Brave the depths of the Goatse Grab Bag! Gaze in horrified fascination and respect at the fine art that is Lemon Party! Become a part of the shocking experience in our Groping Booth! 21300.description: Find your party pole spirit animal from a recklessly selected stuffed animal flock we lasso year-round, cut a hole in its butt, put em on a fancy stick, dance, discover 2nd level dance parties, get sweaty, drink…so many BUBBLES!!! Come to Corny's Party Pole Palace and create the party pole of your dreams at our party pole creation stations.  We provide the materials, you make your delight-filled dancing accessory, shake your butt on the party pole dance floor and chug some of our legendary Rainbow Drink.  Take a insta-photo-booth pic and ride off with your new party pole friend who’s yours for eternity. Make sure to feed your party pole often, it only eats dance and it's always fucking starving!!@#$

21302.name: The Dusty Beavers’ Maple Taffy Stickeasy
21302.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
21302.description: Come all ye playa dappers, dames and ragamuffins and indulge in our beloved Quebecois spring ritual: the sugaring-off party. The Dusty Beavers will recreate the jovial, old-time Cabane à Sucre (Sugar Shack) tradition on the Playa. Maple syrup will be boiled to amber-hued perfection, drizzled on snow (crafted in secrecy, but with love), then artistically twirled into a sticky sweet gem-like glob. Don your dustiest glad rags to chill out in our maple-icious speakeasy and indulge your sweet tooth with nature’s sweetest sap. No beaver pelt trade expected or required in return. Come and experience this unique, sugar fueled ‘joie de vivre’.

21304.name: Physics of Kink
21304.description: Eureka! Ever wanted to nerd out on all the cool physics involved in the kink and fetish world? Well here is your chance. In this class we will explore the thermodynamics of wax play, the tension forces of bondage, and the connection between Isaac Newton and spanking. With multiple live demonstrations of the equations in action, your instructor will even explain how being kinky is actually a lot like being a nuclear engineer. An open discussion on other physics aspects of the world of kink will help us round out an epic hour of naughty nerdiness. Lecture & Demos. 18+, ID required.

21305.description: One ring from many is matched to one stone from many. Craft your unicum – your ringsake forged here, always pointing to this moment. Materials Provided.

21307.name: Ladies: Eros Tangeré Erotic 1on1 Sensation Perform
21307.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
21307.description: Do you want to try something completely new? We’re all looking for ways to have experiences that really rock our world and awaken our senses! Here’s your chance to experience something we guarantee you’ve never felt before! Eros Tangeré is a one-on-one “tactile performance” that can only be described as a sensation experience that is created as your very body is played as if it were an ever changing organic musical instrument. Your body becomes the surface upon which amazing erotic sensations will cascade with the undulations of an amazing music track and scent. Imagine that you can FEEL the expression of music with your body. Shed of your clothes, you lay prone and robbed of your sense of sight, one of our artists will perform upon your body with the music in ways that you have never experienced. This is a unique and creative custom designed sensory performance. Not for the faint of heart. Eros Tangeré is a one on one, sensual adult event. Space is very limited so signing up for a session prior to start time is highly recommended. Check in at the Camp for Sensual Pleasures inside Spanky’s Wine Bar for more info and times. 18+, Ladies Only. This has become a hit-favorite at Burning Man, do not miss it. Appointments are limited.

Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 3 p.m.

Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 3 p.m.
21309.description: Come to Listen and be heard.

21310.name: Being Sovereign in Intimate Relationship
21310.description:
"Sort out desire from co-dependence. Meet your edge. Breathe out obsolete limits. Affirm new decisions. Includes 1 hour Sovereign Breath session. Open to singles and couples. Breathing together is a great way to deepen and bond, so bring your beloved if you choose.

Please be sober -- you will not need any additional substance and it can get in the way of your optimal experience. Sovereign Breath creates an altered state in which many experiences are possible facilitated by your higher self. Bring what you most want to release, shift, gain insight about, step into, affirm and create. Be ready for change. This form of breathwork grows out of rebirthing and is a more feminine, gentle and allowing practice than other more aggressive and cathartic forms. This approach makes more effective the integration of your insights and transformation into ordinary reality, and is easier on the nervous system. Deep states of bliss and bonding among participants are common.
"

Huck, bid, and heckle as Camp UFO brings 4-on-4 Beach Ultimate to Burning Man. Come alone or bring your team. All skill levels welcome. Wed morning, before it gets too hot.

21447.name: Unfucking Sexuality: Intimacy as Art
21447.description:
"Unfucking Sexuality is about decoupling the sex-craving instincts from the desire to connect intimately. Infinite openness awaits your surrender.

When we can separate our desire for sex from our desire to connect intimately, a canvas of possibility emerges in the space between two hearts where we can truly explore intimacy as art.  

Human beings need touch, comfort, safety, love, and intimacy in their lives to feel whole, welcome, complete, and content. Attaining the combination of this cocktail of bliss often is only experienced through a sexual relationship of some kind, and rarely are all of these needs met simultaneously, or by the same person. 

Often, along the path to deepening a relationship or flirtatious connection, one partner or the other begins to dabble with sexual energy through flirting, playful touch, sexy talk, innuendo, or other strategies in an effort to shift the situation into an opening for sexual connection and orgasmic release. 

Sexual energy is incredibly powerful, playful, blissful, and transformative, yet it can also be overwhelmingly tricky and even deceitful to one's self and others if not stewarded with care. 

This workshop explores the fine lines between sexuality and intimacy, between loving touch and sexual touch, and between desire to be with someone intimately and the desire to fuck. 

Through practicing clear and open communication, bringing awareness to the energy in our bodies and intention in our hearts, and by relaxing into the openness of the moment and surrendering any agenda for where it may be leading, the relational space can be transformed into a mysteriously infinite void of possibilities where literally anything can happen. 

Countless women have confided in me that they are frustrated beyond measure by their partner's (or men in general's) inability to be with them in a way that makes them feel safe, free to express their fullness, and feel loved, cherished, and comfortable in their bodies.

21448.name: BLACK ROCK CITY CENSUS CORRELATION AND COCKTAILS

French Maids have become indispensable to the spiritual progress of Black Rock City, no more so than in 2017 with the unprecedented proliferation of altars, most of which have ceased to function properly. 21541.description: Homecoming Dance! Let’s start the burn off right! Come all decked out or as casual as you like, there are no rules here. Get yourself an ice-cold cup of delicious and refreshing spiked school punch or H2O! What school dance would be complete without a commemorative dance photo? Get yours taken while supplies last! While sipping on your beverage of choice, dance your heart out and meet your fellow Burners. Don’t forget to pick up some condoms from the bar for your post dance fun! The first 25 people at the dance will get to spin the prize wheel and pick a new, high quality, sex toy! The Schoolyard exercise balls, jump ropes, hula-hoops, hopscotch, shade, and resting chairs are available 24/7 so come by, have fun, relax, and enjoy!! As always, BYOC!!

21543.name: Ecstatic Erotic Massage (bring a partner)
21543.description:
"High energy beats, massage, up-regulating breathwork, Taoist big draws, awakening energy and intense mind altering sober psychedelic experience.
--

Often in moments of intense experiences we find answers to solutions we could not access. Benjamin facilitates an experience through high energy beats, partner based massage, up-regulating breathwork, Taoist big draws, and awakening energy with the potential to unlock intense mind altering sober psychedelic experiences. Are you curious?

The workshop explores embodiment using one-directional partnered massage. Each set of paired individuals will explore what it means to be in their bodies and fully present while receiving one-directional touch from their chosen giver. If an individual can master blocks in their own body, search for releases, discover new methods, or find hidden gems from being present, it creates a foundation of opportunities that can be unleashed. Some benefits to receiving one-directional touch can be:
• Self awareness
• Communication skills
• Desires & goals
• Coping with insecurities
• Decision making
• Shifting mental states
• Letting go (aka release)
• Moving forward
• Opening doors

How to prepare:
This workshop is partner based or can be experienced solo. A crucial consent, boundaries, and communication section will be covered at the beginning. Individuals will have an opportunity to choose a partner. Please be open to same gender pairings. Triad groups are also encouraged, however one person will not be able to receive due to time constraints. This work can include genital or anal touch, but is not required or expected. You can be fully clothed or naked as when you were born. We mention this so you can be comfortable with others choices in a shared space and define your own boundaries.

Let's talk about our trans experiences on and off the playa. Let’s share our stories and support each other. Our goal is to create a space to feel comfortable being our true selves; we will listen, share, hold heart space, and bring our fullest selves.

WEAR BLUE and join Awesome(ville!), Fuck Yeah, Donner Party + Dawn Patrol as we bring the Tahoe life to the Playa!

21550.name: Pralaya Yoga (Ancient Tibetan yoga + Science)
21550.description: As the creator of Pralaya Yoga, Robert Boustany says, “The PRALAYA YOGA System is continually being optimized to help you develop maximum functional strength, reach the safe extremes of functional flexibility, discover the keys to the best alignment for your body and artfully define the areas that need the most attention.  Pralaya Yoga was developed specifically to support joint longevity as well as to prevent and speed recuperation from the common problems in sports and daily life." On Wednesday at 10:AM, we'll gather at General Portrait Studio.  Our 90 minute class will contain some lecture and some practice.  When we finish, you're encouraged to explore their amazing and welcoming camp (Get pictures of your favorite body part, ice cold beverages, great music, Sea Dragon art car, aerial rig, and warm hugs). On our journey, we'll: 1. Generate Life Energy through Ancient Tibetan breathing techniques. 2. Find ways to Challenge your Body (safely). 3. Explore a dozen different ways to Increase Flexibility in a joint.  4. Discuss the usual cause of any Joint Pain (especially lower back) and how to Avoid/Fix the pain. 5. Compare and feel the effects of these sacred Pranayamas and Asanas in your own body. 6. Understand that Pranayamas are ENERGY exercises, not just breathing exercises. 7. Leave Energized, Elevated and Equipped with new ideas to explore. If you have a mat and/or block, please bring them. All are welcome. Advanced Yogis Encouraged! I promise to challenge you.  Physically, Mentally and Spiritually. I look forward to showing you what I’ve learned from my amazing teachers. Please join us!

21551.name: Blondie Parallel Lines Singalong
21551.description: Don't leave me hanging on the telephone - costumes & props are apropos, bring yours, and/or maybe the desert will provide. One way or another, we will sing the whole album. Picture this: We all sing along with the album from the bottom of our hearts, perhaps on top of a big bus? Fade away and radiate...your flashy blinkies. Pretty baby, please stop by & join us for one or all twelve songs. I know, but I don't know where we'll be placed, just look up VW Bus Camp. It's 11:59, and I want to stay alive. Will anything happen? Yes, Sunday girl, Y comprise un verse en Francais. Once I had a love, and it was a gas, please don't be, a pain in the ass - everyone deserves to sing! I'm gonna love you too - strangers are friends you haven't met yet. When it's over, don't go away sad, don't go pre-fab, don't go away mad, just...you know.

Discover the magic of allowing versus doing. By embodying this ritual, we attune our body to tend toward our highest good while making space to step with clarity into what is next. The healing practice of Medicine Dance to melt some of the walls to giving and receiving that love within. Medicine Dance is a space where we tap into our own intuitive power to heal and be healed. There is nothing to do. The ritual will work it's magic by inviting you to tap into your own without even trying!

21560.description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.

Mind machines change your perception by stimulating balanced, abundant neurotransmitter production, expanding neural pathways, and programming desirable, ecologically sound behaviors. 21655.name: Midnight Star Art Installation
21655.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11:30 p.m. – 12:30 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11:30 p.m. – 12:30 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11:30 p.m. – 12:30 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11:30 p.m. – 12:30 a.m.
21655.description:
Join our Midnight Ritual when the Big Dipper's stars perfectly align with our art installation’s illuminated red rings, that seemingly hover in air. Take a guided meditative tour of the night sky, combining spirituality, music and physics. Led by our resident astronomer and PhD physicist (Nir Lahav), we'll journey from our galaxy to deep outer space, exploring the meaning of the universe and life in the cosmos. Relax, breathe deep, tune in. Located in deep dark Playa near Black Rock Observatory.

The ritual begins at 11:30 with drumming, vocal toning, and other healing sounds. The alignment itself takes center stage just a few minutes before and after midnight. Nir will then center our minds with conscious breathing before focusing our attention on the night sky's mysteries and wonder.  Healers bring vocal toning, singing bowls and drums into the mix, with NASA’s space-sound recordings in which the planets sing. 11:30pm to 12:30am.

Come create your own natural mask recipe with fruits, veggies, coconut water, almond milk and other yummy natural ingredients to soothe and restore your skin to its magical glowing best! We’ll provide all the ingredients, teach you recipes, and you can either indulge with us (while re-hydrating with cucumber and lemon water to groovy sounds of our Loveland DJ) or take your own freshly made mask with you to enjoy in the privacy of your tent (within 24 hours)!

Gender Blender welcomes you to our Annual Smoothie Social! Escape all those dusty boring straight parties, and come mix it up in heart of the queerborhood!! 
 
The whole queerborhood is invited for smoothies, dancing, sexy gender blender games, toss the monkey make-out, and an all-around queer love fest! Special shout out to Glam Cocks, Comfort & Joy, Beaverton, Astropups, Stella, Suspended Animation, PolyParadise, ShamanDome, Yes Please, QueViva, POC Camp, and all the camps that were at the Queer Burner Retreat, and all you other fabulous queer camps - if we didn't mention you please show up so we can mention you next year. Our goal is to create the largest and most epic queerborhood event. So come and enjoy smoothies and shake your tails! All genders welcome always. (If you’re straight but not narrow, you are welcome too...besides by the time you leave you probably will be bent - that's right we recruit!). We will offer both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.

21762.description: Wait...What? You Want What Where? Congratulations! Has your partner approached you with the idea of ass play? Is it exciting...and confusing...and perhaps a little scary? In fact, prostate stimulation can produce orgasms up to 10 times stronger and/or more intense than an average genital-stimulation-only orgasm (lucky prostate owners). Pegging is about pleasure plain and simple and humans are enjoying ass play and pegging without shame or stigma now more than ever. Ass play is for everyone! I’ve been ass fucking and blogging my way to pegging princess empowerment for 12 years and want to share my love of all things penetration with you. I LOVE pegging. It makes me feel powerful, sexy, and feminine. I love the view, I love the adoration I get in return, and I love being a part of heightened levels of sexual pleasure for my partner. Pegging need not be about dominating, humiliating, or degrading your partner.  Join me as we leave our fears behind, bring pegging out of the shadows and into the lighter side of kink, and explore safe pegging 101 and beginner equipment. The workshop includes an interactive demonstration, question and answer, and a few surprises. Now let’s rock out with our girl cocks out!

21792.name: What the Heck is Leadership? A Scientific Approach
21792.description:
Jason Gore runs an executive coaching firm for fast-growing startups.  They firm primarily work with highly-innovative companies that will reshape a given industry or domain.  

Many of their clients are young engineers who suddenly found themselves leading large teams.  They needed to learn what “good leadership” was, identify their blind spots, practice new communication skills, and improve their ability to lead.  After conducting 100s of leadership assessments, the firm has been able to scientifically define what good leadership is when it comes to building teams and innovating in the startup environment.

In this interactive presentation, Jason, the firm's cofounder, will share some of their discoveries, how leadership can be defined, and most-importantly, how what we learn by co-creating in community turns out to be the exact same skills that leaders are learning at startups.  

Festivals like Burning Man are more than just a good time—they are a training ground for leaders, community, and innovation. There’s a reason that many startup leaders go to Burning Man and other festivals. 

Together, we’ll look at what we have already learned about leadership though our community experiences and how to apply those skills to leadership in the default world.  Everyone in the audience will also receive a self-assessment (printed or online) to identify areas that they could improve.

21817.description: Do you have a deep yearning in your heart to meet the Beloved? Do you have a romantic feeling about the words Sacred Union? The search for the Beloved, sometimes called a Twin Flame, starts in our own being, integrating the energy of the Healed Masculine with the Healed Feminine. This IS possible, personally and collectively. First we must embrace the Beloved within us, experiencing the marriage our own inner masculine and feminine. Curious what it takes to actually be radically inclusive? Feeling like Burning Man and default world have too much racism, sexism,homophobia, transphobia, ableism, ageism, classism, and oppression then the magical world you want to live in? Then this workshop is for you!
 
In a fun, creative, interactive way, we are gonna get serious about our collective liberation and what it really takes to make the world a better place. Join us as we dive deep on this facilitated journey of learning tools to deconstruct the current painful and harmful system we live in and rebuild the world we want to see.  This workshop will give you tools to end oppression, pathways to personal and political liberation, and will be rooted in the theme of ritual and will have a liberation ritual component.
 
All genders and backgrounds welcome always!

21849.name: Ritual Augmentation & Decoration (RAD) Services
21849.time:

Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
21849.description:
We at RAD Services are dedicated to imbuing your ritual with auditory and visual zing. RAD maintains a list of ritual augmentation providers and pairs them with ritual events.  Attend office hours or just drop on by and ring the bell for service!  And those wanting to join team RAD Services are invited to contact us!  

We at RAD Services aren't going to own/produce/design your ritual. We don't loan/gift equipment to you. What we do is show up in person, with our stuff, and augment/decorate your ritual with visual pizzazz and auditory depth!

Here is a list of some of the services that we provide (some best in low light venues):

- LED image painting: Image poi, with is a programmable sticks of LEDs, can trace out any image when moved or spun, e.g., fire, lightening, patterns, words, pictures, etc.  Also, these LED props can produce interesting visual affects even when not moved quickly, e.g., flames, fuses, torches, pulsating lights, etc., etc.

- Sound: We at RAD are able to provide a wide range of mobile audio support, e.g., music for a parade/procession or clear dialog for weddings or other ceremonies. Our electric trike moves the audio with your moving ritual/parade.

- Fire: Torches, staff, fire ropes, orbs, poi spinning, etc.

- Video: Front or back lit video projection can help add a new layer of interest to your ritual. You provide the projection surface (e.g., EasyUp side wall) and we bring the equipment.

- Blinky: Many props to decorate any low light ritual, including: LED poi (dynamic color changes), LED staff (two image poi brought together), LED image poi (see above), fiber optic whips (think swarm of fire flies).

- Music: Airy Native American flute background music and parade drum cadence music services are available.

So, you come up with the ritual and we at RAD help make it even more awesome. Contact us soon, as our Burning Man 2017 calendar is filling fast.

21908.name: The Path of (Open) Relating
21908.description:
We invite you to this gathering of Spiritually Minded, Open, Fluid, LGBTQ, Polyamorous, Polysensuous, Polycurious, Monogamomish people. This is a safe, fun way to meet new people who are also participating in Open Relating and to gain some practical tools for your relationship or future relationship(s)!

To chose to live and relate in an open or polyamorous way requires a community of like-minded souls. Without community we do not have the necessary support we need as couples and individuals to love as big as our hearts desire.

Why we each consciously choose to live in alternative ways then the ones that were passed down to us from earlier generations is very personal. Some do it to increase the variety of sexual partners and others do it as a spiritual path to embrace the light and shadow of opening up.

There are many ways to make it work. Some people have stated agreements meanwhile others rely on embodied principles and some are just totally radical. Regardless of your personal preference, most of us were not raised with role models for this alternative way of relating. So we must come together to role model and mirror one another.

As the definition and practice of relating is expanding beyond what we were taught unconsciously by our parents we want to invite you to join the conversation. How do you navigate these waters? What have you found that works? Come just to listen and observe or come to participate and add your own thoughts, questions and perspectives into the conversation.

We invite you to share what is most alive in your heart and come join the conversation of open relationships where we aim to come together to create a Culture of Conscious Relating.

21914.name: The Gardens of Babylon
21914.description:
On Monday we create rather mysterious event for all those passing by. Taking motivation from this year's Burning Man theme, we thought we would tap into a the Radical Ritual and play with a fun concept...

Starting the day with spirituality, we end the day with incredible music. After leaving the first new moon of spring behind, we finalised our program and created a daytime/nighttime 12 hours program of our dreams.

12:00 - 13:00
We start the day with our community college. We are constantly attracting new roads to explore. We hear friends talk about life changing experiences. We read articles on different ways of life. It leads to so many questions. What is ayahuasca? Should I do Vipassana? Why does Sting love tantric sex? Our community college invites inspirational speakers to provide information on interesting topics. Join this talk, be inspired or just listen to the many wonders of the world.

13:00 - 14:00
As we gather in the desert for more than a week, we take the opportunity of this event to ground you, in the desert. Take a moment to step away from the outside world and connect with your home. A beautiful guided meditation accompanied by a celestial communication followed by a cleanse. Not only will this spiritual ceremony set the energy for the rest of our day, it will offer you so much light the rest of the week.

14:00 - 00:00
As we slowly move from our spiritual self into our spiritual animal, we've created a musical program to get those who are passing by stop and dance. Our camp members are completely transformed into wild performers, face painters, tantric masseuses and more.

Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 5 p.m. – 9 p.m.
21954.description:
The rules are simple … yet can change at any time!  First we make the I.D. checking process fun by creating a three-step “fact-finding” mission.  Once visitors receive their Yes. Now. Please. stamps verifying their age, they enter the GameBar.  The GameBar games are a mash-up of twister, musical chairs, and hot lava.  Stools, tables and counters are spread out over a platform.  Each stool has a different color and colored spots are on the bar, the floor, the monkey bars overhead and even the swings on the edge.  Some stools even have numbers or symbols.  The bartender picks from a stack of overly large cards to find out what happens next (or they can just make up a new rule!).  For example, It could be that all people sitting on yellow seats have to go to a blue seat, but they can’t touch the ground, hot lava!  They must climb over and around people, keeping hold of their drinks, of course!  They may have to get a partner and find seats that add up to a certain number.  They may need to have a hand on a certain color and the butts on a different color.  They may have to sit on the bar, hang from the monkey bar, sit on the monkey bar, one foot on a swing, one hand on...the bartender themselves!  There are so many versions and iterations of different rules that the fun is endless.   The patrons will be encouraged, through the cards, to interact with each other as well as those in the street.  There are no points and not even a goal of the game other than to share in the fun and make some new friends!
Bartenders wear matching twister-themed outfits and carry super soaker water guns filled with a tasty cocktail.  There is no “bar” in our bar unless you count the monkey bar!  The bartenders roam around the platform, serving our special blend to the patrons.  
 
The GameBar will be open Monday - Saturday 5pm - 9pm for happy hour game time.

21972.name: Wannabe in the Movies - Movie Themed Drinks
21972.description: Have a movie themed drinks! Act out your favorite movie scene ! Stump or Impress our Movie Buffs and you win a "NO DRAMA CAMP" prize. Hey Baby, have a seat on our casting couch and talk about your future.

21973.name: Lick and Toss Reborn! Birth Canal/Bocce/Ice Cream
21973.description: If you can only make it to ONE Planned Playahood event, what's wrong with you? You should come to them all! But really, this is the one to circle thrice on your calendar! An ice cream social event for everyone. Come lick REAL organic ice cream and toss some REAL bocce balls in our annual bocce tourney. If balls aren't your thing, come get reborn through the cave of wonders birth canal. Swim with sperm in the dome womb and push your way through the love canal right onto the playa. Followed by slaps on the bottom to welcome you to the world, and drinks and music of course! (Watch out for Planned Playahood protesters! You may have to cross a picket line.)

21974.name: Bondage Rides
21974.description: Learn to fly! Explore the unique experience of being bound in rope and suspended in mid-air. Our crew of expert riggers can give you a ride that is relaxing, beautiful, thrilling, sexy, or excruciating. No creepers, photography, drugs, or alcohol; 18+ with ID.

21976.name: E-meditation: A Stimulating Meditation Experience
21976.description:
Hotel California offering a revolutionary E-meditation experience. These sessions are unlike anything you have experienced and will be the first of their kind using new technology developed by some of our campers. All levels of meditation practice are welcome!
You will experience a high-tech, accelerated, and enhanced meditation practice led by our instructors who will walk you through a meditation to wake up from ego and into awake awareness.

21977.name: "Just A Minute" Radio 4 panel game
21977.description: Exactly that. Game where competitors have to speak for one minute without repetition, deviation or hesitation.

21978.name: Men's and Women's Teepee Circle

Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 1:30 p.m.
21978.description: We gather in sacred circles with our brothers and sisters. Each in their own teepee. We hold space for what will emerge within us at that time.

21980.name: FROZEN ICE POPS IN THE SUN!
21980.description: Tubes of brightly colored frozen flavored wonder dispensed to the weary, the weird, and the wonderful

21981.name: Desert Figure Skating
21981.description:
Figure skating’s so hot! Like desert hot! Lutz like Lipinski and spin like Scott. Leave the Kerrigan/Harding drama behind and just “glide.”

You'll learn the moves and participate in a synchronized figure skating routine.

21982.name: The Science of Shift
21982.description: The real science of how change happens at scale and how to do it better.  A full day of speakers and workshops.

21983.description: Avant-garde duo Ginger And The Ghost say they hail from Sydney, but it’s more likely they’re not from this planet at all. Missy Gilbert and Daniel Bourne are first and foremost visual artists who twist their imaginings into textural, futuristic, otherworldly sonic landscapes. This dance party is gonna rule!

21984.name: Coloring Fun

21985.description: A magical happy hour of live DJ sets with hula hoop dancing, aerials, spinning and manipulation (contact staff, dragon staff, poi, hoop, etc.), lights, essential oils, live painting, hand pan, drums, piano, and other musical instruments, with a fire spinning circle at sunset to welcome the moon. After dusk, our fire spinners and friends will venture out into the Playa to drop, stop and spin. Bring your toys and come play with us!!

21987.description: Aloha from the islands! Throw on your best Hawaiian shirt and come to our tropical oasis to party down.  Bring the chill party vibes, we’ll provide the rum.

21988.name: Totally TLC Tuesday
21988.description:
Every day is a celebration! Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun. We’ll will be quenching your champagne thirst with a noon-3:00 happy afternoon. Not in the mood for bubbles? Grab some friends and take a shotski. Bring your own cup! 

TUESDAY: It's Tuesday and you know your still feeling fresh. So come party with us for TLC Tuesday as we burn the house down like Lisa Left Eye Lope to the Crazy,Sexy, Cool sounds of TLC and other great hits from that era. After getting a healthy pour of some ice cold champagne you can cabbage patch your way onto the dance floor and get your running man on until you make a dust devil. High fives, bright colored pajamas, and condoms taped to your Left Eye are highly encouraged. No Scrubs allowed.

21989.name: 'Merica vs. The World Box Hockey Battle
21989.description: Test your skills in this box hockey tournament for global supremacy while drinking home brews and listening to Ennio Morricone, Wu Tang and others.

21992.name: Slutty Seconds

Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.

21992.description: You dressed for desert survival and now you feel lame. The Sluts can help you! Come sluttify yourself into the playa fantastic.

22001.name: •	1 on 1 Shamanic Healings
22001.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 1:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 1:30 p.m.

Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 1:30 p.m.
22001.description:
Dispirited? Stuck? Get on your mountain. We channel spirit, clean up negative energy, rescue lost souls, get you through your shadow to regain flow. 
1 on 1 or in small groups.

22003.name: Quaker Meeting for Worship
22003.description: Worship in the Quaker tradition. We wait in silence in the presence of the Divine, which may move anyone to speak. All are welcome.

22005.name: DodgeSheep with the Magical Bo Peep
22005.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8:30 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8:30 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
22005.description: Bo Peep’s Sheep are ready to brawl in dodgeball fashion. Dodgesheep is a game in which players on two teams try to throw stuffed sheep at each other while avoiding being hit themselves.

22006.name: Worst iPod Ever
22006.description: Join us and share your favorite bad songs as you enjoy some of ours.  You will need a drink.

22007.name: Body Paint by Cannon Blast at Holi High Camp
22007.description:
Holi High Camp brings the madness and color kaleidoscope of the Indian festival of Holi to the boisterous masses of the playa through body-paint blasting cannons. Drop your shirt or pants (or both!) and get blasted by paint. Your body is art and today we paint you with high-velocity cannons. Music/Drinks included!
Be sure to look for our Funkadelephant art car which will be touring the playa and also hanging out around camp and hoping you'll come be part of his herd for an afternoon.

22009.name: An Algorithm for Creation
22009.description:
Fill your emptiness by formulating a new creation story that tells you why you are here, or pick from one of the many existing creation myths that best fit you. 
 
Mankind has always had the inherent desire to explain where it all came from. An origin story to find a purpose, grounding, control, or just be entertained. We’ll examine many of the ancient to more modern myths, and the serious to the absurd. A short tour of the majestic Creation Museum. We’ll dig out the patterns of what makes a great creation story, and apply modern day methods and knowledge to build new ones. At the end, we’ll preach our own personal word of…

22011.name: Hooping for all skill levels
22011.description: We’ll teach tricks and techniques to up your skills, whether you’re a novice or performer. BYO hoops if you got 'em, come regardless.

22012.name: 5Rhythms Dance w/Charlie Korda @ RhythmWave
22012.description: Lets add movement to our bodies and retrieve the animating force dancing through us. Supported by music, environment, intention and the other moving bodies, we play. Using the 5Rhythms map, we follow our feet, awaken the senses, find our creativity and dance. Whether you have danced forever and know it like an old friend or have never thought yourself a dancer, this is the place.

22013.name: Space Camp Night Pt. 2:
22013.description: Each camp has an ultra-vixen.Ready to flaunt your awkward boner and/or erect nipples as Barbarella tries to sex everyone up. Drink:Excessive Machine

22017.name: Squid Mass

THIS IS THE FUTURE AND IN THE FUTURE WE WORSHIP SQUID

Please join us in celebrating and learning about our great leaders and protectors, the squid. Refreshments to follow.

22018.name: Alchemy of Touch “Tantra Connection of the Heart!”
22018.description: Tantra Awareness opens our Heart to Love.  Tantra Touch connects our Heart and Hands to Love.  Touch awakens Intimacy and feeds our Consciousness!

22019.description: Exactly what it kind of sounds like. Better than the Thunderdome.

22020.name: Endless Carnival: Burning Man & History of fun
22020.description: Do you feel like a poem at Burning Man? Unpredictable? Metaphorical? Come hear how the Playa is part of the endless carnival, a kaleidoscope shadow of capitalism.

22022.name: Dino Yoga

22022.description: Embrace your inner Dino and feel the welcoming bliss of Dino Yoga.

22023.name: Slippery People
22023.description: Talking Heads songs performed by Slippery People. Party and Disco. There will be dancing, and lovey dovey, cuz we have time for that nowwww!

22024.name: Ending Jealousy Permanently
22024.description: Transform insecurity into loving yourself, scarcity into deepening intimacy, codependency into enjoying aloneness in this interactive class. Led by Steve Bearman, Ph. D.

22025.name: Gentle Yoga
22025.description: Specifically crafted to help release soreness&pain for those who ran the ultramarathon, but open to all looking for a gentle, easy relaxing yoga class

22027.name: Music and Variety Acts at the Horny Goat Lounge

Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 a.m. – 11 a.m.

22027.description: Come visit Horny Camp’s newest space – The Horny Goat Lounge! We’ll have booze and nightly spectacles, from a capella groups to drag queens to BDSM how-to. There may even be a night of karaoke! Check out our signage on the playa to get a run-down of nightly activates. And if you’re a performer, come by and say ‘hi’ – we’d love to add in your act!

22028.name: Tutu Tuesday Ballet Barre
22028.description: We will remove our bikes to expose the perfect playa barres for your convenience. Bring your tutu and pointe shoes or come as you are for an hour of sweet and sweaty workout in the dust. Mixed level class: both beginner and bunhead friendly.

22029.name: Symposium: The Stoner Food Pyramid
22029.description: With the increasing use of medical and recreational marijuana, it is important to remember the role of proper stoner nutrition. Join researchers from Habitat for Insanity to explore this critically important topic.

22030.name: Noisey Sailors Whiskey Wednesday
22030.description: Join the drunken sailors of Awesome(ville!), the Noisey Boys, and don your nautical attire as we crush some whiskey party- Y'argh!  All pirates and merpeople welcome! We'll be serving whiskey gingers as our artists are there to paint up yer face and body while yer here - no nautical attire?  No problem - we'll paint in on ye!

22031.name: The Sacred Dance of Thai Yoga Massage
22031.description: Watch, give, and receive a 45 minute guided sequence, with some introductory discussion and demos in the beginning on quality and technique for how to touch.

22032.name: Bi-Curious Ball
22032.description: You want it. We want it. Let’s get bi-curious. Drink, dance, and break through yr gender-norms with the noble studs and lusty wenches of Pickle Joint.

22034.name: Last Rites Lounge
22034.description: Join our processional through the neighborhoods of BRC ending in a celebration of the ritual of the passing of time, the mortality of a day in BRC.

Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.

22036.name: The Ecology of the Temple
22036.description: This year’s temple holds a key message about the healing of our dying forests, and gives a voice to the dead pines used to build this sanctuary.

22037.name: Ecstatic Cacao Dance Ceremony
22037.description:
"We will create a little love bubble with Cacao from Bali and dance our heart out. Bring a cup!

Flow 1.0 (tbc)

Cacao ritual
Connection exercise
Ecstatic dance!"

22038.name: Kazoo 4 You Day
22038.description: Come by between 11.00 and 2:00 p.m.,  grab a MINSTREL CrAMP "Blow Me" kazoo, wrap your lips around it and blow

22040.name: Phage Seminar: Infecting the Playa with Science!
22040.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 p.m. – 9 p.m.

Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 p.m. – 9 p.m.

22040.description: Come recharge your batteries with a dose of SCIENCE! Join us for Phage's geektastic nightly seminar series, 8pm. Be there or be unenlightened.

22041.name: Electropop-rocks party
22041.description: An explosion for your ears and mouth — dance to electropop and future bass tunes while sipping Pop Rock cocktails.

22042.name: Playa Choir's Sunday Sunrise Service at the Temple
22042.description: The Playa Choir’s Radical Ritual: Singing you Home on Sunday at Sunrise at the Temple! Renew your Commitment to Life as Divine Art! Non-Dogmatic but Spirit-Driven! Renegade Gospel!

22043.name: Aphrodisiac 101
22043.description: How to enhance the pleasure of your sexuality and the beginning of your evening at BurningMan... Simple nutrition to enhance your fuck–  ‘ing life! Bring your favorite aphrodisiac or a story to share for Show & Tell.

22044.name: Bourbon Bacon and Booty
22044.description: Come join us for all of our favorite things! Taste different bourbons & learn how whiskey is made! *optional bacon & spanks are available.

22045.name: Moroccan Tea Service
22045.description: Burning all day can be exhausting, especially when you’ve got a full night of fun ahead. Come refresh with us in the cool shade of our Goddess Tent, relax on our soft pillows and luxuriate with some hot tea, served the way it should be: by proper maids in uniform!  Wide selection of teas from which to choose!  What makes it Moroccan?  Come find out!

22046.name: 5Rhythms Dance w/Andreas Tröndle @ RhythmWave
22046.description: The 5R practice reveals it's true power when we simply show up and allow the container of these 5 shamanic rhythms to hold clear and present space in which we may for once surrender such notions of planning and presentation and instead discover the pure and exquisite artistry of our true self as it comes forth in a timeless expression of movement, never to be repeated, but always to be remembered.

22047.name: Reclaiming Lost Power From Circumcision
22047.description: The aim of this workshop is for men to get in touch with their wounding from circumcision.  We will explore the wound itself, share in a grief ritual, and hold space for each other as share our journeys.

22048.name: Midnight Blacklight Bacon!
22048.description: Dressed up in your best black light reactive clothes but no where to eat bacon? No worries, CBT Project is have a blacklight, bacon give away. Come dressed in your best blacklight outfit and enjoy the bacon, best blacklight outfit wins a bacon paddle

22049.name: VICE Vietnamese Iced Coffee Service!
22049.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
22049.description: Serving our signature hand crafted Vietnamese Iced Coffee, your cup or ours, enjoyed in a relaxing social Experience - our 17th consecutive year.

22050.name: Deux Ex Machina - Welcoming Happy Hour
22050.description: Come join us at the altar of Deux Ex Machina, enjoy a magical cocktail, and experience Gearotica!

22051.name: Tribal Tantra Heart Opening & Devotional Puja
22051.description:
"Devotional ceremony where we open to the possibility of falling in love with ourselves through the eyes of another

There is power in making a choice to be present. To witness. To be witnessed. A choice to see and be seen as we are and in our highest self When we gather with intention, we gather and increase in said powers. This will be such a gathering... ...and in such times and at such gatherings true magic, transformation, renewal and clarity through spaciousness are even more possible, even more accessible, for that tribal heart intention is an almost irresistible force for ourselves individually and collectively. This heart centered gathering is a simple but profound Puja (Devotional) ceremony of seeing and being seen first in silence, then with witnessing, listening and sharing, so that we may open to the possibility of falling in love with ourselves either directly or through the eyes of another. I invite you to be vulnerable. To see and be seen in this moment. To open to the beautiful reflections in each other. Come to this gathering because you are READY to step up into your full expression. Ready to be the Strong Man and a Powerful Woman who has the right to be met, and the right to love and be loved.

"

22052.name: Foot Washing
22052.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
22052.description: Come get your feet washed with vinegar water, rinsed with a baby wipe, and massaged with lotion! Ask for the special! There’s nothing better than enjoying a nice foot washing and massage while pleasuring yourself with one of our vibrators! Or better yet, engage your partner to help you with that as we tend to your feet!

22053.name: Humphrey's Hump Day
22053.description: Sip on some of Bogart's favorite cocktails and enjoy a screening of the movie 'Casablanca' in the comfort of our Moroccan style Bedouin tent

22054.name: Loving Your Body Temple for Women
22054.description: This body positive discussion and exercises will help women learn to practice loving their bodies and selves more fully!

22056.name: What The? Wednesday
22056.description:
Every day is a celebration! Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun. We’ll will be quenching your champagne thirst with a noon-3:00 happy afternoon. Not in the mood for bubbles? Grab some friends and take a shotski. Bring your own cup!

Blackouts happen. Retrace your steps. You started here yesterday. Ice cold bubbles will lead your way. Champagne and Vodka all afternoon, bring your cup!

22057.name: Beginner's Mind Flow Arts
22057.description: Do hula hoops and swirling ribbons help your hangover? Amateur hoop and flow jam. Beginners encouraged. Bring your own or use some of ours.

22059.name: Flavor Fantasia “Taste Tasting” at The Yum Cart
22059.description: We conjure any taste you desire, including: “now,” “lucid dream,” & “cosmic liftoff!” Savor the flavor fantasia today whilst wiggling your hips to sweet tunes. Bring open mouth & mind.

22060.name: Blender Bar Pre-Sexploration Libations!
22060.description: Join us for this lubricating bar-licious event to prepare yourselves for the Sexploration Party! Come drink, mingle, play games, & get your sexy on! Enjoy beautiful, sexy, hot, wonderful, queer-licious, trans-glorious, fantastic people who you will hopefully really get to know at our play party later in the evening. Catch someone’s eye during this super flirtatious blender bar event. Both alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks will be served. All genders welcome all ways. We mean this - you can be trans, cis, boy, girl, gay, bi, dyke, king, queen, loving these words, hating these words, our neighbors, or from far-away lands across the playa: this night is for you. So let’s enjoy ...each other!

22061.name: Heart Opening Concert with FIA
22061.description:
"A unique, crystal clear voice sharing original songs that stirs your soul and opens your heart. Conscious, healing and empowering music. Fia is an artist and songwriter from Sweden who anchors divine wisdom and shares it in a powerful way that goes straight to the core, she reminds us of who and what we are beyond our limiting beliefs, wounds or stories. Fia's songs guide us back home to ourselves and each other. 

""She has a gift of speaking straight to the soul as she sings and play every cell into coming alive around Universal awareness; the divine wrapped in and around every note she gifts to the listener.""

Fia released her debut album 'Made of Stars' in Oktober 2016 and have since then been touring all over the world. She is currently working on her upcoming album that will be released fall 2017.

”The moment we stop running from the demons in our heads, and instead we choose to love them, when saying yes to life, both shadow and light, our suffering is done, we come alive.” - From the song ”Shedding Skins”, Fia"

22062.name: Authentic Relating Games
22062.description: If you’ve ever felt like the world is asleep, that social interactions bore you or give you anxiety, or that there's more FUN possible in conversation, Authentic Relating Games is for you! We are the antidote for apathy, and the inspiration for a new generation of human social technology that will change the way we treat connection. This is the Authentic Revolution.

22063.name: Harmony: A Multi-Sensory Celebration
22063.description: Join us for a night of magic - great DJs, scented drinks, interactive LED art, live painting, and many other surprises will spice up the night

22064.name: Fishing for Cats!
22064.description: CALLING ALL CATS/FURRY FRIENDS! Have you ever wanted a fishy friend, but were too scared you may eat him? Well worry no longer! Come and catch a fish!

22065.name: Cosmic CaSINo
22065.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 5:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 5:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 5:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 5:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 5:30 p.m.
22065.description: This year, the Casino portion of Stardust Lounge has been re-imagined as "The Cosmic CaSINo" where visitors can encounter a crew of fun carnivalesque characters including space cadets, Tarot card mystics, cult leaders, trash pandas, Pikachu, Domo, and Drunk Elvis. We will once again host our popular game of chance, Shot Roulette. Take a chance and spin the wheel to decide your immediate destiny! Whether you meet your soulmate or have an encounter with MamaBird, you'll never be the same again. We will also have the classic casino table game Blackjack. Gamble with your very soul if you like!

22066.name: Power Of Prayer Global Sunset Drumming Circle
22066.description:
Join Power of Prayer with First Nations' Wisdom Keepers, Red Lightning, Mayan Warrior and Unify for a Global Synchronised Prayer Drumming Circle.

Red Lightning began with a vision to hold a sacred space on the Playa.  Now, returning from Standing Rock to Black Rock, we come together with global synchronised prayer platform Unify, and cultural force Mayan Warrior, to continue the prayer that started at Standing Rock.

For generations, Native American culture has held that the drum is the heartbeat of Mother Earth, and the water, her veins.  Indigenous tribes use drums in various ways to interact with a higher power, known to many as The Great Spirit.  Drums are the channel we use to connect to our spirit, to each other, and to the spirit of Earth. Water is sacred.  MNI WICONI!

The historic, global gathering of hundreds of tribes at Standing Rock standing together for the first time for our water has been prophesied for these times.  Now, we gather under the Medicine Wheel of all nations to carry this prayer forward.  It has been said that peace will not come to our Earth until the circle of humanity is complete; until all four colours sit in circle under the Medicine Wheel and share their teachings. 

Come and experience our unification as a human family as we dance together under the Medicine Wheel to the beat of the drum, playing out to all of Black Rock City on the Playa's best sound-system.  Pray with us on the Playa or engage with us online as we stream our prayer out to over 15 million people using Unify's platform. Join us.  Together, we pray for good health and better understanding.  Together, we pray for deep listening.  Together, we pray for unity, for peace, and for love. 

This is a historic moment you won't want to miss.

This is our Radical Ritual.

22161.name: Surrealist Automatism Nude Body Painting
22161.description:
"Surrealist Automatism Nude Body Painting
Small groups. Eye Gaze. Ritualistic undress. Fear inventory. Be painter and canvas. Explore your artist self, vulnerable self, beautiful self. 

Form in groups of 2,3,4,5, or 6 people. Begin with a partnered eye gazing for 3 minutes. We do this twice. Switch partners, or keep the same partner. If you don't have a partner (odd groups), just sit with the energy and sensations of those around you. Form a small circle and hold hands. Take a few breaths together. Begin a ritualistic undressing and go around in the circle. For each article of clothing one removes, say any fear aloud to the group. Repeat until all clothes removed. Take a moment to reconnect with your partners through eye contact. Ask permission (consent) to paint on your partner's body. You may switch roles, paint each other and the same time, or decide to stay in one role the entire time. Paint without thinking (Automatism). Just paint. Just be. "

This workshop is for people who are YEARS away from thinking about children, parents, folks interested in reproductive justice and those who want an opportunity to ask all the questions they have never had the chance ask!

This will be a storytelling you don't want to miss! Bring your sparkles, spanks, bow ties, heels, yamakas, tzit tzit, and dancing shoes. Smoothie party reception to follow immediately after going to 6pm. All genders welcome and dont forget its a double Mitzvah to get sexy at Burn Mitzvahs - especially those on Shabbas. You dont have to be Jewish to attend - challah and Manishevitz for all! Goys, bois, bubbes, shiksas, shondes are all welcome - the queerer the better! The burn mitzvah is accepting gifts including kosher pickles, rites of passages, and end the occupation stocks and bonds.

From whiskey ginger to rot gut with a pickle back. Each tasting lasts until the whiskey is gone and each tasting is unique.

22189.name: Free to Love
22189.description:
Are you free to love? Free to experience the fullness of love that wants to be given and received from your heart- in this moment? And the next? 

Embodied Intimacy is founded on the idea that relating is the path. All relationships, every shape and size, have the ability to lead us deeper into the mystery of who we truly are. 

Where we are the most vulnerable, we have the strongest defenses. And it just so happens, we are the most vulnerable in our intimate and romantic relationships. 

So... 
໑ How do we handle the strong instincts that kick in when we are triggered? 
໑ What to do when we are overwhelmed and projecting our past fears on the future? 
໑ Is there an alchemical relational process that makes gold out of led? 
໑ Can we transform our wounds, the most ugly aspects in us and our protective instincts, into an even deeper intimacy? 
໑ Can we unshackle biology and conditioning so that we can be truly free to love?

During this 3 intensive we will guide you through simple and effective ways to come back to love, to transform what keeps you small and to take brave steps into all that you are. We will use practices such as Belly2Belly and other Relational & Embodiment Practices.

22190.name: Kinetic Intimacy: Dance Your Desires
22190.description:
"How can we access more vulnerability in the embodiment of our dance to elevate our co-creation to extraordinary moments of presence? Using energetic attunement and listening as our common language, our intention is to explore form and craft containers with such great integrity, that our ability to request and receive consent and play from our hearts, bodies and spirit emanates in our every movement and action. 

An embodied dance of intimate energy; that which can be expressed, witnessed and co-created conSensually, with the self and others, organically, in a safe, conscious container. We will participate in some collaborative movement exercises and discussion that help us become more eloquent and connected to ourselves, to the other, and to how we feel and express about conSensual dance culture.
 "

22191.name: Compassionate Polyamory
22191.description: In this one hour workshop we will explore how to be fully alive in our desire and totally in our hearts. Learn how to be securely attached to your main squeeze (if you have one) and still enjoy flexibility in your relationship.  Learn how to sculpt your relationships based on what you really want in your life right now. Discover how to be compassionate, connected and equally carnal.

22265.name: The Goddess Array: Tantra meets Neuroscience
22265.description:
"What women need, that men don't need, to fully activate sexually. Informational/experiential workshop for couples with at least one female!

Inspired by Naomi Wolf's Vagina (her book, not the real thing). So if no-one's told you, or you haven't noticed yet, men and women are different! Just how different, particularly in sexual response, is only recently being discovered by western science. The famous study of sexuality in the swinging sixties by Masters and Johnson was largely about male sexuality and in a stunning failure of the scientific method they kinda assumed women were pretty much the same......""two arms, two legs, a head, yeah, I think they're pretty much going to react the same way...."" without actually finding out until 50/60 years later!

But there are and have been more enlightened cultures than ours on these matters. It turns out that some eastern cultures had got a very detailed handle on female sexuality thousands of years ago. Ancient tantric teachings turn out to be not a set of arcane practises based on spiritual mumbo jumbo but precise systems of activating the fullness of the feminine sexual response, now being verified by the latest research in neuroscience in the west.

Wolf calls this range of specific stimulations the Goddess Array, and I shall attempt to describe the steps that every woman needs that men don't need and create a container for you to experience the majority of them in one of Naked Heart's carpeted domes. 

Please bring nesting materials and a secret gift for your goddess.

We intend on being involved, participate and to keep contributing to the Burning Man community.
As the time goes on, we make enormous efforts to make our community grow , during the event and throughout the rest of the year.

Flying Falafels is located at The Yard (village)

22365.name: Belly2Belly
22365.description:
Partnered breathing meditation focused on generating intimacy, emotional openness, and physical bonding in a safe, guided, non-sexual way.

"Belly2Belly partnered breathing meditation is a deceptively simple process that rests on multiple dimensions of neurobiology, pranayama, focused sensory awareness, tantric ritual, intimate communion, witness consciousness, sound entrainment, sequenced relaxation, psychological regression, shadow work, neurolinguistic programming, wizardry and primate zoology.

The exercises are designed to dissolve the Western experience of separate self into rhythmic waves of sensation and feeling that are shared with a partner in real time.

What results is a profoundly felt sense of peace and connection, a natural biochemical high that neuro-mirrors intimate love, meditative samadhi and mystical oneness.

The Belly2Belly practices were developed by David Cates in his healing work with sexual trauma. The results were so  potent that David adapted many of the exercises to share in groups.

In groups, we focus on generating intimacy, emotional openness, and physical bonding in a safe, slow, guided non-sexual way. We reawaken our primal need for human connection, animal to animal, body to body, heart to heart, without the stress or uncertainty of sex. By trusting our bodies and each other, we reclaim our original innocence... and remember we are safe."

22368.name: She Rises: A New Story for a New Paradigm
22368.description: Gather for a radical retelling of the times we are living in through a storytelling ceremony. We'll introduce a new creation myth that examine our life through the lens of Cosmology and explore how Earth's relationship between the masculine and feminine influence the evolution of the planet. We’ll keep an eye on history, connect the dots about what is happening on the planet, and hold a vision of the future. Come to participate ... or enjoy the show. What if we aren’t killing Mother Earth? But are holding the dream of who our girl Earth wants to be when she grows up?

22400.name: Eye Gazing and Hugging with Niraj
22400.description:
"2 of the most natural + nourishing forms of human intimacy. Experience ways to get more out of these interactions than you ever thought possible!

Most people avoid eye contact, especially prolonged, and are pretty uncomfortable in a long embrace. Is it any wonder? Did you ever take a class in either of these? Was physical and emotional intimacy part of your schooling? Has anyone ever shown you or taught you HOW to do these things? No. Our culture could care less about how we demonstrate love and affection for one another. That's for the birds, right? Well, no. Women need face to face eye contact with their mates on a daily basis to feel relaxed. They need to be seen. And everyone needs to be touched, lovingly and respectfully, with consent. It is up there with oxygen, so come and learn some tips and tricks how to be a better hugger and a more relaxed, er...looker!"

22439.name: The Tantra Spa
22439.description:
"Half the group get creative and offer a one-on-one experience somewhere (anywhere!) on the spectrum of erotic delight. 2nd hour, we switch.

What is it you'd like to experience? A foot massage? Orgasm? To feel completely held? Spanked? Squashed? Tickled? Tongued? Only you know in the moment what you would like to feel. Whatever it is and wherever it fits in the pantheon of carnal pleasures, there is one sure fire way of experiencing it. Offer it as a service to others! 'Cos giving is receiving, right? 

Write your offering on a piece of paper (supplied). Half the group offer, half receive. Every 8 mins I ring a bell and receivers get to wander the Spa and choose another offering. After an hour, the receivers write down a whole new set of Tantra Spa delights, now inspired by what they've seen, heard and experienced and the former givers now get chance to sample the menu as receivers."

Motorboat Monday
Urban Dictionary defines Motorboating as, “The placement of one's face, specifically the mouth, into the area between a well-endowed woman’s breasts followed by a rapid shaking of the face in a side-to-side motion accompanied by yelling. The resulting sound that is created sounds similar to an outboard boat motor.” 
 
Come see what all the fuss is about. 
 
We’ll be serving The Wet Kiss – Lick those lips and pucker up because it’s Motorboat Monday. If you need to whet your whistle, we can help with a healthy dose of amaretto, sweet and sour, and watermelon schnapps. Just the thing to get your motor running.

22460.description:
The Game has a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written. 
 “The Game”: the love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and "American's Got talent".
 “The Game” is perfect for letting one's imagination out to play. 
Watch what happens when permission is given to create, with wanton abandon. 
“The Game” is both a game of chance and skill (if you want to believe that.)
 Remove a self-limiting perspective, gain new insights in creative problem solving. 
Come play 'The Game' at the dusty taint

22465.name: Tickling & Sensual Touch from sensual to sadistic
22465.description:
Touch is a vital part of whom we are, how we interact with the world, and most importantly how you connect with a partner or loved one. Many of us have engaged in sensual touch with a lover or tickling at a young age, but are you aware of how well the two can work together to make an amazing sensory experience with someone? Whether it is tickling to tears, to moans of delight, or simply squirming Domme Kelli Lynn Sage and Bagelfather are well versed in this and will be leading this class in sensual touch and the art of tickling with a partner. We have learned the ropes over the years and want to pass our wisdom on to you. We will instruct you, with the help of audience volunteers, in the art of tickling and sensual touch. 

We will also cover consent, basic bondage, negotiation, safe words, having a positive relationship with kink, as well as touching. This event is for those 18 years old and over (please bring your ID if you look young). People of all gender identities are welcome to attend. It is best if you can come with a partner so you can practice some of what you learn, if you come alone we cannot guarantee to partner you up with someone. We recommend bringing a towel or something similar to lay on the ground to sit on. In addition we ask that you be respectful of all participants and remind you to ask before touching someone that you have not made arrangements before hand.

If you wish to volunteer ahead of time email Bagelfather@gmail.com, also feel free to let us know before we start if you are interested in demonstrating.
