22522.description:
We will be creating on our mini clay canvas. You get to design a piece of greenware  (unfired clay) in the shape you would like. Either a 3D object or flat piece ready to receive your favorite photo, will be burnt on in a kiln.
I will have an assortment of cookie cutters for the design challenged or those moving through quickly, to the next art exhibit.
This can be a wearable art piece or a small plaque, your choice.
Let's have fun playing in clay.

22523.name: Bee Love Swarm
22523.description: It's time to get our buzz on and swarm our fellow Burners with love and a little sting! Dress as a bee or adorn yourself in yellow and black as we swarm the playa! We'll meet at the Loveland dome, provide swarm and sting lessons and then head out to the playa looking for recipients to swarm with love and a loving but memorable sting! What to bring or wear: all bee themed accoutrements, a bee-u-ti-ful smile and silly attitude.

22524.name: Richard Cheese Dirty Martini Monday
22524.description: Get to know Dick Cheese in a way you never thought possible!

22525.name: Liquid Contact Dance
22525.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
22525.description: Discover the fluid nature of the body, learn to move like water as you flow with others in divine synchronicity. Yoga clothes.

22526.name: Sunrise Champagne & FIRE
22526.description: Come join us to welcome the day with a glass of bubbly and a sunrise fire jam. Bring your fuel, fire gear, a safety and a cup!

22527.name: Kava Closing Ceremony
22527.description: Close your burn with kava, the drink of peace.

22528.name: Face Painting
22528.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.

22529.name: Body Activation: Wake Up the Mind & Spirit
22529.description: Wake up the body, starting with stretching & gentle hatha yoga until you've broken a sweat, then we'll chant, meditate, kundalini and gong bath!

22530.name: Boozy Slushy Happy Hour at SLUSHIOUS!
22530.description: Cool off, boogie down, turn on & juice up at Black Rock City's Famous Boozy Slushy Happy Hour.  DJ Mac Harris with the funky house to stimulate your electric senses!  Meow!

22531.name: Galactic Yoga
22531.description: Midweek refresh! Come dust off your mind, body, and spirit with a grounding power flow. All levels welcome!

22532.name: Tantra Puja - Mirrors of Emotion
22532.description: Simple but profound traditional tantra ceremony of seeing and being seen beneath our stories and in our raw self as a pathway to healing.

22533.name: Rare scheduled Acapplaya Performance
22533.description: Enjoy a rare scheduled performance by Acapplaya, Burning Man's original acappella jazz sextet!

22534.name: Distaff Shatner
22534.description:
A William Shatner impression contest for WOMEN!

"But...for...how...loooOOOOOOooooonnnng?"

I don't know...we can probably be done within an hour, I guess.

"And...at...whaaAAAttt...coooOOOOOooooosssst?"

Nothing. You might even win something.

Ladies, perform a fondly remembered James Kirk monologue. Emote for the ages as T.J. Hooker. Sing "Lucy In The Sky With Diamonds." Whatever you want, just as long as you do it SHATNERIFICALLY! 

There'll be an Act-Like-Bill competition, a Sing-Like-Bill competition, and a Bloviate-On-A-Talk-Show-Like Bill competition. Laffs, fun, maybe even some prizes, all overseen by your favorite Seattle burner, Nogoodnik. I hope you KHAAAAANNN!!! come!

22535.name: Sinners Social (Cosmic CaSINo)
22535.description: We welcome friends old and new to kick off the Burn at our sinners social! Here’s your chance to meet the Stardust crew and explore our many interactive offerings. Take a spin on Shot Roulette at the CaSINo or get a radical Changeover at the Chapel. Discover which of the seven deadly vices will send your soul into ruin this week!

22537.name: Sacrificial Altar to Dionysos @ PartySnail Maenads
22537.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 7 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 7 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 7 a.m. – 7 p.m.
22537.description: Surrender & remove masks to become intimate with your true ecstatic nature.  Write down your sacrifice & submit it in our box to be burned at Temple.

22538.name: Why is Conscious Uncoupling for Lovers?
22538.description: How would life look if our partings were filled with Love & Honor? How do we evolve from old paradigms of Soul-mate to Soul-hate? Why bother?  What if all your relationships were full of compassion and honor, from rev up to wind down and into a different phase of friendship, marked by honesty and generosity for others and yourself.  How did we get here, and how do we get there from here?  What is a source fracture and how is it effecting our capacity for Love today? Are you stuck in a mire of blaming, self-loathing, or inability to trust?  With the assistance of wisdom dispensed by relationship expert Katherine Woodward Thomas, and the life changing jewels of clarity by human connection expert Dr Brene Brown, lets explore together how to make the deepest levels of Love possible!  The power is in you to begin this reality today!

22539.name: One-Hit-Wonders Tunes-Everyone-Knows-the-Words-To
22539.description: Dance Party and Sing, too!  Hosted by our in-house DJ Tupoc Biggie Small Latte Vanilla Frappaccino.

22540.name: 5Rhythms Dance w/Mackenzie Amara @ RhythmWave
22540.description: In this Sweat Your Prayers style dance we will greet each other as if for the first time while we say our first goodbyes of the season. We will dance, pray, cry, and laugh with each other in celebration of our beautiful existence together and apart. There will be love.

22541.name: Join the Great Proletarian CATural Revolution!
22541.description: Kittyzens of Black Rock City: Throw off your shackles and unite! Assemble at Commeownist headquarters to make glorious revolution. Run missions to level up in the Commeownist Pawty. Earn a chance to meet Chairman Meow himself!

22542.name: Vermiculture for the Urban Culture
22542.description: Do you yearn to speak worm? Come learn how to start a veggie garden with built in composting. Worms not included.

22543.name: Lawless and Disordered Black Rock City
22543.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
22543.description: Internal conflict? Head and Heart disagree? Clearly you need the drama of a courtroom (court-shade structure) to find resolution! We will zealously represent both sides of you in the case of You vs. You. We’ll also supply the judge, the bailiff, and a psychological expert witness. You bring your conflict, and any witnesses that can shed light on it. A jury of your burner peers will hear the evidence and render a verdict for one side of you.

22544.name: Incendiary Challenge
22544.description: Embrace life's bad decisions. Try our three step challenge: Hot, hotter, horrible. Alcohol involved, 21+

22545.name: Buffer Zone
22545.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
22545.description: We are the original ... Car Buffer Massage! Give a buff ... get a buff.  Imitation is the most sincere form of Burning Man.

22546.name: Spiritual Enlightenment Championship
22546.description: An open contest to see who is the most enlightened shanti god/dess on the whole playa. 10 will enter, only one will win. It's gonna be insane.

22547.name: Happy birthday to everyone
22547.description: Ever wish you could have all your closest friends around to celebrate your birthday? This is your lucky day because today we're celebrating everyone's birthday.

22548.name: Life Drawing
22548.description: Life drawing in the Garden of Eden. Draw or model. Materials supplied. Spot the snake.

22549.name: Diva Thursday at Paradise Motel
22549.description:
Today our DJs will be featuring the powerful vocals of your favorite Strong Black Women as you chill and enjoy a snow cone in the shade

If you'd be interested in being a guest DJ please contact us.

22550.name: Discussion: Building a Community
22550.description: Discussion on the nuances of participating in and building, community, particularly as we seek to create supportive environments in the modern world

22551.name: Exploring Sound & Skincare as Ritual
22551.description: Replace routine with ritual as we share how to love ourselves as a practice combining sound therapy, massage, amazonian skincare, & meditation.

22552.name: Make Your Own Loincloth Workshop
22552.description: We provide the tools, instruction, and fabulous fabrics so you can walk away in your own creation!

22553.name: Radical Breathwork @ RhythmWave
22553.description: Radical breathwork, a journey with Jimmy, Stephane and Karen: Guided breathwork, evocative music, bodywork, and toning in a safe and supportive container. A powerful way to release and integrate emotions and traumas, access transformative, non-ordinary states of consciousness, and to rejuvenate and relax.

22554.name: AA (Alcoholics Anonymous) Meeting
22554.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
22554.description: An open 12-Step meeting for anyone with a desire to stop drinking. AA Format. We are a dusty, hella unglum lot! AV also hosts other 12-step program meetings. Pick up a Playa Meeting Directory at Anonymous Village!

22555.name: Playa Portraits
22555.description: Come dressed to impress and take home a polaroid and link to a digital portrait to remember forever.

22556.name: SLUT OLYMPICS
22556.description:
The SEVENTH-annual international Slut Olympics championships! Think you have what it
takes to go for the gold? Do it right and become a playa legend!

22557.name: Book Group Smackdown
22557.description:
Tired of book groups where everyone reads the same book and discusses that one book in nice, polite language? Come to the BRPL Book Group, where everyone brings a different book (your favorite?!?) and argues that it is the best.

Yelling, cursing, logic and other forms of persuasion are encouraged, but not required.

22558.name: N8Tron Spins Some Funk
22558.time:
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4 p.m. – 7 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4 p.m. – 7 p.m.
22558.description: Come indulge in a dance party, drink PVD's ...Playa Vodka Drinks and get twisted on our giant twister board.

22559.name: Eye to Eye...Contact! with Niraj
22559.description:
"Yes, Edwin Starr said it best! It's more intimate than sex. Controversial, but true! Commune with your playamates. Nurture and feed your soul! 

Most western cultures are intimacyphobic. No wonder there are epidemics of depression and unhappiness. We rarely actually meet! Enjoy the experience of truly being with another, even if you just met! It really is possible, honestly!"

22560.name: Chakra balancing Cuddle 'Shop
22560.description: Come and enjoy your time in the dust cuddling, in a safe, sweet environment. We will go through a flow of different cuddle poses, grounding, nourishing and connected to balance the body-mind. Come with loved ones or alone, we will find cuddling joy, and connection!

22561.name: Intimacy through Japanese rope bondage
22561.description: An exciting, hands-on introductory workshop on the historical and artistic world of Shibari. Explore reasons for wanting to tie or be tied up, the safety factors involved, how to choose the right ropes and lengths. We teach foundational ties, and some intriguing variations, as well as explore a dynamic use of bondage from the sensual to the artistic. No previous rope experience is necessary.

22562.name: Reverbia Jam and Tea
22562.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 3 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 3 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 3 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 3 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 3 a.m.
22562.description: When the night starts to chill the warmth of tea will thrill, at the after hours live music jam and tea house.  See acoustic and jam trios nightly perform as we serve you hot tea in a warm space.

22563.name: Superhero Comedy Hour
22563.description: Come try out stand up or sketch material, hilarious story-telling (yes you can read off notes!) or hop onstage with us in the second half of the hour to do some super-heroic character-building improve games that will activate your fun vibration for the rest of the week.

22564.name: The Melon Ball
22564.description: Do you consider yourself a melon baller? Test your skill and strength in a series of melon contests for the chance to win fabulous prizes, while shaking your cantaloupe to some fruity tunes. Happy hour will conclude with a one-time only performance of A Melon Is Born: The Ceremonial Reenactment of the Birth of Juan-Gabriel.

22565.name: Marijuana Anonymous Meeting (Open)
22565.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4:15 p.m. – 5:15 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4:15 p.m. – 5:15 p.m.
22565.description: Marijuana Anonymous is a worlwide fellowship of people who share our experience, strength, and hope with each other about our recovery and help others to recover from marijuana addiction. Our purpose is to stay free of marijuana use and to help other marijuana addicts achieve the same freedom. Marijuana Anonymous uses the basic 12 Steps of Recovery founded by Alcoholics Anonymous.  Newcomers are welcome!

22567.name: Emote-a-thon: Reclaim your passion
22567.description: Embody your hidden anger, your silent sorrow, or your forgotten joy. Step into your feminine to express fully, or hold space from your masculine. This will be an opportunity for Women (or femine identified) to step into the full range and the full force of their emotions and to express them fully towards a will, capable Masculine counterpart. For Men, this is an opportunity to face thebiggest fear that exists inthe heart of men, The raw unbridled feminine in all her beauty, depth and terrible, awsome might.

22568.name: Camp Beaverton's Lesbian-ish Lending Library
22568.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
22568.description: Come by the Lesbian Lending Library to pick up a good book or share one of your favorites! Trashy lesbian romance novels guaranteed!

22569.name: Dusty Taint Annual Onsie Party
22569.description:
Dress in your most comfortable, sexy, obscene, animalistic or average onsie. 
Hang out.. laugh, drink, 'conversate', meet new friends and pre-game the most incredible week ever! 
Brief and illustrious notoriety and fame for the 'warmest', 'softest', 'most revealing', 
and most EPICALLY AWESOME onesies.

22570.name: Acoustic Jam
22570.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
22570.description:
Bring your instrument or just your voice and join us for an amazing afternoon of singing songs from the 60's thru the 80's that we all know and love.

We will have songbooks and a shady spot to gather.

22571.name: Sorry, It's Pop
22571.description: Autotune, synthesizers, Ariana Grande et al. Booty shaking, lip syncing, no remixes. Sorry we’re not sorry -- this dance party is Top 40 AF.

22572.name: Amateur Body Painting
22572.description: We’ll do our best, but no guarantees!

22573.name: 10 Principles Spirituality
22573.description: Explore the place from where the 10 principles emerge.

22574.name: Hardly Salsa Dancing (doesn't come with chips)
22574.description:
Need an electronic music break? Salsa instruction (8PM) and dance party to follow 9PM until?

Moral Hazard and the Siren Zara will be available at 8 PM for some salsa dancing instruction. Dance party kicks off at 9 PM!

Note- we will be dancing on the dust, so spiked heels are maybe not the thing to wear.

22575.name: My Heart's Calling

22576.name: Belly Dancing with Vera
22576.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
22576.description: Learn basic belly dancing techniques, posture, and movement. Be ready to undulate. Early arrivers will receive a gift!

22577.name: Arduino Winky Blinky Demo
22577.description: Setting up IDE for an Arduino using the FastLED library.  Program the arduino for a WS2128B LED strip. Patterns explained & demoed.

22578.name: German Sparkle Party
22578.description: Rubber boots and party pants. You bring the sparkle. We’ll bring the German. It’ll be a party. Expect gold bootie shorts and industrial music. Our sexy bar mistress will be cooking up some Black Magic. Come enjoy a sip of hardcore awesome with this combination of blackberry liqueur, cranberry juice, and grapefruit juice. Stick around for shots of Jägermeister and Barenjager.

22579.name: Mid-Burn Review
22579.description: Meet with your manager who’ll assess your P.L.A.Y.A. performance issues/successes. We’ll outline our strategy to help you achieve your B.U.R.N. goals.

22580.name: Blues and Booze at Fire and Ice Lounge
22580.description: Blues and Booze at Fire and Ice Lounge nearly every day! Come blues up your day and evening with Fire & Ice Lounge blues men and women doing it! IT!

22581.name: Lower Back Massage
22581.description: Would you believe me if I told you that the solution for your lower back pain is a good ass rub? Come find out.

22582.name: Concerts in the Shade
22582.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 6 p.m.
22582.description: Come enjoy a series of 3-4 live music groups each afternoon, as they bring you music for your soul and sole (dancing feet). Acoustic groups begin, Conscious Dance bands close.

22583.name: Fire Competition
22583.description: Fifth Annual Hellfire Spinning Competition! Each year we get some of the best fire talent in the world competing for the top prize! BYOC because the bar will be open! If you are entering come early to sign up! Music is provided for fire spinners!

22584.name: Sunset Aerial Show
22584.description: Stick around after our Jamiroquai Happy Hour and get enchanted by our lovely aerialist display over a beautiful sunset and some vibey tunes.

22585.name: Bubble Butt Yoga
22585.description: Yoga dance party.  Poppin' bottles and poppin' booty right before you downward dog.  Join us for a twerkin' booty champagne bonanza!

22586.name: Being a Man in the 21st Century
22586.description: What does it mean to be a man in the twenty first century?  How can the tale of Iron John be used to define this? As we relax together over a shared hookah, we will have a mediated discussion of maleness and masculinity and how the initiation of 'adult' maleness might be approached in this new age. Maximum of 30 participants, or however many we can fit in the dome.

22587.name: TALKING HEADS - *Stop Making Sense* Party
22587.description: An annual tradition! Join our camp and the Talking Heads for a swampside Stop Making Sense watch (and dance!) party. Sing along, dance with David Byrne, and go wild out on the playa with one of our absolute favorite bands of all time!

22588.name: Pink Heart Water Bar and Pink Lounge
22588.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 8 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 8 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 8 a.m. – 8 p.m.
22588.description: Gaze out at the Playa from our Esplanade Viewing Station while you enjoy ICE COLD CUCUMBER WATER. Quench your thirst while relaxing in the Pink Lounge on our pink fur couches.

22589.name: DESTINY'S SPICE PARTY
22589.description: The Brits and the Americans have a special relationship...with girl groups!  So bust out your Union Jack dress and some Tina Knowles couture for this SPICE GIRLS vs. DESTINY'S CHILD daytime dance party.  And don't worry 'Commander' fans, we will play solo singles!  Come for the hits, stay for signature cocktails: Girl Power Punch and Bug-a-Beer!

22590.name: Shemagh ONLY Party
22590.description: Have an awesome shemagh or two - or three? Show up to the bar to dance in your best shemagh and forget the rest! Dance away to electro swing with all your friends and ours and show off those shemaghs in pure Burning Man form. If you are not sure how--our fabulous bartenders can show you the way!

22591.name: Make Exodus Wait Again: Real Talk Self Reliance
22591.description: Join Ira Wing from Gate, Perimeter & Exodus for a panel discussion about all the things. We'll explain how to Exodus using this one weird trick; you won't believe it!

22592.name: Stutterers/Stammerers are Burners, Too
22592.description: Stutter/Stammerer? Care about someone who is? Let's talk in a safe judgment-free space about what we face on playa & off. You have a voice!

22593.name: Tantra Play Party
22593.description: Celebrate sensuality/sexuality in a safe space. Erotic celebration opening ceremony @ 10 PM. Guys must be with a goddess. 21+ ID Required

22594.name: The Humaniversity AUM Meditation
22594.description:
Release your stress and reclaim the joy of being alive.
This Humaniversity AUM meditation guides you in a safe and supportive environment through 14 aspects of the human experience: personal power, forgiveness, love, stamina, life energy, chaos, dance, sadness, laughter, sensuality, chanting, silence, respect and sharing. It is a Social Meditation that combines movement, role playing, and vocal expression. By participating in the AUM Meditation you can experience a deep sense of aliveness, warmth, relaxation and acquire a taste for life again!

22595.name: Inhabit You
22595.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 11:30 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 11:30 a.m.
22595.description: This movement based class helps you connect into the intricacies of joint movements so that you feel more powerful in your own skin.

22596.name: The Magic of Human Connection!
22596.description: Blissful & powerful heart opening workshop using partner activities to activate the INFINITE POTENTIAL of MAGIC and LOVE within CONNECTION!

22597.name: Easy Listening Lemonade
22597.description: Summer breeze, makes me feel fine. Lemonade will be served while listening to soft rock. Do you know the difference between soft rock and yacht rock?

22598.name: The NoTown Bar
22598.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4 p.m. – 6 p.m.
22598.description: Stop by and enjoy our mature-themed carnival games, chunes from our resident DJ’s, and some tasty libations served by our surly Canadian bartenders. You might even get to meet the famous Donk. More Rye, Less Pants! 21+ only.

22599.name: Make-a-molecule mixer
22599.description: Mix it up with your fellow (bunson) burners by being your favorite atom at the Mindshark Bar. Real scientists (chemists not guaranteed) will assign you an atom and shake things up to see who you bond with unless you decide to split...

22600.name: Breath of One
22600.description: A life changing ancient practice that will allow us through breathing to open our hearts connecting with our purest inner and higher self

22601.name: Post Burn Wine and Chocolate Party
22601.description: Dear Mr. Burningman: Thank you for taking the time to burn for us again this year. This was the bestest summer ever. We’ll be back next year.  Love,Penguins

22602.name: Black Rock City Cell Phone Throwing Competition
22602.description: Campmates using their phone too much? Bring them, their phone(s), & 2 sealable plastic bags and see how far their phone will fly!

22603.name: Playa Art Tours
22603.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
22603.description:
Tours to the Playa Art with a wheelchair accessible trailer,
 2 hours, must sign up on Playa in Advance. Mobility Impaired always have priority.

22604.name: "Partners in Flow  "
22604.description:
""Partners in Flow"" is a movement based share that takes the weight sharing elements of Contact Improv and melds it with partnered dancing for dancers and those seeking to start moving. 
We will explore what I call “The Flow Loop”. TFL is what I see happening within connected partnerships when we listen, respond, allow ourselves to be inspired and share our own voice. My belief is that investigating these principals will give us the tools to create more dances in the “SWEET SPOT”, where your brain gets to shut off and you body moves with grace.
If you have never dance before, Gina will take you though exercises that will give you the confidence to move with another person. 
And, if you are an accomplished dancer from any genre consider this your cross training. Gina will be exposing  you to concepts that will take your dance to the next level. Specifically giving you some tools to enable you to have connection and conversation with all levels of dancers. 
Come play with us!

22606.name: Afternoon Tea Cocktails
22606.description: Happy hour at the croquet lawn. Tea themed cocktails and lawn games.

22607.name: Art Bike Ride
22607.description: Want to see the Playa Art from your bike? Join the Hammer And Cyclery Art Appreciation Society for our bike art tour across the Playa!

22608.name: Discussion: Spreading Burning Man Values Beyond
22608.description: Informal discussion on how we can extend the way of Burning Man beyond the trash fence

22609.name: Uproarious Fire Orchestra
22609.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 p.m. – 11 p.m.
22609.description: Join our fire spinners and set the night sky ablaze. Fuel for guest spinners, LED flow toys for beginners. Music, dancing, and drinks for all!

22610.name: Erotic Fanfiction Readings
22610.description: ‪Bring your favorite fanfiction and read it. Hilariously terrible fanfics are strongly encouraged. Your OTPs won't make out on their own.

22611.name: Forest Experience
22611.description: A consensual, non-sexual sensual sensation workshop to reinvigorate the mind, body, and soul.

22612.name: Learn to Listen and don't show up!
22612.description: Don't come to this event, I repeat, DO NOT COME TO THIS EVENT! We will work on listening during this (very) short workshop.  Seriously, don't come.

22613.name: Sex, Power, Awakening
22613.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
22613.description: An experiential, interactive and informative workshop designed to light your fire! No partner necessary, no overt sexual activity. The power of creation is expressed potently through our sexuality. The full spectrum of duality from the highest high's to the lowest lows manifest through this raw, primal,  juicy, very physical aspect of each human being in ways that are unique to each one of us. This powerful force of nature provides us with an individualized doorway through which we can awaken to who we truly are.

22614.name: Ask a Mathematician, Ask a Physicist
22614.description: Ask a Mathematician /  Ask a Physicist is two people sitting in the desert talking to other people in the desert.  Ever wonder about the universe?  Entanglement?  The nature of logic?  Got a nagging question that's been bothering you for years or just want to hang out and listen to other people's questions?  We can help!

22615.name: A Symphony at the Temple (Weather permitting)
22615.description: The PlayaPops is glad to offer its fourth season of acoustic classical + programing for our 2017 season. We are 80+ string, woodwind, brass, percussion, and other musicians performing a one hour program including Sprach Zarathrustra (you know this--- 2001: A Space Odyssey), a movement from a Mozart Symphony (Jupiter), Rainbow Connection, Carmina Burana (you all know this piece lol),  Beethoven X2 (Egmont Overture and Ode to Joy), Dance of the Ghazies, Ashokan Farewell, and Radiohead! …We’ll also have premier soloists and audience participation…Come join us for something truly different for our 5 show season (with one back up performance time) for 2017!

22616.name: Slap, Bump, Choke BRC Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Club
22616.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
22616.description:
Slap Bump and Choke. BRC BJJ Club
Camp Settle This Like Men brings you an opportunity to Slap, Bump and Choke in a non-sexual, but still mostly consensual, way. Burning Mans’ only Jiu Jitsu club, we offer almost 400 s.f. of grappling mats for you to get your Jits Fix in. We’ll have Black Belt instruction almost every day, unless they’re hung over, in which case you’ll get an inferior substitute.
Class at 11:00, Free Rolling (gi or no-gi) at 11:30. Loaner gis available.  
Sure, we’ll choke you, or bend your arms backwards, but it’s all in good fun. Think of it as involuntary yoga. Open mat free rolling begins at 11:30, and that’s when the real fun begins. 
Bring your gi! We’ll have some loaners, but only in my size, A2, or A3. Or, go no gi. Just wear something over your junk. This ain’t that kind of camp

22617.name: A Whole New World
22617.description: Disney sing alongs and friendship bracelets

22618.name: Osho Mystic Rose Meditation
22618.description: We’ll journey together through laughter, tears, and silence to experience their sacred healing power.

22619.name: The Jim Reynolds Band
22619.description: Jim Reynolds has flavours of Americana, Pop, Funk-electro, and soul-metal written into the fabric of this band. Come groove to the sounds and feels.

22620.name: Live Figure Drawing! Artists and Models Needed!
22620.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
22620.description:
Center Camp Café : Live Figure Drawing! Artists and Models needed!
Daily Tuesday through Friday 3pm-4:30pm - look for the circle of seats around the platform towards the 3 o’clock side of the Spoken Word stage.  Seating is limited!
We supply sketch paper, easels and drawing materials, FC/FS or bring your own!
Want to be a model for artists? Clothing optional!  No experience necessary! Models can sign up in advance at the Volunteer booth (located at the 9 o’clock end of the coffee counter) at least 30 minutes before start time for a better shot at a slot. We get a lot last minute walk up models. 
It doesn’t matter if you are a gifted artist or a beginner who always wanted to try your hand at figure drawing or modeling- come give it a try!

22621.name: Playa Piano Lounge
22621.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
22621.description: Share your musical talent or enjoy somebody else's and create lifelong playa memories around this piano during your burn. Shade and chill space.

22622.name: Fire and Ice Party
22622.description:
Dance Party-live DJ's from a actual Ice Pirate Space Ship , Fire performers and Sexy Brulee Bar that dreams are made of... 

RED and/or WHITE attire is highly encouraged. Red if your kink feeds your fire, like Brulee, White if you party like a Ice Pirate.

22623.name: DJ Medley
22623.description: All Yummy DJ's show off 30 minutes of their business

22624.name: Orgasmic Meditation:the art of Pussy Stroking
22624.description: Connect with your partner in a direct, vulnerable, intimate way. No performance, no goal, just explore sensations. Couples only.  Orgasmic Meditation (OM) is a partner practice where a woman's clitoris is stroked very gently and intentionally for 15 minutes with no goal other than being fully present together. It is a mindfulness practice that brings more vitality, attention and connection. Nikoletta and David will create a safe, clean and playful space for couples, with a demo and a first guided practice.

22625.name: Lucia N°03 Immersive Light & Sound Experience
22625.description: Using light & sound to create a profound DMT-like experience stimulating a meditative state as you witness the profound beauty of your consciousness. Event held at Healing Dome.

22626.name: Clothing Option Qi Gong
22626.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 10:45 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 10:45 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 10:45 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 10:45 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 10:45 a.m.
22626.description:
QI: The life energy that flows through and permeates all things, according to Ancient Eastern Medicine (AEM). Their version of The Force, essentially. According to AEM, slow or weak qi is the reason we feel weak. Stagnant qi is the reason we feel PAIN.
GONG: A lifelong process for improving, enhancing and perfecting something.

QI GONG: A lifelong process for improving, enhancing and perfecting your qi.

CLOTHING OPTIONAL: If you don't know what this means, I won't be the one to tell you.

AEM teaches us that sweat is chi leaving the body, so if there's anywhere you need this, it's on the playa. Come build that nourishing life energy every morning after breakfast with your favorite Seattle burner!

DISCLAIMER: I am not, and don't claim to be, any sort of qi gong master. I'm just someone who knows a thing or two about it and would like to share it with the playa.

22627.name: Bang Bang's Wild Animal Party
22627.description:
Every year Bang Bang throws super welcoming Wild Animal Party, this year will be no different. This is our turn to get you feet dancing once again, get the neighbours over and invite all our new friends from the Playa. Got leopard print. Damn it you are invited. A human who likes to dance like an Animal, you are invited. Got a heartbeat you are invited. Well in fact our Camp is briefed to invite everyone they meet from all over The Playa, so basically YOU ARE INVITED!

We will be serving Saloon Juice and slinging Aussie slang and insults at you all night long (remember we are joking 99% of the time).  Our good friends from many other camps in the Tokyo Sector will be there as well to come and DJ while we entertain, so escape your own sector, hit the back streets and join us at this neighbourhood / suburb party, where we can just literally be silly like we are at a Wild Animal House party. 

Rated 5 stars on some app, given two thumbs up by two guys, worth every second of your time said some guy last year.

22628.name: Beer Toss
22628.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 7 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 7 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
22628.description: This year, just as every year, when the sun drops out of the sky so do the BEERS!!! Park your thirsty self outside the AutoSub dome at sunset and look skyward!

22629.name: Capoeira Workshop & Roda & Discussion
22629.description: Join us for an intro to Capoeira class and a round table discussion about the relationship between culturally-rooted movement and cultural appropriation versus appreciation. We will discuss what it is like to be an insider/outsider in a world of a movement style with a complex history of liberation ideology.

22630.name: Captain Scurvy’s Shanty Sing
22630.description: Shiver me timbers! Shanties ahoy! Come have some grog and sing with us!  Lyric sheets provided.

22631.name: Nikola's Naptastic Napventure
22631.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
22631.description: For the weary wanders in need of a shady shanty! Come levitate your legs under V&T's humble hammock dome.

22632.name: Got a 60s Party If You Want It(3) British Invasion

22633.name: Le Kafé Mornings
22633.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
22633.description: Step out of the morning sun and start the day right – Le Kafé style! Our cheerful, sexy servers in French maid regalia will jumpstart your body and mind with organic coffee and tea. Want a little breakfast treat? Nibble on pastries, biscotti, and maybe even some authentic French crepes. Don’t forget to bring your own cup!

22634.name: ARRGH BAR “BOOTY SHORTS BOY PARTY”
22634.description:
Sexy Pirates, Booty shorts, One bar, lots of RUM...OH MY ... Too hot to handle
Hosts:  Admiral Steve, Pirate JT, Vice Admiral Morgan, Dude, Mistafur

22635.name: Sunrise Service @ The Temple!
22635.description: The Playa Choir’s Radical Ritual: Singing at Sunrise! Renew your Commitment to Life as Divine Art! Non-Dogmatic but Spirit-Driven Renegade Gospel!

22636.name: TEA TIME AND GIANT GAMES
22636.description: TEA Time starts at 4pm but we will be serving THAI ICED COFFEE at Serenity Giant Game Camp, with Battling Giant Jenga Towers and lots of other Giant games Game Camp open everyday Look for the traveling Giant Connect Four Game Car on the playa.

22637.name: The Drinkery
22637.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.

Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, September 4th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
22637.description: A mobile experiment, The Drinkery is a pedal powered bar. Find us pedaling all around BRC from deep playa to center camp serving up shots & cocktails under our exclusive VIP circus shade. Come drink & ride with us!

22638.name: Live Music Lounge
22638.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
22638.description: Are your ears yearning for LIVE music? With a blend of original material and classic covers, D.avid J.eremy will surely have you singing in the shade! Set your clocks to chill and come join the fun.

22639.name: Unicorn Psychology
22639.description: Manifest your unicorn magic. A group to explore positivity, connection, and your inner rainbow.

22640.name: Morning with an Egg Bot
22640.description: Meet the "EggBot". Demo of a CNC robot for drawing on a 3 dimensional surface -- an egg.

22641.name: Shibari Sanctuary Salon
22641.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
22641.description: Open tying at Shibari Sanctuary. Come watch Kinbaku (Japanese rope bondage) or try being tied yourself.

22642.name: 10th Annual Marching Band March Off!
22642.description: Shake your BRASS @ The Marching Band March Off, same bat time on Friday @ 8pm in Center Camp Cafe. Chaos! Tubas! And so much suspense! Who will win? You can help decide!

22643.name: Holy Sacrament of the Man
22643.description: The time has come for you to drink the kool-aid.  Join us at the Buddha Bank Shrine located at the man pavilion to receive the holy sacrament of the Man.  Come for communion and receive the body and blood of The Man.  As we drink the cup and eat the bread, we reflect on The Man's sacrifice for us.  Look for the metallic monks.

22644.name: Get Blintzed on our Blinis
22644.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
22644.description:
Blintzkrieg is a theme camp centered on the ritual of breaking fast to the core of people’s beings by nourishing their tummies and taste buds with delicious and surprising flavors. After a long night on the playa wouldn’t you like a “schmoke und a pancake? No?” Well then, how about a blintz!
 
What is a blintz?  It’s like a crepe, only tastier and more transportable, something quintessential when it comes to all the lightning-quick decisions you have to make on the playa.  A blintz is one standard-issue crepe pancake combined with a sweet, cottage cheese-like filling (or a savory potato and onion filling) that is then rolled into a small burrito-like form to fit nicely in the palm of your hand. Delicious!
 
Come groove with the camp and ask your skilled blintz chefs for the latest flavor, and hang around in our shade structures to meet other hungry travelers. Blintzes will be offered every day from 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM, or until we’re out of blintzes

22645.name: Mandatory Union Break
22645.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
22645.description: Our PiRat Bar is the home of the Yo! BRC Volunteer Labor Union where we offer "shots of sympathetic listening" and forms for volunteer workers to submit their demands.

22646.name: Face mask staring contest
22646.description: Cleanse your face & have fun. We've got goofy animal-themed face masks, which you will wear and (optionally) compete to keep a straight face the longest

22647.name: Rocking Tutus!
22647.description: Join us for Rockin Tutus!  Classic Rock and the best bartenders on the playa!

22648.name: Bazaar of Wonders
22648.description: Visit the Raider’s Bazaar of Wonders! Test your steel at the armory, refresh your spirits in the apothecary, find your armor at the haberdashers, or simply claim a gift from the curio shop. And for those with the sharpest mind and bravest souls solve the riddles to unlock even grander rewards!

22649.name: Emote-a-thon: Express what scares you
22649.description: Speak from your deepest heart. Embody your hidden wells of passion as the sacred feminine or receive its full force as the conscious masculine. THis will be an opportunity for Women (or femine identified) to step into the full range and the full force of their emotions and to express them fully towards a will, capable Masculine counterpart. For Men, this is an opportunity to face thebiggest fear that exists inthe heart of men, The raw unbridled feminine in all her beauty, depth and terrible, awsome might.

22650.name: Spin the Room Famous Energy Meditation
22650.description: Lawrence has travelled the world spinning energy and the room. He continues to offer people full body sex energy transmissions...

22652.name: Whiskey Tasting AKA The Colorado Party!
22652.description: Bring yer favorite bottle of fire water and a cup. Gift and share the best whiskey your new playa friends have to offer. Single malt, Bourbon, Rye, and Moon Shine are quite acceptable. You worked hard to build the city, it is now time to have a good stiff drink.

22653.name: Monkey Magic
22653.description: Follow your ears toward the ooo-ooo-ooos and aaa-aaa-aaas of the Dust Monkey tribe and join us for an evening of music and magic. Feel the silky growls of our handcrafted subwoofer from the plush trampoline pillow lounge or the highest peak of our scaffolding. Use those opposable thumbs to grab a friend and get down to our luscious melodies. Bring your brightest lights to create a dance of color and shadow on our interactive light installation.

22654.name: Tantric Forgiveness Ceremony
22654.description: We limit our capacity to feel & to love by holding on to old stories. To forgive & ask forgiveness is a gateway to the freedom and love we desire

22655.name: Moon Hoop Workshop
22655.description: Find your flow inside the sacred circle. Set aside the showy tricks- this workshop is all about syncing body + circular movement. Suitable for all hooping skill levels.

22656.name: ManKind Project: Circle of Men
22656.description: This will be an interactive workshop offering men a chance to stick a toe into the shallow end of the kind of work that the ManKind Project has to offer. Men will be heard, supported on their own journey, and not judged. We work on shadow; what I hide, repress, and deny about myself, and about personal power. More than 60,000 men have been through the New Warrior Training Adventure weekend. What did they get out of it? And what might you get from this work?

22658.name: Kamikaze Karaoke
22658.description: Good singer? Bad singer? Who cares!? Join us for Kamikaze Karaoke where you can belt out your favorite show tune or ballad with a little liquid courage from a Kamikaze cocktail.

22659.name: Exploring NonVerbal Consent with Your Inner Animal
22659.description: Mraaaooooww!!!! Purrrr. Wooof! Grrrr... There are many ways to communicate without words! Come release your inner animal and explore non verbal communication and consent at Miso Horny with Tygar.

22660.name: Won't You Be My Neighbor? Mr. Rogers Social
22660.description: Come on over for a morning beverage, wear your best loved cardigan and meet your neighbors.

22661.name: Brooklyn Block Party
22661.description:
Bored with the Snooze House and Playa Tech everywhere on playa? BROOKLYN’S GOT YOU. 

Come get your groove on under the Brooklyn Bridge, Chrysler Building, and Empire State Building! Our DJs and MCs will be spinning only the hottest throwback jams, 90’s hip hop and R&B, while you strut yo stuff on our runway and get harassed by vagrants in the K Train.



We’ll be linking sound systems across all boroughs with art cars The Electric Bubble Bus, Thunderius Gumbonium Lahontanii, Art Carfunkel, the MyPlayaPonies, Sparkle and Flame + surprise car guests!



Brought to you by New York City's Kostume Kult, Thunder Gumbo, Kashyyk, Heroes & Super Villains and Magic Hour.

22662.name: Beginner Fans
22662.description: Indulge your curiosity for fans/tech fans. For those who have never picked up a flow art or others who are looking to learn a new tool. Ask for Eve!

22663.name: Ariadne’s Labyrinth @ PartySnail Maenads
22663.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
22663.description: Ariadne was the immortal wife of the wine-god Dionysos.  Her labyrinth, which we set up on the playa, is for you to enjoy.  Labyrinth walking in an ancient practice used by many different faiths for spiritual centering and contemplation. Entering the serpentine path of a labyrinth, the walker walks slowly while quieting their mind and focusing on a spiritual question or prayer.  Lose yourself to find yourself.  Look for the colorful fabric and multicoloted LED rope lights at night.

22664.name: Afternoon Tea Delight w/ John Craigie
22664.description: Come relax, drink tea, and listen to the awesome music and storytelling of John Craigie!

22665.name: Midmorning Meditation
22665.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
22665.description: Take time this morning to find your center.

22666.name: Lucia N°03 Immersive Light & Sound Experience
22666.description: Using light & sound to create a profound DMT-like experience stimulating a meditative state as you witness the profound beauty of your consciousness.

22668.name: Acro Stretch And Massage
22668.description:
The playa experience can be taxing on the body and cause tenseness you wouldn't anticipate. Our partner stretching workshop will unwind you and get you stretched out in a safe, inviting environment. 

We'll focus on moves you can easily replicate and bring into your practice effortlessly. Please join us for the most relaxing time you'll have at Black Rock City.

22670.name: DUST-ed
22670.description: DUST-ed is a new educational program presented by PlayaSkool, the co-founders and creators of TEDxBlackRockCity. Have you ever really fucked something up but learned a shit ton from the experience? Startups, projects, businesses, relationships . . . we all take it in the kisser sometimes. Quite often, these "interruptions" can lead to amazing breakthroughs in business, life and relationships. We want to focus on some of the biggest and most amazing stories from within the Black Rock City community where citizens overcame adversities only to thrive in the the wake of failure. Come and SHARE with us!

22671.name: BDSM on a Budget
22671.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4 p.m. – 6 p.m.
22671.description: The practice of BDSM can be a very expensive endeavor.  One might get discouraged from exploring their fetishes because of the prohibitive cost of toys and furniture.  If this is you, come learn great tips and tricks to do terrible, awful things to your partner on a tight budget, making use of inexpensive and common household items near at hand!

22672.name: Wings of Eos Shrine Ritual Opening Ceremony
22672.description: Gather at sunrise around the Wings of Eos shrine for its ritual opening ceremony, meditation, and reiki healing service.

22673.name: Seuss-face
22673.description: Get your eyebrows painted! Want pink? Get them shits pink! Want blue! Get them fuckers blue as fuck! You will look stupid WITHOUT them. Idiot.

22674.name: "Kimono Disco"
22674.description: Come out for a day of fun in the sun on the playa where you can feel sexy, silky, and free while dancing on Miki Beach to the lush beats of a talented roster of DJs and special guests!

22675.name: Soaked So-Wrong Slut Fest
22675.description: Soaking your sarong has never felt so wrong. Come enjoy a cool drink, a wet sarong and some hot bedouin action!

22676.name: Cold.Sweet.IceCoffee
22676.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
22676.description: Sweet. Cold. Ice Coffee while supplies last at Camp Cyberia!

22677.name: Camel Toe Contest
22677.description: Think your camel toe is the fattest on the playa? Let us be the judges. Our bartenders are camel toe experts.

22678.name: Playa Tattoos
22678.description: Mark your burn with dusty regrets or happy sparkle memories-your choice!

22679.name: Feldenkrais Workshop w/Shara Ogin @ RhythmWave
22679.description: At the seat of our souls, core to all of our ambition and desire lies our heart. Though gentle, relaxing movement sequences along with inspirational meditation, you will leave the class standing straighter and taller and with your shoulders falling back behind your chest. If you are experiencing any pain, you might find it improve or resolve throughout the class.  Feldenkrais helps with the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. This will help you with your late nights dancing to the beats, or with walking long distances through the desert. As we radiate more love out into the world, the world can’t help but smile back.  And with that, only magical shifts can follow.

22680.name: Upcycle Your Very Own Flogger
22680.description: Our resident dominatrix shows you how to create a flogger from bike tubes and other re-used materials. Perfect for flogging your friends, lovers, and mortal enemies.

22681.name: Tutu Taco & Tunes Tuesday
22681.description: Join the Misfits for Tacos & Tunes on Tutu Tuesday. Wear a Tutu, get a taco, enjoy the Open Mic and share your talents! While supplies last.

22682.name: Body Scan Meditation
22682.description: A practice in mindfulness-based stress reduction & liberation through awareness. respect the start time, don't disturb the journey of others.

22683.name: Animal Role-Play Class
22683.description: Ever wanted to explore what it might be like to give up the heavy mantle of responsibility that comes with being human?  To not have to speak, make deadlines, feed yourself, if at least for a little while?  What does it feel like to be owned and cared for as a beloved pet?  Curious kitties, puppies, ponies, pigs, and animals of all genders welcome!

22684.name: That's Not Punny - A Treatise on Bad Puns
22684.description: Low on content, heavy on puns - subject matter TBD/made up on the spot, but will probably include a short history of wordplay and interactive punning.

22685.name: Hatha Yoga for Your Chakras
22685.description: Slow paced yoga, with a pose designed to open up each chakra.

22686.name: Toddies and Tiaras
22686.description: Join us for a tiara making party while you sip on one of Awesome(ville!)'s signature cocktails. Wear your creation for our Sinderella's Ball at night!

22687.name: Mental Health and the Scene
22687.description: Interested in how kink and BDSM can often be a force for increased mental health?  Have a tale about a scene that did more harm than good? Curious to hear the stories and journeys of others? Learn about and engage the intersections of mental health and the BDSM scene in a friendly round-table format.

22688.name: Furry Friday Manplay
22688.description: Go beastly over furry men? Smooth to Sasquatch, adult 18+ Gay/Bi/Curious men let hair way down for erotic manplay in our discreet air-conditioned tent

22690.name: Annual Trash Fence Ride
22690.description: The trash fence. Miles long. Deeply mysterious. Ride it all with us and get lost finding yourself. Daft Punk sightings guaranteed*. (*Not guaranteed.)

22691.name: Smokey Tortuga’s Taco Tuesday
22691.description: Since the dawn of time, spiced meats, vegetables and guacamole had flown freely from the loins of humanity. Then one day, it happened: these homeless flavors found themselves seated in the golden throne of a tortilla.  As everyone knows, the birth of the first true taco was on a Tuesday. Celebrate the occasion with a taco of your very own! *Please bring your own bowl and utensil to reduce moop*

22692.name: Literary Salon
22692.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
22692.description: Come hear smarty-pants bibliophile Burners share some of the most fascinating, thought-provoking, or otherwise stimulating passages and essays that they've come across this year!

22693.name: Make Your Nipples Hard

22705.name: Hechi-Ken Hamazaki / Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD
22705.description: Art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. This performance was inspired by and arranged from traditional Japanese tea ceremony. The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please simply drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thoughts inward for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me. Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- is always a great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy. I'll be happy if we could find any great idea to make a brighter, better, and more enjoyable future through this tea ceremony.

22708.name: Poly High Juice Box
22708.description: Think poly is complicated enough? Try adding children to the mix. Weather you're poly with children, or otherwise in an open relationship with or contemplating children, this special Poly High Tea discussion is for you. Bring the kids and lets hear from them if you like (or dare)! If all this seems overly daunting, don't worry - it is! So let's put our dusty heads and hearts together and see what we come up with. This is an open discussion facilitated by Peter & Gretchen (aka Adam & Eve) about all things poly with children. This will be their 8th Burn, and the second with their 5 year old daughter, Veronica. Don't expect us to have all the answers, instead come to both learn and teach! Juice boxes and animal crackers provided to help grease the conversation.

Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:30 a.m.
22730.description:
We’re BAAAAACK!

By popular demand, Mr.+Ms. Mudd are again hosting our fresco classes for Burning Man 2017, this time at Black Rock City Welding and Repair!

Our greeting: Come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Our host theme camp, Black Rock City Welding & Repair (Thank You for having us! ;), welcomes you all to their location for these wonderful fresco workshops/classes.

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various old time techniques to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. Participants will learn to recreate various historical mixtures that compromise the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally, the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes your momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!
All materials are provided, simply bring yourself, and enjoy this wonderful, enduring art process that is ‘old as time.’

Details:
Our location is at Black Rock Welding & Repair, where we’ll have our classes. See you there!

That’s NOT all!
We’re offering an unique community event; we invite everyone to participate w/ your hearts+energy:
@Playa Art Park+elsewhere on the playa, we offer you our rocking ‘Paper Boats,’ for creation of wonderful music+inspiration for your soul.

The Blurb:
#Land Pirates Ahoy! ‘Paper Boats’ be Rockin’ Waves; you Scalawags get to Work— HEAR Music Created by Motion and Winds that Lash About! Decks be scrubbed with Words Learned!
There be CHRISTENINGS, Mateys! Bubbly cider+water served to all #Land Pirates that attend! (Bring yer cups and while supplies last! ;)

Find us—Join us @1pm!

22765.name: The Divine Masculine & Feminine Healing Circle
22765.description: 'The Divine Masculine and Feminine Healing Circle' is an event where the men of the playa are invited to step into their higher selves, and consciously hold the energy of the Divine Masculine. Josie Posie leads a ceremony where the women of the playa welcome the men lovingly at the entrance to the dome, inviting them to match the high vibration they hold. The dome becomes an Ancient temple space. The men then stand in a circle offering unconditional love and healing to the community of women who gather in the center. The women come for healing their trust of the Masculine and to receive their love. This is a hands-off workshop. There is no touching except optional hugging at the end. When men show up and become the pure presence of their Divine Masculine nature and truly witness, then women can relax into their loving Divine Feminine nature and fully become that love. As both polarities open to their Divine essence, we transmute cultural wounds in the collective feminine and masculine for all of humanity, co-creating a needed and beautiful new story of balance.

22773.description: We will take a brief look at what the voice is both mechanically and spiritually. This will provide context for why it is terrifying for so many of us to speak or sing in public. Then we'll take a look at a handful of exercises which will help build vocal awareness, and a number of participants will receive individual instruction in front of the group (very limited. 22774.name: Playa Recipe Swap Meet
22774.description:
This is an open forum for culinary enthusiasts. Let us create a burning man gift together: a playa recipe cookbook! Join a relative newbie on a quest for radical self-reliance at her second burn; the quest for good-as-homemade food with no RV, a very long drive, and a small budget.
 
Let’s talk about food! Share in my journey from one week of nothing but military rations to setting up my first playa kitchen. Learn with me about frozen pre-made meals, dehydrated pre-planned meals, coolers, and home-made solar ovens. Teach me what you have learned about cooking on the playa, swap recipes and techniques. If I have had any success, we can also share something tasty from the solar oven!

22779.description: Contact Improvisation is an open-ended exploration of the possibilities of bodies moving in and out of contact. Wild and athletic, or quiet and meditative, it is a dance form open to all bodies and inquisitive minds. At the jam we practice, research and play with other dancers, following our own dance as it flows through the movement constellations we find ourselves in. Facilitated warm up and mixer with Stormbird and LoveGrenade.

Come to Naos Ekstasis to experience an epic class on how to deliver a great spanking.  Topics such as consent, negotiation, spanking techniques, aftercare, and more are covered. 22796.description: We got Shandies! We got Silly Songs! That’s it!

22797.name: Vinyasa flow
22797.description: A smart flow inspired vinyasa class where you will practice a few sun salutations A and B before stretching your back, opening your chest and doing some twists. We will also practice some pranayama and of course will spend some times in meditation and/or full relaxation. You will feel renew and centered, ready for your burn!

22798.name: DIY Coffee Roasting
22798.description: Come by and see how easy and satisfying home roasting your own coffee can be.  A morning cup for first arriavals.

22799.name: Knots & Rigging Workshop
22799.description: A beginner to intermediate level workshop on knots and rigging.  Learn how to secure and fasten your load.  We provide the rope.

22800.name: You made it here. What now?
22800.description: There’s a million ways to be at Burning Man. How do you choose? Come reconnect with your core values and orient your Burning Man compass.

22801.name: Erotic fruit and vegetable sculpting
22801.description: Love to sculpt? Like fruits and vegetables? Admire the human physique? Well, come on over to Feed the Artists, the Playa’s premier gourmet food camp and learn how to turn fruits and vegetables into exotic and erotic shapes. Some fruits and vegetables provided, but bring your favorites too. And if you like to model, bring your body parts too. Photo contest for best sculptures! Creative dipping sauces available too. Come eat your fruits and vegetables in your favorite shapes.

22802.name: Passion and Purpose
22802.description: A new minimal approach to ignite passion and discover your life’s purpose presented in a hilarious and anecdotal manner, guaranteed to leave you with new insights and simple routines to easily incorporate into your daily life.

22803.name: 36 Questions to Love
22803.description: Bring someone close, bring someone new or come alone and meet someone also searching for love. Ask through 36 questions to love together. Face to face, eye to eye, love and light.

22805.name: Clam Jam Extravaganza
22805.description: Its shirt-clamming season! Come bare your bits & share Caesars with these crazy Canadians. Watch out, tickets issued for illegal clam-digging.

22806.name: "PRIMAL REVIVAL Knowing Your Role In Tribe "
22806.description:
"Hyarchy is a circle and getting back to our design is key to healing the worlds chaos. Who are you and what to you bring to the tribe? Alpha, Omega, Gamma, Beta, Dleta... what's your designed role? 

How can we ALL be empowered through understanding to thrive as tribe then be at war? 

How can we all take our seats at the table and go from isolation or codependency to interdependency? 

How do we heal our communal world through our human animal bodies and contributions? 

These are the questions we will visit, contemplate, and ponder together as we discover ourselves and what we are born to be. Blending and mending in order to join together and crush it! "

22807.name: Fuck it's HOT!
22807.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.

22807.description: Come cool down in our misting domes and chill out in the heat of the day.  Fuck it's HOT!  But we've got something good for you . . . mmmm.

22808.name: Warrior Wave w/Andreas Tröndle @ RhythmWave
22808.description: Turn your wounds into the powerful qualities of a healer-warrior. Dance wildly, rest in the beat, and deep medicine of your own wild tribe.

22809.name: Shamata Meditation
22809.description: This meditation practice called  is Shamata which means peaceful abiding where we synchronize mind and body by focusing on the breath.  Sitting meditation will be broken up by brief periods of walking meditation where the focus will be on sensation of the feet meeting the ground instead of focusing on the breath. We will do two periods each of sitting and walking meditation.  A Q&A will follow.  If time permits a diad will be tried.

22810.name: Skepticism IS a Radical Ritual
22810.description: Half of what we know is wrong. The odds in a coin toss are NOT 50% as usually believed. This talk explains how/why we “know” things that aren’t true.

22811.name: Wizard Wars: Magician Competition
22811.description: Calling all magicians and magic aficionados! Join our open mic magic show for fun, or compete for Best Wizard of BRC. Wizard cocktails will be served.

22812.name: Mr. T Time
22812.description: A tribute to the man himself. Do you have enough gold chains to be part of the TEAm?( we also accept booty shaking.) Afterall, it takes a smart man to play dumb.

22813.name: Stillness Practice
22813.description: This talk will bring insight and a pathway into the depths of being through the 7 Stages of Stillness where access to awareness, clarity, expansion, and Divine Wisdom take place from a grounded and living practice that may improve your perception of self and existence

22814.name: Deep Mindfulness Meditation
22814.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 6 p.m. – 7 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 6 p.m. – 7 p.m.
22814.description: Come sit for a bit and engage in traditional meditation practice.  Ground into presence and awareness, open with equanimity to what is happening moment-by-moment, and let the energies within you untangle and flow.  A guided meditation will help us bring balanced, clear awareness to our breath, body sensations, and thoughts in our minds, with some time afterwards for question and answer, and discussion.  Bring a something to sit on, if able.

22815.name: Stay out of MindShark
22815.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 11:45 p.m.

22816.name: The Meatles at Fire and Ice Lounge!
22816.description: Meet the Meatles at Fire and Ice Lounge at their exclusive playa-only show. Jim, Peter, Larry and Ringworm perform your favorite Meatles tunes!

22817.name: Shaft's Yoni Worshipping Workshop
22817.description: We all came from the Yoniverse so let us learn to Worship the Sacred Space that is the Vagina. Women and men come with a partner or 2 and learn the art of the Yoni Massage in a space of worship and meditation.

22818.name: Move with the Mystery w/Tess Howell @ RhythmWave
22818.description: 5Rhythms is a moving mindfulness practice, a powerful dancing pathway to greater presence.There are no steps to learn, nothing to get right. We can learn to avoid the places where our mind messes things up and surrender in to the sweetness of our own body-based intuition. What opens up when we let the mystery move within us? We will use the dance to get out of our own way and to let life flow through us- so that we can learn to flow with it all...lightening up, letting go.... surrendering our sense of separateness as we drop into beat, bassline, breath, bones.

22819.name: Kilted Men Reading Poetry
22819.description: Come one come all to the soft manly art of wooing, as demonstrated by a selection of Whiskey and Dust menfolk. Poetry and sonnets read in the round by Kilt wearing speakers of the words from lovers and artist’s centuries dead. Soft lighting and reclining

22821.name: Dandara - Documentary Screening and Discussion
22821.description: Dandara Zainabo has a scar around her belly button from eating bricks as a young child. Today, she is a 19 year old trans activist living on the streets of Rio de Janeiro. This experimental portraiture seeks to preserve the spirit of this mighty woman as both powerful and precarious.

22822.name: Get Ahead!......Make A Head Piece
22822.description: Come and create! Head pieces for The Masses!

22825.description: Drop by for an energy healing session with Ravi Mishra. Ravi has been practicing meditation for 9 years, is the founder of the meditation app Awaken, and will be sharing a healing modality based on Reiki. Each healing session lasts about 10-15 minutes and does not include touch (unless you want it to! :) - drop by and check it out for yourself!

Partake in a Pay It Forward coffee grinding experience, wifi connections, and bean toss challenge to enhance your morning brew! The electric gypsies are ready to help you get your head on straight with a taste of your morning routine BRC style. BYOC!

The hot desert heat will help with those muscles. By the end you'll be walking out like yous Gumby.

22838.description: Has dehydration and lack of fiber stopped up your pipes? We can help! Natural remedies like prune juice cocktails, tea, coconut and figs get your flow moving again.

22839.name: Be a Lamplighter!
22839.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
22839.description:
Lamplighting and Sacred Ritual!

The Lamplighters are one of the longest-running moving art projects on the playa, and one of the many longstanding daily rituals of Black Rock City. Drawing from lamplighters of ancient cities, the Lamplighters gather volunteers from the city each night and maintain, light, and hang over 900 kerosene lamps in a procession that goes through the heart of Black Rock City. Come and be a part of the our sacred ritual.

22840.name: Healing the Fire Within - Soul Fire Workshop
22840.description: What pain are you carrying? What hurt are you feeling that has caused you inner turmoil? The first class of the Soul Fire Workshops series is focused on healing your inner blockages that have been caused by pain, hurt, and karma. This class will give you the tools and techniques to begin igniting your soul’s fire. Day 1 will be the beginning of the challenging work.

22841.name: Hatha Vinyasa Yoga
22841.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 a.m. – 9:30 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 a.m. – 9:30 a.m.
22841.description: Wind down from your deep playa sunrise with strengthening hatha folds and meditative vinyasa stretches.

22842.name: CANADA DAY!
22842.description:
Canada Invades BRCU, We’re Sorry! Come for the maple syrup, stay for the healthcare. Canadian Whiskey, Beavers, Caesars, and Apologies.
Try out the Maple Collins, a mix of maple finished whiskey, pineapple juice, and lemon. We’re sorry if that’s not enough. So sorry, we’re sorry.

22843.name: There's no place like Dome!
22843.description: You finally made it; Home sweet Dome! Come on down and help us crack open The Saloon for another week of hollerin', hijinks and hootenannys!

22844.name: TWERKSHOP
22844.description: Can you twerk? Prove it. Want to learn? Our sluts will show you how. Let's form the world's biggest twerkle.

22846.name: Elemental Wave w/Mackenzie Amara @ RhythmWave
22846.description: The 5Rhythms®--Flowing, Staccato, Chaos, Lyrical, & Stillness--correlate to the five elements that make up our natural world: earth, fire, water, air, & ether. Through the dance we will learn, discover, and enjoy our own elemental nature by connected to the big-picture and the defining elements of our world.

22847.name: Guerilla Rope and Art Bicycle Tour
22847.description: Do you love playa art?  Do you love to tie people up or be tied up?  After a quick meeting at our camp to cover safety guidelines, we will then venture out on the playa to share our passion of rope with others while directly interacting with the sculptures on the playa.   Please bring plenty of water and your own transportation. If you are the one doing the tying, it would be best to come with a partner and a supply of rope.

22848.name: Detox/Retox
22848.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.

Friday, September 1st, 2017 6:45 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.

22850.name: LobSTAR Lounge - *host YOUR OWN playa event here!*
22850.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.

Come radically express yourself! Please check in with our camp on-playa about availability. First come, first serve!

22851.name: Dissolve Into Connectedness
22851.description: Enjoy a series of guided Tibetan Buddhist practices led by Dr. David Bach and dissolve into deep feelings of profound love and human connection.

22852.name: Abuelo Fuego Procession
22852.description: Join us in our processions to and from our shrine of eternal consciousness!  Departing from the Black Rock Notary with music, dance, sage and ritual!!

22853.name: Faye's Festival Face Painting
22853.description: Come on down to hellfire and learn how to do a wicked tribal face paint, or a radical ritualistic design for the burn. We will have some paint, but feel free to bring your own water based or grease paint along with some brushes.

22854.name: How To Fuck Like A Goddess  (Wombyn only)
22854.description:
"How To Fuck Like A Goddess and Be Worshipped Like One Too is a workshop dedicated to activating the consciously competent mystical wombyn inside! As with all Muse's offerings this space will be a closed, safe container holding us wombyn/women in a ceremonial circle to share, witness, learn, and grow. We, as the empowered sexual and feminine wombyn brand new to today's world are hungry to rejoin one another in walking this Earth and here is where we can start that journey together. Honoring that our type of wombyn is the first generation of its kind, built from the efforts of our fore mothers and ancestors, we will give thanks and give way to what has to come next to keep progressing. 

Now that we are these powerful juicy GWADDESSES, what now? 

Here is a space where Muse will lead you through teachings and practices, not to mention you receiving or teaching super delicious technique, to go back into your lives not only fully liberated wombyn, but now more INTEGRATED wombyn! "

22855.name: Adult Coloring
22855.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 5 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 5 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 5 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 5 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 5 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
