22856.name: Cocoa & Cabernet Cabaret
22856.description:
A calm before the storm. Hot cocoa and cool cabernet are the perfect accompaniments to an evening of live entertainment and musical performances. Sit back and unwind from the journey home around our toasty bonfire and prepare for the magical adventures yet to come. 

Please contact us if interested in performing

22858.name: Art and Photography Tour
22858.description: Bring your bicycles, drinking water and cameras to explore and interact with the amazing sculptures of Burning Man. Talk to some of the artists and creators about their work and see some pieces being built right in front of you. If you are reading this and are a playa artist or crew, come along and share your creative vision and message with everyone else!

22859.name: Trance around the Playa at Duckpond
22859.description: Trance Trance Trance. Uplifting, psy, Goa, progressive, get all your feels in.

22860.name: Color Coaching
22860.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
22860.description: What color are you? A sparkly gold adventurer or ravishing blue thinker? Immerse yourself in a Color Coaching session.

22861.name: Inner Child Workshop
22861.description: Are you looking to get in touch with your most authentic self? Do you let your inner child play and create? This workshop helps you to bring your inner child to the real world. Get ready to get creative and playful!

22862.name: Guest DJ Sean Reya
22862.description: Come and enjoy the special musical stylings of DJ Sean Reya.

22863.name: Dark Side of The Moon Live!!!!
22863.description: Come space out on an ethereal musical joy ride as Reverbie Live Nights presents the full album of Dark Side of the Moon...LIVE!!!  Cosmic Stowaway, Alexa Melo directs and voice leads this concert of All Star Musicians.

22864.name: Lightning Dance Workshop & Procession
22864.description: Red Lightning has choreographed a dance this year that we will be presenting en masse in the middle of the playa, and we want you to dance it with us! This simple sequence of steps will be taught pre-sunset in Red Lightning's Mandala space by Onelove and the Red Lightning tribe. At sunset, we will follow artist Jade Robertson Robertson Fusco in a beautiful choreographed procession out to her Aquarian Shrine by the Man for a group dance, serenade and water blessing ceremony. Wear whites and blues if you have em!

22865.name: Use Your Breath to Free Your Life
22865.description:
"Release stuck emotions, stagnant energy and outdated patterns. Open inner and cosmic portals, access truth, and experience bliss w/o drugs. Please be sober --
 you will not need any additional substance and it can get in the way of your optimal experience. Sovereign Breath creates an altered state in which many experiences are possible facilitated by your higher self. Bring what you most want to release, shift, gain insight about, step into, affirm and create. Be ready for change. This form of breathwork grows out of Rebirthing and is a more feminine, gentle and allowing practice than other more aggressive and cathartic forms. This approach makes more effective the integration of your insights and transformation into ordinary reality, and is easier on the nervous system, and is easier on the nervous system. Deep states of bliss and bonding among participants are common."

22866.name: Beginner's Improv Comedy Workshop
22866.description: Join us for fun interactive games and help co-create something magical.  No experience necessary.  Maximum 10 humans.

22867.name: Bard Circle with The Bard in Green
22867.description: Bring your ballads, bawdy shanties, and get your geek card ready! It's time to sing and tell tales about anything you want but mostly about fairies, Klingons, lightsabers, orcs, Odin, and discover some things about Cmdr. Data that you never wanted to know!

22868.description: Learn to visualize and communicate with the many aspects of your psyche, from your Inner Child to your Deepest Fear. Tools for deep self-love and inner healing.

Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.

Workshops will be taught by different teachers with different styles of dance - ballet, rhythmic gymnastics, lyrical dance, hip hop. We will also guide anyone that's interested in spinning fire into that space.

Get your garment silk screened and come wash away the sadness with tunes by Morrissey
We have a variety of different templates and are happy to get your choice printed. We ask that your material, shirt, vest, kilt, shawl, what have you, be relatively clean.

Here at Simian Akademy, our mission is to help you gain the skills necessary to adapt to today's dynamic, ever-changing playa environment.  Our dedicated team of trained monkeys will show you where it goes and how to work it.  If a trained monkey can do it, you can too!

Come spin the 'Wheel of Fortune' to decide your fate:  Fix It, Break It, Camp Chore, Sparkle Pony Watering Trough, Dome of Despair... only the hand of Fate knows the outcome.

22886.name: Embodied Intimacy: Belly2Belly
22886.description:
"The Belly2Belly practice is a relational breathing meditation, cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now, within and in between. Utilizing the core tools of Tantra: Breath, Sound, Movement and Touch we slow way down to be together, just as we are. Drop in all the way, fully into your body. Down, in, open and relax. Feel the fullness that arises from within. Breathe deeply into your sovereign experience. Land, ground into your sense of self and feel your boundaries in relation to others.
Meeting and greeting new people in a festival environment is inherently exciting and anxiety provoking. From a survival standpoint we are testing strangers before we invite them in. So in this collective field of unlimited interactive potential, how do we honor the wisdom of our bodies while connecting with others and with what wants to happen? When animals are safe they play, so do we. "

22898.name: Evening Disco Spa
22898.description:
On Thursday evening, Never-Land will host an Evening Disco Spa! 
Let's face it, by Thursday night, people are tired, dirty and burned out. Let us pamper and refresh you before you head back out for a night of debauchery. Relax in our cuddle puddle with aromatherapy cooling towels and face masks, refreshing drinks at our bar, or take a quick nap in our cooling hammocks.

During the Evening Disco Spa, our licensed massage therapist, Scott, will provide quick massages to refresh your weary body. (Due to the time constraint, we will ask that people sign up for a time slot in advance). Our trained barista, Kyle, will provide guests with coffee samples to give them that boost of energy for the night. Nurse Rico will be on hand to make sure you are hydrated at our hydration station. Our resident DJs will provide you with funky beats for you to begin your night with dancing under our disco ball. Our trained bartenders will be serving magical cocktails (and mocktails). The Never-Land Disco Spa will run from 8 - 10 PM on Thursday night. We can't wait to pamper you.

22900.name: Atomic Pussy Photo Lounge
22900.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 6 p.m.
22900.description: The Atomic Pussy Photo Lounge is a place to grab an ice-cold drink, groove to killer music, see photo art, and photo-booth for posterity (yes, we make “photo-booth” a verb). Bar service includes the “best drinks on the playa” including ice-cold Palomas, Margaritas, and Kamikazis. Try our Shot-Ski, which of course is a form of Radical Ritual that goes back to 3rd century when the Norwegian Snow God, Ullr (Son of Sif), used the Shot-Ski to imbibe the town of Oslo, thus avoiding war with the nearby Hamlet of Drammen.

22923.name: From Bitch to GAWDDESS
22923.description:
" There is a large trend happening where the term goddesses been hijacked in order for women to become empowered. I'm totally into this to be perfectly honest but I'm wondering how many of women are actually doing their work around the archetype of the bitch? She which has the sacred task an drew tilte as guardian of the temple. 

It is a noble roll indeed but are you feeling stuck there? Now adhering to this coveted discription but not really fully aligned to it yet... Are you wanting to be the guardian of sacred ground or be the inspiration? 

 From bitch to GAWDESS workshop dedicated to women stepping it up and stepping in to their true divinity and availability to be the unspoken Divine Feminine.  

And!!! 

Let's be honest, we can't do without our sisters and brothers. So let's join together and have a ceremony circle graduating women into true Empowerment. "

22925.name: Closing Blessing, on the bamboo @ RhythmWave

22927.name: Twerk 4 Lemonade
22927.description: Come one, come all, it's a twerk off, baby! Simple enough, if you want delicious Ice-Cold Lemonade, come Twerk for it! There will be special prizes for the best Twerkers, so bring your A-Game!

22928.name: The Path of (Open) Relating
22928.description:
"We invite you to this gathering of Spiritually Minded, Open, Fluid, LGBTQ, Polyamorous, Polysensuous, Polycurious, Monogamomish people. This is a safe, fun way to meet new people who are also participating in Open Relating and to gain some practical tools for your relationship or future relationship(s)!

To chose to live and relate in an open or polyamorous way requires a community of like-minded souls. Without community we do not have the necessary support we need as couples and individuals to love as big as our hearts desire.

Why we each consciously choose to live in alternative ways then the ones that were passed down to us from earlier generations is very personal. Some do it to increase the variety of sexual partners and others do it as a spiritual path to embrace the light and shadow of opening up.

There are many ways to make it work. Some people have stated agreements meanwhile others rely on embodied principles and some are just totally radical. Regardless of your personal preference, most of us were not raised with role models for this alternative way of relating. So we must come together to role model and mirror one another.

As the definition and practice of relating is expanding beyond what we were taught unconsciously by our parents we want to invite you to join the conversation. How do you navigate these waters? What have you found that works? Come just to listen and observe or come to participate and add your own thoughts, questions and perspectives into the conversation.

We invite you to share what is most alive in your heart and come join the conversation of open relationships where we aim to come together to create a Culture of Conscious Relating."

22929.name: Space Pants Dance with Tropo
22929.description: Interplanetary travel made easy as the space babes of TROPO transport you with their live-electronic jams. Wear space pants to get a wink with your drink.

22930.description: Unlived fantasies? Still curious? After the burn adult 18+ Gay/Bi/Curious men crowd into Down Low Club’s discreet tent for a last night of hot manplay

22931.name: Release from Bondage of Ego Self
22931.description: Ego chatter and stories of me can create anxiety, self-limiting beliefs and downright misery.  Discover ways to free yourself from the ego chatter and beliefs about yourself which just aren't true.  Companion event: Run Free Naked Run

22932.description:
Hung over? Need hair of the dog? Amazing Bloody Marys for breakfast 
BEST CURE EVER !!!

22933.name: Stealing Fire: Secret Revolution in Altered States
22933.description: Over the past decade, Silicon Valley executives like Eric Schmidt and Elon Musk, Special Operators like the Navy SEALs and the Green Berets, and maverick scientists like Sasha Shulgin and Amy Cuddy have turned everything we thought we knew about high performance upside down. Instead of grit, better habits, or 10,000 hours, these trailblazers have found a surprising short cut. They’re harnessing rare and controversial states of consciousness to solve critical challenges and outperform the competition.

22942.name: Sailing the Dead Seas: Rockin’ the Boats!
22942.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
22942.description:
Rituals Arts Collective's 'Sailing the Dead Seas: Rockin' the Boats!' installation is anchored in our childhood; you'll see a flotilla of oversized, whimsical, origami-like colorful 'paper boats,' each floating upon its 'waves.' Each boat is actually a teeter totter, ready to be rocked by the participants. As every craft has environmental sensors installed within, you'll hear incredible, albeit low-key musical tones, as 'played' by the wind, and motion of the boats. The effect is bio-elemental, aural soothing of our minds. Participants will find the interior of the (easily accessible) boats gilded in silver and gold, filled with inspirational quotes to complete the experience. Each ship/shrine has materials to write 'notes of hope' and means of containing these utterances by attendees (Truth be told, these boats act as walk-aboard shrine(s) to inspire Burning Man attendees to leave notes for us to burn off-playa in a ceremony, so their wishes may be granted to the winds after the Burning Man event. ;) The reason for 'Dead Seas' in the title is twofold: the playa's dry lake bed, and the actual Dead Sea in Jordan-- both have high mineral content, that which nourishes souls who 'float' in it. 

That’s NOT all! ;o)

There be CHRISTENINGS, Ye Mateys! Help us christen our boats at the Playa Art Park and on the Playa itself!

Monday, 1:00 pm: 

Our lead ship will be christened, and bubbly cider and water will be served to all #Land Pirates that attend! (But of course, bring yer cups and while supplies last! ;)

Tuesday, 1:00 pm: 

Our first flotilla of ships on the playa will be christened, and bubbly cider and water will be served to all #Land Pirates that attend! (But of course, bring yer cups and while supplies last! ;)

Wednesday, 1:00 pm: 

Our second flotilla of ships on the playa will be christened, and bubbly cider and water will be served to all #Land Pirates that attend! (But of course, bring yer cups and while supplies last! ;)

Femme! as designed, creates sacred, safe spaces for students to move in sensual ways, to explore and release emotions, to alter or release beliefs about themselves and to unapologetically love their bodies! Using a variety of movement and musical styles including live drummers, Femme! interweaves the influences of Dance, Healing and Sensual Arts into a multisensory experience that expresses the entire body.

Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 11:30 a.m.

22950.description: Radically inclusive, open 12-step meeting for codependents seeking recovery, where you are free to identify according to any 12-step traditions. SO MANY OPPORTUNITIES TO BE HELPFUL!!!

22951.name: Vinyasa Yoga
22951.description: Wind down from your deep playa sunrise adventures with a relaxing Vinyasa flow.

22952.name: Playa Hookah Lounge
22952.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 10 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 10 p.m.
22952.description: Riddle: What is before us which we never see? Your future! Visit a beautiful tepee decorated and lit to provide a welcoming vibe, with rugs and pillows for your comfort. Stimulate your brain and relax your body. As your body and mind relax, challenge your intellect with riddles and reward yourself with a hookah in good company.

22953.name: Phantom of the Playa!
22953.description: Join us for a musical production of Phantom of the Playa at Brulee. Unlike anything you've seen before!

22954.name: Hula Hooping Unicorns Frisky Throw-Down!
22954.description: Bring your own, or come on the early side to decorate a blank Hoop with other Unicorns!  Share your best and most awesome tricks to an energetic Hula Hoop Friendly Soundtrack!  Later in the event after everyone's gotten Frisky & All Spun Up, we will take our Minxy selves out and Gallop down to the Swish Embassy to perform a Bar TakeOver!

22955.name: Hip Hop to the Top
22955.description: DJ Daddy Pants spinnin' that good hip hop

22957.name: History Mystery Mix
22957.description:
What happens when you blend electronic beats with some of the oldest songs and music ever recorded? Find out, have a drink, and get lost in the mists of time. 

From clay tablets in ancient Egypt, to the minstrels of the age of crusades, we will re-mix some of the most amazing music left behind by our ancestors to tell stories we should never forget.

22958.name: Pumpkin Spice Holiday Party
22958.description: Celebrate the magical transformation of the seasons as we move from Summer to Pumpkin Spice! Serving pumpkin spice grilled cheese, soup, & alcoholic shots.

22959.name: RoyalTea Crowning
22959.description: 'Here ye here ye! This is an invitation for all the magnificent throughout the land of Burn! Tap into your inner royalty and pimp a crown while drinking liquid crown! Bedazzle while you unfrazzle and let the Crown RoyalTea sipitty craft hour activate your inner state!

22960.name: Tie a Shemagh
22960.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 p.m.
22960.description: Any time, day or night, bring a large square scarf or pashmina and we’ll show you how to wrap and tie it to make an effective dust mask/head covering. This traditional Arabian headdress is perfectly suited for Black Rock City – serving as a fashion accessory between the occasional playa dust storms.

22961.name: Power of Prayer Closing Ceremony - Medicine Wheel
22961.description:
You are invited to join Red Lightning and First Nations as we sit together under the Medicine Wheel and close our Radical Ritual with the extinguishing of the Sacred Fire.

Our life is a ceremony.  And this year, we gathered to ceremonially engage in a Radical Ritual together on the dusty Playa land. The extinguishing of this Sacred Fire marks the closing of our week-long ceremony at Burning Man. 

How have you learned to appreciate fire during our ceremony together? 
How have you learned to work with the spirit of the fire?
How will you carry this prayer forward, and back to your communities? How will you keep your own Sacred Fire lit? How will you continue to shine your light in the darkness?

Fire feeds the seeds of intention of what we seek to call forth. Fire is also a purifier. Send everything that no longer serves you into your own Sacred Fire to purify your heart, body, mind, and soul.  Keep the memory of what occurred this year during our Radical Ritual with you, and bring it back to your community.

22962.name: Yummy Morning Yoga
22962.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:30 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:30 a.m.
22962.description: Rise and shine with April for your gentle wake-up call, with lots of floor asana and grounding breath-work. In this yoga-for-Burners, coordinating breath with movement, we will clear the previous day's energy and set our intentions for the days to come. Bring a mat or towel to create a little layer between you and the one-of-a-kind bamboo dance floor at RhythmWave.

22963.name: Quinceañera Party
22963.description: Come celebrate our radical 15th BRC birthday ritual with the craziest quiceañera party ever at BRC. Enjoy Aguardiente, tequila, Salsa, and Latin beats. Bring your quince dress and/or formal attire suggested.

22964.name: Wednesday WakeUP
22964.description: Let's explore the world of natural highs and the dance of Unity and Polarity.  The best drugs are in our own bodies!  Yes, we’ll have coffee too.

22965.name: Supa Shuffle School
22965.description: Join us for a dance party and lesson on shuffling!  who better to take lead than our lovable and legally named SUPA MAN?! Supa fun times for all!

22966.name: Swingers Happy Hour
22966.description: Classic jazz meets electronic beats. Swing your booty, kick up some playa dust, and have a drink on us. We spin the music, you spin your body.

22967.name: Emo Night
22967.description: Break out your eyeliner, your suffocatingly tight pants, and get ready to have some feelings. We're a group of nice queers who'll be playing our favorite angsty sad bastard tunes and offering a respite from the sensory overload of the day. Don't expect quality DJing because we will be busy crying.

22968.name: PlayaSkool's Famous Homecoming Party
22968.description: Welcome HOME! PlayaSkool welcomes you to join us in our famous Homecoming Party with Guest DJ's and FUN! -- Let us welcome you HOME and introduce you to our latest art adventure, Incendia!  Be prepared to have your minds blown!

22969.name: Irish Pub Sing Along
22969.description: Irish Pub songs sing along. Some songs about whiskey, some songs about ships and other Irish stuff sung with song sheets while drinking whiskey.

22970.name: Playa Art Tour
22970.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
22970.description:
Tours to the Playa Art with a wheelchair accessible trailer,
 2 hours, must sign up on Playa in Advance. Mobility Impaired always have priority.

22971.name: (ICK!)leback!
22971.description: What happens when Nickelback meets picklebacks? Something terrible? Something confusing? Something terribly confusing?

22973.name: Building Relationships
22973.description: A new minimal approach to ignite passion and discover your life’s purpose presented in a hilarious and anecdotal manner, guaranteed to leave you with new insights and simple routines to easily incorporate into your daily life.

22974.name: Cereal and Cartoons
22974.description: Bring your naughty inner child and indulge! Enjoy politically incorrect cartoons,colorful breakfast cereals, and doctored coffee with an adult twist.

22975.name: Deep Fry Potluck
22975.description: Do you feel a strong need to clog your arteries? We do! Bring your left over food and friends to throw into the grease.

22976.name: SPANKATHON
22976.description: Spank or be spanked, that is the question.

22977.name: SEWING AND TAILOR SHOP
22977.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:30 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:30 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:30 a.m.
22977.description: Visit our shop for any clothing alterations or customization you may need. Fairy Godmother Seamstresses are here for fashion help. Just look out for our sewing machines on the playa!

22978.name: Basic Bike Maintenance Clinic
22978.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
22978.description: Flat tire, chain slip, or bad brake? Come to Hammer And Cyclery and learn how to get rolling again! (We need tubes!)

22979.name: Tuvan Generals sing for U!
22979.description: Tuvan Generals sing for U! Throating at its best. You won't believe it. What is seen cannot, will not be unseen! Ancient throat singing has never...

22980.name: Wine and Painting
22980.description: Need I say more?! Supplies provided, Ask for Emily!

22981.name: Hula Hoop Workshop
22981.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
22981.description: Wonderful circus performers Mélodie and Daïna from Montreal, Quebec, will help you shimmy and shake to make your hula hoop shine! All levels welcome.

22982.name: Balance of Safety & Aliveness
22982.description:
"How does one assess and honor their boundaries, yet still have the ability to stretch outside their comfort zone to grow beyond fears in intimate relating? 
There is a delicate balance between taking too big of a risk and acting out of integrity, versus hiding in comfort and playing it too safe. How do you balance your need for safety with your yearning for full expression? 
How do you identify your growth edge, play safe but not too safe, and keep riding that edge, take risks but not into the danger zone? Can you find the sweet spot of feeling safely embodied while growing and  expanding towards what you want? Join us for this energizing, exciting, connecting and possibly edgy exploration. Lets move through the unknown of relating into the sweet spot of living an exhilarating life while still having your own back. "

22983.name: Earth Honoring Ritual w/Glide @ RhythmWave
22983.description: Please join RhythmWave to connect with, honor, and care for Mother Earth on our beautiful bamboo dance floor. Ground, connect, and open to the world around you and these troubled times we are in.

22984.name: DJ Despair Lord’s Despair Hour
22984.description: Feel the angst as the dark musings of Despair Lord crush your dreams! Despair Lord will be spinning an hour-long mix of Industrial, EBM, and Future Pop in the camp’s fantasy bazaar.

22985.name: Bacon Brigade Sausage Serving
22985.description: The Bacon Brigade makes a stop at the New Barbarians to join forces for food! Come and get your groove and grub on - gotta fuel the party!

22986.name: Let's Talk About Sex... Maybe?
22986.description: Join an interactive, often hilarious exploration of social/sexual behavior, consent, and your own sweet talking skills as well.

22987.name: Singing Bowls 101
22987.description: Are you curious about Sound Healing? Come play with us! You'll have an assortment of singing bowls, singing saws, and other noisemakers at your disposal, and we'll help guide your exploration to unlock the secrets of sound. All are welcome, no musical experience necessary. Oh, you'd rather listen than play? No problem! We're going to need practice subjects for our students.

22988.name: Ritual De Lo Playabitual: Jane's Addiction Social
22988.description: Come enjoy cocktails, experience the rituals of our interactive Altar sculpture & rock out to the sounds of Jane's Addiction.

22989.name: Famous Tri Tip BBQ
22989.description: Come join us for our big event! 140lbs of Tri Tip BBQ'd to perfection. Meet new people, bring friends, listen to some good beats! Games to be played. What's better than real protein mid week?! Our camp is Honest MiSteak!

22992.name: Sunrise Cafe
22992.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 6 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 6 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 6 a.m. – 8 a.m.
22992.description: Sunrise coffee and sustinence with service that's hot and fresh from a journeying French Cafe.

22993.name: Dare OR Double Dare.
22993.description: Feeling risky? Dare I say, a little frisky? Dare to go alone or double down with a friend

22994.name: Forgot Your Tutu?
22994.description: Forgot your Tuesday essessial fashion?  Come make your own.  Tule and other materials supplied.

22995.name: The Afterglow Soireee
22995.description: 8:30p.m. - 9 p.m.  Open Mic / 9 p.m. - 10 p.m.  Special Live Performance by Cello Joe / 10 p.m. -  11 p.m.  DJ Set by Knowa Lusion

22996.name: Fwedding Reception Party
22996.description: You're Invited to the Fwedding of the century! Come get theme fwedded and join the reception. "Couples" and moresomes will be celebrated, crowds will cheer, drinks will be poured. Wear your Sunday best (or anything really - we aren't picky!) and come boogie down to the cheesiest wedding reception songs on the playa.

22997.name: Perform in Center Camp!
22997.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
22997.description: Want to showcase your original performance on Playa? Come see Beat at the Performance Stage to see if there are available slots!

22998.name: Feed Your Head: Which Riesling For Your Problem
22998.description: Interactive drinking workshop: "What's the Riesling For Your Problem?"  Got a hang nail? Lost a shoe? Wanted for not paying camp dues? Let a Sommelier pair the right Riesling for your problem. 21 and over only.  Elise's desire to do this comes from her love for the grape. Remarkably expressive, it can range from "so tart you think you're drinking lemon juice" to "nectarine honeysuckle heaven"!  Something bubbly from Germany, something serious from France, some approachable Austrian delight, something mineral forward from Canada or NY, and some rubber hose super crisp dry example from Australia.

23000.name: Got a 60s Party If You Want It (4) Teen Club Slow
23000.description: A unique opportunity at BRC to hear "From Sir To Love' while dancing closely with the one that brung ya.

23001.name: Drink the Queen Dick Dry
23001.description: Cold beer, G&T and shots at the bar and your favorite tunes. Finish the week in style after the Man burns!

23002.name: A Symphony-Playapops 4th season ala Penguins!
23002.description: The PlayaPops is glad to offer its fourth season of acoustic classical + programing for our 2017 season. We are 80+ string, woodwind, brass, percussion, and other musicians performing a one hour program including Sprach Zarathrustra (you know this--- 2001: A Space Odyssey), a movement from a Mozart Symphony (Jupiter), Rainbow Connection, Carmina Burana (you all know this piece lol),  Beethoven X2 (Egmont Overture and Ode to Joy), Dance of the Ghazies, Ashokan Farewell, and Radiohead! …We’ll also have premier soloists and audience participation…Come join us for something truly different for our 5 show season (with one back up performance time) for 2017!

23003.name: Balkan Dance Party!
23003.description: DJ Miloš spinning all the Balkan hits. Horns, accordions, drums, bitches, real Balkan Boots and Cats, but earthy, real Balkan “dirt” as Seido would say. Miloš says “you gonna dance your dirty asses off.”  There is no escape from Balkan.

23005.name: Lemonade Stand
23005.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Monday, September 4th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
23005.description: Ice cold Lemonade. Need we say more?

23006.name: RU a hot mess? Probably. Come to "Hot Mess Yoga"
23006.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8:15 a.m. – 9:15 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8:15 a.m. – 9:15 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8:15 a.m. – 9:15 a.m.
23006.description: Are you a hot mess? Probably. Have you been raging a little too hard and need some wellness in your life? Likely. Is your brain and body's limits being tested by The Playa? Definitely.  Hot Mess Yoga is for all you beautiful souls.  Come breath deeply, and get right with yourself and the world. In this hour long Vinyasa class we will stretch, twist, and sweat to some chill beats. Come as you are... no judgements here. Even if you are lookin' like a nasty lil playa rat out there.

23007.name: Sunday Street Party
23007.description: So you think your burn is over? Are you off your bloody rocker! Don your Sunday besties for disco, funk and high vibe house, with plenty of free flowing bloody marys!

23008.name: Jazz Theory Part 1
23008.description: A beginning Jazz theory workshop for musicians and non-musicians.  The Professor explains and demonstrates what Jazz is and how musicians improvise. Cold drinks for guests

23009.name: Becoming More Effective
23009.description: Becoming More Effective - Open forum to discuss ways in which we can optimize our effectiveness. We will discuss the importance of focus, minimizing the noise of the world around us, and Pareto's law (the 80/20 principle).

23010.name: The Metamorphosis of Early Christianity
23010.description: From fringe fanatics for peace, to the official religion of the Roman war machine and beyond.

23011.name: Porn and Puppets
23011.description: Do you like porn? Do you like puppets? Well, do you?!

23012.name: Sunday Funday
23012.description: The Summer Cup – Time to bring it down a notch with a refined yet refreshing cooler of white wine, ginger liqueur and cranberry juice.

23013.name: Compassion Practices
23013.description: Want to learn how to be a more compassionate person? If so,this workshop may be what you desire. Let's practice techniques to accomplish this. Ways to develop both self-compassion and compassion towards others will be uncovered. The difference between genuine and "idiot" compassion will be discussed.

23014.name: Na Zdrowie!  Michal’s Polish Vodka Bar.
23014.description: Returning to the playa for the 3rd year, Michael the Mixologist will be serving up delicious liquid concoctions made with quality Polish Vodka. Don’t miss this one time experience at the Electric Gypsy Coffee Oasis!

23015.name: Sextasis - Integrated Sex & Energy Practice
23015.description: A guided energy practice to find flow state during sex and intimate connection. (partner/s required)  - Learn the basics of balancing internal sexual energy, identifying sensations,  polarization, creating a safe space to play, personal sexual alchemy, partner sexual alchemy, clearing blockage, deepening subtle body awareness and intimacy.

23016.name: Tribute to Lost Musicians (2016-17)
23016.description: A concert in tribute to all the Lost Musicians who passed away from our last Burning Man to this Burning Man.  All Star Reverbia musicians will be performing songs from: George Michael, Leonard Cohen, Chuck Berry, Greg Allman, Chris Cornell... and more.

23017.name: Testosterone Thursday Manplay
23017.description: Adult 18+ Gay/Bi/Curious men steeped in hormones celebrate all things male in Down Low Club’s discrete tent with testosterone-fueled erotic manplay

23018.name: SO YOU THINK YOU CAN SLUT?
23018.description: Mirror mirror on the wall, who's the sluttiest of them all? Come vie for the title and show us what you've got.

23019.name: Sexy Nude Figure Drawing
23019.description: Come draw. Come pose. 100% participant fueled. Sensual, sexual, silly, and everything in-between. Beginners encouraged. Limited supplies, bring if you can.

23020.name: How to Give a Great Spanking
23020.description: Many people would love to give or get a great spanking, and crave it with all of their might. Don’t let the lack of knowledge stop you; learn how to give a truly great spanking! This class covers consent, negotiation, techniques, aftercare, and more! Plus a live demo!  Make sure to bring a consenting partner on which to practice!

23021.name: Power Room Boutique- All Day
23021.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
23021.description: Queer Upgrade - An intimate lounge chock full of glamor. Get a new outfit, beat down your face, or just sit a spell on our rotating loveseats. Fresh inventory daily.

23022.name: Forgiveness – Soul Fire Workshop
23022.description: True healing and movement cannot take place without forgiveness. We will be digging deep and unearthing hurt and pain you may have forgotten you were still carrying. It is time to establish true forgiveness so that you can clear out the blockages and create inner balance and harmony. Without healing and forgiveness, you cannot discover your true path.

23023.name: Learn How To Not Give A Fuck
23023.description: Do you stress out, and worry about stupid shit? Enjoy participatory exercises based on the teachings of Swami Pranayomama. Tutu contest included.

23024.name: Sonya Sophia EFT: SEXUAL HEALING
23024.description: Get good with your sexuality. Clear fears and honor your turn on. Tap out shame and labels. Leave open and ready for more LOVE in your love life.

23025.name: The Big Show at SIDESHOW
23025.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
23025.description: It's all on the inside!  Freaks, creatures and the unexplained brought before your eyes! But don't just sit there you freak, you can be a part of the show too! Bring your freakish look, talent or skill.  Returning for it's smash 5th year on the playa, SIDESHOW brings you the old time sideshow experience.  It's ALL FREE!  Seating is limited, so hurry hurry!

23026.name: Meet the Mayor
23026.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:45 a.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:45 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:45 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:45 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:45 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:45 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:45 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:45 a.m.
Monday, September 4th, 2017 8:30 a.m. – 9:45 a.m.
23026.description: Be it known that the official Mayor of Burning Man resides at Camp Retrofrolic.  And each day he is scheduled to meet with any and all citizens of Black Rock City, promptly around 8:37 AM.  (Unless the Mayor sleeps in, and then he will arrive as soon as mayorly possible.)  After greeting his constituents and citizens, the Mayor will hear comments and complaints from the people of Black Rock City.  Thereafter, he will perform the sacred Airing of Grievances ritual to heal our beleaguered city.  Post ritual, the Mayor will sign autographs, pose for pictures, and give and receive gifts.  (Gifts will not be misinterpreted as bribes, officially.)

23027.name: Dirty Chicks Ceramic Jewelry Creations
23027.description: Get artsy on the Playa with the Dirty Chicks of Awesome(ville!). Paint + make your own Lake Tahoe ceramic jewelry to take home, while enjoying morning cocktails too!  The perfect warm up to the Tahoe Blue Block Party after!

23028.name: Cumbia music and tequila shot party
23028.description: Come on over and dance to cumbia, salsa bachata and lunch with tequila shots!

23029.name: •	Shaman's Death
23029.description: Meet your death. Surrender to the inevitable but now. Release ego, social ties, stuckness. Come back more alive than ever. Shaman initiation. Release old stories around your persona and ego bruises. Refresh.

23030.name: Dickbats! Ride and Chapter Meeting
23030.description:
The rottenest scooter gang in the whole damn history of BRC is once again accepting new members/prospects/hangarounds. In a nation of frightened dullards there is a sorry shortage of outlaws, and those few who make the grade are always welcome. We are the misunderstood, the hard core, the outlaw elite.  Our existence is a mockery of all public decency. FUCK OFF!!!

Ride is at 3, meeting at 6.

23031.name: OA/Any-F Meeting
23031.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 2:30 p.m.
23031.description: A Radically Inclusive 12-step recovery meeting where you are free to identify in accordance with Any 12-step Food-related Program traditions (OA, FAA, etc…) We are never alone--even in the dust! AV also hosts other 12-step meetings. Pick up a Playa Meeting Directory at Anonymous Village!

23032.name: Ho‘oponopono Forgiveness Meditation @ RhythmWave
23032.description: Let Shannon guide you through an ancient Hawaiian forgiveness process. Together we will be clearing out preconceptions of how we view others to create new connections and rejuvenated relationships. This is a guided, easygoing embodied and joyful meditation. In true RhythmWave spirit we will use a little rhythm to align our bodies in our seats. The Hawaiian word ho‘oponopono comes from ho‘o ("to make") and pono ("right").

23033.name: Singles Silly Hour
23033.description: Experiment in connecting with other singles in a variety of silly ways. Authentic awkwardness and curious lighthearted play encouraged!  This is a no-pressure, safe arena for expressing all shades of shy, silly, and serious in connecting with each another.

23034.name: Come find out Your Natural Energy
23034.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
23034.description:
At 9 Energies Pavilion - Come find out Your Natural Energy. Understanding your Natural Energy enables you to recognize your gifts, gain a better understanding of yourself and others so that you can live a happier and more embodied life. Through a simple physical process your body reveals your great natural abilities. Once you know your Natural Energy you can consciously use this power to move yourself forward.

9 Energies is open daily 10-4pm. After 4pm the tent is open for discussion. Please come sober!

23035.name: Buffer Butt Car Wash
23035.description: Has dust from your bike seat rubbed you the wrong way? Select your buff of choice to ease your tension & release your Gluteus-Maximus! Beats, buffers & babes, you provide the butts!

23036.name: Birthday Party Thursday! It's your birthday
23036.description: Is it your birthday? Well, even if it isn't, come on by! When you arrive, it will be your birthday too! Come say Happy Birthday to a whole bar full of people with the same birthday as you! The first time travel holiday on the playa. We can re-celebrate, celebrate, and pre-celebrate any of your birthdays! We'll make sure they don't suck. We have music, drinks, and cake. Please come dressed in your feline finest, or whatever! In addition to birthday spankings and celebration, there's an open bar, DJs spinning, and a bocce ball tournament as well as our birth canal interactive obstacle course experience. (Watch out for Planned Playahood protesters! You may have to cross a picket line.)

23037.name: Boom Boom Majestic Drive-In Movie Room
23037.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
23037.description: A camp and neighborhood favorite! Films screened nightly against the 12 x 16 screen unfurled on the side of Penske Palisades. BBW welcomes all to walk, bike and drive in and snuggle up in the movie room for a selection of classics, thrillers and Planet Earth 2.

23038.name: Grease Movie Sing-along
23038.description: Enjoy a cool drink while watching the most successful musical movie of all time: GREASE! Sing and dance along with Danny and Sandy, and dress up in your petticoat, while being transferred back in time to the 1950s.

23039.name: Friendship Bracelets Are Awesome
23039.description: Got a GF, BFF, BF, FWB or just someone you like? Come make them friendship bracelet! Basic instruction & materials provided.

23040.name: NonMonogamy: How to navigate relationship dynamics
23040.description: Eugene has been living open non-monogamous lives and counseling others through the process for nearly a decade now. He will share real world stories and experience to support your on your path to fearlessly relating in a way which feels good, ease full, loving and empowering.

23041.name: Uncle Napster’s 90s MP3 Collection
23041.description: Inter-desert, peer to peer shrine to the sharing site of old. Come enjoy and share a vodka elixir while we toast Napster. Find Keyser Soze and win!

23042.name: Closing Show of The Sound and Performance Stage
23042.description: Catch one last, lasting glimpse of euphonic magic on the Center Camp Performance Stage before it comes to a close.

23043.name: Kink party/fetish night at Brulee
23043.description: Join us for our annual Kink and fetish night at Brulee, bring your slaves on leash! Libations available all night at the bar, dungeon available.

23044.name: Fortune Telling with Tarot Cards
23044.description: As the sun sets on the playa come have your possible future divined. Actual results may vary.

23046.name: A Party in the Desert or a Polis on the Playa?
23046.description: This philosophical talk will examine the experience of Freedom in BRC through the intersecting lenses of the 10 principles and the political theory of Hannah Arendt.

23047.name: The 9th Node
23047.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
23047.description: Backstreet Reverbia features The 9th Node...an Interactive Soundscape Experience, where movement,  breathing, heartbeat, chanting voice, acapella song... will redefine your concepts of sound.

23048.name: Find Your Inner Unicorn: Guided Meditation
23048.description: Come discover your inner unicorn with the help of a guided meditation, surrounded by fluffy, sparkly, magical ponies and unicorns in the Yurticorn!

23049.name: Belly2Belly: For Couples & Pairs
23049.description: Learn simple and effective tools for how to regulate your affect, increase your somatic sense of safety and connection with your partner. Where we are the most vulnerable, we have the strongest defenses. And it just so happens, we are the most vulnerable (and reactive) in our intimate and romantic relationships. In this playful workshop we will utilize a simple map of the nervous system. Learn who shows up to our rescue when we are triggered (into primal instincts such as Fight, Flight, Freeze, Submit, and Cry for help). We drop below the thinking mind into the wisdom of the body. To a depth from where it is easy and simple to relate most intimately. Here we drop the guard and lead with the last thing we want our partner to know about us. Vulnerably revealed, 100% responsible, allowing yourself be seen as you are, unedited, undefended, raw and exposed. This is the quickest way to intimacy and how to create healing relationships that honor the intelligence of our body, emotions and intellect.

23050.name: Paperback Porn
23050.description: Pick a passage from our steamy stack or bring your own for a read-aloud, around the campfire style. Bashful giggling is acceptable and encouraged.

23051.name: Going Higher Together
23051.description: How to nurture the most critical relationships for your dreams and impact in the world. In our increasingly interdependent world, Going Higher Together is a new level of commitment we make to own our and each other's results and growth.

23053.name: Infinite George Michael
23053.description: Join us for a Careless Whisper marathon. You're never gonna dance again, the way you did with us.

23054.name: Finding the GHEE Spot!
23054.description: The Ghee spot will set you free if you know how to properly use it!  This class will clarify the many uses of the Ghee spot.....a slippery subject!

23055.name: DingDongSingSongBeerBongPingPong World Champs!
23055.description:
Back for 2018, the toughest game in the Playaverse.  Kegel Kommandos and the Lake Lahontan Water Ski Club present the Black Rock City, Ding Dong, Sing Song, Beer Bong, Ping Pong World Championships.
Offering you a chance to play a very serious, Championship-level game of table tennis while eating Ding Dongs, and doing Beer Bongs at every 7 points.  A win in the game can only be claimed by demonstrating your singing ability after crushing your opponent on the table.  Presented alongside the Kegel Kommandos annual Grilled Cheese and Baconstravaganza, your stomach will hate you for days!  
Qualifying and tryouts on Thursday, August 30th at High Noon.

23056.name: Contact Improvisation Midnight Dance Jam
23056.description: After the man burns, join us for a joyful celebration of love, connection, and immediacy, through movement, dance, and connection with others.

23057.name: Belly2Belly: Integration
23057.description: The Belly2Belly practice is relational breathing meditation done in full body embrace, cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now. Utilizing the core tools of Tantra: Breath, Sound, Movement and Touch we are slowing down, and we are being together just as we are. In this edition of Belly2Belly, let’s harvest! How was your festival journey? What was the quality of the peaks and valleys? Is something left unprocessed? Is there a feeling that remains, lingering on, unfelt? Come move the energy and tend to your wings before leaving the festival to gain a sense of closure. Come to celebrate yourself, bask in the love bath you’ve cultivated and go home with a deep appreciation for the roller coaster ride that could only take place at Burning Man!

23058.name: Live set with OmHu the Ancient Alien
23058.description: Enter the realm of OmHu a ancient Egyptian priest... it will travel with you to the realms of street beats mixed with alien language and sound healing medicine

23059.name: HOUSE PARTY
23059.description: Slutgarden is throwing a house party! BYOC!

23060.name: Whisky, Cigars, and Philosophy Bootleg
23060.description: Bring any whiskey or cigars you may have (or not) and join the round table with a bunch of drunk philosophers to dissect the universe.

23061.name: 4th Annual Art Car Forum
23061.description: Art Cars are one of the most exciting forms of art on the playa. Come participate in a forum of makers, designers, supporters, enthusiasts. Last year we had over 40 cars represented and this year we hope to grow this event and incubate some killer projects for 2017. Come be a part of this amazing forum!

23062.name: Burnin Butthole Challenge
23062.description: Ahhh the trifecta: eat a habanero, wash it down with a splash of hot sauce and cleanse the palate with a shot of our secret, age-old desert drink. Guaranteed to feel the oh’ so breathtaking burn on both ends. A taco for any man or woman bold enough to endure the suffering. Let it burn, baby! ;) *Please bring your own bowl and utensil to reduce moop*

23063.name: Daily Crafts, Workshops & Skill Shares
23063.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
23063.description:
MON: 10am Creation Myths, 12:30 Get Photographed by a Pro, 3pm Balkan Dance Class. 

TUES: 10am Burning Man Costuming from the Thrift Shop, 12:30 Learn to make Rubber Bracelets,  9pm till whenever: Balkan Dance Party! 

WED: 10am Playa Recipe Exchange, 12:30 Rock Mandalas, 3pm Make a Mala.  

THURS: 10am Solar 4 Beginners, 12:30 Rock Mandalas, 3pm Make a HexaYurt!

FRI: 10am Make a Mala, 12:30 Intro to Solar (Going Solar on the Playa for beginners).

SAT: 10am Learn to use Devil Sticks (no fire), 12:30 [Surprize workshop], 3pm [Bellydance with Karin of Kassar - tentative]

23064.name: MindVisualizer 1 on 1 Coaching
23064.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 5 p.m.
23064.description: Drop in for a One-on-one coaching session with Dr. Moshe Zloof using his “Mind Visualizer” methodology, on a topic of your choice, including fitness routines, creating new healthy habits, improving relationships, or finding career purpose and passion in your work life.

23065.name: How to Make Soap
23065.description: Come learn the basics of plant based soap making! Soon you too can be cleaning your body with a vegetable.

23066.name: Guided Meditation w Hand Pan Melodies
23066.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
23066.description: Join us for a guided morning meditation accompanied by beautiful hand pan melodies. Come relax and give rest to your mind, heart, body and soul.

23068.name: Mindfulness Meditation
23068.description: Traditional mindfulness meditation to help you ground and open into presence and clear awareness, and let the energies within untangle and flow.

23069.name: Rope Play for Creative Embodiment
23069.description: Rope can bind, tickle, support & liberate. We will explore how to create opportunities for connection, presence, surrender & embodied play.

23070.name: Bang Bang's Sunset Saloon Cocktail Lounge & Casino
23070.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 6:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 6:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 6:30 p.m.
23070.description:
The concept is to bring a playful vibe to the Tokyo sector, its encouraged that people flowing and exploring the 9:00 Corridor, have an flowing option between the day & the night parties. Stop in for a fun casino game (dice, cards, Aussie Two up), cheeky challenge on the wheel of risk or dare to taste vegemite before they get rewarded with a tasty cocktail. Best of all enjoy it why the day sky turns dark and the sun sets on The Playa while we also play fun music to get people in the mood for the night ahead.

The idea is that people dare to RISK something, but for every RISK, there is potential REWARD.

We are not just offering drinks, we are offering for people to participate in an experiment of gifting, sharing, laughing, joking, real people connecting and making people feel good... and we love it when people feel good.

23071.name: Genital  )'(  Games Party
23071.description: Just the Tits race, penis relay & golf, porn hole. Penis surfboard prize! Shirtcock Saloon (21+), DJ atop Snooty the Sea Dragon. You know you can win!

23072.name: The Yoniverse of Self-Love - Yoni Puja
23072.description:
"Look into the mirror of Shakti and come home to the blissful recognition of Goddess Source in a beautiful Yoni Puja ceremony (women only/nudity)

All women will be first sanctified as ritual participants. The ceremony will include a closed-eyes guided meditation, an open-eyed transfiguration circle, a living Yoni Puja ceremony, worship and offerings, and the ritual closing. Bring a sacred item to charge on the altar and any offerings you wish to share."

23073.name: Kirtan workshop w/ Vijay Krisna of The Kirtaniyas
23073.description: We will learn the concepts, principles and meaning of these ancient Sanskrit chants and mantras. We will practice singing kirtan as a group including opportunities for you to lead. All voices and instruments andre welcome. Your hearts will open. You will discover a higher love. You will leave in joy.

23074.name: Pimp Your Cup
23074.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 5 p.m.
23074.description: You know that drinking vessel you bring with you everywhere you go?  If you didn't know yet, you will need one!!  Relax in the shade and decorate your cup with our supplies .  Join us for drinks before & after along with so much more.  This is outside the bar area so kids are welcome, just no kids at the bar!  The supplies dont leave, so you can probably bribe a bartender to bring it out for you about any time...

23075.name: Buddhist Chanting: Gongyo &  Daimoku
23075.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 8 a.m. – 8:45 a.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 a.m. – 8:45 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 a.m. – 8:45 a.m.

Friday, September 1st, 2017 8 a.m. – 8:45 a.m.

23075.description: Awaken your inner Buddha and start your day by chanting nam myoho renge kyo. Everyone is welcome.

23076.name: Para Para Workshop
23076.description: Despair Lord will be teaching 80’s Japanese dance routines, similar to the macarena, except way groovier and more synthy. Think cheesy DDR music and synchronized dancing.

23077.name: Obstacle Courses!
23077.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.

Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.
23077.description: One in a wheelchair, One on crutches! Experience the Playa from a new perspective! Or ask for an "Awareness Task"!

23078.name: The Olfactorium
23078.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
23078.description: Burdened with useless swag?  How about something useful?  Stop by the Olfactorium and have a custom perfume created just for you by professional perfumer, Agent 11.  Scent evokes memories directly through the limbic system in a way no mere memento ever could.  You will leave with a mini perfume that is tailored to your tastes—something you can take back to the default world as an everyday reminder of your experiences at Burning Man.

23079.name: So-So Pancakes & Meh Mixology Bar
23079.description: Just before your body is about to give out, a mid-week refeed of carbohydrates will serve everyone well. Serving hot pancakes filled with chocolate chips, blueberries, and bananas, or plain and topped with peanut butter and syrup. Delish!  Our bar will be serving up ice cold cocktails for those with a cup!

23080.name: Molly Manatee’s Dusty FILM FEST
23080.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 6 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 6 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 6 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 6 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 6 a.m. – 11 a.m.
23080.description:
Join us in The Swamp's LobSTAR Lounge for movies each morning & evening. Expect old + new cinematic staples, cult classics & silly swampy favorites! 

Stop by the Swamp to see specific movies & showtimes daily - whether you want a cozy night in, or you're on your way home after a crazy night out, or even if you're an early riser looking for a chill way to welcome the morning!

23081.name: Ali Bar-Bar House Mix
23081.description: Park your camel, chill in our Bedouin tent, and listen to the sound of Ali Bar-Bar. Our special House mix will make you dance the desert night away.  We know that Chicago is not in the Sahara Desert. But if it was, this is what it would sound like.

23082.name: Our Future is Female: Paradigm Shattering Speech
23082.description: Playa Naia NEWLIGHT elucidates the path to a sustainable trajectory of peach and prosperity, echoing successes of past civilizations.

23083.name: Tetherball Tourney
23083.description: Tetherball Tourney - Your favorite schoolyard game gets playafied!

23084.name: Explore the Primal Sense of Touch
23084.description: Touch is a primal way we feel pleasure, joy and human connection. Guided non-sexual touch workshop in a safe accepting space. Led by Dr. David Bach.

23085.name: Disco Party!
23085.description: Bell bottoms, polyester and disco! What a great way to kick off your week! Cliff will be serving Baybreeze and we will be dancing into the wee hours!

23086.name: Military Madness Manplay
23086.description: Adult 18+ Gay/Bi/Curious men w/Soldier, Sailor & Marine action fantasies do ask & don’t tell in Down Low Club’s discreet, erotic barracks manplay tent

23087.name: Concierge Desk at Paradise Motel
23087.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
23087.description:
Searching for the best events on the Playa but can’t narrow it down? Wondering where to get your butthole cleaned? How about who is serving waffles today? Or is that girl you met at Robot Heart THE ONE? Come ask the all-knowing Paradise Motel Concierge Desk! We've got answers you didn't know you needed.  Visit our in-house concierge for a breakdown of the coolest, can’t miss activities happening each day at the Burn. We’ve done the work. We've studied the guides. Now we bring you the highlights!  

Contact us to have your event added to our select events!

23088.name: Yang Family Tai Chi; the art of letting go
23088.description: By conditioning the connective tissues and learning to relax, we can use the forces of nature and gravity to increase energy, rather than make us stressed. First part opening the bodily gates, second part movement exploration. No experience required. At Hibernaculum on 6:30@E. Free 30-min Tai Chi warmup follow along sample video here: www.fierceheartyoga.com/videos

23089.name: Communication Sexation
23089.description:
Exploration of Sexploration 
A journey through authentic relating games as pertaining to the topic of sex. Exploring boundaries, love, fear, expression, listening, technique, connection, many of all or none of the above!

23090.name: Tutu Tuesday Tutorial
23090.description: Tuesday is The Day to shake your tata in a tutu! Learn how to make your own! Materials provided, just bring your creativity!

23091.name: Bygone Booze and Ballads
23091.description: Fancy will play barkeep as we sway to sultry Sinatra tunes and imbibe old school cocktails. Discuss your railroad acquisitions and speculate on commodities.

23092.name: Design your own mini succulent garden
23092.description: Arts and Crafts workshop-bring your own rock or item to be painted and then enjoy our happy hour. Rocks and paint will be provided.

23093.name: Insane Sweat Session!
23093.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
23093.description: Get yer sweaty HIIT on! Our shady mats+your towel,water & luv of all types of music. Wind down with shavasana, essential oils & hands-on adjustments.

23094.name: Dialogue: Intro to Decentralization
23094.description: Dialogues on Decentralization: Find out why the Blockchain and other Decentralizing technologies will fundamentally shift how a society can operate.

23095.name: Mosaic Tiled River Stones
23095.description: Come play with us, create uninhibited thoughts on stone: a unique reflection of your playful self, only limited by you're own imagination!

23096.name: Therapeutic Acro Yoga & Thai Massage
23096.description: When your body has started to take a toll from all that biking & deep playa dancing, come learn to stretch your spine and revive tired muscles. Rather than rubbing on muscles, Thai massage allows the body to be compressed, pulled, stretched and rocked into limber lightness of being. No partner needed. Bring a mat if you can.

23097.name: Young Sluts Orgy Contest!
23097.description: May the biggest orgy win! Apply to be cheerleaders or secret judges. No monogamous couples or single guys. 21+ ID Required

23098.name: Let it out!
23098.description: Do you have something inside of you that you're just dying to release but are afraid to? Feel free to release this in a safe space created here. Your confidentiality will be protected and judgement will be suspended. Don't suppress any emotions that may come up whether they be happy,sad, angry, or disgusting.  Crying or yelling are perfectly OK.  We may work in one larger group or break into smaller groups depending on what arises.

23099.name: 200 Tu-Tu's Tequila Tuesday
23099.description: tu-tu materials, tutorials & tequila for 200+ supplied by Club Neu Verboten - what more to say?

23100.name: Orgasmic Meditation Class
23100.description: Orgasmic Meditation is quickly becoming a well known and loved means for the pursuit of sexual and spiritual pleasure with your partner. Maybe you are already curious. If so, join us in our sex-positive, female friendly discussion space to learn the basics behind the philosophy and techniques of Orgasmic Meditation! Bring a partner for best results!

23101.name: The Big Lebowski
23101.description: When the darkness warshes over the Playa – darker’na black steer’s tookus on a moonless prairie night, come channel your inner Dude.

23103.name: Love the shame out of body
23103.description: Calling all body shame! Everything about your body you objectify, blame, critique! Bring all that to this workshop! This is the kindling we will use to light the fire of divine, self-love. We will dig deep into the mud and absorb its nutrients together, utilizing this process as the gateway to self-acceptance and communion through our shared humanity. The lotus blossoms out of this very mud- the dirt we get sucked into through. As we fully embrace all that is, in all it’s ugliness and discomfort, together our tantric tribe we will drift off into the shared space of flow, relatability and healing… and from that space blossom into the divinity of all that is.

23105.name: We're not the last bar standing, but we're close
23105.description: On Monday, we get weird. Come drink what's left of the booze.

23106.name: Foot Clinic
23106.description: Participants will get their feet washed and cared for, starting with a water/vinegar soak, and then a massage circle with a lotion or oil of their choice. It’s like hitting the reset button on your burn. There is nothing better than walking out of a camp with shiny new feet. We at PP know that playafoot is a real medical problem. Come get on the good foot! Dr. Z will be on-hand to provide semi-accurate medical facts about feet.

23107.name: STAMP IT! Camp
23107.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 2 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 2 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 2 p.m.
23107.description: Create your BM themed souvenirs using our stamps and inks.  Bring your burning self, your hats t-shirts or whatever.  Sample stampings: BM 2017, the man with flames, Radical Ritual related stamps, and a variety of BM logos and sayings.  Family friendly camp with stamps for younger aged Burners. Come on by and get yourself stamped and picture taken.

23108.name: Feldenkrais-Easing Playa Aches & Pains
23108.description:
"Ready to free yourself from all those playa aches and pains?  

Feldenkrais is a gentle, subtle and effective approach to healing.  It helps with blood flow, the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. 

Be prepared to lay down, relax and attune to yourself as Shara guide’s you through gentle simple movement sequences guaranteed to shift your nervous system to a place of more serenity, comfort, and joy.  Please bring a mat or blanket if you have one.  

The perfect way to rejuvenate your tired playa body"

23109.name: Open Hookah Dome
23109.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 8 p.m.
23109.description: Come retreat from the world in our shaded hookah dome!  We are open to the public for conversation sharing and new friend making Monday and Wednesday, 5-6pm and 7-8pm, and on Friday, 4-5pm.  Clean mouthpieces available for your comfort and cleanliness.  Smoke rings encouraged but not required!

23111.name: MOVIE NIGHT: ALL AGES
23111.description: Sanjay Super Heroes (Short) and a movie about the Goddess Kali. Bring chairs if you can, or relax on our rugs and pillows. We are inviting kids to this event, so please be respectful. This will make for a fantastic comfy event.

23112.name: Shamanic Death and Rebirth Ceremony
23112.description: Participants will be guided in a "Shamanic Death and Rebirth" ceremony to make peace with life and let go of the inner baggage that weighs on our heart. We will call in the Spirit of the Rainforest Medicine, God, or Higher Self with a ritual drink of water and Palo Santo scent. Come prepared to lie down or sit and envision this is your last day on the planet. You have an opportunity to make peace with your life and everyone who has touched you, to surrender, to forgive, and emerge freshly into a new life.

23114.name: Shadow and Light Circle
23114.description: You are that which you admire and that which you despise. A relational, embodied exploration of self and other (Relational Alchemy)

23115.name: Dancing with Dragons
23115.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
23115.description: Come train swords in the Dancing Dragon style with the Fremen masters.  All levels welcome.  Learn our weirding ways, then stay and get weird!

23116.name: Custom pastie making station
23116.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 3 p.m.
23116.description: Come creat your own work of art nipple coverings!

23117.name: Any-S Meeting
23117.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.

23139.name: Power of Prayer Opening Ceremony - Medicine Wheel
23139.description: You are invited to join Red Lightning and First Nations as we sit together under the Medicine Wheel and open our Radical Ritual with the lighting of the Sacred Fire. Our life is a ceremony. And this year, we gather to ceremonially engage in a Radical Ritual together on the dusty Playa land of the Paiute people. The lighting of this Sacred Fire marks the opening of our week-long ceremony at Burning Man. Learn to appreciate fire during our ceremony together? Learn to work with the spirit of the fire? How will you carry this prayer forward through this week of ceremony and Radical Ritual and back to your communities? How will you keep your own Sacred Fire lit? How will you continue to shine your light in the darkness? Fire feeds the seeds of intention of what we seek to call forth. Fire is also a purifier. Send everything that no longer serves you into your own Sacred Fire to purify your heart, body, mind, and soul. Open this year with a Radical Ritual and hold your prayer through the burn and bring it back to your community.

23140.name: Finding Inner Balance in a chaotic world

Participants choose a piece of art which speaks to them, fill out a short adoption card, and take the art home with them to keep.  Small paintings, prints, photography, and collages are the usual mediums, much is original work, it is hard to tell what you will find.  A Gifting Box is available for your perusal, and has swag, trinkets, and small useful items.
Open during daytime hours.  The Home is curated each morning, so every day there is something new.  Hours are after coffee until suppertime.  Closed in case of rain or wild stampedes.
Donations of non-MOOPY art are welcome, but please, no food or costumes or anything large which would be hard to transport.

23147.name: Feldenkrais / Expanding Intuition
23147.description:
"Through this gentle somatic techniques, we will align our bodies and gain greater access to the rhelm of our subconscious & the inner wisdoms of the body. 

Feldenkrais is a gentle, subtle and effective approach to healing.  It helps with blood flow, the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. 

Be prepared to lay down, relax and attune to yourself as Shara guide’s you through gentle simple movement sequences guaranteed to shift your nervous system to a place of more serenity, comfort, and joy.  Please bring a mat or blanket if you have one.  

The perfect way to rejuvenate your tired playa body"

23148.name: Autogenic Training-heal our mind&body
23148.description:
Autogenic Training (AT) involves repetitions of a set of visualizations that induce a state of relaxation. AT has been shown to be an effective tool in preventative medicine, stress-related disorders and panic attacks. It can relieve tension, lessen anxiety, and enhance performance. As the world's first western developed mediation technique, AT is a neurological and psycho-physiological tool or therapy for psychological and medical self-healing. 

AT takes you through a series of validated and prescriptive mental exercises that target specific physiological reactions in the brain and body that underpin optimal health and well-being. Through the power of self-suggestion you are taught how to consciously and intentionally control your Autonomic Nervous System. AT is for anyone who wants to benefit from gaining the self-help tools to manage stress in the present and to develop long term strategies to reduce stress and anxiety. It is also of benefit for qualified or trainee psychotherapists who wish to gain a deeper trust in their relationship with 'self' and for those in the caring professions who want to learn new techniques for self-care. The technique was developed by the German psychiatrist Johannes Heinrich Schultz and first published in 1932. 

Each session can be practiced in a position chosen amongst a set of recommended postures (for example, lying down, sitting meditation, sitting like a rag doll).On a micro level of regeneration, Autogenics retrains cells, glands, the brain and organs to behave as they are ‘meant to’, that is, to work in harmony and to restore the natural order. We are now coming to understand AT’s role in neuro-plasticity, gut health, epigenetic modulation and the placebo response. The future for AT world-wide in becoming a mainstream therapy for the self-regulation of body-mind healing and optimal functioning is exciting!

23175.description: Damn the burn, Save the man.  What better ritual then a good old fashion protest march.  Get your clever oak tag signs ready and join us at Burningman Studios as we march out to the man to protest his unjust and reprehensible burning. He's stood up for us all week, now its time we stand up for him. Effigies have feelings too man.

23176.name: Transfoamation
23176.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4:15 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 4:15 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 4:15 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1 p.m. – 4:15 p.m.
23176.description:
Transfoamation is an interactive perfoamance camp which prompts citizens of BRC to ponder self-awareness and investigate the sources of their identity through the examination of perspectives on gender, sociofomo status, race and privilege.  Set in a post Refoamation environment, our theme from last year which asked people to confess their environmental sins to animals and experience life behind bars, this year’s Transfoamation involves a multi-stage process developed in conjunction with LGTBQ community which will highlight person-to-personal exercises diving into identity as participants queue up. After completing all prefoamation rituals to join our Tranfoamation they will shed their old dusty selves and clothing, enter our transfoam chamber, and ascend to the final stage of their actual Transfoamation to oneness with the universe and their fellow human in the transblastive foam experience. 

Transfoamation will take place daily starting on Wednesday and ending on Saturday at 12:00 -1:00pm for children under 13, 1:00 - 4:20pm for all people of all ages. We are usually located near 2:15/G. 

Transfoamation is also the home base of an amazing community that services the city 24 hours a day in a number of ways.  Besides the wonder of a daily personal Transfoamation we offer, the camp serves as the home base of the volunteer professionals working with the Zendo project that provides psychological harm reduction services across the BRC.  We host trainings for Zendo staff in our camp and run a 400 plate per meal kitchen connected to the Transfoamation and Zendo.  We will have a midday hydration area at the exit of our Transfoam Dome run by our camp as well. Also part of the Transfoam camp is the Abraxas Mutant vehicle team.

Our camp changes it's name every year. Previous years we have been called Refoamation, Something Freaky This Way Foams, Fauxmirage, UFOm, Faux Mitzvah, Foamo Aragato, and Foam Saves.

23177.name: Gloving: Glove lightshow techniques and technology
23177.description: Gloving is a form of flow art that has been active in many music scenes for decades. Fro those whom have never seen a glove light show, it’s the art of using LEDs attached to the fingers to display a variety of  displays using different colors, styles, and technology to put on an amazing show. This class will go over the basics of a glove light show, showcase a few different styles, and explain the technology behind the different chip sets.  At the end of the class there will be a giveaway to a lucky few who will receive a glove set of their own. They  will be able to there new knowledge and share the magic of gloving with the the Burning Man Community.

23178.name: •	Core Shaman Extraction How-To
23178.description: PREREQUISITE: Find your Power Animal. Clear bad vibes, negative Energy, hitchhikers- while protected. Our animal spirit guides us in a drumming journey. This is core shaman protocol.

23182.name: Stoicism: Ancient Necessary Philosophy
23182.description: Stoicism: How an Ancient Philosophy Can Turn Us All into Laughing Vulcans.  Philosophy is often thought of as the exclusive playground of philosophy students and their professors, but what about the rest of us nincompoops? Stoicism is a philosophical school that is highly misunderstood today, and the model it offers promises us a way of living that is still applicable.  It offers different perspectives, teaches acceptance of imperfections, and demonstrate an updated Vulcan model for living: to live well and prosper.
