Friday, September 1st, 2017 5 p.m. – 7 p.m.
23187.description:
Come play beer-in-hand soccer at the one and only BRC Arena Camposanto Soccer Stadium. Fire Soccer a distinct possibility. 

Camposanto es territorio futbolero. In 2012 we used a glow in the dark ball and black light to stretch the futbol games into the night.  In 2013 we built the first official stadium of Black Rock City.  “El Monumental” .  In 2014 we took the world cup to playa with a little twist, no nations, no flags, just the joy for the sport… at a very fancy stadium. In 2015 and 2016 we had a professionally measured futbol 5 field.

We do take special care of the field the whole year in order to have one of the  best sport arenas of Black Rock City.  Following the radical inclusion rule,  many other sports are practiced at the stadium during the day. Tejo, track and field, bola criolla, handball/footbal, saltimbanqui are just some, to name a few.

23188.name: "Nastoyanka" Bar
23188.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 8 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.

Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 8 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
23188.description: Do you know the oldest and sacral ritual of Ukraine? Small tip: it’s about moonshine. Come and Drink with us real Ukrainian homemade bitters! Only for the strongest in spirit.

23189.name: History Mystery Mix Reloaded
23189.description: What happens when you blend electronic beats with some of the oldest songs and music ever recorded? Find out, have a drink, and get lost in the mists of time. From clay tablets in ancient Egypt, to the minstrels of the age of crusades, we will re-mix some of the most amazing music left behind by our ancestors to tell stories we should never forget.

23190.description: SPUN provides lanyards and tags for Sparkle Ponies to write down their camp address and other pertinent info so they can always find their way home!

23191.name: Vegan de-programming
23191.description: Tired of tofurkey, sprouts and soy milk? Tired of being laughed at by your carnivore friends. Well, come on over to Feed the Artists, the Playa’s premier gourmet food camp where we will gently show you that eating flesh is fun and good for you. It ain’t fucking up the planet either. Our caring de-programmers will gently guide you through various delicious fleshy treats that will have you squealing, mooing and baying with delight. Not a shaming seminar.

23192.name: Introspect, Reflect, Detect, ... ect
23192.description: We'll ask questions. Write our answers. Share our findings. Join us for group journaling, sharing, reflections. Questions of varying depths provided. Bring your problems, a life-changing question, and Pen/Paper if you have them.

23193.name: Sonya Sophia EFT: INVINCIBLE HEART of LOVE
23193.description: Tap into LOVE with us! SHINE up your heart by burning emotional baggage. Open up to GIVE love, RECEIVE love, and BE LOVE.

23194.name: The Non-Thinking Mind
23194.description: Reverse engineering the human brain to manage our conscious mind. Be in control of your internal environment to achieve self mastery.

23195.name: How to strap it on: pegging & butt sex
23195.description:
With the popularity of Bend Over Boyfriend videos and the proliferation of sex-toy stores aimed at women, the practice known as Pegging, (anal penetration of a man with a strap-on dildo – a term coined by sex-columnist Dan Savage) has become a popular fantasy for many people.

Strap-on play is no longer something solely for lesbians and dominatrices. Pegging and the play surrounding it can be a sexy, fun and adventurous way for men and women to explore new dynamics and sensations in the bedroom. Yet, without a game partner or a certain amount of experience and communication confidence, pegging can be a nerve-wracking adventure.

Butt- Allie is here to help!

Join sex and relationship educator (and veteran peg’ster) Allie Moon as she guides you through a laughter-filled and pragmatic workshop that takes you from soup to… er, nuts!

In this 2-hour, informative and humorous workshop, where you get to watch, take notes and ask questions, you will learn:

Strap-On Basics for Women￼
Simple techniques for fun and easy bottoming/receiving
Ways to bring up the idea of pegging without freaking out your partners!
Communication and negotiation skills that will deepen your love life…
* Safer Sex protocols and hygiene tips
* Special considerations when working with butts
* Unique and fun positions perfect for Woman-on-Man sex
* Some simple fem-dom techniques (nothing too scary, we promise!)
* And much, much more!

Show up with your questions and leave with new-found confidence and self-esteem for your relationships and sex life.

23196.name: FUNdoshi
23196.description: Learn how to tie a loincloth. Fabric will be provided or bring your own strip (approx 1' x 8'). Put YOUR fun in a FUNdoshi! While supplies last!!

23197.name: Soul Train Friday!
23197.description: Celebrate the 70's, get your full bush photographed here and display it proudly on your own take home genital ID badge. Already trimmed? We have merkins for those left bereft of pubes. Grab a drink at our ShirtCock Saloon!

23198.name: Mimosa breakfast
23198.description: It’s Saturday morning, after a long dusty night out, you wander back home. You happen upon TDC, serving you an ice cold Mimosa. What else would you need?

Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.

Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.

23200.name: Soulmates- A partner out there for me – Soul Fire
23200.description:
Is there a difference between people who attempt to find soul mates without this assistance? What will this do for them?

Each soul was made to be loved unconditionally. We all have been given a soulmate: a partner created at the moment of your soul’s creation. Being with your soulmate will bring true fulfillment to your life because your life’s path lies parallel to theirs.

23201.description: We all need to know how to sew on a button since mom's not always around! Learn the basics of the not-so-mystical-art of hand-sewing & machine sewing.

23204.description: Grab a drink and rest in the shade while you relax in paradise at our air conditioned tiki bar!  We'll have the A/C on full blast in our camp bus while serving you cool refreshing drinks.

Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23205.description:

This class will be an all-skill-level introduction that focuses on safe, sane, consensual play and sexual exploration. Beginner's class for Flogging and Rope.  This event is adults only: 18+.

23206.name: Cultivating Conscious Communities
23206.description: The new rules of connecting, collaborating and co-existing (including businesses, ways of living, policy, and new models.

23208.name: Sonya Sophia EFT: DIVINE PURPOSE
23208.description: IGNITE your REASON for BEING and Tap into your purpose. Clear out fear & doubt. YOUR MISSION MATTERS! Leave inspired with tools to help you forever.

23209.name: X Commandments (A Sexy Old Testament Dance Party)
23209.description: A party of Biblical proportions for everyone from Babylonian Whores to “Virgin” Marys. Journey to the inn that welcomes everyone and let The Spirit Move thy body at Paradise Motel’s all Mash-up (Music with Lyrics!) dance party with returning prodigal DJ Lobsterdust (BOOTIE –NYC). Join us as we go back to before there were rules! Receive liquid blessings at our bar, explore lasciviousness, and put your faith to the test with our wheel of "Smite or Blessing." Will you join Eve and Steve as they search for Adam’s snake, help Cleopatra drink all the water turned to wine, or force us to add a commandment? They say the meek will inherit the earth, just not at this party.  By the end, we promise thy will be speaking in tongues.

23210.name: CHILL THE FUCK OUT and COLOR!

Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.

Come visit our shaded dome to relax and color your frustrations away.  Choose your favorite, beautifully embellished swear word, or perhaps a picture of unicorns being total assholes!

23211.description:
Love your friend? Make it forever and have your Fwedding at Camp Friendgasm! Join us for scheduled ceremonies Monday & Thursday 3-6 pm, with differently-themed clothing props (pirate! hippy! others!), or come by anytime for your own Fwedding experience. Pre-written vows provided, or feel free to write/create your own and exchange a gifted friendship bracelet with your friend! 

Friendgasm - where toe-curling friendships are made.

They will teach you the ways of their people and how to level up your sexy with minimal effort. Learn how to set up the perfect yard trap (aka experience center), how to lure unsuspecting young beautiful people into your trap with bullhorns, baubles and sweet dance moves! How to compliment your interns in an almost...but not quite creepy way, how to sport the perfect mum as a progressive fashion statement and how to keep them wanting more Whiskey and more compliments! Lap dance participation is optional for extra credit points.

23222.name: INSTUMENTS & MATE JAM SESSION
23222.description: At PlayaTune we are obsessed with music and sound and there is something very beautiful about connecting over music. We have spent time, energy and money collecting a variety of instruments to share with our fellow burners. We understand that many talented musicians may not feel comfortable bringing their prized instruments to the playa. Because of this we should worked hard to create a space where musicians of all types can come, jam and connect together while also bringing beautiful sounds to the playa and enjoying some curated beverages! Our goal is to combine instrumental music with cold Mate. We provide the instruments, the space and the beverages all with the hopes that musicians will come share their special and unique talents with us in a space that fosters musical innovation and cultivates creativity. Join us for an open call Instrumental session paired with a cold mate to help lubricate your creativity and foster an environment for connection.

23223.name: Dance Balkana class
23223.description: Get your ass ready for Balkan Dance Party tomorrow! Learn to shake it to dirty Balkan style musika! Easy line dance. Freestyle party moves. Rookies to Pro level. Everybody dance!

23224.name: Orgy Night Play Party!
23224.description: 3 somes!, 4 somes!, 5 somes! Young poly sexual celebration. No monogamous couples or single guys. 21+ ID Required

23225.name: HOLY F*CK!
23225.description:
Want to re-write and reclaim your erotic story?  Empower yourself by sharing your voice and being held and heard in a sacred space? Dig into where your erotic edges are so you can go explore them safely? Enjoy your body and it's desires?  Redefine the sounds you make when you make love? Claim your kinks? Get some sexy secrets off your chest?  

In this workshop we will be using the power of storytelling, ritual, partner work, and guided visualization to explore, release, and celebrate and integrate our erotic and sexual selves into our mindful and spiritual  lives.

Lead by Alexandra Roxo (Writer, Teacher, Filmmaker) who writes a column called Holy F*ck all about balancing sexual and spiritual explorations, and facilitates workshops around the world. Read more at alexandraroxo.com, @alexandraroxo.

23227.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.

Aloha

A team of physicists and mathematicians with Los Angeles based Quantum Gravity Research are developing a new first-principles unified "theory of everything" they call Emergence Theory. This mind-blowing new theory attempts to unify, through mathematical and scientific rigor, the theory of relativity, quantum mechanics... and consciousness.

Bring anything from questions to food to share.  This is an informational party!

Handle your disputes civilly while enjoying some lemonade, bring your own hootch to make it hot. Be prepared for civility so you can walk away quenched and put your disputes behind you.

Samples will be shared and audience participation is encouraged.

Thursday  2017 Billion Bunny March

The Billion Bunny March marches Thurs! We march to liberate all furry sentient beings from the treachery of humanity! Fluff up your ears and tail and meet Thurs 4-6pm at EGGS Bar at 6:15 & inner circle of Center Camp for Bunnification, socializing and HOPtails (bring cup). We MARCH 6PM SHARP…like a really pointy carrot! (Email us if you have a mobile sound system to play our march music) Afterparty at EGGS Bar.

There's plenty you can do with a hoop that doesn't require hooping on your waist. There will be extra hoops and they are the heavier kind that are perfect for beginners. 23264.description:
We're throwing a Patronus Party! Come out to Champagne Campaign for an awesome day party with music, dancing and champagne! Costumes encouraged! Harry Potter nerds welcome! 

Why Patronus and not sspirit animal? Spirit animal is a culturally appropriated term which bastardized an important and significant Native American spiritual practice into white girls calling Lindsay Lohan their spirit animal as she crashes her car drunk with Coke all over her nose. Patronus is the non-offensive Harry Potter originated word that is the animal that forms at the end of your wand to protect against dementors. #themoreyouknow 

Not sure what your Patronus is? Here's an easy quiz to find out: https://tinyurl.com/lx2k7rz

For the past nine years, a Seattle-based group of friends have been traveling to Burning Man, spreading the love of Burning Man upon return, and growing larger with each burn. In 2016, Champagne Campaign was first officially placed as a registered theme camp. The universal activity enjoyed by this group of friends is meeting at 12:00 in front of the temple every sunrise for a champagne toast to the new day. This group of friends has continued the sunrise tradition at home in Seattle, and plans sunrise champagne events during the summer. At Burning Man, Champagne Campaign is an interactive camp that hosts daily debates in a campaign-esque setting. Our champagne bar is open during debate hours to encourage lively debates paired with champagne party punch. We encourage lively debates where people are free to give their opinion no matter the absurdity and engage themselves among burners of all different backgrounds and opinions. Champagne Campaign returns to Burning Man in 2017 in that hopes that it will continue to be an interactive inclusive theme camp for years to come on playa as well as in Seattle. All proceeds go to getting our camp to the playa and stocking our bar so we can gift the joy of champagne all week long!

23289.description: Start your evenings with intense laughter! We laugh for no reason, other than for exercise, and health. Relieve stress and pain, promote natural healing, and create spontaneous bonds of friendship through group laughter. It’s fun! The brainchild of Dr. Madan Kataria in India and practiced by millions worldwide, Laughter Yoga combines Unconditional Laughter with Yogic Breathing (Pranayama). Anyone can Laugh for No Reason, without relying on humor, jokes or comedy. Laughter is simulated as a body exercise in a group; with eye contact and childlike playfulness, it soon turns into real and contagious laughter. The concept of Laughter Yoga is based on a scientific fact that the body cannot differentiate between fake and real laughter. One gets the same physiological and psychological benefits. Find much more info online by searching on Laughter Yoga, but come! Enjoy!

23296.description:
Join us anytime in a ritual to un-fuck your burn. Planned Playahood is proud to present our new birth canal, for you to shed the sins of yesterday and be reborn unto the dust. Spend a meditative moment in our womb of a dome, then climb into the canal and be delivered! Squeeze your way through and start the rest of your new life! It won't hurt...much. Our nearby bar, The Rusty Speculum, is open from noon to midnight. Please B.Y.O.S (Bring Your Own Sins).

Participants navigate an obstacle course of contraception devices through the interior orifice and twisty turns of the birth canal, reproducing something that we all have in common: that moment we entered into this self-reliant dusty life. Swat a sperm-shaped tether ball, pass through a leaky condom, jump over a big freakin’ bible, through a coat hanger, climb a set of stairs to nowhere, chill in the womb. 
Culminates in a slide through a giant vagina where you are re-birthed near the bar and greeted with heckling encouragement and a possible spank on the bottom from a genuine playa doctor. During clinic events, our camp members will guide canal visitors: If you need lube or a slap on the ass we are there for you. But the experience stands alone at any time of day or night. The love canal loves to be explored.

23340.description: We want all the virgins! And by virgins, we mean anyone who has not yet had the joy of meeting our camp. Please come and say hi, share a drink, get your family jewels photographed, no big whoop. We love you! Grab a drink at our ShirtCock Saloon!

23341.name: Pretty Kitty White Party >^.^< )'(
23341.description: The Cat's Meow Neon Bar is hosting the obligatory White Wednesday party. Let your tighty-whities glow in our blacklight bar and lounge! Special gifts for our pretty little kitties in their favorite white kitty wear!! Blacklight body painting available as well. The bar serves Vodka, Tequila, Rum and Jameson mixed drinks or shots by request, and cold beer or cider (depending on what is on tap at the moment). The Cat's Meow is a bar and lounge with a relaxing vibe. Music, neon pillows, bean bag chairs, blow up couches, cuddle puddle in a glowing blacklight paradise!!

23342.name: Paint Your Own Person!
23342.description: Be your own canvas and become a walking work of art!   Its fun art, not fine art, so anyone can do it!  Body paints and brushes provided.

23343.name: Falling in LOVE with Yourself
23343.description: Feast of self-love and deeply experiential beginner's guide to sexual energetics. Honor & adore the life force that dwells within us all.

23344.name: Playa Fashion Forum
23344.description: Fashion on the playa has become a hot topic.  From the Do-It-Yourself makers to some of the top creatives in the world putting together the hottest fashion that translates to city streets, clubs and runways all around the world.  What's hip and happening in the world of fashion and how does the playa influence it?  Meet and discuss with some of today's most provocative leaders in fashion in our 1st Annual Fashion Forum at PlayaSkool.

23345.name: Monks Procession to Place Man's Head on the Buddha
23345.description: "Pie Iesu domine, dona eis requiem".  Join the Metallic Monks for a procession out to the Man Pavilion where we will place The Man head upon the Buddha Bank Shrine.  We will flagellate ourselves and reflect upon the sacrifices of the Man all the way from Shrinesburg out to the Man Pavilion.  Dress in your best Holocaust cloak.  Bring bells to ring, your thurible (swinging incense holder), wood planks to smash upon your forehead.  Then help us hand out communion.

23346.name: Drum Circle
23346.description: Bring your percussion instruments or use ours & or your dancing self, and join in the pounding, rhythmic, tribal beats.

23347.name: FUCK ALCOHOL'S BULLSHIT
23347.description: Sick of booze? Hungover right now? BARF. Fuck that! Escape the Matrix. Be a true rebel, so you can crush life & shit. Non 12 Step. Delicious mocktails & NOT shots to flow.

23348.name: Harajuku Party at Broken Compass
23348.description: Hello Tokyo! Harajuku lovers come party with drinking and photo shoot ❤️.

23349.name: ChickPeas’ Psychedelic Fantasy
23349.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.

Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.

23349.description: Surreal Blacklight Art Installation in the Courtyard at Comfort & Joy Village created by Brain ChickPea Busta who has been at the helm of Comfort and Joy, an LGBT non-profit, serving as  Art Director and a distinguished member of the Board.

23350.name: Chill your body and mind - Writing Workshop
23350.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
23350.description: Practice writing from a place of inner quiet that allows you to see and feel the story being told. Perfect for beginning and experienced writers.

23351.name: The Shaolin Survival Kit
23351.description: Morning guided meditation and energy work to fill your soul post-sunrise.

23352.name: Bonobo Lodge
23352.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
23352.description: Join a sensual network. Each person is a node, touch is how we connect, every exchange strengthens the social bonds. We’re inspired by our primate cousins, the Bonobo chimpanzees, who resolve the tension of conflict through intimacy rather than violence (most of the time). We've adapted grooming practices seen throughout the animal kingdom to activate good-vibe hormones, which signal feelings of safety, belonging, and well-being. This is a naked experience where you should expect to touch and be touched by someone you don't already know, within a carefully structured and monitored program. All are welcome. Space is limited.

23353.name: Black Beatle In Black Rock City A Hip Hop Dance
23353.description: DJ Edge and Queen Attia will deliver  the "Future" and present of hip hop at Club Neu Verboten.

23354.name: Bed of Nails’ Yoga Nidra

Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
23354.description: Acupressure your way to yoga bliss on these pressure point mats, based on the 5000 yr old bed-of-nails technique. ONLY 20 spots. Arrive early. BOOMSHANKA!

23356.name: Kinking and Drinking Present drink until your Tied
23356.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
23356.description: Come Drink Kinky cocktails at black rock cities most adventurous bar. Enjoy our cornucopia of kinky beverages and fresh brewed tea leaves. Let yourself be tied by our rope masters as we teach you the basic fundamental ties in rope bondage. Learn to tie yourself and others in our interactive class. Every class will begin with a ritual sacrifice to the bondage god, our tribute will be bound to the web. Afterword anyone is invited to learn to bind a partner or yourself.

23357.name: BDSM Safety Class
23357.description:
BDSM safety taught by an EMT
Learn how to safely spank, choke and tie. As well as the basics of what to do should something go wrong during your play

23358.name: My Little Pony Card Game
23358.description: Learn to play the MLP competitive card game, then enjoy some free play!

23359.name: "Wife" Carrying Contest
23359.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
23359.description: Sometimes, relationships aren't 50/50 and one party does more of the heavy lifting. If you think you've developed a special ability, join us in a non-traditional Finnish "Wife" Carrying Contest. Whomsoever makes their way through our obstacle course in the shortest time will take the trophy, the glory, and a prize proportionate to the weight of the "Wife." (Please note: The term "Wife" merely refers to the team member being carried, so you can find one anywhere.)

23360.name: Make a Mandala on a stone
23360.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 2 p.m.
23360.description: Learn the art of creating sacred Mandalas. We will teach you how and provide all the materials you'll need to create your own special Mandala on a stone which you can take with you. We can accommodate 10 people at a time, and cycle in up to 60 people. Over 18 years of age only. Class is being offered twice in the week at 12:30 on Wednesday and Thursday.

23361.name: Illuminated Headpiece Design
23361.description: Let go of your default visual persona and evolve into a new creature in this 2 hour accessory making workshop.  Costume designer Mikaela Holmes will guide you through creating a unique headpiece using LEDs, silk flowers and other simple materials.  All supplies provided, but feel free to bring any special decorations you want to incorporate!

23362.name: Longevity Stick
23362.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
23362.description: The sun’s just up, but not too hot; clothing is optional here, so adults only, please. Come for a not too early hour of low-impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 lo-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, vitality, & open your points & channels. Bring water or hydration liquid. We have sticks for U. Master Mai Bac Dao developed Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of the North Vietnamese Army. He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain health thru LSA, and vowed if he was ever freed, he’d dedicate his life to spread its benefits, with this proviso: No trainer may ever charge for it. (Like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, moved to Southern California, and taught classes of students and future teachers. Today, weekly classes abound in So Cal, around the US, & the world. See: www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 .

23363.name: Gangstagrass/Rappalachia
23363.description: What is Rappalachia? What is Gangstagrass?  One part bluegrass, one part gangsta rap... somehow they blend into something way cooler than the sum of those parts! BabyWipes will be serving "GitSome". BYO cup. Stick around and help us light the city!

23364.name: Tarot Therapy
23364.description: Tarot can be a wonderful bridge to the untouchable; deepening meaning and orienting and concretizing our understandings and perceptions. Come give it a try!

23365.name: Roleplaying Games Open Tables
23365.description: All you need is your imagination! We will be hosting open table space for anyone who would like to come sample books and games from our library. We also provide character sheets, dice, and writing materials. Get out of the sun for a few hours and explore strange worlds and cool games.

23366.name: Bubbles and Bocci
23366.description: All kinds of bubbles! Just the one kind of bocci.

23367.name: Decentralizing & DAO-ifying Charity with Santa
23367.description: With Blockchain tech & social media, anyone can build a community that can share resources effectively around solving global issues big and small.

23368.name: Acupuncture Nirvana Circle
23368.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10:30 a.m. – noon
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10:30 a.m. – noon
23368.description: Detox your body & mind. Take a break to rejuvenate, recharge & renew with auricular acupuncture - bringing you one step closer to Nirvana!

23369.name: White Trash Superstars takeover Scotch & Hops Bar
23369.description: WTS on the other side of the Playa!  To serve our White Trash mimosas, tang bang  & attitude in their bar!  Scotch drinkers beware!!!

23370.name: Make Your Own Dick Leash
23370.description: Find yourself dicking around, looking for your bag? Over-cocky about remembering your things? Learn to dick leash and you'll never forget!

23372.name: The Significance of a Pause - Meditation
23372.time:
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 6:30 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 6:30 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
23372.description: A simple pause allows for life to become real, awake, and at times it can be incredibly uncomfortable. We often focus on the uncomfortable aspect rather than the significance of a pause.  A simple pause.  This meditation practice will focus on the importance of a pause and how to use one to your advantage to relieve stress and build an everyday meditation practice.  Mudras ad Mantras will be combined with Lion's Breathe and a chant of Rolling Oms to seal the practice.

23374.name: Why the Divine Feminine Wants You to be Rich
23374.description: They say "Diamonds are a girl's best friend" but really it's "Financial literacy is a girl's best friend." Goddesses and boss bitches only. When a woman is economically independent and wields the energy of money powerfully, she shines her light to the fullest, thereby elevating the Feminine and healing the planet. The current state of the world we live in - war, social issues, environmental destruction, financial crises - reflects the distortion & dominance of the Masculine. Nothing has been more devastating to the evolution of our collective consciousness towards a higher state of oneness, love, and cooperation. Let's stop perpetuating the repression of the feminine by settling for less and being less Goddess than we are.

23375.name: Belly Dancing
23375.description: Experience the magic! Learn the ancient art of Belly Dance or just watch. Our Fantastic Dancers are sure to keep you entertained.

23376.name: Sacred Geometrey, Transportals & Technolgy
23376.description: Join us for this multi faceted presentation on the evolution of consciousness.

23377.name: Genital TUTU Tuesday
23377.description: Made it all the way to the playa with no tutu? Make your own with colorful swatches of toile provided by us. Then get your cock, vag, ass, tits, or whatever you got photographed in your new tutu, on your own take home ID. Take a spin on our aerial rig and grab a drink at our ShirtCock Saloon!

Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.

Every class will begin with a ritual sacrifice to the bondage god, our tribute will be bound to the web. Afterword anyone is invited to learn to bind a partner or yourself.

23380.name: Burner Culmination Ceremonies
23380.description:
Burner Culmination Ceremonies
Join our camp for Burnt Mitzvah (13 burns) and Burn-cinera (15 burns) celebrations.  Relive foggy memories and tell creative lies about past Burning Man events and regionals you have attended.  S'mores will be served.

23381.name: What is Tantra and why do I care?
23381.description: Tantra...a big word with a lot of misconceptions. Let us together have a conversation about classical, neo, red, white and any other modifier words we may have! Is tantra all about sex? What are some of the source texts? How can this ancient wisdom be of practical use in my modern life?

23382.name: Blacklight Booty Swing =^.^= )'(
23382.description: Come swing your booty in our glow dome! Playing a mix of our Booty Swing grooves! Burlesque or swing attire with a neon twist encouraged!! Hoops and poi to play with for our circus friends ♥♥The bar serves Vodka, Tequila, Rum and Jameson mixed drinks or shots by request, and cold beer or cider (depending on what is on tap at the moment). The Cat's Meow is a bar and lounge with a relaxing vibe. Music, neon pillows, bean bag chairs, blow up couches, cuddle puddle in a glowing blacklight paradise!!

23383.name: 5 Element Theory
23383.description: A dynamic system of organization used in Traditional Chinese Medicine to explain cycles & relationships within the cosmos, natural environment, and in ourselves.

23384.name: STAR WHORES EP2: ATTACK OF THE BONES
23384.description: TCTC's STAR WHORES ep2: attack of the bones! Princess labia is back! Second annual cantina party, but this is no shitty prequel! More flesh light-saber fights, shots even a storm trooper won't wanna miss. It's 12-6pm Thursday, so we'll ALL smell like Wookies!!

23385.name: Intuition Bootcamp
23385.description: Intuition Bootcamp: We WAKE UP and trust our intuitive sense, with paired practice and prompts of mediumship and "quick hits" to answer deep questions. Learn to access your intuition and develop your skills with lots of opportunity to practice.

23386.name: Greatest Mutant Arts Parade
23386.description: The Greatest Mutant Arts Parade will launch its 4th consecutive year of parading an improvised route through Black Rock City and the Playa.  Mutant Art Vehicles will unite to celebrate the unique and diverse spectacle that is Burning Man. The goals of the Greatest Mutant Arts Parade (GMAP) is to create a future planned route event...where Black Rock City can unite together in an uncensored, magnificent Meet and Greet of Mutant Art Vehicles, Theme Camps, BORG Organizers, Art Groups, Marching bands, Bicycle Crews, Stilt Walkers, and much much more. Look for the parade on its rogue route around Noon on the Playa, through the City...where??? We cannot tell you the route. But we will start and stop the parade at Reverbia Camp (3:45 and Esplanade)  ****All interested participant vehicles and people who would like to assist...then ride in the parade...contact us via email.

23388.name: Freestyle Journaling
23388.description: Quiet(ish) time for journaling. We provide the journals; you provide the deep thoughts.

23389.name: Curated Cat Video Cinema
23389.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
23389.description: Does your purrfect evening include Meownging with your favorite furr baby? Our Cat Video Cinema is sure to knock your kitten mittens right off! Our curated collection of cat videos will be projected into a custom built cat video projector screen. See what all the fuss is about!

23390.name: Camp Beaverton's Welcome Home Reception
23390.description: To celebrate Camp Beaverton's 10th Anniversary, we are showing "Meet the Beavers," followed by story time about favorite Beaverton memories. Open to all

23391.name: Discover Your Kinks! Booth
23391.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 2 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 8 p.m.

23391.description: Take Bad Boy’s “Discover Your Kinks” electronic quiz at the booth to get suggestions for activities or toys that you might want to try. Then optionally get some introductory instruction in our dungeon.  Open only when the booth is staffed.  Mist'R Cool Camp is located in Playfully Yours Village.

23393.name: Good Vibes Yoga and Dance
23393.description: Join us for a dance infused yoga class to stretch out from a long day in the sun, and prep your bod for a delicious dance-filled evening.

23394.name: Rise and Shine Your Yoga
23394.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 8 a.m. – 9 a.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 a.m. – 9 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 a.m. – 9 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 a.m. – 9 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 a.m. – 9 a.m.
23394.description: It's way too fucking early, so keep it down, but some of you want to get up and do some Yoga while most of us are just dragging our asses to bed. Cool. Come on over, jump on the mats, and get some soul cleansing done through sweaty yoga action at an hour that, even in default world, is unholy early. Enjoy your stretch and sun salutations, you over-achieving mother fuckers.

23395.name: De La Quest... Classic Hip Hop
23395.description: So whas,so whas,so what's the scenario? Unwind,pump n grind at The Peoples Bar where cognac will be served.

23396.name: Little Black Dress at Sunset Party
23396.description: You've got the perfect little black dress, you're wondering where to wear it!  Nacho Mama's little black dress party, the chance to look your best.  Come enjoy the magic of sunset with a vodka or wine.  All are welcome: Tutus, Kilts, Sarongs, and more.  Some loaner black dresses available, so bring your man, too.

23397.name: Kickball at the Man!
23397.description: Join us for a good old-fashioned game of kickball!  Meet up at the 6 o'clock side of the Man and get your game on!

23398.name: Quiet Reflection
23398.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 a.m. – noon
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 a.m. – noon
23398.description: Come and grab some shade and solitude in our shade tent meditate, nap, be still be quite

23399.name: Balada Romantica Sunrise @ Solar Chiva
23399.description:
Prepare your soul for the heavy party. 
Come cry your eyes out with the saddest heartbreak songs in Spanish. 
Start your engines for the party at sunrise with the Camposanto crew. 
Look for the Solar Powered Mutant art car.

23400.name: Bonobo Lodge
23400.description: Join a sensual network. Each person is a node, touch is how we connect, every exchange strengthens the social bonds. We’re inspired by our primate cousins, the Bonobo chimpanzees, who resolve the tension of conflict through intimacy rather than violence (most of the time). We've adapted grooming practices seen throughout the animal kingdom to activate good-vibe hormones, which signal feelings of safety, belonging, and well-being. This is a naked experience where you should expect to touch and be touched by someone you don't already know, within a carefully structured and monitored program. All are welcome. Space is limited.

23401.name: Black Rock Beacon
23401.description: We produce a daily newspaper for Black Rock City with a mix of fun articles and serious news. Our Press Club & News Room provide shade and refreshment for ourselves as well as other members of the press, bacon-bearing volunteers, and interested Burners. Come see us at this year's location at Camp Iron Rose. Lux Veritas Lardum!

23402.name: Holy Sacrament of The Man
23402.description: The Time has come for you to drink the kool-aid.  Join us at the Buddha Bank Shrine located at the man pavilion to receive the holy sacrament of the Man.  Come for communion and receive the body and blood of The Man.  As we drink the cup and eat the bread, we reflect on The Man's sacrifice for us.  Look for the metallic monks.

23403.name: Psychedelics of Interpersonal Contact
23403.description: Explore how the person sitting next to you can be the most potent psychedelic. Learn to generate altered states through human interaction!  Led by Steve Bearman, Ph.D. and Troy (TDazzl) Dayton.

23404.name: Kittenplay Class! Kittenplay 101
23404.description: Have you ever wanted to learn about kittenplay? But on your cat ears and come to Brulee for a class taught by Isibella discussing the basics of it!

23405.name: How to Pocket This Magic
23405.description: Using guided meditation, discussion, and therapy tricks we will create a space to set some intentions for incorporating this feeling into our daily lives

23406.name: The Decentralized Dance Party AKA The DDP!
23406.description:
The DDP is nearing a decade of its inclusive, boombox-powered, Open-Source Party Revolution! Pursuing Freedom and World Peace thru Capital-P Partying!

Visit http://www.TheDDP.com for more info

23407.name: Restorative Yoga
23407.description: Lost your zen at Burning Man? Restore the balance to body and mind with down-tempo beats and gentle yoga.

23408.name: Vinyasa flow
23408.description: A smart flow inspired vinyasa class where you will practice a few sun salutations A and B before stretching your back, opening your chest and doing some twists. We will also practice some pranayama and of course will spend some times in meditation and/or full relaxation. You will feel renew and centered, ready for a new day at the burn!

23409.name: DJ Tunes by Ryder
23409.description: Our resident DJ Ryder will be spinning some hot tunes. Don't miss our surprise Disco flash Mob!

23410.name: Megaphone Meanie Bingo
23410.description: Come get your grandma burn on and scald fellow competitors with sweet insults and win sweet prizes.

23411.name: Game Masters Workshop
23411.description: Learn how to build a RPG campaign that your players love. Share tips and tricks from other DMs. For GM’s of any sort of RPG, not just D&D.

23412.name: Neon Nights Glow Party >^.^< )'(
23412.description: Just as the week is winding down come get your glow on! Our bar will still be up and running and fully glowing as we close out the week. The bar serves Vodka, Tequila, Rum and Jameson mixed drinks or shots by request, and cold beer or cider (depending on what is on tap at the moment). The Cat's Meow is a bar and lounge with a relaxing vibe. Music, neon pillows, bean bag chairs, blow up couches, cuddle puddle in a glowing blacklight paradise!!

23413.name: Inflatable Wildlife Tours
23413.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23413.description: Gaze in wonder at the Balloonimati's Menagerie! Romp among exotic plumage hidden from the Public and after the tour, quaff exclusive ambrosia: Dusty Playa Mules

23414.name: College Football Tailgate and Viewing Party
23414.description:
This event has been a blast the last few years.

We'll begin the day by watching the end of the early games...staying with potential upsets. Then the football gods have blessed the camp's favorite team with a formidable opponent and a prime middle-of-the day game time. This will be the main event of the day :-)
- 12:30 Florida Gators vs Michigan Wolverines...wear your colors & Go Blue!

The big late game will be:
- 5:00 Florida State Seminoles vs Alabama Crimson Tide
This game will end around 8:30 - 8:45...the Man Burn takes place at 9:30, so come prepared and be ready to bolt at the end of the game.

Bonus coverage:
- 6:30 BYU Cougars vs LSU Tigers
This game will end while the Man Burn is underway...responsible fans may watch and shut down the Cafe.

If you have a request for a particular early or late starting college game, the management of the Harmonic Cafe will try to accommodate. With all the Michigan fans, it's likely we won't be showing other games during the midday slot. More game times will be announced...please let us know what games you're interested in :-)

23415.name: Recovery Yoga
23415.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
23415.description: It’s a yoga class! It’s a 12-step meeting! Breathe and move through the spiritual principles of recovery. Get connected & cultivate your missing peace! In the Prana Portal Tent in Anonymous Village.

23416.name: Quiet Reflection
23416.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 8 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8 a.m. – 1 p.m.

Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 8 a.m. – 1 p.m.
23416.description: Quiet Reflection Come and grab some shade and solitude in our shade tent meditate nap, be still be quite

23417.name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience (VICE)
23417.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23417.description:
Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience (VICE) is eager to return for its 17th year; serving up a delicious hand crafted iced beverage to our dusty fellow participants. 

The VICE process requires a minimum of seven servers to boil water, brew each cup, carefully measure sweetened condensed milk in to reusable cups, supervisor participants thoroughly mixing their beverage before adding the appropriate scoop full of ice.  We then have a health department approved process for cleaning and returning our utensils to service.

As we serve our beverage in reusable cups our patrons tend to take their time consuming their beverage on premises.  We provide and manage bicycle parking to ensure traffic flow and safety. Guests enjoy live entertainment - encouraging the crowd to participate in joke telling, sing alongs, and self-expression etc.

ANYONE & EVERYONE should get on the bunny!  We upgraded our sound system from 3,000 to 10,000 watts & the bunny is booming even more now! We plan to meet @ Bloom (the giant jellyfish) just before sunset & get the dance party started! Adult beverages will be provided...@ least 2 other art car's will be linked to our sound for even more boom...and djs from the bunny's past & present will be throwing down into the night!

The adventure will last as long as your dreams, or as long as we have a herd of magical rainbow farting equestrians, whichever comes first! Meet at Foxy Kokonaut camp within the Cult of the Magic Lady. Route to Follow!

All your questions will be answered including where are the Portapottys? Where can I buy ice? Is there coffee for sale? and so many more. Have all your pressing survival issues answered while being refreshed by our hospitality.

23471.name: Male to Male intimacy
23471.description:
"BOTH genders are welcome in this gender fluid workshop!

(The terms female/women or male/men are used loosely indicating people who self identify as male or female.)

In this last year and a half I have been delving into sexuality and examining societal beliefs around intimacy. It has become clear to me that sexuality is a fast track to discovering the blind spots which hinder us from intimacy. One of the most fruitful areas of exploration for myself has been in the area of male to male intimacy and gender fluidity. Through my experiences i have found that most men are guarded in ways that protect them from experiencing doubt around their own male sovereignty. For example most of us have been taught that to be affectionate with other males is wrong and means that we are ""homosexual"" or weak. 

A recent study by Harvard shows that humans are actually gender fluid and most of our gender identity is indoctrinated into us through our family systems, society, and the media. 

The fruit which comes from exploring male to male intimacy on an energetic and physical level is that all of our male armor/guarded defense systems vanish and we develop a greater level or capacity for intimacy with all people including women. 

The structure of the workshop allows men to explore their relationships with their fathers, brothers and friends and then moves gently towards male to male affection, culminating in energetic play with sexual energy. This is not a clothing optional work shop, personal boundaries will be respected all of the time, and personal safety a priority! Participants will always be at choice and have a multitude of different opportunities with which to explore this theme. Women will hold space and at times participate in this exploration and benefit from observing what occurs in the room. 

Gratitude and blessings

Timothy"

23473.description: Cartooning is a powerful art-form that can entertain and influence, but is simple to learn and accessible to all. All skill levels welcome; you do not need to have any prior training or experience.  Learn all the basic skills like character creation, layout, composition, perspective, and comedy writing.  Brush up on advanced techniques like human and animal figure drawing, proportion, and color.  Supplies provided, or bring your own.

Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
23474.description: The playa is an intense playground. The highs can be really high and the lows can be really low. It is easy for us to get lost in our stories and not be present. Humans by default think too much. Through mindfulness, we can take a break from thoughts and just be. Come learn how to meditate. You might even lose some FOMO in the process. Lead by: David Lai

Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7:30 p.m. – 8 p.m.

The as-if shrine will be a place of reflection and celebration for participants. Offering a space to create and reflect on rituals and your own as-if moments amongst the whole event that is the bigger as-if moment.

23494.name: Short Term Marriages
23494.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23494.description: Met someone(s) so special you want to spend the rest of your burn with them...or maybe just the evening? Come get playa-hitched!

23495.name: Royal String O’ Pearls Procession
23495.description: Maidens, Mothers, and Crones are all invited to relight your white wedding. Get messy wild with the traditional white dress. Marry the wildest you! Marry the sunset on our playa parade! Get fingerpainty, get flowery, get shredding—purity redefined. No dress, no problem, check our tickle trunk. Or bring the one from your actual wedding to gift away!

23496.name: Circling and Silent Meditation
23496.description: Experienced circlers only: we will begin each circle with 40 minutes of silent meditation.

23497.name: Special Dialogue on Decentralization
23497.description: A Special Talk: Dialogues on Decentralization: Monday - Thursday starting at 1p and ending at 6p and 9a-6p on Friday DECENTRAL will be holding an interactive Dialogues on Decentralization with a focus on blockchain tech.

23498.name: Bloody's & Man-Mosa's
23498.description: Come get your morning started right with Bloody Mary's and Man-Mosa's! ID req

23499.name: Unicorn Meat Inspectors
23499.description: Come get yourself inspected and certified grade-A unicorn meat by our trained Unicorn Meat Inspectors!

23500.name: Eyes of the Soul - Eye Makeup, Astrology, & Tea -
23500.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 1:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 1:30 p.m.
23500.description:
Come visit Camp Eyes of the Soul and have make-up artists work on enhancing one of the most amazing elements the universe has ever created  ……… YOUR EYES.
Often called the windows to your soul, we believe your eyes hold special meaning and represent so much of your inner beauty. We hope to enhance your unique eyes, and allow your inner beauty to shine through!
 
While your eyes are worked on, we will also complete an Astrology reading based on both your main Astrological sign and your Rising sign. We hope this will help you reflect a little more on who you are, and open yourself up to everything the universe has in store for you at Burning Man.
 
….. and to top things off we will be pouring some amazing organic teas all the while

23501.name: •	Einstein, the Universe and You
23501.description: Explore the infinite nature of your awareness. Why it all works. Being everything. The art and practice of being human. Being Present. . Through immediate, hands-on practice and shared experience, you'll discover simple tools to focus and engage your infinite self.

23502.name: Balloominati Burntalks
23502.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
23502.description: Every inflatable is guided by its inner air pressure revealing truth in the world. Join Balloominati scholar Turk on an eye opening journey.

23503.name: Playa Portraits: Get photographed by a pro
23503.description: Ever want to be photographed by a pro? Professional photographer Stephen Jacobson will do Portrait shoots.  All models will be given a card with a URL where they can access their portrait after the event.

23504.name: Countless Carrot March
23504.description: JOIN the More Carrot Camp and Black Rock Animal Control and march to protect The Man from the Ravenous Bunny Hordes! It's time to claim our rights and the rights of all veggie-kind to be treated as the sentient beings we are. All Carrots and Allies assemble in your finest green and orange attire for a pre-party from 4pm-5:30 pm at the More Carrot Camp before the Billion Bunny March. In true Carrot fashion, we’ll provide drinks, music and much entertainment before we head out to intercept the bunnies at 6pm sharp! Bring along your singing voice and your best vegetable themed cocktails to share. While pro carrot, we're certainly a vegetable-friendly group. Practice your chants, learn some Carrot songs (http://goo.gl/IpyjQ) and, most importantly, join us as our wave of orange and green goodness spreads across the playa!

23505.name: DM in the AM
23505.description: Some day time Depeche Mode. Start with the "slower" material. See how it goes.

23506.name: 7 Siren Cove; 24/7 interactivity!
23506.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
23506.description: 24/7 interactivity; advice booth, piratey games and activities, relaxation dome and observation deck, shaded lounge and kid play area and pirate minion staffed cookie bar, interactive crows nest and ship, dive bar ; heed the sirens call…. Beware, you might never leave the cove!

23507.name: Hip Hop and Hot Dogs
23507.time:
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
23507.description: What's better than dancing to Snoop Dog with a hotdog? Come join us! It's going to be "off the heezy for sheezy".

23508.name: Thanks for Building the City Party
23508.description: We at AutoSub would like to say 'Thanks' to YOU for building the city! Come on down to the AutoSub Dome and party it up! After all of your hard work, the DRINKS ARE ON US!!! You can view all the action from the upper-level hammock netting inside the dome. So come by and enjoy it, you deserve it!

23509.name: Open Mic: Dialogues on Decentralization
23509.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 5 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 5 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
23509.description: At 5pm on Tues-Friday Camp Decentral is hosting an open mic for Open talks on Radical Decentralization. Come and share your knowledge with the Playa!

23510.name: Heal Our Earth aka The Marshmallow Effect
23510.description: Learn to unite as a collective consciousness at specific times, and to harness the power of our intention together, to create healing, loving change.

23511.name: Car Buffer Massage!
23511.time:
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
23511.description: Have you ever experienced a car buffer massage? No? You gotta try it. Stop reading other listings and come over here now, you're late for your buffing. Also, stop by The Rusty Speculum and have a drink or six or nine.

23512.name: Decentralised Web Browsing with Fabian
23512.description: Building a Decentralized web browser from the ground up to fulfill the vision of the trustless web 3.0.

23513.name: Ginger Appreciation Party
23513.description: Slather on SPF5000 & let us worship you. Whiskey/gingers & power rock. BYO cup. Stick around & help us light the city.

23514.name: You're Doing It, Write!
23514.description: Make a notebook, grab a pen, and unlock your puntential in the creative writing workshop! Participants will be given a prompt and invited to share.

23515.name: Rock Painting: Rock Your World
23515.description: Rock painting is a fun, relaxing, and enjoyable pastime. Come learn from a professional enjoyable skill.  Forged out of the eons of Deep Time and raw forces of Nature, a uniquely shaped and smoothed river stone awaits your unique curiosity in an ephemeral moment of creative exploration. We supply you with the stone, paint and guidance; you supply your awareness, vision, and imagination. Together on your planetary journeys, after 4.5 billion years, you and the river stone meet. Silly or profound, the colors or imagery are all a part of the play on the Playa. Will your rock become a bug, a power object, a flower, or a psychedelic paisley? Experienced art teachers can help with color mixing, brush technique, and concept execution. Create a memory to keep or offer as a gift.

23516.name: Open Mic for guest artists
23516.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
23516.description: Show off your musical talent, Bring your musical instrument or a whole band, cause we got mics, amps, mixers, speakers and a ton of listeners! Plan ahead and email us before camp and we will add you to our schedule in your preferred time slot

23517.name: Dawn of the planet
23517.description: Our opening ceremony of dance, fire and drums will commemorate the birth of humans and begin our first evening of Luchador wrestling. Experience Yaqui and Mayan animal ritual. After the matches, stay for latin dance music.

23518.name: Feminine Energy
23518.description: Feminine Energy - What inspires us & what may be blocking that inspiration from coming through? Lead by Shara Ogin from Camp Beaverton

23520.name: Sunset DJ Parties w/ Atlantis
23520.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
23520.description:
Dance to deep house, enjoy tasty drinks, experience art / panoramic views from our towers, and celebrate the setting of the sun god over the playa.

------

The legendary city of Atlantis has fallen and many millennia have passed.  All that remains are ancient artifacts used by the inhabitants in radical rituals.  

We don’t understand where or when these sacred artifacts came from or what they mean.  But they have been recovered from the sands of time… and we are inexplicably drawn to these objects… we worship them. 
 
As a rite of passage, pilgrims from all over the playa flock to the Towers of Atlantis for a week once a year to worship the sun god.  The unbearable intensity of his sight will be shaded by a pleasing geometric covering that will be a gathering spot for deep house music dance rituals and the imbibing of tasty spirits.

Join us in our radical ritual!

23521.name: Purr-catory
23521.description: Calling all playa cats and kittens! Somewhere between heaven and hell, there is a magical space filled with nothing but cats! We like to call it Purr-catory.  So stop chasing those laser pointers and getting high on catnip -- and join us at the Purr-catory party for an all-cat wedding ritual, aka Holy Meowtrimony.  Deck yourself out in your best cat-themed finery, dress as a cat, or simply channel your inner cat.  Stay for the reception to chew on some delicious kitty treats and lap up some catrimonial punch. Co-presented by The Meownge and Stardust Lounge.

23522.name: Carnival Samba Dancing Workshop
23522.description: Lovely Athena will guide Carnival Samba dancing steps into a full hour of movement, rhythm, and energia!!!  A live band of all star musicians will accompany this workshop for a full dance and shake your booty experience.

23523.name: Bike Decorating Welcome Workshop
23523.description:
Looking to get that bike all playa ready? Come to our welcome bike decorating workshop. If you want to add color, fur, lights, our workshop will provide you what you need to make that bike personalized just for you.

Smiles, decorations, and great people provided...bikes not

23524.name: Krunkin Kriya Yoga
23524.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
23524.description: Get your krunk on with Kriyas. Set your serpent power pulsating with pranayama, kriya, laya, & hatha. Let her out to play as we move into the Ecstatic Dance that follows.

23525.name: PlayAlechmist Daily Yoga Class
23525.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:15 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:15 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:15 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:15 a.m.
23525.description: PlayAlchemist presents our daily yoga classes inside a magnificent 71ft high pyramid.

23526.name: Nude Authentic Relating Games (Nude Opt)
23526.description: How we communicate shapes our world. Authentic Relating Games are a collection of led experiences that give players a hands-on taste of both the joy and skills of interpersonal connection. Anthony and Maybel will challenge you to listen and reflect in realtime and to become self-aware within connection. Players walk away with a profound sense of well-being, and an experiential toolkit that they can use right away to make their lives better.

23527.name: Old Man’s Yoga
23527.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
23527.description: Has the playa dust crept into your joints? Are you an over the hill burner? Gentle yoga practice for crusty old burners. Don’t worry you won’t have to flip your dog.

23528.name: Open Stage, Wild Times.
23528.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
23528.description: Tea Parlor by day, Decadent Salon by night. Red Herring brings a dilapidated mansion to the Playa for 2017! There’s an open stage so come dance, sing, pose, play, contort, strip, and strut your unique and special stuff. Scheduled acts nightly at 8pm, 12am, & 2am, Sunday through Friday. Don't miss our daily late afternoon happy hour!

23529.name: Chinese Speaker's Tea Party
23529.description: The 11th annual meet-up for lovers of the Chinese languages.  Drink tea and connect with burners from various Chinese-speaking regional communities.

23530.name: "Young" People in Recovery Meeting
23530.description: An open discussion meeting with a focus on having fun in sobriety, getting sober young, and/or being young at heart. Will run as a typical "Young People in Alcoholics Anonymous" meeting. All are welcome

23531.name: Large Piña Collider Demonstration
23531.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
23531.description: Join us as we smash pineapples and drink piña coladas in our search for the Higgs Booze-on, the most elusive party-cle.

23532.name: Bocee Tournament
23532.description: Like all totems of Power and Influence, Bocce comes from Italy. Rumor has it the Medici's played with the preserved spleens of their enemies. Come play with Us!

23533.name: Bluegrass playing workshops at Rootpile daily.
23533.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
23533.description:
Bluegrass workshops: mandolin, guitar, banjo, bass, fiddle, bluegrass singing
11am – 12pm Mon to Sat
We’ll be hosting bluegrass lessons, as well as how to jam. We will have instruments for you to play or you can bring your own! This is for beginners, intermediate players who play an instrument but don't know how to play bluegrass, or even advanced players who want to jam but didn't bring their instruments to the playa. Nightly concerts too! Ya'll come! Food & shine til it runs out.

23534.name: Bucky Dome Open House
23534.description: Check out this new method of dome construction that sets up in under an hour. Requires no tools, special skills, or strength to assemble. Using the geometry of the truncated icosahedron, aka Bucky Ball, this dome frame features uniform pole lengths, isometric vertices, and a modified tensegrity system to stabilize and distribute loads. 15’-25’ diameter domes can be erected by 1-2 people. Welcome to drop by any time. Ask if the creators are around to give you a tour and answer your questions.

23535.name: Empowering a positive future via Decentralization
23535.description: Destruction of the old system is upon us! What do future flat power structures promise for civilization, what'll future societies look like?

23536.name: Basic Belly Dancing Class by Larissa Archer
23536.description: Fun, hour long class on the basic steps of American Tribal Style Bellydance. Start your week with shimmies!

23537.name: IV Annual Club Neu Verboten Cricket Game
23537.description: All skill levels welcome. Enjoy a refreshing Pimms while you try and avoid a duck.Optional white of course

23538.name: Scarf Dancing
23538.description:
"Gina and Bryan will take you on a journey of scarf wrapping, counter balancing and creative harnessing for dips in a safe environment.
No partner necessary 
No experience necessary
Please bring a scarf if you have one"

23539.name: Burner Toastmasters Speak-A-Thon
23539.description: Want some “stage time?” Like to speechify? Pontificate? Step up to ye olde soap box? We’ve got you covered. While there's some jargon in the notes below that our wannabe’s might not understand, we assume the Toastmasters folks will get it. And you will soon! Note:    Bring your TI Magazine and we’ll take pics over at the Man! If you’re a Toastmaster and couldn’t be in Washington, DC, for their August International Convention, then bring your CC/CL/other manuals you’d like to advance in, and join us (with friends) for a real Toastmasters meeting - and some photos! We plan to cram in speeches, evaluations, and table topics into a one hour session, or more if demand exists for it, so on time is a good thing. Prompt arrivals will have the best chances for the most fun and credit.    Looking to join in? Pepperland theme camp, Tuesday, 1-2PM.  Email: Gerflash (at) socal (dot) rr (dot) com. so we can plan ahead and count you in.    Just maybe - the pix we take might make it into the TI Magazine! You’ll actually be Toastmastering on-Playa!

23540.name: DETOX Body and Mind, How-To
23540.description: Connect to your higher self: A practical "How to guide" on detoxing your body, detoxing your mind, create a life plan that is in resonance with these values, create flow and serendipity into your life

23541.name: RECESS!
23541.description: It's Recess! Brush up on your four-square, Freeze Dance, and double dutch skills while sipping on boozy apple juice and munching PBJs. We play a mean game of red rover - so come over! Look for the cuddle puddle and alphabet blocks.

23542.name: The origins of value with Alex Sterky
23542.description: A brief history of the creation of money, credit and record keeping. (an abstract and entertaining talk on what money is and where is came from).

23543.name: PlayAlchemist Daily Meditation
23543.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
23543.description: PlayAlchemist presents our daily meditation inside a magnificent 71ft high pyramid.

23544.name: Sudha Rani Kailas: Physician, Heal Thyself
23544.description: We are facing a spiritual crisis of epidemic proportion in our world today.   As a first generation East Indian woman, physician, and mystic, I have battled through my own psyche to find clarity that I revere as a guide for my being in this world.  The spiritual crisis has been a fundamental struggle, as my life has been a search for identity in a new culture that clashes fiercely with that of my native heritage.  While India is vibrant with with fragrance, texture, sound, and color, a constant sensory exploration,  America has been overworked and desensitized by violence, oppression, ignorance, and suffering.  Initially a victim of this plight, Great Spirit ultimately granted the gifts of True Wisdom.  However, integration from the expansive awakening of unity consciousness to the mundane experience of ordinary life is no small task.  From the strength of humanity and the love of true friendships to miracles and the cosmic vibration found in the echoes of stillness, this is a story of that wonderful journey.

23545.name: Who will own virtual reality? W/ Alexey
23545.description: Combining Sci-Fi books' vision with the vision of Decentralisation via blockchain, to answer the question: "who will own virtual reality?"

23546.name: Jittery Jester Arcade, BRC Boardwalk
23546.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
23546.description: Madame Zeldas House of Mirrors and Reflections. Wheel of Love. Monkey Ring Toss. Burner Skeeball. Giant Cock Rides. Photo Ops. Much more. Fun. Prizes.

23547.name: Playa Open Marriage Ceremony: Most Radical Ritual
23547.description: Our resident justices of the peace will be available to individually or en masse conduct the service of playa matrimony to any/all willing to take the commitment (for any length of time). Ceremonies are also available for those wishing to renew vows, express gratitude, or publicly celebrate joyful separation. Sunday is the biggest day for our popular wedding services, but available by appointment throughout the event -- come visit our bar and ask about weddings. Last year we provided personal playa rituals to many happy couples, often including hand-made wedding rings, music, drinks, witnesses, heartwarming vows, ice cream sandwiches postnuptial, and more.

23548.name: Pornographic Stick Figure Henna Tattoos
23548.description: We are going to get together and draw stick figures on each other with Henna ink. No artistic skills required.  Pornographic models welcome.

23549.name: Aerial Flow Workshop: Lyra
23549.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
23549.description: Learn to fly on our lyra!

23550.name: Temple Gifts and Body Art
23550.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
23550.description: Come dwell at our craft table and create your own burnable offering or tribute for the temple. Enjoy some shade while we adorn your body with the ten principles, practice in our radical ritual of affixing your wish to the wishing wall that will be delivered to the temple on Saturday. And maybe, discover YOUR spirit animal of the playa.

23553.name: Female Ejaculation Workshop
23553.description: Are you curious about squirting? Confused about what it is? Wondering if you're really just peeing? Don't understand all the hype? In this workshop, complete with a live demo, we'll cover everything from anatomy to safer sex to technique and more. Come explore with us and then stay to explore with others afterwards in the dome. Rehydrate yourself with a drink at our kick-off ClitTail Hour at 7pm!  *Women/Trans identified only please.

23554.name: Decentralized Medicine - hacking our biochemistry
23554.description: Traditional control of medical research is being Decentralized, through growing access to research and tools allowing us to heal ourselves.

23555.name: Wide Open Mic
23555.description: You’ve got an act? Great! We’ve got a stage! Our Wide Open Mic is ready for any entertainments you wish to provide – singing, poetry, instrumental, stand-up comedy, storytelling, or something else! It’s Wide Open! Here’s your chance to shine! Sign up early! (or show up at the last minute, like you always do.) Or just come and watch an unpredictable variety or acts!

23556.name: Dialogue: Value Through Token Design
23556.description: Dialogues on Decentralization: Explore recent experiments and higher level philosophy of digital token design focusing on autonomous independent ecosystems

23557.name: Samba Reggae Dancing
23557.description: Reggae and Samba Music Lovers unite! As Reverbia presents Reggae Samba Dance Before Noon, instructed by the dynamic, effervescent Andrea Monteiro of Samba Fusion and accompanied by All Star Reverbia Musicians. Come learn how to get your Samba Reggae dance grooves on!!!

23559.name: Multi-media shows; Californacopia
23559.description:
Wednesday - Californacopia: A photographic/musical journey through the diverse caves of california, including marble caves, sea caves, lava caves, and granite caves.
Tuesday - The Great Caves of the World: Journey with cave photographer Dave Bunnell to some of the world's most amazing caves including the world's largest, Hang Son Doong in Vietnam.
Thursday - The Erotic Underground, a novel approach to figure photography using caves as a setting.

23560.name: Fiesta Friday
23560.description: Join us for Hot Pepper Sampling, Salsa Dancing, party surprises and a genuine moop free pinata. (adult event) Our wrestlers will be there too. Come and learn some moves or cheer on your fellow Burners in the ring. We promise to be gentle as we drop you to the mat.

23561.name: East Coast v West Coast Hip-Hop 101
23561.description: New York or LA? Snoop, Biggie, Tupac? Have fun with old school beats! BYO cup. Stay & help us light the city!

23562.name: Multi-media shows; the Erotic Underground
23562.description:
Thursday - The Erotic Underground, a novel approach to figure photography using caves as a setting.
Tuesday - The Great Caves of the World: Journey with cave photographer Dave Bunnell to some of the world's most amazing caves including the world's largest, Hang Son Doong in Vietnam.
Wednesday - Californacopia: A photographic/musical journey through the diverse caves of california, including marble caves, sea caves, lava caves, and granite caves.

23563.name: Access to Crypto and Global Trends
23563.description: Conversation with a long-term holder/pioneer, founder of EasyBit and member of Argentina BTC Center, facts about crypto and global trends.

23564.name: MINDFUL WINE TASTING
23564.description:
MINDFUL WINE TASTING

Integrate all your senses
Focus/Compare/Contrast

White: Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, Malvasia Bianco
Red:    Cabernet , Shiraz, Zinfandel
ID Required

23565.name: Kraftwerk Nacht                Aftermath
23565.description: Playboy DJ No calls it a day with the same night that launched the camp back in 2001. One hour after The Burn. 11pm

23566.name: Multi-media shows; Great Caves of the World
23566.description:
Tuesday - The Great Caves of the World: Journey with cave photographer Dave Bunnell to some of the world's most amazing caves including the world's largest, Hang Son Doong in Vietnam.

Wednesday - Californacopia: A photographic/musical journey through the diverse caves of california, including marble caves, sea caves, lava caves, and granite caves.

Thursday - The Erotic Underground, a novel approach to figure photography using caves as a setting.

23567.name: Flying Panda Brigade Aerialists
23567.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 p.m. – 8 p.m.
23567.description: Come see the aerial performance! Want to perform come by beforehand and sign up!

23568.name: Massage Therapy by Sweets & Co.
23568.description: Come get those kinks worked out or just relax as Sweets and other camp members provide therapeutic massage

23570.name: Aerialist Meetup/Skillshare
23570.description: Calling all aerialists-come by and play on our 28' high point in the unique AutoSub Esplanade dome! Meet other aerialists, swap stories and share skills. We’ll have fabric and lycra available. Other single point apparatus could possibly be rigged as well.

23572.name: Improv Comedy Jam!
23572.time:
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23572.description: Are you an Improv Comedy fan - or better yet, a practitioner? Radically participate for fun, applause, and the admiration of all! Or sit in the audience and enjoy the spectacle - and give your suggestions! Best of all - do both! All those endorphins are so good for you! Sign up early to ensure your stardom! If you already know your improv stuff, come early to make your preferences known!

23573.name: Sacred Yoga Dance Workshop
23573.description: Enter a journey of sacred yoga dance, where body, mind, and spirit harmonize into the movement of our self awareness and being. Prepare for elevation!

23574.name: Make a Mala!
23574.description: Looking for a peaceful moment on the Playa? Make a colorful beaded wrist mala bracelet with us. Learn about how to create a portable ritual to help you find your center and then gift yourself with your mala practice in our sweet shade. If you have something special you would like to incorporate into your wrist mala, bring it!

23575.name: Bluegrass Onstage Jam Hour at Rootpile, come pick!

Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 p.m. – 9 p.m.

Our house bands will start at 9 pm after the jam, and we will be serving pork bbq and pinto beans until we run out!!

23594.description: Everybody's favorite daytime party, back for its 7th year! Break out your skip-its, dust off your Tamagotchis and make some new friends while singing all your favorite 90’s hits! Live singing performances and an OPEN BAR that goes ‘til sunset. Look for the big trampoline and alphabet blocks.

23599.name: Learn to spin Devil Sticks with Armando
23599.description:
Learn the ancient art of Devil Sticks. We will have ten sets that can be shared so all can try and learn.

Devil sticks are believed to have originated in China in the distant past, in the form of simple wooden juggling sticks. They are one of the circus arts, and are sometimes called devil-sticking, twirling, sticking, or stick juggling.

BYO drawing materials or any mediums you work in, or use the pencils and pads we will have ready for you. All gender models are welcome to participate. Sessions will range from 5 to 20 minutes. Our stage will not be easily visible from the street, just to our participating artists. Adults only, please.

23603.description: Want to take a break from electronic music? Need some relaxation before hitting the playa for a night out? Join Camp Salute Your Jorts for the best 90s and 2000s R&B, and let the sexy vibes and slow jams soothe the soul.

While you're waiting for your turn in the bracket, get all limber playing Giant Twister with Mahalia. Drinks provided BYO cup

23607.description: Serving the finest wines with a screw on top! Also flaming hot cheese balls ala wiz to compliment your palate. Bring some wine or wiz to share!

23608.description: Learn basic car maintenance with Jenni Kitten. Learn tools needed to change a tire, what fluids are in your car, and how and when to check them. Also understand the importance of regularly maintaining your car to last as long as possible.

23612.description: Offering the food of the gods to connect deep with the emotional intelligence of the heart. Led by:Sasha Nielsen & Jena La Flamme

Sunday, August 27th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.

Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
