Come dance with Miki Beach to the dopest beats on the playa.  Beach breezy drinks will be served.  Bring your best friends and we'll bring ours! Best Djs in playa will be there 
Tell only Your Best Friends. 
Hot dogs and drinks served

23618.description: You don't have to a be a 20-year veteran to be a crafty Burner. Come learn the secrets to having a life-changing week on the playa.

23619.name: Back To The ’60s Party!
23619.description: Our camp’s 9th Anniversary year rolls on as you join each other to enjoy those oldies but goodies, tunes from the 60’s, along with light refreshments and beyond. Bring your own cup to keep it so green, and enjoy your pleasure. Mix plenty of fun with a classic Cartoon Commune soiree of rock and roll dancing and good conversation as you meet new friends and old. A wide open dance contest just for the fun of it. We’ll have the music you like, light refreshments, and beyond. Guess what else? A few surprises to add plenty smiles.

23620.name: Second Breakfast Yoga
23620.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
23620.description: Join Misty at the Palenque Norte Tent for a mid-morning heart snack. Come feed your soul. Leave centered and ready to take on your day on the playa.

23621.name: Clue Bar Murder Mysteries
23621.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
23621.description:
We are Clue Bar.

We will host the bar from 3:30- 5:30 pm Monday - Friday and our murders will occur on Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday, at the same time.

Tuesday Theme: Murder under the Big Top (Circus)
Wednesday Theme:  Highschool Homecoming
Friday Theme:  Santa's Workshop

This will mark our second year on the Playa as Clue Bar and we murder people.
To date we've murdered about a dozen people.  Okay not really, but we pretend murder them at murder mystery parties.  So we thought, why not bring this kind of fun home with us?

We will host at three scheduled murders through-out the week, each being about an hour and a half event. Everyone gets a character to play and clues to help solve the murder. There is an emcee that keeps things moving along but this is performance art in its rawest form, everyone is a suspect (or the recently deceased) and it is up to the group to collaborate, negotiate shady agreements, blackmail or otherwise enjoy themselves.

Each murder requires twenty people to play the roles for each murder we commit.  Each murder has a theme; a Circus, Santa's Workshop and an 80's Homecoming murder.  We encourage participants to come in costume and/or fully embrace their character.  We're snarky too so if people need a clue right there on the spot, a clue will be written for them and handed over in a small envelope.  A sample clue would be: "Shave your goatee, with a knife, to get more pussy, in the lounge, you fucking hippie."  It's a silly good time and everyone gets drunk or hydrated, meets new people and whether they crack the case or not they win shit for best actor, best briber, best sleuth, best dressed.

On the days we're not committing foul play we will host a bar and a water hydration station (a giant igloo dispenser available throughout the entire day, filled with Earth20 from Bend, Oregon and chilled with a block of ice).

23622.name: Second-Ever Last Annual Armageddon Alley Cat
23622.description:
Join our pedal-powered radical ritual! Bring your best wheels, playa art map,  water, moop pick-up bag. Ride hard, have fun, win prizes. After-Party!

Have you got a two-wheeled human powered contraption you think is fit to outrun the devil on a souped-up segway during armageddon? Are you ready for the event of a lifetime? Join Camp Armageddon for the SeCOND ever Last Annual Armageddon Alley Cat Bicycle Race. The race will end at our camp after-party; how long it will last is determined by how fast you ride. Some things that might come in handy along the way are the playa art map, a water bottle, and the capacity to hold any moop you might find along the way. Remember to ride fast, have fun, and be safe; ideally in that order because there will be a prize for the winner!

23624.name: Motorboat Monday!
23624.description: You can’t end a week with of bad decisions if you don’t get a jump start on them first thing Monday Morning.  Join us as we kick off the week with our 3rd annual Motorboat Monday celebration in the Dome of Bad Decisions!  Come on over for our naughty-cal themed drinks and signature racks!  Bring a friend, you know good things always come in pairs.

Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4 p.m. – 10 p.m.
23630.description:
Hosting a perpetual Cuban-themed sultry Havana Nights party, with a
laid-back Miami feel.  Palm trees will surround the perimeter of a large
shaded, dance floor; comfortable, elevated chill pads available for guest to

Stop by for bottomless, hand-muddled frozen mojitos served by camp attendants wearing guayabera shirts. Dance lessons daily. HAVANA NIGHTS PARTY Thursday 10pm!

Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
23633.description: Come learn some dragon staff moves and how to spin fire.

23634.name: What is Burning Man?
23634.description: Join us for our 7th annual open discussion on this community, and what it all means. We will be philosophically "pre-gaming" for the big event.

23635.description: Yes, you can dance while touching your partner! Imagine the possibilities for romance. Our dance professor, Paisan, will show you how. You take it from there. Swing, Jitterbug, even Waltz, and more. For sure, you’ll enjoy the evening! It’s a class/workshop, but it may feel a lot like a party.  And come back at 9 PM tonight to put it to good use.

23636.name: Narcotics Anonymous - Recovery Alley
23636.description: NA is a fellowship of addicts who share experience, strength and hope about recovery and join in fellowship. Newcomers, long timers and just interested people are all welcome!

Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23637.description: So over paper and colored pencils? Come to our grooming station, get some cool patterns or designs stenciled onto you, and zen out by coloring them in on your own bodies (or someone else's). Bring a friend or make new ones!

23638.description: Come sample some fine sparkling wine and bring some to share! must have bubbles..

23639.name: Classical Music Hour
23639.description: Get cultured AF during Camp Salute Your Jorts’ Classical Music Hour. Sip some tea and relax; you’re sophisticated.

23640.name: Rainbow Ritual
23640.description: Rainbow Ritual Invoking the colors of the Rainbow and calling on the Goddess of the Playa

23641.name: Critical Tits
23641.description: Critical Tits rides again! Join your sisters and shed your tops and issues to ride free across the Playa. This all women ride is the opportunity to ride unencumbered and celebrate your freedom, strength and beauty.

23642.name: Post Burn Pickin Party, Bluegrass at Rootpile
23642.description:
Post-Burn Pickin Party
Howdy ya'll, we are Rootpile Camp, home of hillbilly culture, moonshine, live bluegrass music and hillbilly food!! We have a live stage under our 40 x 90’ shade area where we will be picking after the man falls until we run out of steam, food, or shine.  Pork barbeque and pinto beans start at 10.  Cooking enough for 200, don’t be late!

23643.name: •	Awakening The Senses
23643.description: A guided journey through the soul with visits in the heart. Bring journals. Crossing over into our shadow and sharing shadows. Manifest in shadow dance.

23644.name: High Noon 4th Step Workshop
23644.description: The fourth step is a personal inventory of character assets and liabilities. The goal of this workshop is to help work through resentment and fear as we build a new way of life out of addiction.

23645.name: “Who What Where” Game
23645.description: Ready? Draw! Who is that? What are they doing? Where are they doing it? Come for a totally fun, fast-paced party game, led by our expert gamer, Nostrildamus. It has yet to be determined whether artistic talent is a help or a hindrance. We have pencils and paper for you. Fun – definitely!

23646.name: The Game OMFG! Uncensored
23646.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 a.m. – 4:15 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 a.m. – 4:15 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 a.m. – 4:15 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1 a.m. – 4:15 a.m.
23646.description:
Let the Dusty Taint help cross some things off your bucket list, and lower your purity score.
“The Game OMFG”: the hell spawn of truth or dare, charades, 7 minutes in heaven, spin the bottle, the Tijuana donkey show, spring break, NYC in the early 80's, and the O'Farrell Theatre.   Rules of play are simple: Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written on  it.

23647.description: Let’s see if you got what it takes to impress Snotto. TV, movies & general knowledge. Alcohol provided, BYO cup.

23648.name: Bad Idea Body Art
23648.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 2 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 2 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 2 p.m.
23648.description: Are you tired of good advice? Take a break at Bad Idea. Come by for Bad Idea body art (airbrush, hand painting, riding crop, sunburn…), a bit of bad advice, a bad Playa name, or share a few bad ideas of your own.

23651.description: For the 7th consecutive year, Automatic Subconscious is proud to host the Reddit /r/burningman meetup.  There will be people probably, and maybe some stuff.  There will definitely be booze, because how else would I deal with you people? I hope to see you there. Well, some of you. Well, I'll be there.

23652.name: Chocolate Tasting
23652.description: Sample some varieties of chocolate and pair it with your favorite home brewed beverage. Bring some to share!

23653.name: Hump Day! "Get Your Freak On"

23654.description: Wear your whites, Paint your face in the tradition of Muertos using makeup that we provide, then join our altar procession to the Temple. Experience this age old practice from South American of Honoring our lost loves.  Musicians are encouraged to participate in this family friendly event.

We will hora together and indulge in common Israeli/Jewish food. The meshoga DJ will entertain us through the night. All are welcome to attend and enjoy the festivities

23657.name: The -ING, Living a Magical Life
23657.description: Bring your cosmic toolbelt for a self-expressive, experiential playshop surrounded in love for the present moment and a life filled with adventures.

23658.name: BYOR - Bring Your Own Ritual Pub Crawl
23658.description: This event is part of our camp's yearly ritual, and will encourage participants to celebrate individual and group rituals from across the globe, and throughout the ages. We'll tour the city together, sharing even the simplest of rituals - be it a handshake, a story, a drink or a song - with our fellow burning man community.

23659.name: 5th Dimension Online Face to Face Meeting of AA
23659.description: An online meeting of AA the meeting Global at 930 pm EDT.  We use the zoom platform with the meeting ID: 687-118-144. Alex H.

23660.name: •	Shaman Wedding Sacred
23660.description: UNTIE THE KNOT on your respective mountain(s). we are free while together. The Divine breathes, consumes and pervades we two. Each on your respective mountain maxing out the other in bliss. Reciprocity

23662.description: Playa got you wound up? Come medidate and zen out with us in a shady spot.

Then come on down to the Dome of Bad Decisions and we’ll get you fitted or squeezed into something that’s just your style and in your perfect color - RED.  Have red dresses/lingerie to donate?  Bring em by!

23666.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
23666.description: By appointment only! Check into our nook to sign up for your massage deli session on, where we will aim to please your every need with gentleness, dexterity, and aplomb; or just catch some stimulating chill shade time between hours. Couples are always welcome.

23667.name: Speed Dating/Darktard Party
23667.description: Still looking for a date for Burn Night? We got you covered. BYO cup fgor alcohol refreshment. Stick around, consensual dark party afterwards.

23668.name: Lemon/baking soda facials
23668.description: Lemon/baking soda facials!  Come refresh and treat yourself to some self-care.

23669.name: 10th Annual Red Dress Run
23669.description: BRCH3 is proud to bring the Annual Red Dress Run, our pinnacle event, back to the playa for its 10th consecutive year! This is a hash-style run in which at participants are encouraged to wear red dresses (yes, even the men). Don't have a red dress? No problem, we will host a red dress costume exchange in our dome the day of the event. Meet us at the Man on Thursday at 3pm. We will run, walk, skip & bike through the city, serenading our friends while we stop to down a couple beers.

23670.name: Radical Inclusion - On & Off the Playa
23670.description: Interactive talk on radical inclusion, and how we can bring awareness to our own unconscious boundaries and expand our own tolerance.

23671.name: Ugly Bridesmaid Dress Party
23671.description: You own an awful bridesmaid dress and would never wear it at a wedding? Jump into it and celebrate with us!

23673.name: Adopt a Mutant Monkey at BRC Boardwalk
23673.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23673.description: Adopt a stuffed and warped Mutant Monkey from our Evolutionary Tree. Name your little "cutie", Take it home and love it. Adoption Ritual required.

23674.name: Massage Night!
23674.description: We have a massage table, enthusiasm, and lots of hands! Learn a few useful techniques; to keep the energy flowing, those not on the table will rub each other for ten minutes, then switch, "speed dating" style!

23675.name: Bluegrass Pinto Bean Daytime Jam at Rootpile
23675.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 2 p.m. – 6 p.m.
23675.description:
Wednesday Bluegrass Pinto Bean Jam
Wednesday 2-6pm
Jam 2-3, live music 3-6.  Come eat pinto beans (veggie or ham) and cornbread, and jam. Food & shine till it runs out.

23676.name: How to give a blow job
23676.description: How to give a blowjob - for singles & couples (all genders)

23677.name: Spin that fire!
23677.description: Learn some hot fire spinning moves from some very hot camp members  - poi technique, fire spinning safety, and you can even touch our thingys!

23678.name: Bike Love on the Playa
23678.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
23678.description: Keep your wheels rolling! Come to Camp Armageddon’s Bike Love Station for air, oil and  radical repair rituals performed by amateur and professional mechanics. If it can be fixed on the playa, we can probably fix it! No job to small or too big. Smiling face required!

23679.name: R-Rated Reading Room
23679.description: In our library on the Playa, we have collected several notable volumes for aloud recitations, including classical and modern, in the soft porn genre.  These include Victorian era, Anais Nin, Letters to Penthouse, modern erotica, and more. Are you a reader or a listener or both? You get your choice. Or might you bring your own offerings?  Adults only.

23680.name: Grilled Cheeses, Pickle Bar and Virgin Mary's
23680.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3 p.m. – 3:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 3:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 3:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 3:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 3:30 p.m.
23680.description:
Voted the Best Medieval Diner in BRC, the Hangry Bishop serves grilled cheeses and more on playa daily. EAT, DRINK, and NE'ER BE HANGRY!!!!

It's no coincidence that our humble inn and eatery was formed in 1300s England, the same time and place that Cheddar Cheese first appeared. We serve Grilled Cheeses and Virgin Mary’s to wandering Playa Pilgrims and only use top shelf Cheddar to prepare our holy trinity of gooey deliciousness, Grilled Cheeses.

23681.name: Thai Body Work, Cuddle Puddle and Angel Walk
23681.description: This is an opportunity to develop our relationship with our physical love language in a safe platonic manner. By authentically exploring our physical senses we come to understand a deeper part of ourselves and therefore allow others to do the same.

Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:30 p.m.

Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 11:30 p.m.

23683.name: Live Plant Harmonics
23683.description: Experience the living, breathing frequency of the Universe & the plant kingdom in an unforgettable sound healing meditation with Dr. Steven Schwartz.

23684.name: World Naked Bike Ride Reception
23684.description: Cocktail reception for the Naked Bike Ride. Come ride by, come thirsty ;)

23685.name: Flow Workshop: Fire Whip and Fire Eating
23685.description: Come by to learn how to whip and eat fire!!

23687.name: Tom Waits Hour
23687.description:
Come find us deep player for a late night Tom Waits filled hour of music and mischief. We will be providing cigarettes and coffee while dancing around to some classic Tom Waits
On the possible playlist so far, 
Closing Time, Mule Variations, Swordfishtrombone, Small Change.

23688.name: Spectrum's Sofas&Soadies
23688.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 5:30 a.m. – 8:30 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 5:30 a.m. – 8:30 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 5:30 a.m. – 8:30 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 5:30 a.m. – 8:30 a.m.
23688.description: Beautiful Sunrises, Truth in Symbols, Playson Subconscious, Revealing the unknown, Magic of the cosmos reflected&refracted Magic in nature. We all have that spark within, lets harness It's full potential with cheers of bubbly and kicking' back on sofies! Bring out Sofas, Lawn Chairs, beers, champagne, open minds, and even more importantly open hearts! Open discussion, chalk board for diagrams, gifting, coolers of ice for beverages will be provided. PACK IT IN PACK IT OUT! Let's keep BRC THE whitetrash Desert Expedition it was always meant to be!

23690.name: Gifting Love Scavenger Hunt
23690.description: Off the wall, whole-hearted, soul-lifting scavenger hunt where we playfully gift and get lots of love, MOOP along the way, and share stories after!

23691.name: Jazz Theory Part 2
23691.description: A Jazz theory workshop for musicians. The professor will explain altered chords, melodic minor and diminished scale harmony and more. Cold drinks for guests.

23692.name: TCO Social and Mixer/BBQ
23692.description:
TCO MIxer and BBQ at Rootpile Theme Camp. We also want to welcome our special guests from Placement. Let's make this a special night and get a chance to get out social and networking grove on. 

Help us reduce the impact on Rootpile by bringing your own cups, plates and silverware to the bbq.

There will be a limited edition patch and sticker available to attenddees. This is for TCO's and their dates. Patches only go to TCOs. Let's try and share the love to as many people as we can. 

Thank you all for your hard work!!!!

23693.name: Water Bottle Madness
23693.description: Did you forget your hydration? Do you need an extra one? We have more than a few water bottles to share. Swing by and pick one out! Madness lasts till we run out.

23695.name: Flow Workshop: Fire Fans
23695.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.

23696.name: 80s Aerobics Cool Down and Dance Along
23696.description: Serving 80s aerobics realness and offering the children of the World Naked Bike Ride an opportunity to move, stretch, cool down and have fun.

23697.name: Lingerie gifting
23697.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
23697.description: Sift through our big collectoin of lingerie and choose your favourite part after spinning the wheel and telling us your most fascinating, exciting or lovely story.

23698.name: The Final Exam
23698.description: Have you studied for The Final Exam? The faculty of The Institute will be holding Review Sessions each day at 5:00 p.m., in addition to their regularly scheduled Office Hours. Students are advised to attend at least one review session or stop by office hours during the week to pick up a Study Guide. Exam proctors from the humanities and natural sciences departments will ensure that all students are sufficiently prepared for The Final Exam through erudition, imagination, and deep introspection. Please come prepared with sharpened wits and a #2 pencil, graphing calculator loaded with Tetris, and crib notes on Jane Eyre. Students who arrive naked will be reminded that they are not dreaming.

23699.name: It’s Not Sleazy Being Green!
23699.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 7 a.m. – 10:30 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 a.m. – 10:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 a.m. – 10:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 a.m. – 10:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 a.m. – 10:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 7 a.m. – 10:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 7 a.m. – 10:30 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 7 a.m. – 10:30 p.m.
Monday, September 4th, 2017 7 a.m. – 10:30 p.m.
23699.description:
If you’ve got nothing particularly green going, come by and watch our Gray-B-Gon Evapotrons and yet another evapo turn your gray water into harmless vapor and minimal waste slush to haul out. Get pumped to build your very own! Then go back home and reproduce that beautiful, green-enhancing thing for your own camp next year! See the Gray-B-Gon’s main proponent, originator, and our fan, Larry Breed (not a member of our theme camp), and his instructions and tips for this great invention at these sites: 
Larry Breed on Wiki: http://www.evapotrons.info/ 
a video here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f-a8QdeyoFs 
Instructables steps: http://www.instructables.com/id/Gray-B-Gon-wind-powered-evapotron-for-graywater-di/

23702.name: Procession of the Dough
23702.description: All followers of the Doughy Sattva will gather at Center Camp and proceed to the Shrine of Dough with a tasty offering.

23703.name: Reframing Our Character Defects
23703.description: A meditation practice found by Debbie Ford, teaches one to identify who the characters are behind the Dark Side of the Light Chasers. In this process we will observe, identify, reframe and deepen our relationship with some of our most challenging character defects. (*note: each person is different and can dive as deep as they want with this in their own individual process, it does not and will not be brought into a comparison game with the fellow attendees.)

23704.name: Domination/Submission 101 women only
23704.description: Learn how to top men behind their backs or just learn the basics like you've always wanted. Feel free to bring a friend.  Women only class.

23706.name: Drum Bass Workshop Part 1
23706.description: House Band Drummers and Bass players explain the roles of their instruments and techniques involved in Jazz improvisation. Refreshments for attendees.

23707.name: You'll Love It
23707.description: If you love puffer fish, electro-shock thumb-wrestling, tantric monkey trebuchets, ear-fucking, SAY WHAAAAAAAT?, fingers (some)... then you'll love ou

23708.name: Aerial Arts for Everyone
23708.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 7 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 7 p.m.
23708.description: Want to fly? Depending on the weather, we’ll either climb silks, hang out in lyra, or sit around in aerial cube. Please wear pants/leggings/or tights. Your skin will thank us later.

23709.name: Flow Workshop: Contact Staff
23709.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
23709.description: Learn to spin a contact staff in different styles. Bring your staff, sword, or come as you are!

23710.name: Orange Jillius Party
23710.description: Get your Orange on and come Party! Orange drinks, Orange ice cream, Orange snacks, Orange games. Some Orange wear available for the Orange challenged.

23711.name: Dust and Your Sinuses – On & Off The Playa
23711.description: We breathe dust into our nose and it blocks our sinuses, especially on the Playa, but also in the "default world".   Listen to an ENT specialist about why you may be more susceptible to sinus problems on the Playa from all the dust we breathe; and as importantly what you can do to minimize the dust effect.   Ask questions about your nose and sinuses that you've been meaning to ask but never found the right time or person to ask.

23712.name: Rites of Spring
23712.description: Stravinsky's Rites of Springs (and other works of classical music) will be played on the sound system.  Attendees can perform an interpretive dance, or listen/experience.

23713.name: Open Lab Hours - Science and Booze
23713.description: Join the Scientists of C4RnD as we study human celebration through the fields of light, sound, and libations. Live Experimental Beats and Cocktails. This year, C4RnD researches the relationship between the Trilobites and the Tardigrades in the fallout from the Great Robot vs. Alien War of 2016.

23715.name: Sea Bead Jewelry of the Playa
23715.description: Make the perfect shwag for your own sweet neck, or for that of one you love, or like! We’ll start you out with natural shells, some glassy bling, plus some color and a closure clip, and you’ll create a lasting, artistic memento to show off, gift, or take home.

23716.name: Singing for Scaredycats
23716.description: You are not broken! Come sing with us.

23717.name: Naked Snow Cone Social & Dance Party
23717.description: Naked all week or just want to lose the costume for a bit? Come by Paradise Motel for a naked snow cone social.  Our DJ will provide chill beats while you hang/ dance nude with others who have lost their clothes on the playa. Full nudist, first timer, shirt cocker or freeing the nipple all welcomed.

23718.name: Spirit of Gratitude
23718.description: Discussion on gratitude and whole-hearted living and loving followed by a heart detox guided meditation.

23719.name: Speed Dating Game!
23719.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
23719.description: Fast and hilarious! In just eight minutes you will meet several other Playa Citizens. Special prizes for those who pick each other!

23720.name: Swim Good
23720.description:
Many say that the act of swimming is the skillful art of intentionally propelling oneself through a body of water. However there are those that hold the belief that swimming is actually a state of mind. Join this class if you believe in the power of group therapy and fun. Bring your own pool.

Instructor Calvin HeKa is certified in Basic Life Support and CPR.

23721.name: Armageddon AlleyCat After-Party
23721.description: Is it the end of life as we know it? Or just the radical ritual after-party for our Second-ever Last Annual Armageddon AlleyCat Race (starts at 2pm)? Come and find out! We’ll have vodka drinks, Alley Cat Race awards/prizes, games, snacks and music to celebrate. Participation in the Alley Cat is not required… but if you don’t, you’ll wish you had! BYO cup!

23722.name: DJ Pantera Blanca
23722.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 7 p.m. – 8 p.m.
23722.description: Dance party in the dome! DJ Pantera Blanca will provide the soundtrack, you provide the moves.

23723.name: Acro Yoga
23723.description: Come learn some Acro Yoga basics that will help you connect with your partner and build trust through connecting, movement and massage. Led by: Justin Gardner & Sarah Belohlavy

23724.name: Sundown Drum & Dance Circle
23724.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8:30 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8:30 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
23724.description: Sunset Drum & Dance Circle - Bring all the beats - drums, bells, whistles, spoons, maracas, tambourines, feet, hands, and knucklebones. Join us in the ancient ritual of playing and dancing the sun down!

23725.name: Olde Time Movie Night!
23725.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
23725.description:
Old & oh so funny cartoons, and some surprises, too, projected on our big screen in our Relaxatorium. These are all historical classics of cinema. Lotsa laughs for all. Popcorn, as well! Our schedule includes:
Wednesday: I Love to Singa; One Froggy Night; What’s Opera, Doc?; Book Revue, etc.
Thursday: More Animation Greats from the National Film Board of Canada.
Friday: Mystery Science Theater 3000 - viewers’ choice!

23727.name: Movie Night
23727.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
23727.description: Rest your feet and par-take in Movie Night. Screening magical family friendly movies nightly. Ranges from classic to stage to block buster.

23728.name: Poi/hoop/staff/rope dart classes and more
23728.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 5 p.m.
23728.description: Workshops for all levels - not just spinning but also yoga, juggling, twerking and more! Check our class schedule board in front of camp.

23729.name: Partner Dancing: Latin Bachata
23729.description: Learn fun & sexy bachata dancing. All are welcome. No partner necessary!

23730.name: Singing for ScaredyCats
23730.description: Despite what you were told as a child, you are not broken! Voice 101 all the way through to singing in four part harmony, come learn about your voice!
23730.hostedByCamp: Dye with Dignity and Mermaid  Bar

23731.name: Useless Skills Workshop
23731.description: Need to get tape out of a shoe using an apple? Busy practicing the art of nose trumpet? Me neither! Come learn & share useless skills at St Squishys!

23732.name: Pepperland Pancakes!
23732.description: Stop by in the morning for these hot off the grill tasty cakes. Syrup? Sure. Nutella? While it lasts. They only last so long, but they’re oh so good on the way down!

23734.name: Fire Jam!
23734.description: Bring your props and spin fire with us, or come and watch some awesome spinners! Safeties and spinout area provided. Bring your preferred fuel!

23735.name: Keep in Touch
23735.description: Workshop about touch and consent all genders welcome Led by: Niv

23736.name: Postcards from the Playa
23736.description: Greetings from Burning Man: Send a postcard from the best summer camp on Earth. We provide a special Black Rock City postmark, postcards of the Man, stamps, and pens.

23737.name: Where Oh Where Do Thoughts Come From?
23737.description: Join us for a love-based open dialogue session on the separation of the self and the mind.

23738.name: Pepperland Sing-A-Long!
23738.description: Been working hard to get your camp built? Okay. So do you like to sing? Do you like The Beatles? Classics? Standards? Step right this way! One night only! Wear your groovy (and warm!) duds that show off your spirit of the 60’s and beyond, and take a trip through Pepperland and memory land! Enjoy popcorn and refreshments while you sing along with fellow fans! It’s a grand vocal jam. - Some years ago on the Playa, we had a total blast when a spontaneous chorus broke out in our camp, covering classic songs, and an annual tradition was born. We’re updating that tradition as we gather this year to sing timeless Beatles and classical standards tunes with/without accompaniment. Everyone’s invited and welcomed! It ain’t over ’til it’s over!

23739.name: Voices from Standing Rock
23739.description: Standing Rock spirit is alive and strong - protecting the water remains our priority. We invite you to join us with your insights, stories, and questions in a discussion circle that will begin with prayer and smudge

23740.name: Annual Boston and New England Happy Hour
23740.description: Longest running Boston camp on the Esplanade invites you ovah for drinks/socializing. THERE WILL BE MOXIE!

23741.name: Cocks & Tails Party
23741.description: Bring Your cocks! Bring your tails! Have a cocktail and write us your favourite cock tale after high tailing up our cocky climbing wall.

23742.name: ClitTails
23742.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 p.m. – 10 p.m.
23742.description: Come to Camp Beaverton and meet the Beaver babes! Enjoy some delicious Clit-tails, make new friends, and possibly find a date before the Strap-on-a-Thon play party on Wednesday night. Open to all!

23744.name: Playa Mooping Adventure!
23744.description: Meet new friends, find new treasures, & participate in being a good citizen of BRC as you scour the playa for moop in a group. BYO moop bag or we will have a few available.

23745.name: Early Morning Yoga
23745.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
23745.description: Start (or end!) your day with the sun. Iyengar-style yoga in our dome. Limited space.  No radical rituals, music, chants or incense, just the simplicity of asana (poses)! All levels welcome.

23746.name: Kundalini Yoga with Heart
23746.description: Shed anything and everything you want to leave behind. Heart opening, yoga, chanting, movement, and meditation. All levels welcome.

23748.name: Aerial Showcase
23748.description: Our Annual showcase of the most awesome of aerial arts. Silks, Lyra, rope in one of the most unique domes on the Esplanade. View all the action from below or at eye level from our unique upper-level hammock netting high inside the dome.

23749.name: Ultra's Menagerie
23749.description: Come join us for a spectacular hybrid talent & drag show performances!

23750.name: Country Western Night
23750.description: It's been a long-standing tradition at Lamplighter Village, that we get down to Country/Western on Burn Night.

23752.name: Becoming Conscious Using Tantra
23752.description: Fun and sensual introduction to the skills taught in Tantra! Increase consciousness and awareness. Couples and singles of all orientations welcome.

23753.name: Girl Sex 101
23753.description: Have you ever wanted to be with a woman but felt a little clueless? In this workshop get the quick and dirty basics about anatomy, finger banging, strap-on sex and all the orgasms! *Women and trans folks only please.

23754.name: DJ Moldover
23754.description: If technology and music are your life, brace yourself- Moldover is about to reformat your soul. Hailed as "The Godfather of Controllerism", Moldover is a new breed of music icon. Combining the charisma of a rock star, the mad genius of a basement inventor, and the radical inclusiveness of the DIY internet generation.

23755.name: Balancing the Masculine and Feminine
23755.description: In this interactive and deeply reflective class, we will be looking at blocks in how we run our male/female energy channels. Led by Shara Ogin

23756.name: Big Games! New Games!
23756.description: Come play games! (including but not limited to: Capture the Flag, Cat on Yer Head, mini-tanks, ninja, and more!) Winning teams lounge in the ball pit!

23757.name: Love Your Body with Chi Running
23757.description: Learn the techniques of effortless injury-free chi walking running, influenced by Tai Chi. Mainly instruction, minimal walking / running.

23759.name: Pepperland Sing-A-Long!
23759.description: Been working hard to get your camp built? Okay. So do you like to sing? Do you like The Beatles? Classics? Standards? Step right this way! One night only! Wear your groovy (and warm!) duds that show off your spirit of the 60’s and beyond, and take a trip through Pepperland and memory land! Enjoy popcorn and refreshments while you sing along with fellow fans! It’s a grand vocal jam. - Some years ago on the Playa, we had a total blast when a spontaneous chorus broke out in our camp, covering classic songs, and an annual tradition was born. We’re updating that tradition as we gather this year to sing timeless Beatles and classical standards tunes with/without accompaniment. Everyone’s invited and welcomed! It ain’t over ’til it’s over!

23761.name: All About Anal (discussion)
23761.description: How to have fun with the anal canal. How to clean it. How to involve it in foreplay. What does it feel like for the giver? What does it feel like for the receiver. All this, and more! This workshop is from a gay male perspective, and all genders and sexualities are welcome.  [2pm-4:30pm in Afterglow Tent at Comfort & Joy Village ] LEAD: Kokoe & Tassel

23762.name: Bootie BRC-Mashup Party
23762.description: OMG MUSIC WITH WORDS! 11 years on the playa, the internationally-infamous mashup bootleg party. AutoSub's biggest party... CD's given away like candy! Bootie rocks our unique dome, (hang out above the action) on the Esplanade for 11 HOURS!

23763.name: Black Rock Coffee Confessions
23763.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon

23784.name: Poly 101
23784.description:
Curious about this new “lovestyle” you’re hearing a lot about called polyamory? Maybe you’ve read all the books but want to talk to folks actually living and loving the poly lifestyle…In this fun, informative and easy-to-understand primer on Polyamory and open relationships, we’ll cover:

Definitions, vocabulary, and different ways to construct non-monogamous relationshipsThe elements that make Polyamory workable (and those that create frustration and regrets!)Open relationships’ most common pitfalls and how YOU can avoid themHow to create safety by figuring out and negotiating your boundaries and agreementsHow to find your Perfect Poly Fit and merge different poly styles to decrease upset and increase your odds that everyone is happier and MORE fulfilled3 tips and tools that will help you survive any poly explorationThe secret reframe that turns jealousy from a death knell into a beacon of hope and healthy relating!Resources, books, and tools to proceed into the world of responsible non-monogamy, at whatever your preferred pace or interest level… Tools that help in monogamy, too! Open to all.

Then join us at Camp Beaverton in our Beaver Dome for this workshop. We will open with heartfelt sharing about our relationships with masturbation, address the stigmas faced in society, and open ourselves to understanding why and how we pleasure ourselves. Once we are all comfortable, we will start exploring our bodies. We will keep our hands to ourselves and power up our bullets, magic wands, rabbits, or other fun battery-operated toys. We will provide AC power for the Hitachis and other power toys! Safe sex supplies like lube, gloves, hand sanitizer, and condoms will be available. Cum take a ride with us! Women identified only please.

23794.name: Trans 301/401
23794.description:
"The trans phenomenon. What do you know? What do you wish you knew? What would you like to know, but were afraid to ask? The purpose of this workshop is to educate and enlighten those interested in knowing more about this 3% of the public that few understand. This workshop seeks to help transphobic people in a non-judgmental way. The very basic definition transphobia, is simply being frightened of trans-folks because of misunderstandings or lack of education on all things trans. This is often because the questions you’ve always wanted to ask, are taboo; making it difficult to learn, understand, and honor the transgender path. Women/Trans identified only please.                                                                                     

Trans 301: Dropping the Veil.
We will bare our souls and our bodies for visual inspection and further Q&A.

Trans 401: Shredding the Veil.
For those brave audience members, we will open ourselves to not only visual review, but hands on, or hands in, examination. "

23798.name: Be A Lamplighter
23798.description:
Lamplighting and Sacred Ritual!

The Lamplighters are one of the longest-running moving art projects on the playa, and one of the many longstanding daily rituals of Black Rock City. Drawing from lamplighters of ancient cities, the Lamplighters gather volunteers from the city each night and maintain, light, and hang over 900 kerosene lamps in a procession that goes through the heart of Black Rock City. Come and join us! All are Welcome!

23799.description: Bismuth is a metal with crazy crystalline properties. Apply heat and turn a featureless lump of dull grey metal into elaborate beautiful crystals. The process is fascinating to watch and the results are unique and beautiful. Listen as we babble on about relevant topics in science or just make up facts as we go. We'll show you how and you'll leave with a crystal of your own, supplies permitting. Mon-Fri 2-3pm Dark Wednesday.

23807.name: Trans 101/201
23807.description:
"The trans phenomenon. What do you know? What do you wish you knew? What would you like to know, but were afraid to ask? The purpose of this workshop is to educate and enlighten those interested in knowing more about this 3% of the public that few understand. This workshop seeks to help transphobic people in a non-judgmental way. The very basic definition transphobia, is simply being frightened of trans-folks because of misunderstandings or lack of education on all things trans. This is often because the questions you’ve always wanted to ask, are taboo; making it difficult to learn, understand, and honor the transgender path. Open to all. 

Trans 101: The Nuts and Bolts.
A brief PowerPoint discussion of definitions and the basics of gender, gender identity, gender expression, and sexual orientation. How are transgender and cisgender people alike? How are they different?

Trans 201: A Peak Through the Veil.
After learning the basics, we’ll have a Q&A session where any and all questions will be fielded. We all know that there are questions that are deemed inappropriate to ask a transperson. For this brief moment in time, there are no taboos. We will do our best to answer your questions with honesty, transparency, and sincerity."

Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 p.m. – 9 p.m.

23825.description: Psychedelic ASURA(Buddhism) is enshrined. When participants is biking, the generator works and psychedelic light and sounds work in conjunction with ASURA movement. Participants riding bicycles with ASURA masks look like psychedelic ASURA. We operate ASURA Bike every day from 19 o'clock to 21 o'clock in the evening. The operation of ASURA Bike will not be done on the day of man burn and temple burn. Other times are displayed as an altar.

23826.name: Black Rock Labs Happy Hour
23826.description: What’s your big idea? Join us for Black Rock Lab’s on-playa launch. We’re creating the first ever Energy Census and sustainability innovation map of the playa.  Come brainstorm, share, and connect with like-minded burners who are inventing the future.

23827.name: The Freedge
23827.description:
Take what you need, leave what you don't. Freedge is a sharing mechanism aiming to reduce food waste and build a stronger community. It's basically a public fridge used to share food and ideas in the neighborhood. 

GIVE: Too many leftovers after a dinner party? Bring them to the freedge!

TAKE: Feeling Hungry? Check the freedge!

SHARE: Freedge is a free sharing space used not only for food, but also books, art and ideas!

23828.name: Jewelry Wire Wrapping
23828.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23828.description: Learn how to do jewelry wire wrapping.  Snag a piece of bismuth crystal and make some pretty jewelry to accent your costumes.  Runs concurrently with the Bismuth Crystal making workshops at the Academy of Arts and Science.

23829.name: Fisting
23829.description: Have your partner literally in the palm of your hand. Fisting can be a mind-blowing experience for both the giver and receiver. Learn safety, technique, and after care. There will be a live demo. The dome will be open after for you to test run your new info. Women/Trans identified only please.

23830.name: Bunna - Coffee Seeds Stories and Songs
23830.description:
From green to brown
From whole to dust
Thru, fire, water, clay and stone
Preparing coffee hear the song
And tell us stories about home.

23831.name: BDSM 101  is it For Play or ForePlay?
23831.description:
I think it's something like bondage, dominance, submission, masochism, with sadism and discipline thrown in there somewhere...I really dunno...Come find Out!

Don't let this conversation happen to you. We've assembled an all-star panel to answer the age-old question, "What exactly is BDSM?" Barrage our panelists with any and all of your questions, get terminology explained, and watch some super sexy demos with some super sexy toys (fondling allowed!).

23832.name: Happiest Hour
23832.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 noon – 8:30 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 8:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 8:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 8:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 8:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 8:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 8:30 p.m.
23832.description: Please join us to enjoy solar panel chilled Magical Margaritas, Mystical Mai Tais, get a Tattoo and interact with Popo's Great Graffiti Wall

23833.name: Hoppers and Scotch Tasting
23833.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
23833.description:
Come one, come all! Delight in various Hop Scotch games from around the globe and time periods. After successful completion of Hop Scotch and being age appropriate,  21+, after partake in Scotch.

All ages welcome!

23834.name: Building resilience in our activist communities
23834.description:
In the default world, we do some fucking amazing work around the year as activists for our communities. Some of us work for big non profits, some for pride or advocacy orgs and some folks are making an impact alone or in small groups.

Let's share what has worked for us at home, talk about things that have made us much more effective and discuss self care, sustainability and how to avoid the burnout that we see far too often. 

Members from all activist communities are welcome.

23835.name: Johnny's Hot Toddy Evenings
23835.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 9:30 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9:30 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9:30 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9:30 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9:30 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
23835.description: As the evening comes in and nomads wander the evenings on the playa, come visit and share in some Hot Toddy evenings. Just Johnny will be hosting and will be sharing in the delight of a warm drink.

23836.name: Bacon Pancake and Reggae Dance Party
23836.description: Come enjoy Reggae music, and delicious bacon pancakes. Coffee and Tea available.

23837.name: Synsepalum Dulcificum and You
23837.description: Each participant will receive a dose of wonder berry and fruit.  The rest is up to you!

23838.name: Reorient with AMPLIFIED YOGA By Donovan McGrath
23838.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
23838.description:
You will be propelled  through a physical, emotional, and mental journey unlike any other on the playa. Rooted in deep yogic tradition but delivered in a contemporary way, Donovan uses music, breath, vinyasa, kundalini, meditation and free form movement to amplify the best parts of ourselves. You will embark on a sweaty, deeply therapeutic ride that feels like a celebration.
As authentic self expression is a cornerstone of this class, ALL levels are supported and welcomed with love. Come join the movement!

23839.name: Theatre Games
23839.description: Join 2 veteran burner, theatre instructors in playing some classic getting to know you and improvisation games. Learning to say "yes, and..." can make a huge difference in your Black Rock City experience! All games are very accessible and this is a very encouraging atmosphere. The only goal is for everyone to have FUN... and maybe meet some new and interesting people! Just bring your imagination and an open mind.

23840.name: Everywhere Opening Celebration
23840.description: Come one, come all, to a celebration of the year-round global Burning Man community! Burning Man Arts & Civic Engagement, Burning Man’s Global Network, Burners Without Borders, and Black Rock Labs invite you to join us for our annual celebration at our shared pavilion space,  located at 6:15 and Esplanade, as we kick off what promises to be an amazing week on the playa. Why? Because together we are EVERYWHERE, and we have amazing global stories to share! This celebration will end in a procession to the Man Base to celebrate the the official opening of the Man and surrounding pagoda to commemorate the Golden Spike. Bring your own cup and a ritual or offering to share with others, and join us for the whole evening!

23841.name: Can't say No Thursdy
23841.description: Don't let sleep deprivation get you down. Say Yes to everything asked of you on Thursday and be amazed where it takes you. Prizes awarded for Hot Mess, Train Wreck, and Best of Shit Show.

23842.name: Everywhere Film Screenings
23842.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
23842.description: Join us for screenings of short Burning Man-inspired films and archival offerings from groups across Burning Man's Global Network.

23843.name: Rave de Cremes Brulees
23843.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 6 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 6 p.m. – 9 p.m.
23843.description: Join us for an afternoon party in the shade. Bring your sexy body for an afternoon of dancing, hula hooping, jumping on trampoline, and we'll delight your taste buds with the crunchiest, creamiest, sweetest dessert on the playa. Enjoy some cool beats from our DJs in the afternoon while tasting the finest French style Crèmes Brûlées on the playa. Show us your best tricks on the trampoline, get a cocktail refill at the bar (bring your ID), or just come and chill with us in the dodecagon.

23844.name: Everywhere Cabaret
23844.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
23844.description: Start your day in an unexpected way with performers from across Burning Man’s Global Network.

23845.name: Afternoon Delight Healing Sessions
23845.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
23845.description: A free flowing mix of magic and healing arts that include: Reiki, massage, crystal healing, sound therapy, card readings, and shamanic trips.

23846.name: Cosmic Yoga
23846.description: Linking breath, movement, and music to induce a state of awareness where you get lost in the flow of your body. All levels welcome. An intuitive vinyasa- like flow accompanied by live music.

23847.name: Clay Milifiori Bead Making Class
23847.description: Milifiori clay bead making class - Milifiori literally translated from Italian means "thousands of flowers" and traditionally the bead making technique uses glass. However, we will be using polymer or sculpey baking clay for this project using a traditional rolled cane method for our design. Fun way to learn and take home a new skill as well create a pretty wearable piece of art. All skill levels welcome, subject of the design TBD based on consensus and or skill level of the class :) We plan to then bake the beads after the class. They can be worn on necklaces or crafted into buttons so feel free to bring your own necklace material, twine, or pins to attach to the polymer clay. Plan to spend about 45min to an hour creating your beautiful beads and approximately an additional 20 minutes for bake time in our ovens! All ages and skill levels welcome. Clay will be provided but feel free to bring your own if you brought some by chance to the playa. Due to limited supplies/tools and seating (unless you bring your own supplies and tools), the class will be first come first serve.

23848.name: Bloody Mary Brunch
23848.description: The playa's best bloody mary's!! Homemade mix, strong as hell pours, and sexy ass bartenders. Come have a drink (or two!), dance your ass off, play on our swing set, or relax in our shaded lounge.

23849.name: Cake Day
23849.description:
Come join the BLM to celebrate Nevada Public Lands at the BLM Interpretive Camp
with cake!

23850.name: Fucking Dodgeball
23850.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11 p.m.
23850.description:
Lighted court, music, confidence-busting-announcer and adults throwing dodge balls. yes, it is that epic.

13+ & positive vibes

23851.name: Wake up Vinyasa Yoga
23851.description: Achy body after a night full of dancing and shenanigans? Stretch and flow it out for a morning vinyasa sesh to prep you for another day in the dust.

23852.name: Finite Patterns & Infinite Games
23852.description: Discover movement patterns as tools for integration into infinite exploration of the body, uniting movement and awareness in our lives. Experience movement culture as a portal for the expansion and communication of YOU.

23853.name: Midnight Fucking Dodgeball
23853.description:
Lighted court, music, confidence-busting-announcer and adults throwing dodge balls. yes, it is that epic.

13+ & positive vibes

23854.name: Snake Day
23854.description: Stop by to learn about snakes and other reptiles from a biologist from the Nevada Department of Wildlife.  Live snakes, lizards and a horny toad!

23855.name: Bat Day
23855.description: Come vist the BLM Interpretive Camp to learn about bats and bat lifeways.  A bat expert will be present to answer questions. Possibly a bat or two.

23856.name: Volunteer your ASSets
23856.description: Come by the bar for a drink and a flogging. We need your booty to perfect our technique using our newly minted handmade upcycled floggers.

23857.name: Sake To Me liquid meet & greet
23857.description: Relax in the shade, have a taste of some chilled sake and meet the people of camp Sake To Me, friends and neighbors! The focus is on Wednesday afternoon, but we'll be here all week! Come back to sample different flavors! We are the original Sake To Me from 2008's Pete's Sake: laid back, casual and week-long purveyors of victimless crimes.

23858.name: Pasties and Punch
23858.description: Create your own fabulous handmade nipple pasties for you or a friend. Bring a cup if you're over 21 for our famous Love Puddle punch.

23859.name: Rejuvenate
23859.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23859.description: Foot sore or body stressed? Come by LAFer Camp for a soothing foot or body massage. Afterwards chill out in the Neon Chill Dome.

23860.name: Sagas in the Silt
23860.description: Tea and tales: Join us at Althing for our 5th year of open Storytelling/Poetry reading, plus bracing beverages. Bring your own cups, cream and sugar.

23861.name: Time Warp Dance Off
23861.description: Love the 80s? How bout the 90s? 50s? We'll have it all at the TWDO where we'll be playing hit from every decade and changing it up every 20 minutes!

23862.name: Paint the Wall!
23862.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
23862.description:
The Painting Wall of Peace Evolves needs you! Help create an ever changing wall of artistic expression which will bring beauty and inspiration to the people of the playa. 
The wall is a 24 foot long 4 foot high blank canvas which is comprised of 8 interlocking 4' x 3' canvases. It will be primed and ready for you to get your art on! As the week goes by the wall will evolve into a community mural for the citizens by the citizens! 
All individuals, whether master artists or stick figure lovers, are invited to participate. Paint as much as you like or observe from our viewing bench.
We will supply all brushes and paint for the wall. Basic painting instruction will be provided if requested. Music will be playing from behind the wall so you can dance along with the colors as you choose. Lights will be on for evening viewing (or painting if we stay open late). The wall will be open for creativity Monday - Friday 10am and stay open until 6pm (or later).

On Saturday the wall will be dismantled. Each of the 8 individual canvases which comprised the wall will be randomly gifted to citizens of the community. These amazing gifts will hold the work of hundreds of passing artists creating magic memories of BRC 2017!

23863.name: Welcome Home Rat Trap Party
23863.description: What you just got here? Your tent set up can wait until tomorrow. Tonight is about making poor decisions.

23864.name: Kylie Minogue Appreciation!
23864.description: Never Too Late (or early) to Come Into My World! BYO Cup & Get Outta My Way - we've got Something Especially For You!

23865.name: Dragon Lounge - Sake Bar
23865.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 7 p.m. – 10 p.m.
23865.description: The Lounge has interlocking foam pads for visitors to sit on, as well as 5 low-lying square tables. Each table will have its own sake set and a miniature Simon Says game. We will be serving hot and cold sake before the late night begins. While enjoying sake, visitors are invited to challenge themselves and/or the host with a game of Simon Says. If you lose, you drink more sake!

23866.name: Rat Trap Meet and Greet
23866.description: Welcome first timers and returning champions. Come on by to meet new people or reconnect with old friends.

23867.name: First Time Burner Safety Class
23867.description: What do you mean you didn’t read the first timer’s guide? Come by and learn some safety tips to help you survive your first time on the playa.

23868.name: Wild Animal Party
23868.description: We've all got an animal inside! So join us in your best animal attire or let us transform you at a primal party. Jungle Juice and Face Paint supplied

23869.name: Alcohol Infusion class
23869.description: Learn techniques and differences of alcohol infusing with a workshop to make your very own flavored booze.

23870.name: Vinyasa Krama
23870.description: Simple to complex poses to prep your body for apex asanas. Harmonizing mind, body and soul in a choreographed journey, followed by a short yoga nidra.

23871.name: F.O.C.U.S. Challenge
23871.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23871.description:
Come by LAFer Camp and challenge your hand/eye coordination skills with
an intense game of F.O.C.U.S! Partake in this very simple and unique
game never seen before on this side of the pond! Challenge yourself against time
or bring a friend to see who's best! Want a hint? The acronym includes the words "Obstacle Course". Winners will receive a COOL "Radical Ritual" LAFer Camp pendant or other prize.

23872.name: The Star Bar
23872.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 7:30 p.m.
23872.description: Happy Hour in the Hushville 'hood with Lucky and La Contessa, serving both adult and non-alcoholic beverages. The hugs are always free.

23873.name: Topless Asian Storytime
23873.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
23873.description: We know what you want. Just lay back, relax and listen to some twisted stories told by a topless Asian woman.

23874.name: Dancing With Resistance
23874.description: A playful yoga flow followed by a guided meditation, set to a funky playlist. Exploring how to tap into lighthearted intuition when resistance arises.

23875.name: Decentralized Currency's Legal Horizons
23875.description: Attorney Emmanuel Rayes will discuss the legal landscape and the historical events surrounding Bitcoin and other decentralized currency.

23876.name: Osho Dynamic Meditation
23876.description: A moving meditation to enable freedom from old ingrained patterns in the body mind that keep one imprisoned in the past.

23877.name: Journey to the Center of Self
23877.description: Hypnomeditation, intense pranayama, and yoga, to transport you on a meditative journey to the center of your self.

23878.name: Humble-Brag Workshop
23878.description: Learn from the best about how not to act like you're the best. Topics include: Inserting your Burning Man cred into conversations, strategic award placement, dismissing compliments in a way that encourages more of them. Learn how to "humble-mumble" in a way that makes people have to lean in to catch your pearls of wisdom. Break into manipulative douche-groups to explore YOUR inner Moby. Wash his feet, lick his scalp and win a chance to kiss his ass. Limited seating.

23879.name: Build your own damn camp
23879.description: Learn the basics of building your own camp: ratchet straps, knots, securing a structure, etc…

23880.name: Playa Murder Mystery and Speak Easy
23880.description: Tis a dark and stormy night. You arrive in sexy attire, mingle with fellow guests, enjoy a cocktail until: MURDER MURDER ON THE PLAYA! But who dun it?

23881.name: Love Cow Sunset Sessions
23881.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 7 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 7 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
23881.description: Lo slung beats, shamanic journeys, and disco treats. Curated by some of the playa's most notorious DJ's and unsung heros.

23882.name: Casual Flogging Intro
23882.description: Want to get flogged? Want to flog someone? Want to watch people get flogged for the first time? Bored? Head over to Rat Trap. We'll be having a casual introduction to flogging: what it is, the basics of how to do it, and how to be safe. Participation is not required and it's held at a bar, so you can just get sauced if you want (please drink after you're all done flogging). Floggers provided, within reason. People who seem too altered to be responsible will be directed to the bar only.

23884.name: Maria del Camino DRIVING LESSONS
23884.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 6 a.m. – 9 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 6 a.m. – 9 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 6 a.m. – 9 a.m.
23884.description:
Learn how to safely operate the only true skid-steer tracked mutant vehicle on the playa! You have seen it, now you can drive it! 

Some mutant vehicles are dressed to look like they have tracks, but this is the real deal— 5 tons of fun! 
A Frankenstein'd chimera of a Komatsu excavator and a 1959 El Camino that transforms into a robot—and—can be driven with a smart phone. 

Really!

If that doesn't float your boat— how about flying in slow motion 9 feet up in the air? 

Spin a playa donut in a flying car!

Once you are trained and exhibit the necessary skills and understanding, you will be eligible to receive an official Maria del Camino Operator's Certificate.

Prerequisite: A valid drivers license, as is required by the DMV for driving any mutant vehicle on the playa.
Where: Classes will be held near the Esplanade nearest Liminal Labs.
When: Dawn til 9AM, MWF

23885.name: Your ASIS is awesome!
23885.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
23885.description:
The Playa ASIS Project is a photo essay. Born literally from a dream after returning from Burning Man about ten years ago, my vision embraced the core of the human body - the Anterior Superior Iliac Spine and the visible line of the Inguinal Ligament. A dream of dancers, hoopers, fire spinners and burners moving in every manner of human endeavor on the Playa and always the ASIS supporting the human form with such graceful, sensual strength. The Playa ASIS Project will attempt to capture the absolutely unique core of the individual in context of the Burning Man experience. This is not genital photography and we will limit identifying markers to your ASIS. Final artistic discretion will remain with the photographer.
This ASIS project will have a stationary location in our camp's community monkeyhut space on Tues. and Thurs. from 12pm to 2pm, but will also be roaming the playa with a photo wagon Mon., Wed. and Fri. Photos taken will be used for a anonymous encyclopedia of playa ASIS. Subjects will only be photographed if they choose to be part of the project. No records are kept on participants making the photos essentially anonymous.

23886.name: The Final Exam - Review Sessions
23886.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
23886.description: Have you studied for The Final Exam? The faculty of The Institute will be holding Review Sessions each day at 5:00 p.m., in addition to their regularly scheduled Office Hours. Students are advised to attend at least one Review Session or stop by Office Hours during the week to pick up a Study Guide. Exam proctors from Theory, the Division of Humanities, and Phage, the Division of Natural Sciences departments will ensure that all students are sufficiently prepared for The Final Exam through erudition, imagination, and deep introspection. Please come prepared with sharpened wits and a #2 pencil, graphing calculator loaded with Tetris, and crib notes on Jane Eyre. Students who arrive naked will be reminded that they are not dreaming.

23887.name: Cock Face Painting
23887.description: No it’s not that you dirty bird. Get some face painting done while you sip on a drinkie. People will be saying “Nice Cock” to you the rest of the day.

23888.name: Divination with La Contessa
23888.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
23888.description: La Contessa divines your choice of Icelandic Goddess runes or the Ranger Love Tarot.

23889.description: Last night to make regretful decisions before the man burns. Come join Rat Trap and party until the sun rises with music DJ'd by Ronabell.

23890.description: Laid back rope centered gathering where you can share your techniques or learn something new. Bring poultry for a good laugh or a friend for some more practical shibari experience. This gathering is open to all experience levels and will have a brief intro on safety and a simple box tie to get started. Be sure to bring your own rope, some spare may be available but no guarantees!

23891.name: Free Your Mind Art Play
23891.description: Mixed media art play, because, two heads are better than one.

23893.name: Automagic Playa Name Generator
23893.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 11 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 8 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 11 a.m. – 8 p.m.
23893.description: Don't have a playa name? Want a new one? Don't give a shit? Come get a new one. Ask the robot lady to get an inappropriate or rude playa name!

23894.name: Oh, Nurse! Foot Care
23894.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23894.description: TLC for your Playa-fied tootsies, administered with wisdom and love by our camp nurses.

23895.name: Temple of Gerbles
23895.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 p.m.
