Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 p.m.
23895.description: Do you like animatronic gerbils and sillyness, the temple of gerbils is the place for you! Press his buttons, see what happens!

23896.name: Dance of the 7 Chakras
23896.description: Harmony and Balance unite in movement as the 7 Chakras are opened one by one in this interpretive dance performance that will bedazzle you with color.  Dancers from many different styles of music collaborate in a spectacular concert of live musical performance and color guided production.

23897.name: We serve you Eggs.
23897.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 12:15 a.m. – 3:45 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 12:15 a.m. – 3:45 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 12:15 a.m. – 3:45 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 12:15 a.m. – 3:45 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 12:15 a.m. – 3:45 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 12:15 a.m. – 3:45 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 12:15 a.m. – 3:45 a.m.
23897.description: Be they fried, whipped, baked, boiled, shaken or thrown, when you find yourself with a seat at our table inside The Copper Egg, you can be sure of the one true thing that binds us, makes us who we are: Eggs.

23898.name: Behold! The Copper Egg Carton Rises...
23898.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3:30 a.m. – 7:45 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3:30 a.m. – 7:45 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3:30 a.m. – 7:45 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3:30 a.m. – 7:45 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3:30 a.m. – 7:45 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 3:30 a.m. – 7:45 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 3:30 a.m. – 7:45 a.m.
23898.description: O weary, O dusty traveler. What you see by soft lamp light is true. A bike-drawn cart in the deep of dark night. Come sit with us. We serve you Eggs.

23899.name: our Eggs, our Temple.
23899.description: Such is the spirit of the Egg. Like The Temple, it exists for us all. Let The Copper Egg Carton serve you joy before a rain of Man-ash engulfs us all.

23900.name: Procession to the Temple
23900.description: Join Earth Guardians & Aztec Dancers in procession to the temple to offer a blessing and connect with Mother Earth.

23901.name: 3rd Eye Painting
23901.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23901.description: We are offering burners third eye opening and painting workshops.  Incense and water/earth offerings will be made.  A mini meditation followed by cleansing and application of 'stick on' or hand painted eyes.  You can pick your color, pattern and where you want it lovingly applied by our camp staff. A ritual gong will be sounded to signify the completion of the ritual.

23902.name: Breaking Free from Fossil Fuels!
23902.description: Environmental Campaigner and AEZ villager Amanda Starbuck will present a plan for a fast-growing movement for a renewable energy revolution.

23903.name: Sunrise Bike Tour with a Naturalist
23903.description: The 'golden hour" after dawn is prime for photography and wildlife spotting. Tour the recently flooded playa, find “Golden MOOP” at the trash fence, contemplate our place in the cycles of deep time. Cameras, binoculars and field guides welcome.

23904.name: Magical Mystical Nighttime Labyrinth
23904.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
23904.description:
Take a journey to the Center of Your Being! You will not get lost; rather, this quiet walk leads inward.  By walking the labyrinth, discover long-forgotten mystical traditions, which acknowledge joy and sorrows and may lead you to a transformational experience.There are 3 stages to the walk:
1-	The Way In. Shed distractions-clear and quiet the mind.
2-	The Center – A place of reflection on your true self. 
PICK A CARD
3 – The Way Out – Renew your unity with the healing forces of the Divine Creation.

23905.name: TINY BURN!
23905.description: This is exactly what is sounds like. Toothpicks, chopsticks, skewers and q-tips, bound with twine and tape. We make tiny effigies and BURN THEM.

23906.name: Create a Postcard Masterpiece!
23906.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 6 p.m.
23906.description:
We will be supplying blank postcards on which you can paint and draw your creative visions from the playa. Once your mini masterpiece is complete, write an address on the back of the card and drop the card into our magical drop box. We will sprinkle the back of your card with a meaningful (or not so meaningful) quote. The cards will be mailed after the Burn at random dates during the next year. Keep the memory alive!

All materials provided, but limited.

23907.name: Brush Off The Dust, Brush Up For The Night
23907.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 6 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 6 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 6 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 6 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 6 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 6 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 6 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Monday, September 4th, 2017 6 a.m. – 10 a.m.
23907.description: Fight with us against the dust. Our De-Dusting Den and toothbrushing station will have everything you need to restore your pearly whites after a playa whiteout. Whether you're winding down in the morning or gearing up for the night, we've got the toiletries and tools for radical refresh routines on the go.

23908.name: Peckers and Perkies for Pickles
23908.description: Pickles for your peckers! Pickles for your perkies! Gherkins for your gazongas! Show us yours and we’ll give you ours…in a healthy, playa-loving brine of salt, vinegar, and spices.

23909.name: Silent Disco Pop Up
23909.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
23909.description: Silent disco pop up with three channels of music. Look for the flashing headsets in deep playa by the giant words. Here's a clue: LOVE/DREAM/BELIEVE.

23910.name: Dynamics Bike Tour with a Naturalist
23910.description: The playa under our feet seems featureless, but this vast lake bed is a dynamic, complex environment. How has recent flooding reshaped the surface?  How does our temporary city and art affect the environment? See how Burning Man endeavors to Leave No Trace.

23911.name: Glue, Screw, Patch, Repair It! Don’t Replace it!
23911.description: How to fix things that break, are worn or want to be re-purposed. Sometimes you have a favorite thing you just want to keep a little longer or most of the object is still good but a portion is loose or broken making the whole thing useless . This workshop will show you how to extend the life of an object.  Bring something to fix if you wish.  Hunger (playa name), the workshop leader, has worked as a product designer and artist for over 40 years and enjoys fixing things.

23912.name: BJÖRK FAN CLUB
23912.description: Björk loves eggs, we love Björk. come sing, dance and be cozy while listening to our favorite alien's tunes. Björk attire encouraged.

23913.name: The Black Rock Desert: Our Inspiring Desert Home
23913.description: Our Inspiring Home! - Come learn about the vast Black Rock Desert and what makes it come alive. Dave Cooper, local and former manager of the Black Rock NCA will talk about playa dust, wilderness areas, historic emigrant trails, wildlife, wild horses, & more. Come with questions!

23914.name: Aerial Hoop Workshop
23914.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
23914.description: If you've ever wanted to learn aerial hoop/lyra, check this class out! We'll start with a quick warm-up and then move into some cool hoop tricks! More advanced options will be given to experienced students. Class will end with some flexibility tips and you can take photos if you want!

23915.name: More Than Just One Word on Plastics
23915.description: Plastics: we love them and hate them. Rebecca Braslau, organic chemistry professor at UC Santa Cruz, will discuss the history of plastics, what they are made of, health, environmental and societal issues, and exciting developments in emerging biosustainable and biodegradable plastics.

23916.name: Space Virgins Happy Hour
23916.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
23916.description: Swing by our Space Dome from 3-5 for some music and drinks served by your lovely neighborhood Space Virgins!

23917.name: Behind the Green Curtain Bike Tour
23917.description: An interpretive bike tour of some of Black Rock City's Green camps featuring solar installations, grey water set ups, recycling efforts, plastic-free living, solar cookers and much more, Come see what innovators are doing to make Black Rock City more environmentally friendly

23918.name: Space Virgins Yoga
23918.description:
Long travels have you tight and cranky? Chakras out of line? Come to Camp Space Virgins for a rejuvenating yoga experience specifically designed to get you loose and oscillating wildly. You will be guided through an uplifting practice of vinyasa yoga and meditation that will relax stiffness, uproot negative thought patterns, shed away decades of emotional baggage, and re-ignite your connection to space. Learn how to fold your body into your favorite sacred geometry! We will conclude our yoga practice with a special chakra healing circle shavasana and mindfulness tea ceremony. Come by to prepare your mind, body, and spirit for another week on the Playa!
Open to All Skill Levels

23919.name: Behind the Green Curtain Bike Tour
23919.description: An interpretive bike tour of some of Black Rock City's Green camps featuring solar installations, grey water set ups, recycling efforts, plastic-free living, solar cookers and much more, Come see what innovators are doing to make Black Rock City more environmentally friendly.

23920.name: Aztec Dance to Honor Mother Earth & 4 Directions
23920.description: Aztec dancers with rare, traditional instrument accompanists will renew our connection to earth, wind, fire and water. Dances will be explained while connecting us to nature; we will end with a friendship community dance circle which all are encouraged to join.

23921.name: Aerial Hoop Performance
23921.description: If you love watching circus and aerial acts, come watch some aerial hoop/lyra!

23922.name: Save the Man Sign Making and March
23922.description:
Are you aware that fire is the #1 cause of death of Mans? Our statistics show that if
you are a large wooden effigy in the middle of the desert, you have a 100% chance of being burned. This is a serious issue and we're not going to take it anymore! We'll be making protest signs in preparation for our Save The Man March. Join the movement or make your own super-serious sign to express your concern for your own definitely-legitimate issue that's totally real. Then, with signs in hand, we'll march on the man and make
our voices heard! All sign making materials will be provided, drinks included. Indignant outrage is encouraged.

23923.name: Drought & Climate Change Threaten Sierra Insects
23923.description: Come look through microscopes with Dr. David Herbst, Aquatic Scientist, University of California at amazing aquatic insects of Sierra Nevada streams and learn how they are threatened by climate change and drought.

23924.name: The Great Flamingo Flutter-A Flamingo Parade!
23924.description: Stand tall, dahlinks! Calling all drag queens, divas, & pink birds of the wild! Don your pink fluffy finest and join us for the inaugural Flamingo Flutter! Come get flamingo-ed out @ High Chair Stilt Bar @ the Red Nose District from 3:30-5pm, enjoy pink drinks & a cabaret show on our stage from 5-7, & strut your SEXY pink stuff with us in fab-flamingo fashion out to Phoenicopterus Rex, a giant pink flamingo idol in the dust! Strike that one legged pose, divas! No feathers please, dahlinks.

23925.name: Playa Chefs and Playa Kitchens
23925.description: Playa Kitchens are where Playa Chefs do their Art work. It is our art studio. A lot of thought and resources can go into building a kitchen on the playa. Come by and let's talk, brag, laugh at or be jealous of each others art studios. At Feed tHE ARTists you can come and see our food art studio and talk about the good and bad of it and discuss your art studio as well.

23926.name: Efforts to Clean Up Historic Mining Waste
23926.description: Bruce Medhurst, Aquatic Scientist at the University of California will talk about a 20 year study to monitor the cleanup of acid mine drainage contaminating a Sierra Nevada stream.

23927.name: From Oy to Joy
23927.description: Joy expert Maya Hampton explains how to liberate yourself from the depressing dichotomy of happy/unhappy and align yourself with abiding joy.

23928.name: Horny Monday
23928.description: It's opening day at the Kkrafting dome and it's time for Horny Monday!! Come get horny with us and place horns on your head, bike, hips or wherever you like!! We will also be working on other head related things such as headgear, sunglasses and goggles. Come and get your head ready with us!  Craft the perfect accessory or garment that complement the costumes you picked from the Kostume tent!!!

23929.name: The Black Rock Desert: Our Inspiring Desert Home
23929.description: Come learn about the vast Black Rock Desert and what makes it come alive. Dave Cooper, local and former manager of the Black Rock NCA will talk about playa dust, wilderness areas, historic emigrant trails, wildlife, wild horses, & more. Come with questions!

23930.name: Earth Guardians Salsa Music Party
23930.description: Salsa Music Party hosted by our own Earth Guardian Aztec Burners.

23931.name: Burning Man & The Environment
23931.description: Since 1991 on the playa Burning Man has evolved and innovated to protect the Black Rock Desert. Learn the history starting with the installation of the perimeter fence, fire blankets and evapotrons. When was the Leave No Trace protocol brought to the playa? When was the first year for the Burner Express buses? What else is Burning Man doing to protect the Black Rock Desert and the planet?

23932.name: Make a tutu for Tutu Tuesday
23932.description: Tuesday is Tutu Tuesday and don't you fret if you forget! Come make the tutu of your dreams with us! Tutus are the best way to prance around playa!! We are teaching you to make the best no sew tutu. To finish your outfit off, we will also be teaching a harness making workshops. Come make a tutu to complement the costume you pick from the Kostume Tent and strut down our runway!!!

23933.name: Leave Big Pharma in the Dust!
23933.description: Alex Howe, aka Bush Ninja, has studied traditional herbalism in South Africa for the last 5 years and will help you with the BM principles of decommodification and self-reliance in meeting medicinal needs.  He'll demonstrate how to make a natural healing balm for the skin and lips and give other practical herbalism tips. There will be a limited supply giveaway of his finest craft to those who attend the full skill share.

23934.name: World’s Largest Fire Blanket
23934.description: Senior Earth Guardian and Leave No Trace Master Educator Mike Bilbo will discuss the history of burn scars on the playa, Leave No Trace solutions, and Burning Man's stewardship through large scale solutions known as burn platforms. Learn also what is the latest protocol for building a fire when camping in back country areas. Then off we go via bike tour to see the world's largest fire blanket. How big is it, what is it made of? We will investigate!

23935.name: Going Backwards to Go Forward
23935.description: We will explore ideas and items from the past that can be used today to help us live a more sustainable lifestyle by cutting back on waste and energy usage.  “Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.” ~Albert Einstein

23936.name: Brush off the Dust, Brush up for the Night
23936.description: Fight with us against the dust. Our De-Dusting Den and toothbrushing station will have everything you need to restore your pearly whites after a day of playa whiteouts.  We've got the toiletries, tools, and treats you need to gear up and glam up for another night of adventure.

23937.name: The Lorax, a Performance Piece.
23937.description: An impassioned recital of Dr. Seuss' best title, for small and big Burners great pleasure. To gain inspiration for our planet’s salvation come through and partake of this treasure.

23938.name: Fund with Fondant: Dessert Landscapes
23938.description: Eat your art out! Experiment creating 3-dimensional luscious landscapes from a variety of tasty treats. Prerequisite: must like chocolate--white, milk, and dark! Who knew rocks, dirt, moss and plants could be so sweet? And for the dairy-free and gluten-free, dessert is fun again!

23939.name: Earth Guardians Live Music Showcase
23939.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 7 p.m. – 11 p.m.
23939.description: Host Nathyn Knott & friends. Conscious music, poetry and dance inspired by our connection to the earth and nature.

23940.name: CIA tech declassified, Beginner Remote Viewing
23940.description: So you might have heard about this declassified CIA technology and wondered how or if it works.  Stop by Feed the Artists and try it for yourself.

23941.name: Honest Flirt Game
23941.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
23941.description:
Flirtation is the art of making oneself attractive or finding others attractive for pleasure without serious intent. 

Honest Flirts are forthright and playful, and they do not tease or seduce.

Honest Flirt is a game that asks you and a partner to tell a story, imagine something interesting, or do an activity together as you practice being attractive and finding your partner attractive too.

Honest Flirts need not have an interest in sex or even a serious relationship. They need only be honest and look for the attractive attributes in the people they play with.

Stop by any time between sunrise and 10 PM.

This game was inspired by an essay by philosopher Alain De Botton called Why, how & when to Flirt

You can find the essay here: https://youtu.be/rZTqF5oYUqo

23942.name: Champagne MOOP Train
23942.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
23942.description: All aboard the MOOP train! Get a ride to the perimeter fence on the Earth Guardian art car while sipping champagne and listening to music, then see what ends up on the fence and put it in your MOOP bag.

23943.name: Experience Deep Time on the Playa Bike Tour
23943.description: This is your opportunity to contemplate Deep Time while on the playa. Your journey will be led by geology experts Drs. Elizabeth Miller (Stanford U) and John Dilles (Oregon SU). Bike to the outer playa to contemplate the history of this place we call home, from the deep time geologic framework to the ice ages, first human inhabitants in the region, post-glacial warming and inexorable warming of the Anthropocene era. Burn baby burn! P.S. Deep Time = Geologic Time.

23944.name: Breakfast Beer Bongs!
23944.description: Its Fuckin Friday and its time for Breakfast beer bongs! Because why the fuck not? Its Friday! Lets drink our brunch and carb load for burn weekend!

23945.name: Astro Cats Bar & Lounge
23945.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 2:30 p.m.
23945.description: Feeling parched on the playa? Wanna get your day-drank on? Stop in and gulp down some Space Cum, or wet your whistle with a little Pussy Juice! Meow!

23946.name: Sparkles vs Furries Dance Contest
23946.description: Come in your sparkly or furry best and join in for the annual dance off contest. Epic DJs! Tons of fabulous prizes! Yummy Unicorn theme cocktails!

23947.name: Draft Beer and Pretzels
23947.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23947.description: Get some draft microbrews and pretzels inside of you! Mmmmmm, twisted!

23948.name: Learn About the Black Rock Rangers
23948.description: Have you ever considered becoming a Black Rock Ranger? Are you just curious about what the heck those khaki-clad people are doing wandering around the city? Come hear who we are, what we do, what we don’t do, and how you can join us.

23949.name: Bunny Warren Theater
23949.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.

23950.name: Earth Party - Greening the Burn/LNT Cocktails
23950.description: We will celebrate all of you Green, Eco and LNT superheros with earthy libations from the EG bar and some Earth-produced nosh to celebrate the high valued LNT /green burners! All LNT/Green camps invited!.  Without you, Black Rock City would not be sustainable!

23951.name: Facerig Kareoke
23951.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 9 p.m.
23951.description: Choose your fursona and show us your karaoke skills.

23952.name: Let's HOOKup
23952.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
23952.description: Are you a Hooker? Does your heart chakra need an adjustment? Or do you just want to try something intense even by Burning Man standards? If so, join us for a group hook pull. Your feet will be grounded, but with 12 gauge hooks in your chest, your mind will be soaring. You can choose your own adventure, either solo pulling or connecting to a group to feel the impact each person can make. We will be piercing for 2 hours but you can pull for as long as you want after that. You can even keep the hooks to show off to anyone who doesn’t believe how tough you are. Supportive people/partners and respectful spectators are welcome, but only consenting sober adults will be pierced.

23953.name: Foxification
23953.description: Facepaint yourself like a fox, or other favorite animal! Perfect way to kick off the fursuit parade!

23954.name: Diaper Hour Happy Hour
23954.description:
Adult drinks for adults in diapers. From Adult Babies to Diaper Lovers to Baby Furs wear your diapers and have a drink on us (we'll have non-alcoholic for the 18+).

We'll even have some spare disposable adult diapers for you!

23955.name: Furry 'Till I Die!
23955.description: Come and dance with the furries! Shake your tails, wiggle your ears, and hop on over and party with a bunch of wild domesticated critters!

23956.name: Kinectimals
23956.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 3 p.m.
23956.description: Play with our exotic animals from all around the world, now with bears!

23957.name: Fursuits and Chiiiillllllll...
23957.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 3 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 3 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 3 a.m.
23957.description: Down tempo music, pretty lights, mellow vibe. Wear your plush furs, come chill out and relax in this peaceful space!

23958.name: Save the World Scavenger Hunt
23958.description:
The MAN has learned how to save the world but unfortunately he cannot speak but can only communicate in semaphore. Visit the Couch Burner camp at 8:00 and G and get a postcard with the entire semaphore alphabet and a piece of the secret message.

Then collect the remaining message pieces at other participating camps around the Playa.

(If your your camp wants to participate then either use the contact form on the website or drop by our camp and we'll set you up.)

23959.name: BRC's First Nightly Late Night Food Court!
23959.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 2:15 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 2:15 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 2:15 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 2:15 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 2:15 a.m.
23959.description: It's late you're hungry, come eat snacks.  Various late night goodies rotating daily.  Coffee, Tea, cider and Cocoa nightly.  We will be attempting to recruit other food Mutant Vehicles and Camps to join us.  Across from Feed The Artists on 10 and Open Playa.

23960.name: Snow Cones!
23960.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
23960.description: We give out snow cones! We have DJs! Dancers! Beat the heat with this tasty treat!

23961.name: Fursuit Parade!
23961.description: Unicorns, Bunnies, Cats, Dogs, Ponies, even Turtles, we welcome all species of all playa animals to join us as we strut our stuff! We'll gather for the first half hour to stock up on water, and then we march around town!

23962.name: Do your hearts beat as one?
23962.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
23962.description: A unique two-person stethoscope allows you and another person to hear your heartbeats simultaneously. It's a hypnotic & curiously exciting experience.

23963.name: Cross cribage
23963.description: Its a simple but entertaining form of cross cribage. I will explain the rules and we will have example and practice games, then whoever wants to can stay and play a Few hands. Relaxing and fun, pluss good conversation to meet new people

23964.name: Come Together Roulette Wheel
23964.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
23964.description: When two people simultaneously press buttons on the Come Together Game Board lights begin flashing. They eventually one light settles on an activity (e.g. Hug, Massage Shoulders, Tickle Each Other) and another settles on a consequence (e.g. Find Intimacy, Experience Happiness, Fall in Love).

23965.name: Black Rock Boutique Open Hours
23965.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
23965.description: Are you a fan of funky and freaky fashions? Let our fashionistas slip you into something more questionable, then strut your stuff on our runway.

23966.name: Topless Pickles
23966.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
23966.description: Pickled Items. Offered by topless people.

23967.name: Bottomless Mimosas
23967.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 1:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 1:30 p.m.
23967.description: Mimosas. Offered by people without pants. Get two by going bottomless

23968.name: Panda Party and Parade
23968.description: Pandamonium! Put on your panda costume and join the fun. Meet up at the Disco Dance Dome in Conscious Dreamers camp for a panda party and then we'll head to the Esplanade and look for panda bars and other pandas.

23969.name: Picklebacks
23969.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 7 p.m.
23969.description: Whiskey. Picklejuice. Classically delicious, playa-certified. Come to Pickleback Mountain: ride our pickle and pickleback again and again. Despite our hours, we're usually open. We're here for you for all emergency pickleback needs.

23970.name: Charcoal Sketching Instruction by Kat
23970.description: The beautiful and amazing Kat will instruct us on the fine art of charcoal sketching. Kat is an accomplished Reno artist and we are honored to have her lead a class that you won't want to miss. Materials provided.

23971.name: Day Dance Party in the Dome
23971.description: Join us in the Disco Dance Dome for an amazing all day party with your favorite DJs pumping out the killer tunes. Dress to impress in your playa finest, invite passersby to join the fun, hoop in the street, get crazy, woot!

23972.name: Disco Dance Lessons by Ian
23972.description: Learn some sexy new disco moves taught by our smoking hot friend and awesome campmate, Ian! Wear your favorite playa dancing shoes and bust a move to your favorite disco tunes!

23973.name: Flow Toy Instruction by Lad
23973.description: Learn a new skill, or hone your existing poi skills, with instructions by Lad. Bring your own LED poi or other flow toy to spin if possible.

23974.name: 4:20 Hoop Jams
23974.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 4:15 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4:15 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4:15 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4:15 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4:15 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
23974.description: Please join us for our daily 4:20 hoop jams at Conscious Dreamers Camp. Loaner hoops and beginner instruction available. Killer tunes provided. 4:20 wasn't an option on the start time, so I just put 4:15.

23975.name: Deep Playa Scrabble Tournament
23975.description: Come play scrabble in the Deep Playa!

23976.name: VICE Beard Spa!
23976.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
23976.description: Playa dust got your beard looking matted and dingy? Come to VICE’s beard spa for some TLC. Our beardistas will clean and oil your beard, as well as provide a shave (face/neck). Barrettes are available for Old Testament beards.

23977.name: Socially Appropriate Burp Day
23977.description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Just for today, let all burping be considered socially appropriate. Buuuuuuuurp!!!

23978.name: Socially Appropriate Nose Picking Day
23978.description: Who wants to suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in their nose? Get those irritating playa boogers out of there already! Don't worry if anyone's watching you go deep with that index finger! Why not give that thumb a try! It's time for each of us to get the relief we deserve and to breathe just a little freer. And go ahead, flick it on the ground because that's where that stuff came from. Get that P.O.O.P. (playa out of place) out of your nose!

23979.name: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
23979.description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!

23980.name: Socially Appropriate Menstruation Day
23980.description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—you don't have to be embarrassed just because you have a naturally occurring blood flow. Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!

23981.name: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
23981.description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not for her or him. Today it's okay to have just woken up in the morning, okay to be stimulated by your own silky boxers, and okay to be TURNED ON, because you have a right to your feelings and you get to do whatever you want with your body.

23982.name: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
23982.description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!

23983.name: Socially Appropriate Yawn Day
23983.description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today. That's right—celebrate one of the great mammalian mysteries and let out a big old yawn even when someone is talking right at you. No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!

23984.name: Hug a Shirtcocker Day
23984.description: They get a lot of attitude from everyone all week. So what if they give you the creeps. Radical Inclusion, people! It’s time to show them it’s all good. Make sure you offer to rub sunscreen on them while you're at it.

23985.name: Deep Playa Space Disco
23985.description: Camp Deep Playa S__ culminating dance party Friday evening with DJ Exxxplosivo.

23986.name: Sunrise Scones and Smooth Jazz
23986.description: Come watch the sunrise noshing on scones while listening to mellow music

23987.name: Jungle FUR party
23987.description:
It’s a jungle out there! Swing on over in your best FUR, enjoy some jungle juice, & get lost in FURngully. We ain’t lion when we say it will be wild!

FURngully is an chill oasis. FUR stands for Fucking Unreal Relaxation. Come over at night and let your senses be stimulated. The Jungle FUR party is one night, but FURngully itself is open nightly!

23988.name: Live Band Karoake
23988.description: Ready to be a rock star?  Come pick from a list of songs and sing in front of a live band.  After your song stay and socialize at one of our 3 bars.

23989.name: The FAFFFing Research Institute
23989.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 2:15 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 2:15 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 2:15 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 2:15 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 2:15 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 2:15 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 2:15 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 2:15 p.m.
Monday, September 4th, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 2:15 p.m.
23989.description:
The FAFFFing Research Institute (hosted by Porndog)
We are in search of research subjects to study. You know that camp-mate who is always last to be ready? Right when you think they're ready, they can't find their headlamp and need to fix themselves another drink??? This person is a FAFFFer. They Fuck Around For Fucking Forever! Please bring us FAFFFers, so we can study their behaviors (for the greater good of society).

23990.name: Hunter Leight on Psychedelic Sex Work
23990.description: Most fans of psychedelics know how powerful sex can be in an altered state. Now imagine that your partner is a skilled sex worker and trained counselor- ready to guide, support, and love you in and through the cosmos. Come talk with a Radical Intimacy Counselor and psychedelic sex worker about the healing and expansive possibilities of this unique work.

23991.name: DUSTDAAAANCE
23991.description: This all-abilities workshop is for anyone looking to groove with some other groovers, with no pressure or expectations. All we ask is that you get sufficiently dusty with the rest of us, and open yourself to the wiggling, stretching, reaching, growing, expanding, and grounding that comes from exploratory movement. Let's fuckin' dance, babes!

23992.name: Finding Inner Balance in a Chaotic World
23992.description: Learn and practice a short, potent prana meditation you can practice anytime with Neosteph.

23993.name: Fly Ranch & Burners Without Borders
23993.description: Join the Fly Ranch team and BWB leaders to discuss the potential for Fly Ranch as a new context for civic engagement and community activation.

23994.name: A World Without Jails and Prisons
23994.description: Learn how the #CLOSErikers campaign closed the country's most notorious jail, and what you can do to help end mass incarceration after Burning Man.

23995.name: Slutty Mini Golf: Always Open!
23995.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
23995.description: Come play a round of slutty mini golf. Take points off your golf game by completing slutty tasks. May the biggest slut win!

23996.name: Feeding Communities with Emma Dilemma
23996.description: Emma Dilemma, a professional chef and caterer, will share stories focused on the particular challenges of providing food for community and event spaces. Emma has provided food service for a variety of organizations and events across the United States, including many camps here at Burning Man and similar events. Join us for a conversation about best practices and methods at handling food stuff on a community scale!

23997.name: Slutty Mini Golf
23997.time:

Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.

23997.description: Come play a few rounds of slutty mini golf. Enjoy an ice cold Arnold Palmer and get points off your golf game for performing slutty tasks.

23998.name: GLAMCOCKS Cockadoodle Brew: Morning Coffee Parties
23998.time:

Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – noon

23998.description: Get your morning started right with a nice big shot of GLAM in your coffee! Coffee served at the bar with some wake up music on the dance floor. Monday - Disco, Tuesday - Golden Age of Pop, Weds - Battle of the Boybands, and Thursday - Swedish Fish

23999.name: GLAMCOCKS Blacklight Magic
23999.description: The night is dark and full of pleasure. Our radical ritual calls for beguiling beats, glowing body paint, and mystical concocktions from the apothecary. Beware virgins, the spirits are hungry for a sacrifice. Doug from The Perry Twins will be providing tribal beats all night long.

24000.name: Tiki Disco Happy Hour
24000.description: Want cold tiki drinks, shade, and some disco to make your hips pop? Head over to Desperados in your purple sequence for a hootin hollerin good time!

24001.name: Hoop and Circus Jam
24001.description: Come down to the Slutt Putt for a fun circus jam. Great music and fun available for all. Limited props available, so bring your own if you've got them

24002.name: Yacht Party Happy Hour
24002.description: Missing your boat out here in the desert? Come gather with fellow yacht owners, suck down some G&Ts and flatter each other’s uppity white pant suits.

24003.name: Nevada Burners Photo Shoot!
24003.description: Nevada Burners unite for their 8th annual portrait @ 6 o'clock side of The Man. Tell all Nevada kin, and don't be late! Afterparty @ Martini Village.

24004.name: Led/Glow Jam
24004.description: We will provide the music, you bring your favorite LED or Glow prop down to the Slutt Putt and party with us!

24005.name: GLAMCOCKS Denim, Diamonds, and Divas
24005.description: Grab your finest denim and dust off your bedazzler out because it's time to sparkle! We're going to dance the night away to our favorite divas! We want thigh-high glitz, acid washed fringe, sassy diva looks, and don't forget to get a Glamour Shot at the bar! Beats by Diva Dance DJ Cat Denton.

24006.name: Hootananny Western Happy Hour
24006.description: We got whiskey, we got horses, we got honkytonk and shit talkin. What are you waiting for?

24007.name: Dungeons and Drag Queens Happy Hour
24007.description: Calling all leather daddies and nerdy queens. Desperados will be playing your fav industrial rock and giving out spanks like they grew on trees!

24008.name: GLAMCOCKS Atlantis: the Lost Glampire
24008.description: Calling all mischievous mermaids, muscled mermen, and sexy sea creatures . Go deep with the Glamcocks as we bring you 20,000 queens under the sea. Flip your fins to our siren songs, show off your starfish, and have a sip of our Seaman's Swig. Because darling it's better down where it's wetter. Beats by DJ Andrew Gibbons

24009.name: GLAMCOCKS Baewatch: The 5th Annual Beach Party
24009.description: Get too shipwrecked last night? The Baewatch squad will bring you back to life! Practice your mouth to mouth as the hottest and wettest beach part on playa returns for sunshine fun, drenching squirt guns, and Speedo-bouncing beats. SPF 69 Recommended.

24010.name: Slutty Dance Party
24010.description: Come get down at the golf course with great DJs and enjoy an Arnold Palmer.

24011.name: Bloody Mar/y/ia Mornings
24011.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 1 p.m.
24011.description: Just starting your day/still going from last night? Head over to Desperados for your favorite hairy dog with some up to go gooders.

24012.name: Yoga Nidra with Gah-bé
24012.description: Attune the mind, rest the body, and empower the soul. Connect. breathe. let go. Recharge.

24013.name: Trash Fence Sausage Cook Off!
24013.description: We’ll be grilling and feeding the hungry wanderers at that beloved orange trash catcher. Come listen to a purely 90s playlist, eat sausage, and watch the sun rise. Vegans welcome. BYO pink flamingo.

24014.name: Ramen.
24014.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
24014.description: Need we say more? Come by for hot, just-the-right-spice ramen. Toppings galore (we love everything pickled) and sexy servers abound.

24015.name: Capy Kisses
24015.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
24015.description: Roll up! Roll up!! Capppy Cappy HEY! Wanna spin the wheel, take a shot,, cop a feel.. In a friendly fashion bae.. Spin on, spin on! Cappy Cappy EY! Spin our spinning wheel, get a kiss, zap, slap or feel and come another day! WAY!

24016.name: Make a vision board
24016.description: Set an intention for Burning Man 2017. We'll have materials to make vision boards that you can take back to your camp to help focus your week.

24017.name: Cappy Hour
24017.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 4 p.m. – 5 p.m.
24017.description: Have you got your friends, and gremlins too?.. Bring them over for a happy Cappy hour.. a shower of your favourite booze. We got friends if you needs them too. Music you won’t find on YouTube. Folk, Punk, show tunes to coo. And Movie themes for the Celiene Dion in you. Cappy hours starts so super early, get in fast to perm your short and curlys.

24018.name: TuTu Tuesday party with Reno Nation
24018.description: Reno Nation is hosting their 3rd annual TUTU Tuesday day party. Starting at noon and goes till the sun is down. We will have art cars coming, with some of Reno's best local talent DJs in the mix! We will have our bar open with many kegs on tap! So come to Reno Nation with your TUTU and spend your Tuesday right with us!

24019.name: Capy Coffee
24019.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 10 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 10 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
24019.description: Can you hear the drumming of ancient Pueblo people thumping their footsteps into your shoes? Their rhythm is a march toward tales of unrequited love. ‘’I love you’ you whisper into a cavern, richly scented by warm milk and cacao. Paddle over through the lush rainforest landscape of neon unicorns,eclipse-bears and rainbow-rascals for a multi-dimensional, sacred DIY warm mug experience. Silence is respected - groans are appreciated.

24020.name: Knitting, Crochet, Tatting, Sewing... Circle
24020.description: Participate in the tradition of a sewing circle.  Knit, crochet, tat, spin, sew & embroider with us.  Work on your projects, bring a snack to share, share a skill or tip, learn a skill?

24021.name: Marshmallow Kibbutz
24021.description: Isreali Burner meet up.  Let's meet up if you are a Burner from Isreal or MidBurn.

24022.name: Coffee on the Man
24022.description: Cowboy Coffee! for Burners at the Man, warming themselves or having breakfast on his hot remains the morning after he burns.  It's Mirror Man and Patti from Earth Guardians providing you with just what you need, or, just what the doctor ordered, as it were.  You can have it black or, until we run out, with some evaporated milk and or Stevia.  We've been doing this for a few years.  We bring burnable paper cups, but if you have your own cup, that's even better.  What's really cool is if you can bring an authentic reproduction tin cup (get them from 19th-Century reenactment vendors, like C & D Jarnagin or James County Mercantile).  We're usually on the west side - Look for a table, red wagon behind a a red Trek mbike, blue enamel-ware coffee pots boiling away, a tallish thin lady and a tall guy with a black slouched hat, kind of looking like a 19th Century 49er or maybe one of the 1st Cav guys who patrolled this region 155 years ago - and who had hot coffee like we'll be serving you...!

24023.name: Porta Pizza Party
24023.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 6 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 6 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 6 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 6 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 6 p.m. – 10 p.m.
24023.description: Join us for home made gourmet pizza slices made fresh & cooked in our home made wood burning pizza oven. Bring a cup & we'll serve what we got.

24024.name: Make Shrunken Heads, voodoo dolls and boomerangs
24024.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 4 p.m.
24024.description: Come by and spend some time at Camp Shrunken Heads and make a shrunken head necklace, a full size (shrunken) head or a voodoo doll! We will also have a few boomerangs for decorating and tossing. Lessons given! Kids of all ages are welcome.

24025.name: Salsa  + Yoga = SALSOGA
24025.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
24025.description:
Invigorating body flow + salsa movement to start your day! 
No mat needed. Bring a cup. Champagne anyone?

24026.name: StarSpirit Portraiture & Cocktail Hour
24026.description: By now, we all know that we are made of StarBarf. But how does YOUR StarBarf manifest itself on this Earthly realm? Come drink a mule (Kentucky, Moscow, Mezcal, or Virgin), and get your StarSpirit Portrait done by one of our visionary artists. Take your portrait home with you, donate it to our StarSpirit portrait album, or burn it with the Man.

24027.name: Good Clean Sox
24027.description: Good clean sox to be gifted, with a rejuvenating footrub/massage for your playafied tootsies.  LAFers camp (Lazy Ass Fuckers) will be waiting to make you feel good!

24028.name: Daruma Intention Setting Ceremony
24028.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 5 p.m.
24028.description:
We'd like for you to meet and interact with the 6’ tall Japanese intention setting Daruma doll we've built for Burning Man 2017. 

Join us at the Daruma for intention setting ceremonies! You are invited to approach the Daruma in groups of two or three, set a personal goal, and demonstrate your commitment to the intention you've set by marking one of the Daruma’s eyes.

From then on, every glimpse of the Daruma as you travel through Black Rock City will remind you of the intention you've set...of your commitment. 

Three years from now, we will return with the Daruma to the playa so you will have a chance to fill in the Daruma’s other eye after you've completed your intention / goal. Together, we'll be granting the Daruma vision 20/20 in the year 2020, and then bringing the Daruma to the Temple to burn.

24029.name: Beginner Acro Yoga
24029.description: Want to learn how to get all bendy, sexy, and lift yourself (or partner) into the sky?? Come join our Beginners acro yoga class! No partner needed.

24030.name: Alternate Wisdom and Lustrous Libations by Bambi
24030.description: Let me unfold the stories of your days with my magical 8ball and tarot cards. Might even throw a few bones.  Alternative wisdom aka bad advice is quintessential in your journey through this dusty land, not only to yourself but for all others. I would lend an ear and of course SO much wisdom accompanied with glorious sparkly drinks.  Just relax stop on by hop a carpet or fly .. Or not. But the drinks will be great.

24031.name: Mad Hatter Iced Tea Party & Herbalization -
24031.description: Wear your maddest hat and tea attire, bring your teacup, and enjoy hot and iced wild herb teas selected specifically for playa life while you learn about their medicinal benefits.  Awesome if you’d like to bring extra ice, herbs/tea to share. ICE is NICE! :)

24032.name: ONESIES PARTY
24032.description: At the coldest part of the morning, don your spirit animal onesie and join Pele's fire for some dance and snuggles.  BYO-Onesie

24034.name: DiscoSlut Yoga
24034.description: Bring what you’re using as your yoga mat and definitely your sluts. Get ready to get bendy and juicy.

24035.name: The Meaning Behind Pink Floyd's Dark Side Album
24035.description: Dark Side of the Moon syncs up well with Wizard of Oz, but it's also a powerful concept album on the existential and ephemeral nature of life. From the ordering and theme of the songs on the album, to the musical and lyrical qualities, there's a lot to unpack. Come to listen and to discuss. We can discuss on some other albums as well.

Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 6 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Monday, September 4th, 2017 6 a.m. – 10 p.m.
24036.description: We supply the paint & BM stencils.  You supply the clothing, gear, or body to create your own wearable BM art. Interactive, quick, easy, & fun.

24037.name: Freetown Christiania
24037.description: Freetown Christiania in Copenhagen, Denmark. The Transformation of a worn-out Military Barracks into a sustainable urban Village. Film, Dias and Discussion.

24038.name: Yerba Matè Dub
24038.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 2 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10:30 a.m. – 2 p.m.

24038.description: Come drink teas and relax on our coaches benches and carpets inside our circus tent. We have diffrent forms of classic dub music playing through our daily tea time. We burn copal, palo santo, oud wood, sweet grass and other smells from around the worlds tea ceremonies.

24039.name: Pre-apocalyptic Melt Down Party
24039.description: Come dressed in your finest Tank Girl/Mad Max attire to celebrate the beautiful beginning of our inevitable demise. We'll be spinning a barrage of EDM and serving up icy-cold beer, mixed drinks and vapor shots. Don't forget to bring your own vessel and ID.

24040.name: Freetown Christiania
24040.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4 p.m. – 7 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4 p.m. – 7 p.m.
24040.description: Christiania-Party in the “Hurry up Slowly” Camp

24041.name: Wheel! Of! Misfortune!
24041.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 6 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.

24057.name: Be a Sexy Burner Model, or Shoot Them!
24057.description: Wanna be one of those SEXY BURNERS seen in all the best photos? Wanna shoot sexy Burners on playa? Models and photographers unite and join our Sexy Burner Photo Safari! Arrive by bike, and bring your camera and/or sexy attire for a FUN and SEXY shoot during the golden hour. All photos will be shared!

24058.name: Consent and Conduct - Caring for our community
24058.description: Consent Culture celebrates enthusiastically opting in as a cornerstone to meaningful and loving interpersonal engagement in our community. This workshop will provide a foundation for discussing and practicing consent, particularly under the umbrella of conduct, as well as identify consent related resources on Playa. Freely given agreements to interpersonal engagements are the keys that allow our community to be the best version of itself. And we endeavor to cultivate an environment where boundaries are not just explored but protected as well, and individuals are held responsible for their own actions.

24059.name: Latin Dance/Salsa night
24059.description: For the 3rd year in a row, Village Home Rule host Latin dance night! From salsa, merengue, to bachata and kizomba. All levels and styles are welcome, from New York to Cuban, to on one and on two! Dress for pizazz, and come ready to dance! And we promise, there will be no more than 3 Cumbia songs. Promise! There'll be Mojitos.

24060.name: Forgiveness
24060.description: We all carry things with us into this desert that we came here to let go. Come be supported and heard in the safety of perfect strangers in a conversation and process about forgiving others, or yourself.

24062.name: Stori Telling - Putting the "i" in your story
24062.description: Storytelling is not only an ancient art form but something everyone still does in their everyday life. Come receive tips on how to take raw memory and form it into a flowing narrative. If you’ve seen the “Ten Principles )’(“ storytelling project performed in DC over the past several of years, you’ll get a taste of the same craft and training those participants received to get stage ready. And whether or not you end up telling your stories for an audience of one or dozens, hopefully this workshop will help the true tales you do share be ever more engaging. Learn some tips on telling a true story well in a short period of time.

24063.name: Spirit Animal Gathering
24063.description: For the 2nd year in a row, we will have a Spirit Animal Gathering. This is where you learn to access, channel, and become your Spirit Animal. Learn to draw on its wisdom, strengths, weaknesses, and discover another facet of yourself. You should already have spent the time discovering and studying your Spirit Animal before coming, in The Tiger Temple

24064.name: The Twisted Swan - Tuesday
24064.description: At pub open is Naughty nun night, nuns, vicors, a night of incredible blasfemy and even more sinful libations!

24065.name: Pharmakon Apothecary & Father Jack's Panty Shack
24065.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
24065.description:
The playa is a harsh mistress and overstimmed nights can lead to painful mornings. Pharmakon, open M-F mornings, 11am-1pm from, is the yourt "Oh, gawd!" hangover recovery station, replete with a full menu of tried and true playa picker uppers. 

This year we have broadened Pharmakon’s offerings to include simple first aid items for (hapless) virgin burners who find themselves unprepared. We have found even seasoned burners can be surprised by the fragility of their bodies in our dusty wonderland. By offering various OTC remedies we hope to mitigate trivial demands on Rampart medical services and provide a gentle lesson in self-sufficiency along with the bandaid and a hug. (Unfortunately we will no longer be offering ameliorative trepanning or exorcisms as we broke the skull drill and drank all the holy water). 

FATHER JACK'S PANTY SHACK offers solace for souls experiencing that ‘not so fresh’ feeling. Eager participants in need of a little freshening up can score a dainty thong, beefy briefs or a naughty hybrid that tap dances on the line between decency and profane. You never know what you’ll find when you put your hand inside the box of mystery but we can promise you’ll get rousing applause, catcalls and possibly even a consensual reacharound as you model your new underoos for our staff of helpful shackmasters.

24066.name: Consecration Cinema
24066.description: Revel in the ritual of immersive film under the heavens. Witness "mirrored movie magic" at Liminal Labs' Consecration Cinema. S-F, 8:15 pm (first feature is always kid-friendly). Tonight's offerings: Nightmare Before Christmas, Black Narcissus, Logan Noir. Check out our marquee or visit www.liminallabs.com for complete listings.

24067.name: Consecration Cinema
24067.description: Revel in the ritual of immersive film under the heavens. Witness "mirrored movie magic" at Liminal Labs' Consecration Cinema. M-F, 8:15 pm (first feature is always kid-friendly). Tonight's offerings: The Monkey King, Lair of the White Worm, The Magic Christian. Check out our marquee or visit www.liminallabs.com for complete listings.

24068.name: KAFKA 9.0 VANDALIZING
24068.description:
Vandalizing is a creative tool, the act through which the painting is given a new meaning, a more detailed and profound identity. It provides additional information able to transfer a specific emotion, to convey the rhythm of the soul in that particular moment.
"Disfiguring" a painting is necessary to create the correspondence between the artwork’s identity and feelings that moulded its form and content.

24069.name: Cory Doctorow at Liminal Speaks
24069.description:
Liminal Labs Lustration Station is pleased to present Liminal Speaks!, an annual artful conversation about whatever our featured guest wants to illuminate. This year, Join us for a conversation with with author and burner COREY DOCTOROW (Little Brother, Homeland). Imagine a gift-economy society built on the fringes of a hyper-capitalist, hyper-unequal world in decline. A wasteland where bohemian makers build an automated luxury communist utopia out of the waste-stream of industrial civilization. Sound familiar? 
"We’re making a world where greed is a perversion. Where grabbing everything for yourself instead of sharing is like smearing yourself with shit: gross. Wrong."

24070.name: Huggzilla Sunrise Coffee & Meet
24070.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 6 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 6 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 6 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 6 a.m. – 8 a.m.

24070.description: Enjoy fresh brewed coffee, meet new people while lounging in comfy beds as you watch the sunrise.

24072.name: no hablo espanol
24072.description: whether you know it or not, come learn how to mispronounce Spanish with me.

24073.name: Bear Yoga Practice
24073.description:
Are the stresses of being a bear in a human dominated world getting you down?  Do you miss the calm and relaxation of the idyllic days in the forest?  Are you a bear curious human who wants to learn more about the life of bears in a yoga atmosphere?  Then Bear Yoga is for you!  

Join Yogi Bear as she leads you through an introductory bear yoga practice, suitable for all bear yoga level participants.  Please bring your own yoga gear.  If you don't have gear, we'll find suitable substitutes.

Namaste Bhaaloo!

24075.name: Corey Doctorow: Liminal Speaks
24075.description: Corey Doctorow in conversation about Homeland, a burner-ish scifi look at a maker-built, gifting utopia constructed out of capitalism's waste stream.

Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
24076.description: The hieratic gestures comprise the fundamental vocabulary of body-knowing.  These gestures are the body’s primary agents in forming meaning out of experience.  They are universal appearing spontaneously in all cultures.

24077.description: Breathwork Journeying to shamanic drumming music. Shamanic breathing technique is used to guide an often highly informative visual and sensory journey

24078.name: Leopard Martini Lounge Party
24078.description: It's the 20th year for the Annual Leopard Martini Lounge Party!  Bring your spots and we will serve you a Dirty Martini!

ZaZen returns with their annual Whiskey Party, belly up to the saloon bar and
enjoy the varieties of ever flowing amber libation at "Hotel Playafornia".
Sooth yourself with timeless classics and favorite tunes of non-electronic 
eras with some live music cameos from our talented resident musicians. 
 Throw back your partners and dance with our whiskey, and sun 'til the sings goes down!! 
Outfits from decades past encouraged!  Giddy up!

Sunset you are sure not to forget! All things sports-ish are encouraged (cheer-
leader audition on site!)

24081.description:
This is going to be a very unique event, during the performance of various DJs a special song will come up and everyone in the audience will be ask to participate. The song in question is a theme song for our camp called Huggzilla Attack. We want everyone to learn the lyrics so they can participate by singing along, and at the very end of it there will be mass hug attack. Which means, you need to attack someone with your hug and hold it for at least one minute or before the music starts playing again.

The lyrics:
We're living in the world of monsters
Hiding in plain sight
Huggzilla may attack you anytime
And make you feel alright

We're living in the world of monsters
Hiding in plain sight
Huggzilla may attack you anytime
Be careful here it comes

Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D6XOHpqnjdk

You will each have time to share whatever you are needing to share to feel heard and appreciated. Then you'll have an opportunity to participate in a couple songs to complete our ritual together. 24090.description: Please join us for a sharing circle focused on Grounding and Gratitude. Burning Man can be frenetic and overstimulating -- come to Flirt Camp for an intentional, safe and intimate time for grounding and to honor what we are grateful for. This will be a 90 minute activity and all are welcome.

24091.name: LED Bicycle Flag Creation Station
24091.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
24091.description: All hail Glorious Chairman Meow, our illuminated leader!  Glorious Chairman Meow is a benevolent shepherd of the people and bestows LED bicycle flags to the grateful citizens of Black Rock City during our LED bicycle flag creation stations.  Glorious Chairman Meow seeks to end the barbaric practice of bikicide: carelessly abandoning one’s innocent bike to wither and die on the playa.  Comrades in dust: join the revolution to end bikes-as-moop by creating a personalized flag with your playa address that radiates with your creativity and our LEDs.  Glorious Chairman Meow decrees that you let your freak flag fly, and remember comrades, the Pussy demands obedience!

24092.name: Flirt Camp Sunset Gold Party
24092.description: The King of Greenland (DJ) and Camp Master team up to torch the streets with a dance party, also featuring the best (and hottest) flirters at BM in the Flirt Camp Lounge™. Everyone wears gold (or a hat with a bird on it).

24093.name: Mixer upper and deep dive. puja jam
24093.description: Mix of improv games. ecstatic dance and a mishmash of movement based practices focused on letting go of barriers and beliefs. eye gazing. partner work. group movements. all guided and curated especially for burningman 2017.

24094.name: Hug Meditation Workshop
24094.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
24094.description:
Looking to deepen your meditation practice? It turns out that embracing someone in a mindful hug might help you do just that. Hugging meditation, made famous by Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh, is rooted in the belief that a good hug can have transformative effects.

"When we hug, our hearts connect and we know that we are not separate beings," Hanh writes. "Hugging with mindfulness and concentration can bring reconciliation, healing, understanding, and much happiness."

24095.name: Swayze Stories
24095.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 9 a.m. – 9 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 9 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 9 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 9 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 9 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 9 p.m.
24095.description: Your real or imagined encounters with Patrick Swayze are wanted for our audio oral history repository. Record your truth or fantasy and then play Swayze bean bag toss while wearing a mullet. 100% pure adrenaline.

24096.name: 5 Alarm Funk and The Funk Ups Live!!!
24096.description: Reverbia Live Nights presents on our outdoor Main Stage...A Funky Dance Party Concert that may just blow your ears off as 5 Alarm Funk (Canada's loaded Funk band) and The Funk Ups (All cutter musicians who are Jason Mraz's touring band) cause your feet to kick up the dust and get your booty uncontrollable shaking for all Black Rock City to see.  Come early as we surprise you with another amazing opening band.  Afterwards, enjoy some hot tea in our acoustic music and jam off Teahouse on Backstreets Reverbia or hit our Radiance Chill Dome for live looping ethereal and spacial  cosmic music until dawn.

24097.name: The Third Annual Worst Comedy Show Ever
24097.description: It's The Third Annual Worst Comedy Show Ever on the playa. The worst stand-up comedy showcase on the playa! It's terrible, it's a nightmare, it's a train wreck, so don't miss it! Hosted by David Cooper. We'll have jokes, we'll have stand-up comedians, we'll have microphones. Okay, we're gonna have one microphone. Find out if that one microphone works and more if you come on down. Comedians looking to perform welcome. Kill me.

24098.name: guided creative visualization meditation
24098.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 2:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 2:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 2:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 2:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 2:45 p.m.
24098.description:
Join Camp Feel Good for a guided creative visualization meditation. Dr. Feelgood will help you picture your perfect day 10 years in your future. The process works by subconsciously shifting your decision making over the next 10 years eventually making your vision a reality. You don't know what that day looks like? Don't worry, most people don't, but your subconscious already knows what is important to get there. The more amazing and compelling the vision that you let emerge, the more you will be drawn to it. How? Most people make between 80 to 400 decisions a day. A rich, compelling visualization with a lot of sensory "hooks" can shift those decisions towards your perfect future because the right choices will feel "good.” We will start with a mindfulness of breath meditation, a gratitude exercise and then wake up the morning of your perfect day and explore it through a guided process. After, we will ask a few of those interested to share their visualization with the group. We look forward to sharing your future day together. Dr. Feelgood.


The 45 Minute Meditation Session is 2PM M-F and followed up with creative cocktails, step up and have a feel good drink at our Camp Feel Good Compliment Bar/Sherpa Foot washing station!

For those in need of a deep dive in what you want out of life, we offer an Advice Booth Open every day!

24099.name: Boutique Opening Day - Dress A Virgin!
24099.description: Veterans and Virgins, get playa ready with fun and funky fashions. Come find that magical piece of clothing that was always meant to be worn by you.

24100.name: Trash Fence 1/2 Marathon
24100.description: The trash fence is under visited and underappreciated. This 13 mile perimeter and inner city run/ride will give burners an overall perspective of how big this event is and how small they are. Medals awarded for participation and refreshments served at the after party. Race will begin at camp at 7am. Runners need to carry their own water. Race bibs will be distributed to keep track of runners' safety!

24101.name: Bunna - Coffee Seeds Stories and Songs
24101.description:
From green to brown.
From whole to dust.
Thru, fire, water, clay and stone.
Preparing coffee hear the song,
And tell us stories about home.

24102.name: Million Minion March
24102.description:
Join us at Camp Charlie before we march down to greet our new master, The Man! 
Fun swag for celebrating with us.  Tulaliloo ti amo!  Banana!

24103.description: Come get your fabulous freak on at the Boutique.  Visit the alteration station and get funky  down the runway, accompanied by hot beats.

24104.name: Britney Spears Brunch
24104.description: A chronological tour/listening party through Britney Spears' career along with a discussion of her cultural impact, relevance and legacy.

24105.name: BlackSKYwhite Show
24105.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
24105.description:
BlackSKYwhite's performances are magical sights - incorporating organic actor's bodily movements, music reaching from electronics to cabaret and ethnic style as well as stunning lighting effects which create a surreal world of great illusion, yet at the same time, a world that is very close and true.
blackSKYwhite have created, and continue to create a special technique of placing actors on the edge between reality and illusion - where performances are more of a dream than anything resembling real life. It is difficult to identify the genre of this theatre's stagings (as the word "genre" in itself implies some kind of traditionalism) and perhaps the company's style is closest to modern choreography in its most nonconformist form. The shows tell no story, reveal no plot, have no dimensions, or narrative. Rather, they mirror reality through dreams, bordering on that thin line between the outer and the inner worlds that interacts with the spectator through their own intuition or unconsciousness. As in the 'absolute mirror', every single person should see in each their work, an inner world and their own particular destiny. 
blackSKYwhite has received important awards for innovation in theater at FringeFirst - the international performing arts festival in Edinburgh, Scotland and have headlined performances at Glastronbury Festival. They have performed at Burning Man 2010 also.

24106.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 4:15 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 4:15 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 4:15 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10:15 a.m. – 4:15 p.m.

We have several of our camp mates that dedicate the entire day to curate the boutique and encourage/guide each burner soul that enters the Bazaar to explore their true self expression. These items are truly a gift to the Playa. As we all know, "the Playa provides". There will be all types of items available from simple accessories to full outfits. Maybe you forgot your coat, or that special Tu-Tu. We will have a "Tonne" of stuff but do encourage others to donate if they feel the need.

Our DJs will provide an eclectic mix of dance music, starting with a half hour warm-up and followed by a one-hour dance party in the sunshine. Come join us for some good ol' fashioned dancing on the playa! Wiggle on!

Inspired by Ecstatic Dance, The Wiggle Room is a safe, non-verbal space to dance any way you like so long as you wear your heart on your sleeve. Our DJs will provide an eclectic mix of dance music, starting with a half hour warm-up and followed by a one-hour dance party in the sunshine. Come join us for some good ol' fashioned dancing on the playa! Wiggle on!
