We provide all materials and instruction whenever you need/want it. We also love to give out tips about how to twirl those tassels. This workshop always attracts a good crowd so please leave enough time so you don't rush your Dark Sparkle!

24113.name: Burlesque Extravaganza
24113.description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what pushes people to the point of insanity; that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. It is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that citizens of BRC embrace. Our shows are an opportunity for Dark Sparklers and other BRC citizens to explore and showcase their Dark Sparkle through performance, storytelling, and tease. Featuring your favorite DS performers as well as guests from the BRC community. We'll also turn the tables with ample opportunity for participation.

24114.name: Trumpism Knocks us Back with Corey Doctorow
24114.description:
Tech steps forward, Trumpism knocks us back: how can we tell if
we're winning?

Is Net Neutrality on the up or down? Is DRM rising or falling? Is crypto
being banned, or will it win, and if it does, will its major application
be ransomware or revolution? Is the arc of history bending toward
justice, or snapping abruptly and plummeting toward barbarism?

It's complicated.

24115.name: Jockstrap Twister - Blacklight edition
24115.description: Come on by in your sexiest jockstrap and play twister! But, there's a catch - it's blacklight twister! The brighter your jockstrap, the better! Come on out and get twisted with other sexy men, or ladies.

24116.name: Titty Twister - Blacklight edition
24116.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
24116.description: Come on over and get your tits twisted, or pinched. Here's the catch, you have to pinch someone else's nipples too, at the same time! Do that without falling, last person standing wins! And, yes its blacklight.

24117.name: Naked Twister
24117.description:
In celebration of Critical Dicks and Tits, we welcome all that are already naked
 ( unless you want to get naked ) to come get twisted up! As you ride or walk on by, stop in and say hey, plant them hands and feet on the board and play.

24119.name: Lightsaber Battle!
24119.description: Come out and protect our beautiful galaxy, Black Rock City, and show us your Schwartz! Bring your lightsaber!! And, prepare for battle.

24120.name: Glittercamp's Shimmery Bodypaint Disco Dance Party
24120.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
24120.description: Join us for a Black Rock tradition of lovey dance tunes and warm welcoming vibes, sharing the finest bodypaints on the playa. Glittercamp will cover your body in sexy, shimmery psychedelic magic.  Get naked and shiny as nature intended in the afternoons Monday through Friday from 1-6pm on the 3:00 circle.

24121.name: Are you searching for inner peace?
24121.description:
Are you searching for inner peace?

If so, come visit the Department of Peace World Headquarters. We believe peace is a principle that can be learned through direct interaction and creative thinking.

We are mystics, creative problem solvers, ingenious puzzlers and well-oriented conversationalists on a pilgrimage to promote the 10 principles of Burning Man.
 
Our camp promotes radical inclusion through welcoming anyone and everyone who wishes to find peace including all race and gender identifications; encourages gifting by giving peace tokens to our visitors as a reminder to pass along their own peace to other BRC residents; honors decommodification by understanding that peace is not found through objects, but through human to human connections; teaches radical self-reliance by sharing tools and strategies to become your own SOURCE; celebrates radical self-expression because everyone should feel free to find their own path; commits to communal effort by understanding that our camp cannot function without the support of ourselves, the participation of our visitors, and having a home in BRC; observes civic responsibility through being a grounding source of peaceful energy for our neighbors and beyond; respects leaving no trace because we want BRC to exist long into the future and we also recognize humans greater impact on the world; practices participation each and every day we’re on the playa through offering our peace services to the residents of BRC; thrives on immediacy by facilitating a safe space for vulnerability between ourselves and our visitors.

24122.name: Wobble Wednesday
24122.description: Daytime Dance Party with a world class lineup. Come Wobble away your Wednesday under the shade with any ICE COLD drink! Featuring bass heavier vibes and a shaded lounge area.

24123.name: Thumpin' Thursdays
24123.description: Daytime Dance Party featuring a world class lineup. Come Thump away your Thursday with Apollo One while we serve drinks under the shade! Bass heavier vibes and some cool drinks will keep you dancing all day long.

24124.name: OUR RITUAL )?( Music Born Of The Desert )?(
24124.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 p.m. – 7 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 7 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 p.m. – 7 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 7 p.m. – 7 a.m.
24124.description:
As we begin this years journey into music born from the playa, we start the ritual. Gather with us to create our week long ritual. Together we will bring forth the sounds deep within the desert that will force our bodies to move. We will channel creativity to unseen heights so that we may adorn the dust with its shared vision. Be prepared for something different as we take you on a week long experience into the future of ancient vibrations. Let your questions be your guide. 

)?( Always Question Everything )?(

24125.name: Downward Wolf Yoga
24125.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:15 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:15 a.m.
24125.description: Yoga for all of those who are able to drag their tired, sweaty, dusty, sunburned bodies to our dome. Expect breath, guided visual mediation, some yang asanas matched with some yin restoration, and most likely some sweaty burner-balls in your face. So don't miss out!

24127.name: Cannabis Scientific Renaissance
24127.description: After half a century of research restrictions, we are seeing a cannabis scientific renaissance around the world. Dr. Jeff Chen MD/MBA, Director of the UCLA Cannabinoid Affinity Group, will take us on a journey through the 10,000+ year history of human cannabis use.  He will then show us the intriguing inter-workings of the human endocannabinoid system, our body's system of natural "cannabis-like" molecules.  He will fascinate us with the latest research and science on the health effects of this unique plant.  And he will end with a vision for how cannabis users can help accelerate cannabis research by becoming citizen scientists and donating their data to researchers.

24128.name: DragonCampArmory- Bikini Armor Workshop
24128.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
24128.description:
Learn traditional metal shaping skills to make an amazing custom fitted aluminum bikini.  (Think Game of Thrones or amazon women).  Decorate with our baubles and bangles for an amazing costume. or feel free to bring your own broken or worn bits of jewelry or other decorations.  
This is an empowering activity primarily for women, but male partners welcome to provide encouragement. Patterns are provided in various sizes and you will cut and hand-hammer a thin piece of aluminum into a precise shapes to fit your curves.  Decorate by gluing trinkets and jewelry onto the armor, then secure in place with leather thong strips. 
A costume takes 2-3 hours to complete a top and bottom so please allow time.  A typical costume like this costs $$$, but this is yours to keep, wear, and be admired on the Playa! All sizes welcome.

When finished be sure to take a Photo-op on our Dungeon set with the Big Green animatronic Dragon!

24129.name: Magician's Show
24129.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8:30 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8:30 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8:30 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8:30 p.m. – 9 p.m.
24129.description: Magical mischievous shenanigans with a hint of ritual.. Just your typical evening of sorcery - complete with levitations, transformations, appearances, mind reading and more. It will leave you rubbing your eyes and asking "Am I really seeing this or do I need to cut down on the hallucinogens..?

All materials and a moop bag for broken balloons will be provided.

Wednesday from 2:00 to 4:00

at Post Nuclear Family

Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.

24137.description: Stop by the self-service armpit smelling booth to have your pheromones evaluated by our scent sommeliers, or perhaps appraise a stranger!

24138.name: Ashtanga Yoga and Discussion
24138.description: Join us for an intro to Ashtanga Yoga and a round table discussion about the relationship between culturally-rooted movement and cultural appropriation versus appreciation. We will discuss the use of Yogic terms and philosophy and the relationship between the East and the West in terms of body-relationships and movement practices

24139.name: Capoeira Workshop & Roda & Discussion
24139.description: Join us for an intro to Capoeira class and a round table discussion about the relationship between culturally-rooted movement and cultural appropriation versus appreciation. We will discuss what it is like to be an insider/outsider in a world of a movement style with a complex history of liberation ideology.

24140.name: See yourself Wide Open!

24140.description:
We believe Burning Man is a transformative experience. Let's see how this week will affect you, physically and mentally, through our before/after portrait sessions.
And while you're here show us how wide opened you're are by taking your chance at our Radical Ritual Wheel of Fortune!!

24147.description: Come learn about why bees are in peril. Discover what you can do to help. Get free seeds and cross pollinate some friendships!

24148.description: One time only!  Swing in and stretch out.  A great mid-week kitty treat.  You will feel purr-fect.

24149.name: NIPPLE GANG RIOT
24149.description: Nipple Gang Riot!! Shots, Titty Art & so much more. Free your nipples, get your ass over & let's all get TIT FACED!

24151.name: How to install an E-Bike Kit
24151.description: This class will show you how to turn your bike into an E-bike.

24152.name: Singing for ScaredyCats
24152.description: A workshop to help you reclaim your singing voice. Four part harmony guaranteed!

24153.description:
For the closing of this years week long ritual, we channel everything we can to bring the experience to a peak point of celebration & elation. And after we have reached that point, we will release it back to return to the beginning. The process has completed & the balance is reset. We are now prepared to start along our journey again. Fresh & renewed. Overflowing with inspiration & momentum. We have bathed in the creative sound waves. The ritual has worked once again. 
 
~ Let your questions be your guide )?( Always Question Everything )?(

24154.name: Food from Wes Anderson movies
24154.description: Watch some Wes Anderson while eating food items featured in his movies.  First come first served.

24156.name: Playa to painting
24156.description: Using playa dust to create either gesso to prime canvass and to create special oil paints.

24157.name: Clusterflock
24157.description:
The Clusterflock Bar
Join The Camp With No Name for their annual migration flamingo I don't give a Flock Party on Thursday.
Get ready to party in pink in your preening best flamingo dress, with delicious pink beverages, flamingo croquet and a flocking good soundtrack.
Come join us and Pink your Flamingo! Get flocked!

24158.name: Palanque Norte Speaker Series
24158.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 9 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 9 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 9 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 9 p.m.
24158.description:
The Palenque Norte journey began with the legendary Entheobotany Conferences held at the Chan Kah hotel near the ancient Mayan ruins just outside of Palenque, Mexico. There, Terence McKenna, Jonathan Ott, Ann & Sasha Shulgin, and a host of other psychedelic luminaries passed along many insights, discoveries, and wild tales to the fortunate Tribe members who were there. And it was at the end of the pool where Terence McKenna gave some of his last talks at the Chan Kah.

Years later, then in 2003, a few alumni from those conferences decided to have a "Palenque reunion" at the Burning Man Festival, and so they organized a lecture series to continue the Palenque tradition.

24159.name: People of Technicolor
24159.description: Join an open discussion on intentional inclusion of people of color in psychedelic communities and cultures.

24160.name: Tech Ethics as Psychedelic Parenting
24160.description:
As above, so below: maps of the Internet look like maps of the inter-species symbiosis in a forest, which look like maps of the functional connections in an LSD-inspired brain. And evidence is stacking up that psychoactive plants have played a major role in the development of language, art, and culture – not just for human beings, but across the biosphere.  

And as within, so without: the dragons on the edge of our maps are turning into Pokémon in AR gaming; our science fiction narratives of de-extincted dinosaurs are looking likelier each day with radical advances in genetic engineering.  

Thanks to the psychedelic ("mind manifesting") power of our Promethean technologies, our dreams and fears have never been so fast to manifest as they are now.  It is time for us to take a long, hard look at what might be, if ANYTHING is possible. 

What did the psychedelic revolution of the 1960s teach us about how to handle the immense and terrifying pace of change these days?  Tim Leary said PCs would be the next LSD – and, in fact, it was their visionary journeys that they thank for inspiration, almost all the masterminds of the computing revolution.  So maybe there is something to the notion that the insights from psychedelic psychotherapy and of indigenous plant medicine traditions are just what the doctor ordered to help navigate this age's waves of great accelerating transformations.  

Join paleontologist-futurist Michael Garfield on a whirlwind tour through an age "indistinguishable from magic" – and a lighthearted but deadly serious examination of the responsibility of bringing new life forms and minds into this world as parents in our psychedelic century.

Watch Michael's lightning presentation of this talk at the Commonwealth Bank of Australia Innovation Lab:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pfjnWkDwYrc
View the slideshow for this talk:
https://www.patreon.com/posts/tech-ethics-as-7956513

24161.name: Rational Ritual and Pragmatic Mysticism with Sarah
24161.description:
Join Sarah McManus on discussing robust and resilient systems to help us navigate the challenges that face humanity, in ways that steer between the rocky shoals of nihilistic meaninglessness and the treacherous whirlpools of self-delusion.


In 2016, Sarah McManus was hired to be a research director at an ayahuasca center in Peru... and then fired for being too rational. She has a BA in Ecology from New College of Florida, a school that explicitly values ecstatic wonder. She was in a PhD program for Integrative Conservation, but left after realizing that humanity’s socioecological crises won't be solved by data alone: we need better tools for looking at hard problems with self-compassion, and for communicating and coordinating to co-create solutions. She writes about these topics, as well as psychedelic integration, at pricklesandgoo.com. 

 
These places where reason and spirituality come into conflict can provide fertile ground for cultivating new ways of understanding and relating. If we can turn towards the tensions that arise when our existing belief structures are not able to meet our needs, we can find opportunities to help those frameworks grow and expand. I want to make spaces where we can allow our sense of the sacred to encompass the deep and beautiful metaphors that science has discovered, and where we can allow our need for analytical understanding to take in the complexity and uncertainty of the world in all its rich variety.

24163.name: TuTu Tequila Tuesday
24163.description: Put on your best tutu and join us at the Dusty Goat camp to get sauced up on some delicious varieties of our favorite Mexican import, Tequila!  We will be featuring multiple different Reposado and Anejo Tequilas.  Drink em straight, or try one of our special Goat Margaritas!

24164.name: C.U.N.T.D.
24164.description: Tired of jug drinks?  Are you looking for something a little more special?  Then you need to join us for C.U.N.T.D, Cocktails U Need To Drink!  This will be our 2nd year creating a dazzling array of hand crafted cocktails for you to try.  Last years menu included a Rhubarb Rye Old Fashioned, a White Negroni, and a Habanero Margarita among others.  Our resident DJ's will delight your eardrums while our pro bartenders tickle your tastebuds.

24165.name: Make Mead @ Home
24165.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
24165.description:
See how easy it is to make this delicious ancient beverage at home!  Ever thought about home brewing?  Been making beer but want to expand your repertoire?  Come the the Waggle Lounge Meadery and see how it's done.  We'll set up a 1 gal batch of a Show Mead or Melomel (fruit-flavored mead) from start to finish.  Well, "finish" except for waiting for the yeast do their thing.  You'll be able to taste finished product in our Lounge.

The demonstration includes sterile technique, all the equipment you'll need (from super-simple to more OCD-oriented brewing), ingredients and steps.  You'll walk away with written instructions including links to resources, recipes and more.

As a bonus we'll raffle off a complete kit!

24167.name: Drunk Puppets Eat Pickles

Burners of all ages & abilities.

It is staffed by us every day to help and assist the mutation and beautification of bicycles and other modes of personal human-powered transport. We also supply simple lighting for bikes in the interest of nighttime safety. Great for Kids!

24192.name: Slappy Hour
24192.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 5 p.m. – 6 p.m.

24192.description: Do you enjoy a little pain with your pleasure? A little spice with your sugar? Well come on down to the Freestyle Palace Slappy Hour for our one-of-a-kind, world famous Slapshots! Each slapshot will be carefully crafted by our expert slap technicians. Choose your slap from our wonderful menu of options and prepare for an experience like no other!

24193.name: Burner Crawl
24193.description: We cordially invite you to the 59th annual Burner Crawl. We will be hitting all the hottest bars in the area ending at the Pussy Liquor Lounge at the Freestyle Palace for some cold libations and sweet sounds. We will meet at the Circus Tent promptly at  3:30pm Crawl departs at 4.

24194.name: Freestyle Palace Music Spectacular
24194.description: Dust off your dancing shoes and prepare to get the FUNK down Thursday night at Freestyle Palace! Enjoy a refreshing cocktail from our bar as you cut a rug on the dance floor. Music kicks off at 7pm and will conclude with an unmissable headline extravaganza by the world famous Black Rock City All-stars! All are welcome! 21+ to drink.

24195.name: The UnAwk Walk
24195.description: Awkward on the dance floor? Too shy to shake it? The UnAwk Walk dance class teaches VERY basic moves (dance floor camouflage). It also heals fear of group dancing so you can join any dance party with unfettered joy (dance floor shine). Wear a mask or costume for extra mental comfort.

24196.name: LCW Happy Hour
24196.description: Come by our kissing booth for a Li’l Crack Whore mug full of delicious microbrew or special cocktail served by the playa’s most notorious Whores! We’ll keep pouring and whoring until supplies run out!

24197.name: Playa Attaya
24197.description: Give your senses a jolt. Join Lightning Toe under the circus tent for a shot of Attaya, green tea made in the traditional Senegalese way, and music from the far corners of the earth.

24198.name: Air Guitar Competition!
24198.description:
Come join in the spandex, the rock-n-roll, and the greatest thing you've never done before! Open to all levels of air guitarists! You will compete in 2 rounds of 60 second performances, where technical merit, stage presence, and "airness" earn you points with a panel of judges who will be selecting the winners. We can provide music for you, or bring your own!

Even if you don't want to get on stage, come watch our amazing contestants, including special appearances by world famous air guitarists Cold Steel Renegade (recent qualifier for the US Air Guitar Nationals) and Seth Leibowitz.

24199.name: Get Your Connection On
24199.description: Marriage/Family Therapist leads connection activity to give couples better insight on their relationship.

24200.name: Morning Face Painting
24200.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:30 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:30 a.m.
24200.description: Stop by and get your face painted before all the adventures of a new day on Playa.

24201.name: Harmonic Sound
24201.description:
PASSWORD FOR URL: fundamental.

Tierra Bomba teams up with with the Mayan Warrior to host a massive sound meditation with Alexandre Tannous (soundmeditation.com), aiming to inspire the Burning Man community around the spiritual aspect of meditation and the mystical aspect of sound.
Throughout the experience, Alexandre will play a series of ancient and new instruments and recordings that positively affect the spiritual growth of all living beings, while Paolo Montiel (NERD Studio) will play an innovative light show inspired by the golden spiral and the sacred geometry.
The sound meditation music will then slowly blend into a DJ that will drive attendees into a night filled with magical sounds and lights.

The sound meditation is an integrated practice that combines a shamanic ceremonial setting with an Eastern emphasis on breathing exercises and visualization. Specific musical instruments played during the meditation allow participants to use sound as a therapeutic tool to disconnect from discursive thinking and delve into a transcendental state. The goal is to enable participants to disengage their undesirable habitual patterns and to empower positive cognitive change. Most of the instruments used in a Sound Meditation are overtone-emitting instruments such as gongs, Tibetan singing bowls, bells, metallic discs, etc. These instruments have been used in meditation and sound healing for centuries in many cultures and continue to be used.
Alexandre has conducted ethnomusicology fieldwork for 18 years in over 40 countries. His research investigates issues of acculturation, community, musical identity in an urban setting, and the concepts of talent, charisma, and leadership in music.

24202.name: FRESH FROZEN SMOOTHIES/FILTHY BEATS

Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.

Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.

FRUIT!ICE!MIX! B&4:45
Oranges and Bananas! Frozen Berries!
Come party in our Freezer Truck!
CAMP JUICY invites you for Vitamin C and afternoon beats.

24204.description: Come find us in our Mutant Vehicle at the trash fence for an impromptu dance party.  Cold beer will be served and plenty of loud music to dance to.

24205.name: Mercury Touchstone Launch Party
24205.description: Come launch our 12-foot tall, 6000 LED covered rocket! Enjoy laser stars, UV lights and dancing with our camp resident DJS. Power your rocket boosters with Moontang shots. Show your full moon for an official Badass Ass Stamp. Plus UV body painting!

24206.name: Escape Velocity - Black Light Party
24206.description: Leave the gravity of earth behind! Power your rocket boosters with Moontang shots. Get an official Badass Ass Stamp. Plus UV body painting!

24207.name: Dino Hunt
24207.description: Want to hunt dinosaurs but can't afford the deuterium needed for time travel? Want no more! Join us in the zaniest dino safari on the playa as we radically include denizens from the Cretaceous era via the magic (science) of our quantum gate.

24208.name: Tatt Vibes
24208.description: Get your vibrational playa tattoo. It's a vibe you don't want to miss!!!! ❤️❤️

24209.name: Bicycle Jousting
24209.description: Relive the dark ages by competing in a playa-fied jousting tournament. Champions receive mead and the plague.

24210.name: Butoh Ritual Dance
24210.description: Dynamism Dance Theatre presents a ceremonial dance practice honoring the ancestors and those who have passed away.  Its a movement meditation practice, a living altar offering, which examines the question of existentialism: what do we live for? Presented for the 4th consecutive year at the SW corner of the Temple, at dusk, one hour before sunset.

24211.name: 50's Day
24211.description: Experience the 1950's through the miracle (science) of time travel, as we open a space-time party portal to somewhere in the late 1950's.

24212.name: Rotary International international meeting
24212.description: Burning Rotarians!  Get yer weekly meeting in while doing the burning thing.  Come to Cameltopia and meet fellow Rotoburners from around the globe.  Bring with you your fave story of how Burning Man and Rotary have intersected in your life.  Take back a unique make-up meeting story!

24213.name: Milestone Party
24213.description: A celebration of celebrations. This is a party for each attendee to celebration something in their life by dancing and crafting ones own medallion. DJ'ed by N2N & Benjamin Gleitzman

24214.name: Camp Biergarten - Beer Tasting
24214.description:
Yes. We will do it again! Longer, louder and more ice cold german and international beer than the years before. 
Camp location 6&K on Wednesday at Burning Man 2017. You're welcome to show up!

24215.name: THRIFTY PONY
24215.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 4 p.m.
24215.description: Tired of old dusty threads? Sparklepony outfits loosing their luster? Only pack military gear & feel out of place on the Playa? Full makeovers welcome‬!

24217.name: Mistress Jade's Spanking 101
24217.description:
After many requests for lessons and tips, Mistress Jade will be debuting Spanking 101, a class for first-timers, curious lovers, and fetishists who want to embrace their love of BDSM. Learn the basics of spanking, paddling, flogging, and whipping. During the class, participants will study how to gently bind, blindfold, gag, and/or prepare their partner for a round of loving smacks, whips, and spanks. Engage in sensual play designed to express love through pain and power tactics. Understand the difference between doms and subs and discover your true nature in the realm of BDSM. Mistress Jade will personally guide each couple in how to manipulate, treat, and care for their bodies and how to avoid hurt and confusion during play. Materials will be provided, but feel free to bring your own love instruments to class. 

Mistress Jade runs a tight ship. There is a strict hassle-free class rule: no threatening, close-minded, or rude participants will be allowed to stay. Check all your expectations and predispositions at the door. All students can expect a safe, supportive, and encouraging atmosphere. But beware, you WILL give and receive some loving pain, and you will always thank your hostess and your partners when doing so. Now don't be late! There will be a price to pay...that only your sweet bottom can afford!

24218.name: Bacon Party
24218.description: Positively presidential bacon bonanza. Be a pig, eat a pig. We will be cooking up maple soaked bacon, bacon wrapped pickles and more bacon goodness.

24219.name: Essential Oil Lubing
24219.description: Come get lubed with essential oils to relax, stimulant and energize you.

24220.name: Robot Hour
24220.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
24220.description: Stop by our Zen Cube where Robots and Burners are invited to check-in each day as we share OS upgrades and show you how to maintain your mechanical structure to refuel and recharge your mind, body, and heart! Embrace Huey, our HugBot ambassador, going into what is called a cuddle puddle - we have learned that this directs electricity to the heart. Like the markings of our abode and circuitry, we want to share with you the beauty of our patterns through body paint so that you may reflect the beauty of being biologic robot. We understand running on high energy most days can get our systems overheated. With essential oils, we will teach you how to cool your system, while using this technique to blend into the current human population with natural smell. Lube up your connective joints and re-energize your circuitry through inhaling oxygen and extending your hydraulics through breathing, meditation, and poses drawn from an ancient human practice called Yoga. Refuel and keep your batteries fully charged by making a long pit stop at this refueling center.

24221.name: Tea Soul Trap
24221.description: Come drink tea with Alice and her friends in Wonderland, eat dim sum, and listen to soul and trap music before we venture out to the Playa for sunset with our resident art car and hand pan guru. Kimonos encouraged!!

24222.name: Bal guinguette
24222.description: Re-live the Paris of the 1900's. French Cancan, wine, and the music to go with it. Proudly bring the berets, suspenders and old dresses you keep in your closets most of the year and show that you look amazing in them !

24224.name: Open dungeon play
24224.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 2 a.m.
24224.description: Playfully Yours is a play space for you to learn and experience sensation play in our well equipped dungeon. We encourage beginners, intermediates, and those curious about BDSM play to come, learn, and experience in a safe, non-pressured, and supervised environment. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we focus on the lighter, softer, more sensual side of BDSM. Our personnel are available to provide instructions and demonstrations on the safe use of the equipment and will supervise or help facilitate play. We'll also have an outdoor dungeon play area with a double St Andrew Cross, spanking bench, and stock.

24225.name: An Introduction Into BDSM Play
24225.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
24225.description: This class will discuss the safety, trust, and communications aspect of BDSM play. We will provide an introduction to many of the equipment and toys normally associated with a dungeon such as floggers, paddles, feathers, crops, pinwheels, and a violet wand. The focus will be on the softer, more sensual side of dungeon play. There will be demonstrations and some audience participation. The play area will be open after the class to play and try out some of the things you learned in class.

24226.name: Filament's Fat Fucking Tuesday - Sunset Till . . .
24226.description: Help Fulfill Filament! Come get your face* fucked full of fun filaments, floats, fizzies,  and fantastic beats. *BYOFace

24227.name: Fly Ranch Participatory Summit
24227.description: Join members of the Fly Ranch team and share thoughts on how you envision its unfolding in the future.

24228.name: Grateful Dyed
24228.description: Bring your natural fibre to VW Bus Camp and enjoy a moop free tie dye workshop.  Do art, and take a fun memory home.  We have all the supplies including washing soap and baggie with instructions to keep your project clean and damp until you get home to wash it out.  The Grateful Dead music will keep us rocking and you can enjoy libations at the Leopard Lounge before during and after.  This is the 10th Grateful Dyed.

24229.name: Migration is Beautiful: Wing Making Workshop
24229.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
24229.description: Paint your own wearable monarch butterfly wings and learn about human migration and racial equity. This workshop is great for kids and families!

24230.name: A Kickback for Multiracial Burners
24230.description: Our society often frames the conversation of race as Black or White, Asian or Middle Eastern, or Native or Latinx. How do we then, find safe and intellectual spaces to discuss multiracial individuals; those who exist across many racial boundaries, and those who are often left out of social discussions of race? Que Viva would like to host a celebratory event for all multiracial burners, who understand the challenges of living in a racially polarized society. This will be a chill, and celebratory meet and greet.

24231.name: Do Black Lives Really Matter?
24231.description: Many say yes! Doubters say no. Come sit and interact and question what this controversial phrase means for Black Burners. Poke. Prod. We won’t judge. We’ll give you cold beer and kick you into the default world more woke.

24232.name: Selena & Sangría Dance Party
24232.description: Get ready to Bidi Bidi Bom Bom your dusty heart out to the beat of Selena’s (Quintanilla, not Gomez!) greatest hits. We’ll be serving up sangría to tickle your thirst and get you doing the washing machine across the playa.

24233.name: Being an Effective White Ally
24233.description: We are living in a world of magnified racism, and many of us see the evils around us, but have no idea how to constructively engage with the good fight. Our event will help White burners, who are interested in learning new methods of combating racism, attain crucial tools to fight for racial justice.

24234.name: Breakfast Sandwiches at the Sunrise Diner
24234.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – noon
24234.description: Feeling hungover (or still drunk)? Wake up right at the sunrise diner - enjoy a hot (sausage) egg & cheese sandwich in our retro diner, and enjoy our fresh Seattle-roasted coffee. Vegetarian and gluten-free sandwiches available.

24235.name: Learn To Juggle Like a Beginner
24235.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
