You will leave knowing the basics and how to continue to practice and improve your juggling after Burningman is over. Stop by at noonish every day for class or any other time and ask if the juggling instructor is in.

24236.name: Boob Tube Kaleidoscope Photos
24236.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
Monday, September 4th, 2017 9 a.m. – 7 p.m.
24236.description: Come and have a photo of your boobs taken in our giant Boob Tube Kaleidoscope. Or take your own photo. You can turn your own boobs into a photo with too many boobs to even count. Our wide angle lens turns the image into a spherical "planet of boobs". You'll be able to download a digital copy of your image after Burningman. This event is all day every day.

24237.name: Viking Mead Party
24237.description: Join us for a Viking Mead Party. Wear your best Viking outfit and join us for some Mead served in traditional type cone shaped glasses. Find out why Vikings used cone shaped glasses to serve Mead. And while you're here, participate in some of our interactive activities and challenges.

24238.name: Tarot by Jewel
24238.description: Deepen your understanding of life's journey through a Tarot reading by Jewel. Explore your past, present, and future through the ancient wisdom of Tarot.

24239.name: Write a Collaborative Poem!
24239.description: Come join us for a creative collaboration to compose a group poem. See how our interconnections play out in the creative process!

24240.name: Viking Meet and Greet Potluck
24240.description: Join us for our annual Valhalla on the Playa meet and greet potluck. It's early in the week and your camp is all assembled and it's time to take a break and meet some people and eat. Bring some food to share with you so we don't run out of food. Bring some of your best food. Don't bring crummy food or leftovers. Wear Viking clothing if you have it. Participants will be required to wear nametags.

24241.name: Shuffleboard Tournament
24241.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, September 4th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
24241.description: Come by day or night and partake in our Shuffleboard game zone opened 24/7.  Lot's of shade and lounge space to relax during the day..also well lit for evening shenanigans too! We can't wait to meet cha.

24242.name: Bloody Mary & Quesadilla Bar
24242.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 6 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 6 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 noon – 6 p.m.
24242.description: The Blissfits (Retirement) Village, camp frontage, offers up a mighty fine daytime Bloody Mary & Quesadilla Bar. We'll wet your whistle and take great care of you along your journey! Don’t forget your ID & cup!

24244.name: Releasing Toxic Energy Through Forgiveness
24244.description: Self-love, healing, & forgiveness - shared in a space of exploration. We'll redefine what forgiveness is and create some major energy shifts together.

24245.name: Get out of bed on the Right Foot
24245.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
24245.description:
Come lay down in one of our hammocks were we will simulate the incredibly annoying sound of an alarm going off. 

You’ll have your choice of morning rituals:

1) A cup of black coffee to get those bowels-a-movin (BYO ashtray if you want to smoke a cigarette and really get “things" going)

2) Cucumber slices to relieve the puffiness of staying up all night, rosewater spray to refresh your face and nasal cavities and facial wipes to clean off the dust and mistakes of the previous evening

3) A playa themed stretching and yoga routine to ensure you are limber enough for whatever the day ahead has in store

Alternatively, a giant snooze button will be provided so you can continue enjoying their slumber in one of our hammocks.

24246.name: Kentucky Fried Breakfast - Bourbon and Bologna
24246.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11 a.m.
24246.description: Most famous hot breakfast on the playa, custom smoked fried bologna sandwich and a shot of real Kentucky bourbon served by gingham clad Kentuckians.

24247.name: Kentucky Fried Brunch - Saturday Bourbon & Bologna
24247.description: Most famous hot breakfast on the playa, at brunchtime! A custom smoked fried bologna sandwich and a shot of real Kentucky bourbon served by gingham clad Kentuckians but at a more casual hour of when we wake up.

24248.name: DADA Sound Poetry
24248.description:
Sound Poetry
-1-3pm Tuesday August 30
Come to the DADA3 cabaret to share your original sound poem (wordless poem), or recite Hugh Ball's famous "Karawane" (we'll help you out if you don't have it memorized). Stop by and say Hi!  We're waiting for you in the lounge.

24249.name: Bike Ride to the Rapture!
24249.description:
Bike Ride to the Rapture! 
-6:39pm Wednesday August 29. 
-Congregate at the 9 o'clock plaza.
-Don't get left behind! The Rapture is coming to the Playa. Only the most faithful will be lifted by His glory. Follow the Purple Priest as he guides you on a pedal-powered journey to spiritual salvation.

24250.name: Punk/Ska Power Hour
24250.description: Tired of Techno? Had it with Hip Hop? Dreading more Dubstep? Come recharge and feel some Punk/Ska power! Enter the skankathon to win a prize!

24251.name: The Whoreshoe Derby - a dusty race in slutty heels
24251.description:
One punishing lap of the 3:00 Plaza in the tallest and sluttiest heels. Prizes for the winners. Greyhound cocktails for participants. Bring your derby hat and julep cup to cheer on the fillies. You can bring your own heels but they have to pass inspection and be taller and less stable than ours. The race is over in a flash so be there on time, especially if you want to race as there is often a back up at the pre-race doping station.
We will retire after to My Old Kentucky Dome for bourbon and Kentucky Fried Cockfights. Join us.

24252.name: Exquisite Corpse Drawing
24252.description:
Exquisite Corpse 
- 1-3pm Thursday, August 30
Come to the DADA3 for a round of Exquisite Corpse. Mingle with new friends, make some weird art, hang out for a bit.

24253.name: Kentucky Fried Cockfights
24253.description:
Two puffy gingham cocks enter, only one leaves. You figure out the rest. 
Immediately after the 5th Annual Running of the Whoreshoe Derby in My Old Kentucky Dome.

24254.name: Kentucky Fried Cotillion
24254.description: A grand illuminated Electroswing ball in the dust. Get yourself a hoopskirt and light it up! They are super easy to find on line and come packed in a tiny flat package. Pro tip: do not open to decorate until you get on Playa. Make a slip cover with the decor or sew/staple/ziptie in the dust. Or just put whatever you want on and come revel in the lovely spectacle and dance.

24255.name: PLAYA 54: 1st Ever DISCO DANCE @ Greeters Station!
24255.description: PLAYA 54's DJ 6 spins DISCO at Greeters!! We'll be Dancing & Singing & Greeting to the Music, and just when it hits you...Yeah, You'll wanna be there!!

24256.name: Gourd Lanterns
24256.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
24256.description: Come make a gourd lantern! We supply everything that you need including the gourds. You get to take home your completed lantern.

24257.name: PLAYA 54: 6th Annual BLOODY 80's Party
24257.description: BLOODY Mary's and 80's Music...Yeah, you'll wanna be there!

24258.name: Nickelback Pickleback Happy Hour
24258.description: We've been wrong. We've been down, into the bottom of every bottle... and we want you to join us!!! Come tickle your emo pickle with some Nickelback classics and tasty picklebacks. We will have some other fun surprises in store for you, so come on down! The Scar Bar can't wait for all the new emotional scars this happy hour will bring!!! (Nu Metal attire is encouraged)

24259.name: Eye Spa Treatment
24259.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11:30 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11:30 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11:30 a.m. – 3 p.m.
24259.description: Sore eyes?! For the 13th year on the playa, let DP soothe you with cool drops and cucumbers, followed by lavender eye pillows and light touch.

24260.name: Soul(ar) Sun Salutation and Sound Meditation
24260.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
24260.description: Come greet the Sun with energizing vinyasa flow and a crystal singing bowl meditation. We'll have your chakras blasting through temple burn. BYOM.

24261.name: Top Hats & TuTus Happy Hour
24261.description: Come boogie with Soul(ar) Society Resident DJs and Special Guest DJs (TBA). Wear your Top Hats & TuTus and prepare to get a little silly. Refresh yourself with a Disco Lemonade at our camp bar and recharge your batteries and devices using our solar powered charging stations.

24262.name: Wig Out Wednesday
24262.description: Wig Out with Soul(ar) Society as we prefunk for White Wednesday shenanigans. Wear a wig or snag one of our extras and boogie with Soul(ar) Society DJs and a few special guest DJs. Refresh yourself with a Disco Lemonade at our camp bar and recharge your batteries and devices at our solar charging station.

24263.name: Austin Powers Schwagalicious Cocktail Party
24263.description: Join us for an Austin Powers Schwagalicious cocktail party and get schwagged (bring some of yours or get some of ours-it's all good baby!) Fembots and gogo girls will preside!

24264.name: Life's A Beach Happy Hour
24264.description: Vamos a la playa con Soul(ar) Society! Join us for a beach themed happy hour with music provided by our resident DJs and a few special guest DJs. Wear your favorite beach attire. Don't forget your water wings and life vest! We'll be slanging cold Disco Lemonade from our camp bar. Recharge your batteries and devices at our solar charging station.

24265.name: Black Light Painting
24265.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
24265.description: Help us paint our 25 ft wide and 8 ft high wind mobile. We provide the Black Light paint and paint brushes for your creative masterpiece.

24266.name: Soul(ar) Recharge Happy Hour
24266.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 3 p.m. – 6 p.m.
24266.description: Cold drinks and crunchy beats! Come refuel and recharge at Soul(ar) Society's Camp Bar. Sip some refreshing Disco Lemonade and recharge your batteries at our solar charging station.

24268.name: Chips And Salsa and Salsa Social
24268.description: We’ll be hosting a salsa music afternoon to get your groove on.  Chips and Salsa and Salsa music provided you bring the moves.   If you are rusty checkout our salsa workshops.

24269.name: Naked Pub Crawl
24269.description: Since 2004, hundreds of burners meet at the Man and pedal off into the City for a few hours of bar hopping and good cheer! Multiple host camps will have bartenders standing by with refreshing libations prepared exclusively for the riders. Among this year’s host camps are traditional favorites like Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Cubhouse, and Celestial Bodies, along with several new hosts. The ride culminates with the afterparty hosted by the wonderful folks at Comfort & Joy. If you’re willing to meet the (un)dress code, join us for one of the goofiest parties on the Playa. No statement or political agenda; just riding our bikes, drinking some cocktails, and making new friends. Oh yeah, and we’re naked. Mugs for the first 500 riders (and yeah, we always run out). Cheers!

24270.name: Best Martini's on Playa!
24270.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1 p.m. – 5 p.m.
24270.description: Join us at Mo's for an ice cold martini in a shady, comfy, and properly dusted space. Explore true stories of erotica written by burners over the past 17 years in our 300 year old book! Look for the giant martini sign in the sky! We also have a night shift starting at 10ish...

24271.name: Best Martinis on playa!
24271.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:45 p.m.
24271.description: Join us at Mo's for an ice cold martini in a shady, comfy, and properly dusted space. Explore true stories of erotica written by burners over the past 17 years in our 300 year old book! Look for the giant martini sign in the sky! WE start loosely at 9pm and go till the am...

24272.name: Lycra/Spandex Singlet Minglet Cock/Tail Hour
24272.description: Come for a brief mingle clad in your finest Lycra/Spandex attire! Jazzercise, Lucha, WWE, singlets encouraged. Dress tight to feel right!

24273.name: ScintillatingFireCircusDragonflyMating Performance
24273.description: Prepare to be scintillated as SFC performs feats of circusy acrobatic mythical ritualistic unique-prop narrated storytelling fire & music & interacts with our audience!... Come join the videotaped story of The Dragonfly Mating Ritual!

24274.name: Heart Awakening Mediation
24274.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
24274.description: Kia Shanti Bower and Tim Rustow are offering Heart Awakening. Come experience the language, songs, and opening of the heart as together we expand consciousness and experience Oneness. Enjoy this unique experience in our misting domes as you cool off your body and expand your mind.

24275.name: Samba Showdown!
24275.description: Wanna drum? Come hit it hard with us! Bring an instrument if you have one. Get ready to bang! We're gonna breakdown some polyrhythms and then tap into Brazilian-Carnival! All levels welcome. If you don't have experience, come and get it! We're gonna be kicking butts and busting nuts all over the playa, so come!

24277.name: Art Discovery Bike Tours
24277.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – noon
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – noon
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – noon
24277.description: Pedal over to the bright pink ADT signs on either the 3 or 9 roads and join us for a bike tour to explore and discuss the art in that quadrant. Join up or drop out at your leisure.

24278.name: Mobility-Challenged Art Discovery Tours by Art Car
24278.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
24278.description: We'll help you get on an art car and go for a guided 90-minute tour. Sign up at Mobility Camp. Worst come, first served. Bring water, mask & goggles.

24279.name: Playa Tech Meetup
24279.description: Do you dream of lasers, quantum entanglement, and swarm computing?  Do you create cool shit?  Swing by for a drink and chatting up other techies.  Hosted by Wizard - the author of the Time To Burn app.

24280.name: Electronic Repair
24280.description: Did your LED hat give out?  Is your EL costume sputtering?  We can't make any promises, but our techs will be happy to give it a look and try to repair small problems.  If you don't need help, but are wise in the ways of soldering irons, come by and help others and earn some cool swag.

24281.name: 26th Annual People's Fashion Show
24281.description: Join Dr Hal & fly Spy w/ DJ Justin for this original integral event, the wildest bunch of Black Rock outfits & attitude! Won't YOU walk our Runway? Everyone is invited to show up & show off!

24282.name: Kamp Karaoke
24282.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 7 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 7 p.m. – 9:30 p.m.
24282.description: Our live 6-piece band has a large collection of songs to back you up, plus 1000's of standard karaoke songs to choose from, KK encourages Burners to SING, entertain and feel the joy of hearing your voice(s) on our stage under the big blue tent. Our radically inclusive 10-year  Burner veteran Kamp hosts, including licensed inhibition-thwarting therapists, and YOU most welcome BRC citizens, embody the BM Principles of radical self-expression, participation and communal effort, as you give us your musical gift, without leaving a trace!

24283.name: Midnight Bacon
24283.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 2 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 2 a.m.
24283.description: Come shake yer ol' booty with the monkey pirate pirate monkeys and gobble down some bacon and sip on our fine spirits.

24284.name: Last Resort Country Club Membership Drive
24284.description: Fancy a game of tennis, croquet, or a little hip-shakin, mixin & minglin?  The Last Resort Country Club will be accepting new members - caddyshack style. Stop by for a cheeky cold beverage and check us out today and everyday!

24285.name: The Playa Open Tennis Tournament
24285.description: The Last Resort Country Club will be hosting its 3rd annual tennis tournament on their super cool court - it's got interactive LEDs and glow in the dark racquets and balls that look ah-mazing at night. All are welcome but be prepared to demonstrate an array of skills. If you win a tennis match you may go on to the next round which could take you to a dance competition judged on racquet use and ability to hop the net. Fashion will play a large role obviously. Although this conservative tennis club will be disciplining anyone who breaks the Wimbledon all-white outfit policy, passes may be granted based on "who you know". Knowing the right people may even lead to a "no shirt, no shoes, no problem" attitude. LRC members will have a lemonade and pop tart stand set up during the entertainment. During intermissions, croquet competitions will be arranged on an ad-hoc basis for athletes who prefer sports that do not result in drink spillage.

24286.name: Petanque 70' music
24286.description: Come to play to the petanque game with 70' music

24287.name: Petanque Metal an Rock music
24287.description: Come to play to the petanque game with metal music

24288.name: Petanque Electro music
24288.description: Come to play to the petanque game with Electro music

24289.name: petanque shit music
24289.description: Come to play to the petanque game with shit music

24290.name: Mid Morning SLOWGA
24290.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – noon
24290.description:
Join the Random Pants crew for an hour of yoga under our 32 ft shaded yoga dome.  Taught by professional instructors, this slow flow will take you down to funky town and then lift you back up; kicking your body, spirit and booty into the mid-day sun feeling more alive than a pack of trampling tortoises. Our Live DJ's will create a space where you can get lost, found, centered or just astral project...no shit, it's happened. 

If you arrive at 10AM you'll catch the Random Pants morning yodel followed by a champagne toast - basically you get to dance, drink, and then stretch before heading off to lunch, bike exploration, or a mid day nap.  See you soon...and remember...shirtcocking is the gateway drug.

24291.name: Friday Frogzday
24291.description: Come on little frog, jump on the music and play petanque !!!

24292.name: petanque frog
24292.description: Jump, dance on the good music, play petanque and more !!! but it's a secret....

24294.name: Working with Challenging Psychedelic Experiences
24294.description: This year, millions of people will use psychedelics outside of supervised medical contexts, many of them for the first time. Difficult psychedelic experiences can be frightening, but also potentially among the most valuable experiences someone can have. What can you do to help someone having a difficult psychedelic experience? What techniques are available for helping transform a potentially traumatic situation into a positive or even therapeutic one? What role has the Zendo Project played at festivals, and what take-home messages are available for others interested in psychedelic harm reduction?

24295.name: The Bank is Open for Business
24295.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
24295.description: The First Bank of BRC is the bank for the gifting economy!  A storehouse for burner goods; come by to make a donation or withdrawl!  During bank hours our tellers are on hand to serve you- open an account with us, deposit something into another burner's account, or simply let us entertain you.  When the bank is closed, we still have a 24 hour ATM where you may find that essential item you forgot to pack.  If you talk to the right bank teller, you just might get the opportunity to test your skills by breaking into our vault, or hang out in our white collar criminal shooting gallery.

24296.name: Debt Jubilee Happiest Hour
24296.description: Celebrate our beautiful week on the playa with a bacon bloody mary at the First Bank of BRC!  Revel as if all our debts have been forgiven.  Life begins with a clean slate, starting NOW!  And while you're here, see if there isn't something you are desperately in need of that the bank can provide!

24297.name: Stock Market Crash Party
24297.description: Tycoons and bums, sheriffs and thieves, come party with us at the bank like it's 3029! (20's attire welcome)  There will be music, dancing, revelry, and runs on the bank!  Come see how much fun a shot market crash can be!

24298.name: Puppet Play Time
24298.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
24298.description: Come one come all to our Hand Puppet Theater. As a spectator or a puppeteer all are welcome to join in the fun.

24299.name: Build-a-Clown
24299.description: There is something inside of you just begging to be let free? Just giggle that sucker out. Lets get silly and awaken the hidden clown inside you.

24300.name: Show Tune Shenanigans
24300.description: The Playa is alive with the sound of show tunes. We'll be running the gambit from Sondheim to Porter and belting like there's no tomorrow.

24301.name: MOMs/DADs MEET-n-GREET
24301.description:
Are you a mom or dad of a burner at Burning Man for the first time?
Come meet at: CENTER CAMP CAFE, TUESDAY @ NOON!
Bring a snack to share (or not) & we'll make it a party! 
Birds of a feather...! 
Any ideas or questions, contact Linda: lindashuey@gmail.com

24302.name: T&T's Dusty Brunch Bar
24302.description: Grab a cold glass of booze and coffee to get your morning started.  Dusty Joes served with love and contempt.

24303.name: Low Expectations Caberet
24303.description:
Low Expectations Cabaret
The Power Trippers and Illumination Village humbly bring to the Playa “Low Expectations Cabaret”.   We invite you to bring your talents (or not)  bring your enthusiasm (or lack there of) and share some time with us (or don’t) as a number of beings attempt to entertain you with song, dance, drag, storytelling and/or silly human tricks.  We think it could be fun, but then again, we make no assumptions. Expectations are Low, after all.

24304.name: Qigong with Steve
24304.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10 a.m.
24304.description: Help start your day with a good idea - Qigong with Steve. Steve is not an instructor but has been practicing Qigong and Tai Chi for over three years and is happy to help beginners practice alongside him. More experienced practitioners are welcome as well, Steve might just hand the class over to you. Afterwards we are likely to open up the Bad Idea Bar for some bad ideas and beverages.

24305.name: Easy Run!
24305.description: Come join those tapering for the BRC 50k - and those wanting an easy chill run - of 2-3 miles. Meet other running nerds!

24306.name: Juggling and Jewelry
24306.description: Come learn basic toss juggling. Materials to make your own juggling balls provided. Not into juggling? No problem! Come make your own playa jewelry!

24307.name: Twerk-shop
24307.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4 p.m. – 6 p.m.
24307.description: Feeling frisky? Wanna shake it and looking to add alittle fire to your desire? Learn the in's and out's and up's and down's of Twerking at our very own Twerk-shop.

24308.name: Metal Monday
24308.description: A fucking hell-collection of US and UK metal. Open bar including authentic moonshine.

24309.name: Whatever Goes Wednesday
24309.description: Crunk, indie, drum and bass, country, dubstep, line-dancing, house music, pop, soul, techno, party sounds, gospel, metal, rave, britpop, coldwave, AND EVERYTHING. Open bar including authentic moonshine.

24310.name: Floyd Friday
24310.description: Pink floyd...need we say more? Open bar including authentic moonshine.

24311.name: Motörhead Monday
24311.description:
It's Monday. 
Motörhead, Jack & Cokes, and Bacon. 
Come punish your liver on this Monday morning and start your Burning Man by going deaf.

24312.name: Experience Black Rock baseball!
24312.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
24312.description: Check in with the home plate umpire, fill in the line up card, and step up to the plate while strictly adhering to all rules and regulations. Do you have what it takes?

24313.name: Breakfast & Beats Under the Sheets
24313.description: Good night beautiful moon, hello handsome sun. Join us with your naked or semi-naked self as we greet the sun as he awakens from his slumber. We’ll provide deep beats & sparkly sheer sheets so you can tap your foot & let your beautiful self shine along with his morning rays.  We’ll also have mimosas & funfetti pancakes (gluten free options) so you have a jolt of sugar & alcohol to energize your movin & groovin.

24314.name: Purple party
24314.description: Dress in purple, dance in purple, listen to purple. What does that mean? Join the Mycodelic Forest Friday Night and find out. Don;t forget your purple. we might hve purple drinks too...

24315.name: Wizards beer tasting
24315.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 3:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
24315.description: Come taste the cold beer brewed by our wizard for this  heat. A nice refreshing treat. beer flows from 3:33, till the keg is gone. 21+ only, bring ID

24316.name: Wacky wizards whimsy and wonder story time
24316.description: Children of all ages Come listen to story's of love and kinship.

24317.name: Reggae party
24317.description: Come listen to some roots reggae,  get happy and share the love, maybe a little dancehall...

24318.name: Intergalactic Pancake Massacre
24318.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
24318.description: Pancakes on the playa! Our piping-hot cakes come crammed with chocolate chips, cranberries, or all of the above. Load yours up with toppings including fruit, peanut butter, jam, nutella, maple syrup, and honey, and then orbit over to the Star Bar to round out brunch with frozen pina coladas, sangria slushies, and other icy goodness. Stay and chill out with us, and our giant “adult coloring” boards will put a big fucking smile on your face. Brunch is the most important meal of the day, so come on down!

24319.name: Slave Auction
24319.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
24319.description: Master flesh merchant Uli Baba cordially invites you to bid on (or become) one of our fine specimens with a wide variety of talents.

24320.name: Uli Babas Street Carnival!
24320.description: Come participate in Uli Babas Street Carnival!  Have your fortune told by our unruly genie.  Come try your luck at Spin the Scimitar.  Our moroccan version of spin the bottle!  Test your balance at our renowned Chicken Beam Fighting.  Explore many of our other offerings!

24321.name: Bubbles Beavers and Boners
24321.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
24321.description: Come enjoy a morning mimosa or champagne while making priceless art from your favorite body part!  Paint your cock or pussy with non-toxic paint and imprint it on card stock.  Makes a fantastic modern art christmas card.  Or if you want to leave a lasting impression, leave your imprint on a panel of fabric, to be made into a pussy and cock print quilt to be on display at future burns!

24322.name: Slave Auction Orientation
24322.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
24322.description: Curious or nervous about joining the slave trade? Arrive prior to the 6pm auction to learn how to consensually buy or be sold.

24323.name: The Annual Avant Yard Cabaret Night
24323.description:
Bring your wonderful, your weird, and your burner brain to dusted up by the Avant Yard Annual Cabaret Night! Past performances include poetry, music, burlesque, juggling, and a rousing rendition of "When the Saint's Go Marching In" by a person dressed as a lobster (or maybe it was a lobster acting very convincingly like a person)...you name it, our stage has hosted it! 

MC'd by Lizard the Chicken. Performers welcome--there are no spectators here!

24324.name: Daily Special- Margarita Soup w/ Ice Cube Croutons
24324.description:
Come on over and enjoy a cold tasty treat! 

Over 21 only, bring your ID.

6PM till we run out!

24325.name: Big Kids Birthday Party
24325.description:
YOU’RE INVITED!
Let your inner child roam free at a classic kids birthday party - with an adult only spin. Come play musical space bag, giant jenga, Simon Says and more for your chance to win some sweet loot. Need a time out? Take a quiet moment to collect yourself in our BYOF (Bring Your Own Feelings) corner. 
Just remember: “It’s YOUR birthday, you can ______ if you want to!”

24326.name: Conversational Bingo Tournament
24326.description: Ready to meet interesting people? Join us for Conversational Bingo, you'll be having fascinating conversations in no time. Cool drinks served too :-)

24327.name: Flasher's Happy Hour
24327.description: Like to get your bits out for appreciative audiences? Start your week off right with some kindred spirits. Drinks, as always, are served

24328.name: Strip Rock-Paper-Scissors
24328.description: Can you win the title of Strip Rock-Paper-Scissors champion of 2017?

24329.name: George Michael Sing Along
24329.description: We're turning on George Michael, on repeat. We're serving drinks. We'll sing. We'll laugh. We'll cry. It will be glorious, it will be fierce.

24331.name: Foursquare Tournament
24331.description: Can your old schoolyard skills match up to whatever the playa can throw at you? Come re-live your childhood and play foursquare with us - and drink.

24333.name: Hootie and The Blowfish Sing Along
24333.description: Do the Doiphins make you cry? Join us when we turn on the Hootie, pour the drinks, and sing our hearts out.

24334.name: Dildo Jousting Tournament
24334.description: Third annual regional Dildo Jousting Tournament, sanctioned by the NDJA. Novice through Expert divisions.

24335.name: Bon Jovi Sing Along
24335.description: Singing and drinking to Bon Jovi, giving burners a bad name

24336.name: Making The Perfect Bloody Mary
24336.description: Are you tired of lame Bloody Marys ruining your neighborhood get-togethers? Well, no more. After a quick lesson from Bartender to the Stars, Kerry Mitchell, you'll be making Bloody Marys so delicious you be proud to host parties again.

24337.name: How To Make The Perfect Grilled Cheese Sandwich
24337.description: Are you tired of making lame grilled cheese sandwiches? Have you given up on the process because of the mess? Well, rejoice butterfingers because Brett Erickson is going to show you how to make the perfect grilled cheese sandwich without making a mess.

24338.name: Photo 0f YOU, alone, with a Frying Pan and a Chair
24338.description: Nothing screams success like a photo of you, alone, sitting in a chair, holding a frying pan. And this year we've got your back. Or your front. Those are the choices. Otherwise no variations are permitted - you get to sit in a chair, and hold a frying pan, facing or not facing the camera. No profile shots, or anything weird. It's just you, alone, sitting normally in the chair, holding the frying pan, and a background we select.  Don't get clever. Then we send it to you later. And we give you a free shot of scotch after you've obeyed. FIRST FIFTY PARTICIPANTS ONLY.

24339.name: Music from Harry Partch - Daphne of the Dunes
24339.description:
Music from Harry Partch - Daphne of the Dunes
Join us for a playing of Daphne of the Dunes. Your welcome to bring your Chromelodeon or Harmonic Canon 1 and play along.

24340.name: 2017 Burning Man Photo Walk with Trey Ratcliff
24340.description:
Hey Burner buddies! Trey Ratcliff here for the 8th photo walk - Sooo excited!

Do you like taking photos or perhaps do you like people taking photos of you in all your fabuloso Burner gear? Well come on out and join this fun event - all are welcome! 🙂 It's great for beginner photographers all the way to advanced - bring anything from a mobile phone to a DSLR! We'll roam the streets of BRC and capture some of the magic of Burning Man together. 

I'll be giving lots of tips and tricks to help you on your own creative journey. We also talk a lot about the creative process and how it can be quite an active meditation bringing more consciousness, presence, and awesomeness into your life. So, come, bring a friend or three, and let's have a ball. Word has it that we'll get a bunch of Burner Girls too that just dance around and have thousands of photos taken of them. You know the type. Good times.

And after, we'll share all the photos in the Facebook event at https://goo.gl/PGy7Qq . Check the comments in the event to make some new Instagram friends with fellow photo walkers too! 🙂

We'll meet outside of Center Camp TUESDAY at 6 PM and start the crawl from there!

24341.name: Resilience on the Playa
24341.description: Even when we’re having a wonderful Burn it’s hard to avoid moments of stress and uncertainty – that’s what comes from pushing our boundaries, after all. Come to the schoolroom at Mystikal Misfits to learn some simple techniques to help you stay cool and get your Burn back on track any time you feel disappointed, irritated or upset by the trials of the playa. The session will be hosted by Camp Combobulated and led by a long-time Burner who’s an IRL expert in showing people how to boost their resilience and wellbeing by using science-based strategies (based on solid research in psychology and neuroscience). She’ll give you practical tips to keep your dusty brain functioning at its best, and other Combobulated veterans will answer any questions you have about using these kinds of tactics to stay sane and happy in BRC.

24342.name: Combobulation Station
24342.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
24342.description: Run out of band-aids or sunscreen? Desperately need condoms, wet wipes or a bandana? Come to Camp Combobulated and raid our Combobulation Station for essentials – as well as occasional random non-essential costume items. Available any time of day or night. (And if you have surplus stuff to give, yay! Drop it off here for some grateful discombobulated soul to discover.)

24343.name: Classy As F*** Cheese & Wine Party
24343.description: Looking for a weirdly classy way to mark the half-way point of your Burn? Come visit Camp Combobulated and we’ll ply you with cheese and wine till you feel fine. Not string cheese, either. Real cheese. Good cheese. And not all the wine will be in boxes. As the great philosopher Jean-Paul Sartre once said, "La classe, putain!"

24344.name: The Lavender Lounge
24344.description: Come cool down and relax with a gently head massage, body misting and soft music. 10 minutes to transport you to another world, away from the dust and stimulation! We look forward to your arrival and will send you off on your continued journey with a sweet treat to suck on! Comfort and heart felt soul connection awaits you.

24345.name: Caterpillar Who-kah Lounge
24345.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 6:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 6:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 6:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 6:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 4:30 p.m. – 6:30 p.m.
24345.description: Come lounge in our shade structure, blow smoke rings at strangers, & wonder who-you-are. Excessively small bottled drinks and hookah provided, byo existentialism.

24346.name: Red Queen's Croquet Court
24346.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
24346.description: Do you play…croquet? Come on any of your unbirthdays! The Red Queen’s Croquet Court is always open. Rules provided, but optional.

24347.name: Mass Meditation
24347.description: A closing ceremony & guided journey into our hearts that will invite burners to connect, reflect, and integrate practices to uplift the Earth.

24348.name: EXTREME BIKE REPAIR
24348.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
24348.description: Bike Repair with a shame free learning zone focused on radical self reliance these professionals who will help you to fix your bike!

24349.name: MARTINI HAPPY HOUR
24349.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 5 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 5 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 5 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 5 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 5 p.m. – 8 p.m.
24349.description: Rotating hosts offer themed happy hours, starting at 5:00. Snacks, costumes and impromptu performances encouraged.

24350.name: Contourture
24350.description: Come get your early burn stretch-out for all your limber run-ins through the week. Feed the Soul with some body stretch work.

24351.name: Energy Clearing
24351.description: Get your pre-playa prep, frenetic energy cleared from your body so you can attract and enjoy the abundant, creative, beauty of the playa. Believers and non-believers are welcome. Clearings and aura fluffing conducted by Reiki Masters and complete amateurs will bestowed blessings from the playa gods. Optional Tarot Reading.

24352.name: HAPPY HOUR with LIBATIONS
24352.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 2 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 2 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 2 p.m. – 11 p.m.
24352.description:
A don't miss retro lounge experience. Imbibe forbidden potions in exotic splendor. But beware of cannibals! Legendary play favorite and 11th year! Aprox hours:
2pm -5pm and 8pm-11pm DAILY. Late night ska party after 11pm Thursday night with DJ Cabinboy. and 90's R&B Dj Town Drunk after 11pm Wednesday night.

24353.name: Worldwide Women's Circle - Together WE Rise
24353.description:
The circle calls you forth. Participate in a global, synchronized event; Women gathering all over the world on the same day including right here in Black Rock City. Bring your gifts, your hardships, your celebrations and your expressions. We RISE together with the sun and this ancient ritual will tap us into this global event.  We gather at the heart of the city, The TEMPLE, to dance, to pray and to share - Our stories are Medicine for the human soul. Women, women identified and even men in touch with their feminine side are welcome to join us!

About the Worldwide Women's Circle: The Worldwide Women’s Circle is an international movement which utilizes the ancient tradition of the women’s circle.  We offer women the gift of community and help each one become the kind of leader the world needs now.  Behind this mission is a deep desire to support women who are making a difference in the world.  This is an important time in human history and there is an urgent need for women to gather and organize. 

2017 circle in Black Rock City, will be facilitated by the founder of the WWWC, LeahRose Farber

24354.name: Bike-Bar Show N Shine
24354.description:
BIKE-BAR SHOW N SHINE
Integral parts of the Burning Man culture include: bikes, art, gifting, radical self-reliance, bars and cocktails, will be brought together with a celebration of the 'Bike-Bar Show and Shine' Party. 
Bicycles that have been modified and adorned with small bars or cocktail elements will meet up on a sunny afternoon to show off their creative designs and share Bike-Bar cocktails.  
Photos will be taken for the participants, best of show judging by popular vote!

24355.name: Black Rock City - Voter Education
24355.description:
Black Rock City - Voter Education Event 
The Black Rock City Polling Place located within The Shallow End will be conducting voter education thru a self-paced interactive program. While no elections will actually take place during the event we hope to energize the voting population and turn out large numbers of participants in their homeland / default world. The Black Rock City polls will be open daily including weekends from 8:00 am to 10:00 pm. The Adorable Deplorable party at The Shallow End will allow you exchange your voting stubs for crafted top-shelf cocktails.

24356.name: Educated Voter Party
24356.description: The voter education bar entices you to discover the shock of voting and drinking. We provide voting booths at our camp's center where venerated voters of voting age can participate in our ritually shocking vote for the adorably deplorable oxymoronic issue of the day. Cheered on by the adorably deplorable and your cohort, you and a partner lime-wedge-spoon race your way through hugging news-booths flashing radically contradictory headlines. The final shocking voting ritual ceremony opens the gates to the educated voter bar where you may exchange your “I voted” sticker for a revitalizing beverage - shaken, not stirred. Squeeze your race lime-wedge (into your drink), bond (with others, not your drink) over your newly re-educated views on the issue of the day. Enjoy the soft soothing music, and become one of the increasingly deplorable adorables as you cheer on the next set of participants. Lie back in shaded comfort, relax; cheers! You voted, and you deserve a drink.

24357.name: Acro Yoga Foundations
24357.description: You're never too old for airplane! Come fly someone or be flown. Open-level. Bring a partner or attend on your own and make friends.

24358.name: The Pussy Chronicles: Aural Story Stimulation
24358.description: We open our legs to you as a female-only forum for story sharing. Come arouse your feminine soul as you listen to your sisters express theirs. We'll open it up at the end for anyone to share a story if she likes.

24359.name: Running of the Mutant Bulls
24359.description: Experience the thrill of running in front of the mutant-bulls-bikes! Wear a white t-shirt and a red scarf and get ready to run! Come on time because this is going to be FAST!!!

24360.name: Cirque Du Playa
24360.description: Take a trip to the circus! Go bonkers to funky beats in a freakshow of magic with acrobats, burlesque dance classes, magicians and delicious surprises. Set free your inner freak, express yourself in this party celebration of the mad ones.

24361.name: Trip to Valhalla
24361.description: Join Odin, Loki and Lagertha in the great hall of Asgard; there will be feasting, dance battling, trickster gaming, crafting of warrior garments, seers to read your fortune and storytelling of the legends.

24362.name: Heal & Feel
24362.description: Feed your soul in our healing space. Opening up with a Yin Yoga class we also treat you with massages, fortune telling, healing teas, counseling, Virtual Reality healing experience & sound healing by our DJ providing sonic enchantment.

24363.name: MAD HATTER Party
24363.description:
Go MAD in the Wonderland of crazies at our signature annual event! Wear your most outrageous hat to win the prize of your wildest imagination. Expect a freakshow by acrobats, burlesque dancers, magicians and DJs from all around the world. 
Join the madness, free your inner Mad Hatter!

24364.name: Tribal Bombastic
24364.description: Explore your tribal roots & express your inner warrior at this dynamic party of wildings. Opening up with a cacao ceremony dance ritual, we move to a medley of tribal beats, drums galore, tribal choreographies & body painting.

24365.name: Tea Ceremony & Connection
24365.description: Experiment with flavors and sensations at our signature Tea Ceremony, followed by a Workshop exploring how we connect within and with each other.

24366.name: How to Meet People Anywhere (yes, even at BRC!)
24366.description: That sexy stranger walking across the road in the dust… You know you want to meet them. But HOW??? Come learn how to meet anyone anywhere! Sexy strangers not included.

24367.name: 2017 BRC Anonymous Naked Yearbook
24367.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
24367.description:
Come be part of the BRC Naked Yearbook. No one will know who you are. Bring your favorite disguise or borrow one of our masks. No playa names and definitely no default world names. Just natural, wonderful naked bodies. We'll also be doing bodyscapes with graphic projections.  Come by yourself, bring a friend, or bring the whole camp. We will pose you individually and then as a group with the always exciting and often surprising Book-of-Poses. Our air-conditioned Bear Naked Tramps Photo Studio is located in Playfully Yours Village at 8 and B. This is an adult-only event.

Private photo sessions can be pre-scheduled at: https://app.acuityscheduling.com/schedule.php?owner=13903078

24368.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 a.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 a.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 a.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 a.m. – 2:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 a.m. – 2:30 p.m.
24368.description:
We provide very fun and highly private, professional photo sessions for singles, couples, or groups. Come explore your erotic side. Ladies, allow us to transform you into a sensual Venus de Milo or a XXX Mona Lisa. Guys, we’ll help you pose like gangster or just pose like a porn star. 

Come with your fav naughty poses or we will pose you with the always exciting and often surprising Book-of-Poses. Bring your fav toys, fetish props, or sexy-wear. Some dungeon toys provided. Photos are delivered to you securely after the event. Our air-conditioned Bear Naked Tramps Photo Studio is located in Playfully Yours Village at 8 and B. This is an adult-only event.

Private photo sessions can be pre-scheduled at: https://app.acuityscheduling.com/schedule.php?owner=13903078

24369.description: What would you do for a klondyke bar?...  while supplies last.

Be The Ball – Awesomeball at Camp Awesomesauce

Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:15 a.m.
24371.description: Gradually wake your body from last night’s revelry with peaceful stretching and yoga poses to the nurturing sounds of ambient chill and spacious DJed soundtracks. If that’s still too much work, just crash on a couch and let the music lull you awake.

24373.description: Come join us for a lesson in ritualistic candle dancing. Learn to balance tea lights on your hands while slowly illuminating your body. We'll finish the class with a meditative dancing ritual, weather permitting.

24374.description:
Bring yourself, bring your cups, bring your beer/drinks! We'll bring the kickball gear and as much beer as we can carry ourselves! Water in cups so no MOOP on the Playa. Drinks on the sideline.

Meet at the 12 o'clock side of the man at 12 PM on Friday, September 1st.

24377.time:

Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.

24378.description: This is night where all kinds of talented people come to sing and hear live music.  Come one come all!

Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 4 p.m.
24380.description: Bloodies and Bacon... your two basic food groups!  Come enjoy live music and cocktails!
