Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
24381.description: Come & learn how to twist & turn your partner in ways you never thought possible.  Learn from one of the best bases on the playa.  All levels welcome.

24382.name: Recycle Your Aluminum Cans!
24382.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 9 a.m. – 5 p.m.
24382.description:
Making drinking plans for your camp? Do those plans include lots and lots of aluminum cans? Want to unload all those empty cans on playa while also helping the kids of Gerlach? 

Well then come on down to Recycle Camp and SHOW US YOUR CANS! At Recycle Camp we will take all of your aluminum cans of your hands as part of our gift to the playa. We are located directly behind the Center Camp Café on 6:00 and are open every day 9am to 5pm. Please no drop offs: participate! When you get there, we will help you quickly separate your cans before riding THE CRUSHINATOR, our magical bicycle-powered can crushing apparatus that crushes your cans flat so we can store as many as possible before scrapping the aluminum off-site. All of the money we generate from aluminum recycling is donated directly to the Gerlach school system. Everybody wins!

We can only accept ALUMINUM cans. Please no glass, plastic, steel, or tin cans, so please keep all of your water bottles, tetrapaks, soup cans, and coconut waters separated. A good rule of thumb for figuring out if something is aluminum: if you can't crush it by hand, then we don't want it! Some stout beers like Guinness also have a plastic widget inside that cannot be recycled with the aluminum, please remove it beforehand or we can show you how. 

PROTIP from the Recyclenaut Aluminati: bring a MESH bag to collect all of your cans in. Plastic garbage bags don't allow your cans to dry out and create a foul, sticky sludge. If you store them in a mesh bag before bringing them over to Recycle Camp it helps make things a little less juicy for you when we they get sorted and crushed. Be smart, plan ahead, Recycle Camp wants YOU to come CRUSH it with us!!!

24384.name: Blazing Saddles
24384.description:
Cowboys and Aliens welcome!!  Enjoy drinks and beats, then leave blazed.

As one starts to wonder when the Sun is about to set, Lotus Ranch will be gifting sound and specialty drinks guest during our daily themed events.  We start by announcing and bantering with passerby's to coming into our tent we name Das Horn, the shape of a klaxon speaker.  Behind is the main camp and lounge area outfitted with programable LED to accommodate the theme and ambiance of the music from our DJs.

24385.name: Hot as Hell Dance Party
24385.description:
It’s hot and we have some icy optional alcoholic malts to cool you down.  
As one starts to wonder when the Sun is about to set, Lotus Ranch will be gifting sound and specialty drinks guest during our daily themed events.  We start by announcing and bantering with passerby's to coming into our tent we name Das Horn, the shape of a klaxon speaker.  Behind is the main camp and lounge area outfitted with programable LED to accommodate the theme and ambiance of the music from our DJs.

24386.name: Muumuu Thrusday
24386.description:
Show us your MUUMUU!! Then jump on our catwalk for the muumuu fashion show playing dance music you can't resist.  Liquid courage available at the bar.
As one starts to wonder when the Sun is about to set, Lotus Ranch will be gifting sound and specialty drinks guest during our daily themed events.  We start by announcing and bantering with passerby's to coming into our tent we name Das Horn, the shape of a klaxon speaker.  Behind is the main camp and lounge area outfitted with programable LED to accommodate the theme and ambiance of the music from our DJs.

24387.name: First Friday of the Month Family Dinner
24387.description:
Every First Friday of the month a group of NTXB gather together and potluck.  The North Texas community has gifted Texas TACOS to share on the Playa.
As one starts to wonder when the Sun is about to set, Lotus Ranch will be gifting sound and specialty drinks guest during our daily themed events.  We start by announcing and bantering with passerby's to coming into our tent we name Das Horn, the shape of a klaxon speaker.  Behind is the main camp and lounge area outfitted with programable LED to accommodate the theme and ambiance of the music from our DJs.

24388.name: Make your own Burning Man Button
24388.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 4 p.m.
24388.description: We will provide all the material for you to create your own 2" steel pin back button.  Similar to what you see at political conventions.  Draw our your own mini work of art or your favorite message.  Create a piece of flair for you to wear.

24389.name: Kandi cuff making workshop
24389.description: Want to make something to help you dominant that late night party? You know the one!  Well now you can,  and we'll show you how its done! From easy to hard we can challenge any ability level!

24390.name: Spontaneous Humming at SATB camp- Rods Rd and 7:15
24390.description: Led by brother sister duo GroundScore 1&2, into stomping and shuffling and eruptions of spontaneous humming and laughter. We are not professionals :) at SATB camp- Rods Rd and 7:15

24392.name: Kandi cuff making workshop
24392.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 2 p.m.
24392.description: Want to make something to help you dominant that late night party? You know the one!  Well now you can,  and we'll show you how its done!

24396.name: Art Discovery Sunset Bike Tour
24396.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7 p.m. – 9 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7 p.m. – 9 p.m.
24396.description: Pedal over to the bright pink ADT signs on either the 3 or 9 roads and join us for a sunset bike tour to explore and discuss the art in that quadrant. Join or leave at your leisure.

24399.name: Art Discovery Walking Tours
24399.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 7 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 7 p.m.
24399.description: Please join Bathsheba on Tuesday 8/29 and Wednesday 8/30, from 5:30-7:00 (the magic hours) for an Art Discovery Walking Tour. We will meet in front of the ARTery to begin our exploration of the art projects on the inner playa. A great time to take photos!!

24400.name: Cleu brainwashing
24400.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 12:30 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
24400.description: For a transformative, truly radical ritual, get a Cleu brainwashing, an ecstatic experience that is both relaxing and exhilarating. You can also get a Cleu pendant to wear as a reminder of who you really are, where we all come from, and why we're all One. Visit the "Do the Cleu" labyrinth out on the playa where you can walk the circles of the Universe, Earth, Life, and Consciousness. Look inside the magic box for a clue to our address. Time to get dusty, playa pilgrims! Got a clue? We'll be waiting for you.

24401.name: Why isn't the rum gone?
24401.description: Come drink home spiced rum served by our camp pirates and listen to Comatose's pirate playlist at Camp We Just Met's Dusty Rum Bar.

24402.name: Heroes and Villains Party and Mixer
24402.description: Are you the hero or the sidekick? The villain or the henchman? Every Joker needs a Harley. Come find yours while you enjoy a beverage. Fill out a DnD-esque character sheet, hangout in the Henchman's lounge and find a partner in crime to save the world or take it over. We'll display your character sheet in our “for hire” section and our expert sidekicks and henchman will join your party or help you find one. Expert sidekicks and henchman are available for hire all night long.

24403.name: Sidekick Bicycle Point Grab
24403.description: Come race around the Playa. Stupid human tricks will abound. You'll receive a custom die and test fate to find your next location. Are you the fastest biker on the Playa? Are you the luckiest? Prove yourself to your fellow sidekicks and heroes. Come hangout with your new found sidekick or hero or find a new one at the Side Kick camp afterwards. There will be friends and libations.

24404.name: Medicinal Bacon Clinic
24404.description: Come experience the medicinal powers of bacon!  We all know that bacon has protein, the ability to help you retain water, and value as aromatherapy, but as we all know the world of bacon is rife with abuse.  To help protect you from crippling bacon addiction and to make sure bacon gets to those truly in need we have made a doubly blind independent wholly certified assessment we will be implementing.

24405.name: Love or Lust Tester
24405.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 8 a.m. – 10 p.m.
24405.description: You and another person touch or kiss and our proprietary electronic device will predict your chances of loving or lustful relations.

24406.name: Open Decks & Beginner DJ Workshop
24406.description:
Have no residency to call home? Or maybe you're a complete newbie interested in learning the basics? Stop by The Orphanage to sign up for either slot!

Open Decks require a laptop with software to use a Traktor controller.

Beginner DJ workshop needs nothing but your attention!

24407.name: Mutant Art Cars- Meet the Artists
24407.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1 p.m. – 3 p.m.
24407.description: Artists who built the cars will be on hand to answer questions and present behind the scenes about Mister Fusion, Valyrian Steel, and Flux Capacitor. Great opportunity for you and friends to take some unforgettable photo shoots with the cars!

24408.name: Mirage Garage's Greasy Get Down Party!
24408.description: Join us for our Annual Party! Hosted by our Resident Darling DJs: Scumfrog and Chuffing Buffy, along with some surprise guest DJs, including sexy live performances, our signature "Motor Oil" cocktail, and some Insane projection mapping from Miki Humo - it's gonna be one for the books!

24409.name: Shop Talk - Speaker Series
24409.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 2 p.m. – 3 p.m.
24409.description:
3-4 presentations/day from titans of industry and leaders of their fields across subjects:
On Alternative parenting
On Energy efficiency in the existing built environment
On Think Global School
On Music/Radio
On Personal optimization
On Hacking for good
On Art
On Energy
On Money
On Sex 
On Music
On Science
On Photography
On Art, Inside Art World, Where do Outsider/New Age art differ

24410.name: Gamelatron
24410.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
24410.description: Come relax with us and lie down with Aaron Taylor Kuffner's base camp, where one of his sound producing kinetic sculptures will be installed, located outside of our main event tent. Seek reprieve from your dusty travels and let the gongs lure you into our oasis.

24411.name: Camel Toe Water Bar
24411.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 1 p.m. – 5:30 p.m.
24411.description: Water camp gifting cool drink of water to dusty passersby. Far away from camp and running low on water? We are your pit stop! chilled AND infused H20

24412.name: LED/Fire Jam
24412.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 8 p.m. – 10 p.m.
24412.description: In the evening we will offer an open, safe area for fire dancers to share their loves on LED/Fire Poi, Staff, Hoop, etc.

24413.name: Open Floor Dance w/Wisch @ RhythmWave
24413.description: Have you ever wanted to say something, but not had words? Have you ever felt more alone in a crowd than you do by yourself? Have you ever wanted to be closer but not known how? This movement session is an invitation into closer contact with ourselves and with others.

24414.name: Open Floor Dance w/Charlemagne @ RhythmWave
24414.description: A somatic dance exploration with full range of e/motion. Good for the dancer who seeks more than just an ecstatic release. It's sexy, sweaty, deep, and playful.

24415.name: Galactic Petting Zoo
24415.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 8 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 5:30 p.m. – 8 p.m.
24415.description: Stop by Galactic Jungle in the evenings to check out our mutant vehicles! We will also be hosting parties in our lounge areas with some exciting DJ guests. Come hang out on top of the elevated lounge, or chill out in the sensory forest and animal lair.

24416.name: I Cream U Scream
24416.description:
Express your Radical Ritual of Spirit
Join us for I Cream U Scream, ritualizing emotional release through your radical, cathartic self-expression in voice — with the sweet gift of cold, creamy, and totally awesome ice cream.
Its simple scream like your having a climax and you get creamed!

24417.name: Flamingo-A-Go-Go
24417.description: Are your go-go boots as flamboyant as a flock of flamingos? Do you feel the rhythm of the music getting stronger? Then gather 'round now, and let your body feel the heat. Don't worry if you can't dance, just let the music move your feet (and ears) to as many remixes of Gloria Estefan's "Congo" as they can physically withstand. Don't fight it until you've tried it under the only giant flamingo on the playa.

24418.name: Dance of the Flamingos
24418.description: Flamingos (and burners) are unique birds (and people) in that they participate in annual synchronized mating dances. The average flamingo has 136 scientifically proven sexy dance moves. How many does the average burner have? Half our camp has bet on "fist pump", and the other half has bet on "several". Who's right? We won't know until you stop by and strut your sexy stuff! We promise there won't be any Gloria Estefan this time.

24419.name: Doc Film Screening "Leave Your Shoes at the Door"
24419.description:
A documentary on conscious/ecstatic dance. Follow individual dancers as their lives are transformed by the experience of free-form dance. Heartfelt events unfold as dancers find a place where they can freely express feelings and emotions including illness and death. There is a brief  history of dance and some of its modalities such as 5Rhtyms, Contact Improvisation, Soul Motion, and Biodanza. 
4 years in the making.

24420.name: Dusty Mules
24420.description: Join your taxi mules to find out about pedi cab services for injured and alternatively-abled burners whilst sipping a moscow mule.  Giddyup! 9:15 & B

24421.name: Yaw Mule!  Rides for injuries
24421.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
24421.description: Stuck on crutches?  Send a mate to Taxi Camp to request art or bar hopping tours via our fleet of pedi cabs.  Trailers with chairs that hook to any bike also available for checkout by day. 9:15 & B

24422.name: Welcome hOMe Yoga
24422.description: Welcome hOMe dusty yogis. Kick off an incredible week with mindful movement in a fun and welcoming yoga class. Good vibes and great tunes. Guided by our camp O.G. Of yoga.

24423.name: Acrobatic Yoga
24423.description: Join Camp Walter and a fun loving dynamic-duo for an all levels acro yoga class. No partner needed.

24424.name: Sticky Sweet Yoga
24424.description:
Come flow like honey in this deliciously sticky-sweet yoga class. The Queen Bee will get your body buzzing and the hive humming.
Find us in the big yoga tent at Camp Walter, 10:00 & Esplanade.
Live music provided by an incredible trio of DJs.

24425.name: Balance and Harmony
24425.description:
Come recalibrate your mind, body, and soul to its most divine equilibrium, in a fun yoga class exploring all the best things: Movement, connection, and expression.

Come alone, with a partner, or a group a friends; this is a great experience to share.

Co-taught by a dynamic-duo of Yin/Yang, Live music provided by a gifted trio of DJs

24426.name: Semi-spiritual Ass Shaking w/Dance Commander
24426.description:
Ass shaking is not something that has to be learned we just sometimes need the right playlist and The Dance Commander sweating and yelling into a microphone to inspire it. The deep healing power of a good all out dance floor freak out is not to be taken lightly.  Come own your divine right to be crazy sexy and wildly unleashed on the dance floor--there is no way you won't leave feeling completely blissed out and enlightened.
Beats provided by a talented DJ who will get you grooving.

24427.name: All levels acro yoga
24427.description: Join camp walter for a fun all levels acro yoga class. no partner needed.

24428.name: Sunrise Yoga @ Kalliope with special guest DJ
24428.description: The biggest fuck-yeah-mind-blowing-blissed-out-feel-good yoga experience you have ever had. Meet at Kalliope post-sunrise set for an incredible movement class guided by our Godess of Goodvibes and Guest DJ

24429.name: Truth~Consciousness~Bliss Yoga
24429.description: Join an incredibly gifted and grounded teacher and equally talented DJ for this mindful, slow flow class will activate the yogic seeds of satchitananda, clearing false beliefs and revealing your most radiant self.

24430.name: A Yogis Guide to the Galaxy - Meditation
24430.description: Gather together to mindfully explore and set intention for your playa experience. Give yourself a chance to detox from the default world and tune-in to higher vibrations through guided meditations, sound healing, gentle movement and breath work. This will be the perfect way to seal your week of seal your dusty mind expansion. Guided by our Godess of Good Vibes, live music scape provides by a DJ with a heart of gold.

24431.name: Read My Hips Belly Dance
24431.description: Read my hips!  Learn the international language of American Tribal Style belly dance, used by dancers all over the world to create beautiful, dynamic group synchronized improvised dance.  Shimmy and shake the dust off and get some snakey, snappy, gooey sexy moves to add to your dance repertoire!

24432.name: Moan and Tone Yoga
24432.description: Sounds from our faces. Movement to the beat. Enliven, awaken, release and flow in this all levels yoga class. Guided by a pure hearted yoga teacher who we love and adore, with live music by a gifted DJ known for her ability to create magical soundscapes.

24433.name: Drop InTo the Soul - Vinyasa Yoga
24433.description:
Drop InTo the Soul - Vinyasa Yoga w/ our Camp O.G. Of Yoga and Our Guru of Techno.
A soulful yoga journey for thoughtful awareness, intelligent movement, and gentle strength. This mindful vinyasa class will help you fully absorb all that you experienced in BRC. Leaving you revitalized for your journey home.

24434.name: Third Eye Meditation / Singing Bowl Healing
24434.description:
Join us for a guided third eye meditation. We will provide a lotus flower ormus to assist in your meditation, while singing bowls help to clear negative energy and relax the mind.
Chakras are centers of energy located throughout the human body, which are believed to provide the connections between our physical and spiritual identities. 
Development of the third eye chakra in this lifetime will allow us to more properly use intuition in decision making instead of the judgement that comes from the use of our physical senses only.

24435.name: Seated Massage Workshop
24435.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 1:15 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 1:15 p.m.
24435.description: Even five minutes of massage can make all the difference to tight muscles! Taught by our resident Certified Massage Therapist, participants in this workshop will learn a five minute routine to relieve tension in the neck and shoulders that can be done from almost any seated position. Bring a friend or make one there! Space is limited.

24436.name: Bootie BRC: Depeche Mode Mashup Party!
24436.description:
Monday afternoon Bootie BRC at EGGS Bar!

All Depeche Mode (+Yazoo and associated acts) mashups.

DJ Adrian A

24437.name: Revenge of the Decade
24437.description: Replicants, Cyberpunks, Dimensional Travelers: come get weird, listen to Synthwave, and travel to the future only the 80s could have imagined.

24438.name: MONDAY NIGHT WELCOME HOME PARTY: Decadent Oasis
24438.description: Welcome home bitches. Come dance under glowing palm trees to the cosmic beat of some stellar DJs. Please do not feed the dust kittens after midnight.

24439.name: Bootie Shake: Decadent Oasis
24439.description: Release your inner child (even if they still wet the bed), and shake it 'till sunrise! Macabre eye-liner and ghastly top hat welcome.

24441.name: Radical Participation: Volunteers on Volunteering
24441.description: Keys to volunteer engagement and leadership. Trends in Volunteerism from BRC Census and Volunteer Feedback Survey. (ONLINE longer description) Radical Participation through volunteering your energies to projects, theme camps, and Burning Man team is what makes the event happen. The level of participation is changing. For those people leading volunteers, there are critical factors that affect your ability to attract and retain your volunteers. For volunteers, what teams are best for you and what might you watch out for to avoid bad situations. This talk will review trends in Volunteerism at Burning Man collected by the BRC Census and the learnings from 6 years of Volunteer Survey Data collected by the Volunteer Leadership Committee.

24442.name: Breaking Out of Self-Limiting Identity Frames
24442.description: Our sense of identity frames our beliefs about our capabilities, our potential for self-development, and our capacity for achieving fulfilling relationships with others. This talk will look at how we can break out of false identity frames that undermine our ability to reach our true potential.

24443.name: What We Talk About When We Talk About Fire
24443.description: What role does fire play in our lives, and how do we think about fire differently based on our frame of reference? Fire can be terrifying or beautiful, a tool or a force of nature. In the summertime, as we watch fire on the Playa, wildfires will burn across the West. In this talk, we'll explore what fire is, how it behaves in different settings, and how human relationships with fire vary in time and space.

24444.name: Improv: The Subtle Sledgehammer of "Yes, And..."
24444.description: Steve Wilder started doing improv comedy as a way to improve his acting skills, but he never anticipated it would completely change his life.  Improvisation isn't about being funny; it's about truly paying attention to what is directly in front of you, and knowing you have the power to change it.

24445.name: Twisted vision: life through a tabloid lens
24445.description: Journalist Peter Sheridan reveals why the supermarket tabloids' lies, gross exaggerations and fantasies may not be so far from reality, and why we could all benefit from viewing the world through a tabloid lens.

24446.name: Playing with Fire - Burn Your Own Wood Medallions
24446.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
24446.description: Stop by and Burn with us! We provide wood medallions and magnifying glasses. You use the sun's rays to design your own playa gift. It's fun, easy, and Dangerous!

24447.name: Running with Scissors Relay Race (& eat ice cream)
24447.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 1 p.m.
24447.description: It's a DANGEROUS relay race because instead of passing off a baton, you're passing off SCISSORS. Your mother warned you about us, this is why! (She also warned you against masturbating too much, but that hasn't slowed you down any.) Winning team gets ice cream and bragging rights. All competitors get to enjoy Strangers With Candy.

24448.name: Strangers with Candy - Free Candy Dispenser
24448.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 11:45 p.m.
24448.description: Come by anytime and help yourselves 24/7 to candies like Runts, Sprees, and SweeTarts at our Strangers With Candy candy dispenser. May or may not contain razor blades.

24449.name: Talking to Strangers Speaker Series
24449.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1:30 p.m. – 3 p.m.

24450.name: You’ll Put Your Eye Out Shooting Gallery
24450.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 11 a.m. – 4 p.m.
24450.description: Join New York Dangerous as we refine our carnival archery skills - each day you can take aim at hanging ducks, stuffed animals, and whatever else we find around camp that would be fun to shoot foam arrows at. Hit two targets with your four arrows, and win awesome NYDangerous swag!

24451.name: Midnight Tea: Radical Caffeine Ritual
24451.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 midnight – 1 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 midnight – 1 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 midnight – 1 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 midnight – 1 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 midnight – 1 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 midnight – 1 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 midnight – 1 a.m.
24451.description: Your mother told you not to drink caffeine at night, but you're at Burning Man so go a little crazy! Come enjoy gourmet teas, coffees, and booze. Choose your caffeine strength and add alcoholic enhancements if desired.

24452.name: Ritual W/O Words: Rediscovering ancient group comm
24452.description: Humans are a hypersocial species and ritual played a large role in the evolution of our brains, our language, and our culture.  Before humans had words, we shared feelings, concepts, and knowledge through sound and gesture.  We still possess these communication skills.  Trevor has experimented with wordless ritual and explored the new perspective on group experience and behavior that it brings.

24453.name: What Living Long Looks Like: Longevity w/ Quality
24453.description: Dr. Zloof's brings you a new minimal approach to living long with quality, passion and purpose! Presented in a hilarious and anecdotal manner, it will leave you with new insights and a simple routine to easily incorporate into your daily life.

24454.name: Vinyasa Flow Yoga for Spinal Strengthening
24454.description: Grounding that last chakrah deep: Join us with your own mat and get a place early for this yoga that supports the spine by strengthening and grounding the ___  chakrah.

24455.name: HEXportraits - Photo Shoot!
24455.description: Let us capture your Burning Man best! Come check out our HEXphotostudio and get your photos taken by our resident photog(s)!

24456.name: Exercise Like a Child
24456.description: Fitness fads come and go but our bodies are here to stay -- listen to your muscles, stretch your joints, explore your pains, and take your time!

24457.name: Warrior Within Workshop: Flowstate through Combat
24457.description: Explore the Warrior archetype through interactive movement. Embody the character of elemental rhythms of combat and engage the constant war within.

24458.name: Reggae Dance Party & Cold Beer
24458.description: Enjoy a live DJ spinning reggae beats while sucking back a lime-salted rim of PNW cold brew.

24459.name: Queers, Crackpots, &Fallen Friends Open AA Meeting
24459.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
24459.description: We host a daily open Alcoholics Anonymous meeting. All are welcome! Format changes daily. Come for some respite and recovery in the dust.

24460.name: Sprouting Spirit - Living Foods for Everyday Life
24460.description: Come learn the simple steps necessary to sprout nutritious living foods at home and start nourishing your body with raw foods sprouted with love.

24461.name: Co-Creating The Play Revolution
24461.description: How do we co-create the play revolution? In this workshop, we'll share what we've learned from organizing Camp Reset, a summer camp for adults.

24462.name: Yoga as Metaphor for Life & Self-Acceptance
24462.description: What qualities are you trying to cultivate in your life? Spark your curiosity and come home to yourself with breath, balance, play, and stillness.

24463.name: Bollywood Dance + Bolly Yoga
24463.description: Let your inner bollywood groove in this 60 minute all out, soulful play of bhangra, bollywood beats, end with some Bolly Yoga. You're in for a treat.

24464.name: Playa Hip-Hop Old/New School Dance Party
24464.description: It's time to get into flow while dancing to your favorite hip/hop from all decades.  This will be the dopest hip/hop party on the playa.

24465.name: 40 Rules of Love
24465.description: A brief and thought provoking journey of self-discovery, examining life and love through essential Sufi wisdom

24466.name: How to Have Courageous Conversations
24466.description: We are going to explore what it means to show up, to navigate courageous conversations and move us to deeper and more authentic connections.

24467.name: Open Mic: Explore your story
24467.description: Not everyone is fit for the stage, yet you all have compelling journeys. Take 3-5 minutes, embrace your fears, and use this platform to share.

24468.name: Honoring and celebrating sex and intimacy
24468.description: Sharing sex is the nicest thing two people can do - pure joy. So why is it so hard to talk about? Come join in an interactive session on open sharing.

24469.name: From My Heart to Yours - Relationship Upgrade
24469.description: Be intentional about creating epic relationships in your life.  Come learn some proven concepts to upgrade your relationships.

24470.name: Breathwork Workshop
24470.description: Join us for a Breath Work Journey guaranteed to take to you another level!  Please come hydrated! See you there :)

24471.name: Blessed Union Ceremony: Bollywood Parade
24471.description: Two hearts & infinite love. Dance with us through this game of life. We invite you to celebrate with dhol, beats & drums through the playa. Meet at the Temple at Sunrise.

24472.name: Me. You. We.: Thrive in Relationship
24472.description: Create an epic relationship. attract a partner that makes you come alive: values, vision and sex - get ready to explore a new frontier.

24473.name: Trust Me
24473.description: An experience lab designed to walk participants through activities and discussions that explore the notion of trust.

24474.name: Explorative Mind Surgery + Breath work
24474.description: Mind Surgery is an equilibrium exercise that elevates the vibration of the group, followed by rapid breath work and curated musical journey.

24475.name: Your Optimal Morning Routine
24475.description: Snoozaholic Anonymous. Create your own morning routine that will ensure you get out of bed with intention and start the day your way!

24476.name: Modern Masculinity
24476.description:
The DANCE: An Awkward Exploration of the Masculine + Feminine 
We are whole beings, masculine and feminine. Lets explore the dance of both energies. "

24477.name: Comfort Zone exploration thru Nude Sketch Artistry
24477.description: We will explore the beauty of our bodies through sketching. We will sketch each other very fast, not expecting great drawings but great emotions.

24478.name: Inner Oracle
24478.description: Trust your inner guidance by working with an oracle card. Then tune in for a message to create an oracle card as a gift for oneself or another.

24479.name: Twister Party
24479.description: Come get intimately tangled with new friends as we contort on the giant inflatable twister while enjoying HEX smoothies with a "twist"

24480.name: Space Cadet & the Werewolves
24480.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3:15 p.m. – 3:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3:15 p.m. – 3:30 p.m.
24480.description: This reading by Space Cadet & the Werewolves will feature a one-woman 15-minute spoken word performance about the meaning of life and the lies we often find ourselves believing. And it will also be about werewolves.

24481.name: A Photoshoot Inspired by Love, Light & Yoga
24481.description: Drops of essential oil, we will set an intention & let that energy flow thru a yoga pose! Wear ur playa costume & LEDs. Digital photo after the burn.

24482.name: Lavender Lounge: Rest and Rejuvenate
24482.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 6 p.m.
24482.description: Sip herbal tea and meet new humans in the fluttering shade dome of purple tie-dye. Relax onto our pillows with icy eye masks and cool scented misters. Slather lavender body butter onto that beautiful bod after a steambath from the Steambath Project next door. (Yes, a real steambath). Recuperate from a rough night and/or meet the love of your life... You never know what will happen in Lavender Lounge. 8&E in Nectar Village, near HGBG Healers.

24483.name: Intersectionality: Your Identity
24483.description: Intersections. explore your identity and what they mean. How has Burning Man has shaped your identity in the default world.

24484.name: Your Hips Don't Lie.
24484.description: Dance on a journey through India, Kenya & Jamaica. channel your feminine energy from spirit to hips. Bring flowy skirts!

24486.name: Musical Sensual Workshop
24486.description: Prepare to use sounds merging east & west: singing, dancing, chanting: Unearth inner creativity from beats around us.

24487.name: Pocket Full of Mindfulness
24487.description: How do we be mindful of our surroundings? Explore your spidey senses and practice your mindful poses in this collaborative workshop.

24488.name: Vadge Badge Workshop
24488.description: Vadge Badge Workshop Blurb: Do you have love for the Vagina? Is it all about the Minge? Hell yeah it is! Then come make your very own Vadge badge to wear around the playa. We'll be playing all things 80's/90's on the decks for your ears while you stitch and bitch fabric Minges. Make yours out of denim, velour, silk, tweed or whatever floats your boat. Add laces, pearls, fancy threads or any accoutrements that tickle your fancy.

24489.name: Bush Bro Meet-up
24489.description: For guys that leave it alone below the belt. Natural pubes, full-grown bushes and hairy balls all welcome. Come hang with your hairy penis brothers and enjoy looking like men! No razors or trimmers allowed. (Meet-up in the play tent)

24490.name: Burning Band
24490.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 noon – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 noon – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 noon – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 noon – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 noon – 3 p.m.
24490.description: Music lessons: Ambitious for something more complicated than a kazoo? Then pick the instrument of your choice and do "whatever it takes" to convince the musician to give you a lesson.  AND Pick-up bands! Bring whatever it is you want to play and join in with band members to create your very own Instant Concert. M-F 12-3.

24491.name: Burning Band Intoxicate a Musician March
24491.description: First Annual Intoxicate a Musician and March: Bring your favorite whisky and share with band members. We'll judge who has the best hooch, and the winner gets to be the bandleader for a stumbling march around the neighborhood. Wednesday at 8 PM.

24492.name: Burning Band Intoxicate a Musician March
24492.description: First Annual Intoxicate a Musician and March: Bring your favorite whisky and share with band members. We'll judge who has the best hooch, and the winner gets to be the bandleader for a stumbling march around the neighborhood. Wednesday at 8 PM.

24493.name: Burning Band Talent Show
24493.description: Talent Show: the Burning Band will host a talent show where you get to show off your talents along with whatever music the band thinks is 'appropriate' for the occasion. Prizes will be awarded! Tuesday night at midnight.

24494.name: Burning Band Intoxicate a Musician March
24494.description: First Annual Intoxicate a Musician and March: Bring your favorite whisky and share with band members. We'll judge who has the best hooch, and the winner gets to be the bandleader for a stumbling march around the neighborhood. Wednesday at 8 PM.

24495.name: Consciousness of Money
24495.description: What is the consciousness of money, the purpose it's calling to fulfill, what old structures are transforming and what does karma have to do with it?

24496.name: Composting your pain
24496.description: Explore the idea of letting go in a generative way. Learn an inquiry process that helps you break down what’s left to grow what’s next in your life.

24497.name: Art Treasure Hunt!
24497.description: The Art Treasure Hunt is back for 2017 with original artwork for you to find! Come to Fucking Flamingos at 8:30 and C on Thursday morning to snap a picture of the treasure clues, and then head out on your adventure! Original paintings will be hidden throughout the city among theme camps, monuments, and random spaces. Following the map will take you on a playa tour! Find one or try to find multiple pieces, anything you find is yours to keep as your personal memento of exploring Black Rock City!

24498.name: Cannabis Laws in the Age of Trump and Beyond
24498.description: The presentation will cover the changes and challenges of Cannabis reform- starting from the populist, referendum led creation of medical cannabis program in California, followed by the detailed regulatory structures enacted in Colorado and the Pacific Northwest,  to the landmark ‘adult use’ programs to the various types of programs now in place in the majority of the states.  It will discuss the conflict between these state programs and existent federal law and enforcement priorities; the difference between the exercise of discretionary policy choices and law; the conflicts between states’ rights and federal pre-emption;  the competing pressures of popular demand, libertarian thought, vested business interests (the spirits industry), tax revenue, states’ rights, and social conservatism.  The difference between legalization and regulation, as well as crystal ball predictions for the future will be covered, followed by a question and answer session.

24499.name: Nuclear Fusion Pancakes
24499.time:
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.

24499.description: Come taste our hot pancakes with cool toppings! Iced coffee and/or hot tea will also be served. Enjoy the magnificent views of BRC and bounce off the trampoline at the top of our 25’ tall Cooling Tower.

Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4:30 p.m.
24500.description: What would be better than a scoop of ice cream in the middle of a hot afternoon? Comes in many flavors and waffle cones! Enjoy the magnificent views of BRC and bounce off the trampoline at the top of our 25’ tall Cooling Tower.

24501.name: Heart, Lead The Way: A Music Workshop w/ King Ben
24501.description:
Drop in, let go, dive deep and open your heart chakra through chanting, live music, mindfulness meditation, and restorative body work with King Ben.

This hour-long workshop is lead by musician and facilitator King Ben at yoga and meditation studios throughout Los Angeles. The intention is to let go of everything but the present moment and consciously choose to let our hearts shine.

24502.name: Iced tea and Storytelling!
24502.description: Stop by the Bard's Corner for casual story sharing and iced tea. Come out of the heat of the day, bring a story -- true, or not -- or read from our selection!  Family friendly!

24503.name: Tall Tale storyTelling
24503.description: Got some good yarns up your sleeve?  Stop by for a (long island) iced tea and swap tall tales to get your night started!

24504.name: Live Heart-Based Music with King Ben
24504.description: Drop in, let go and dive deep with musician King Ben as he uses chanting, live acoustic music and mindfulness practices to open your heart chakra.

24505.name: Radical Ritual Storytelling
24505.description: Stop by for a storytelling event themed Radical Ritual. Come share your radical ritual experiences, or listen to ours! Iced tea will be flowing...

24506.name: So You Used To Be A BRC Virgin
24506.description: Burning Man is great. Integrating back into your life after your first Burning Man is not great. Before you burn your drivers license in the Temple, come get some practical advice on merging your new perspective and connecting with your regional community. Half hour plus Q&A. At Hibernaculum on 6:30@E.

24507.name: Juggling Basics
24507.description: Come Join us at our Pele's Fire Fire Zone for a juggling good time!  3-4 Balls, clubs, rings.  If you have your own gear, bring 'em!

24508.name: Contact Juggling Workshop - Pele's Fire Fire Zone
24508.description: Would you like to learn to manipulate, levitate and control crystal balls?  Join the Contact Juggling Workshop and I will introduce you to the magical art of contact juggling!  This beautiful form of object manipulation focuses on rolling one or more balls over the body, or letting the ball "float" in the air.  You will learn the first basics of single and multiball contact, isolations, stalls, and body rolling.   Are you ready to become addicted to this enchanting artform?

24509.name: Flow Wand Workshop
24509.description: Would you like to learn a skill that combines magic with dancing?  Come to the Flow Wand Workshop and I will teach you how to do it!  The flow wand (aka levitation stick) is a flow prop that is inspired from a classic magic trick called the "Dancing Cane".  It is a cleverly balanced stick with a thin, invisible string somewhere in the middle that is also attached to the to the magician.  The magician appears to control the cane with his mind, the cane seemingly floating in mid-air, while making it dance to music.  Recently the Flow wand was introduced into the juggling community, so in this workshop you can learn everything to get started with this magical prop.

24510.name: Poi and Hoop Basics - Pele's Fire Fire Zone
24510.description: Come learn basic poi and simple sequences with Hawaii's very own Colleen!  Get hoopy with it!

24511.name: Sass & Ass Hoop Class w/Lisa SparkGirl
24511.description: Add a little extra emphASSis to your hopp routine with some fun and flirty booty moves! We'll also twerk on incorporating playful personality tech and activating your inner diva.  Please dress accordingly.

Stop by for refreshing sips of infused water.  Some with fruit, others with potions, all with prayers and good intentions.  Also available with good conversation with our diverse and charming bartenders.

24514.name: Pele's Pa'ina: Camp Party!
24514.description: CAMP PARTY DAY!!!  Live PA musical performances by Zapper and Datgirl, Heavenly Father, and Mr. Rodgers.  Complemented with dancers, fire performers and an interactive art light show.  Come dance, play and share your art!  Infused water bar and tea lounge will be open!

24515.name: Cat Dance
24515.description: You always wanted to dance around in a cat mask, didn't you?  This is your big chance.  Stop by for Panty Droppers and Cat Masks for all you repressed kitties.

24516.name: “Toga! Toga! Toga! - toga party!”
24516.description: New campmate initiation party - test your knowledge with burner trivia - win a prize, and a Playa Cosmo!

24517.name: Journey to the Playa: Bringing an Art Installation
24517.description: The Journey Project is an interactive art piece that was inspired, in part, right here at BRC. Come listen as the artist spin tales of trials and tribulations about the many stops of the ‘Journey’ on its way Home.

24519.name: “Tutu, Tattoo and Tarot Tuesday”
24519.description: Totally tubular tattoos teamed with tantalizing tarot on Tuesday. Temp truth and tattoo your tush! Our skilled celestial astrologer will read your future while we adorn your gorgeous body!

24520.name: Naked Pub Crawl
24520.description: We will be one of the camps on the infamous ride!

24521.name: Spin Art Bike: Take a Ride... Make Wearable Ar
24521.description: A self-propelled art machine that enhances your glorious garments. Bring or, remove your shirt, shorts or whatever and pedal that bad boy till it pops!

24522.name: Spin Art Bike: Take a Ride... Make Wearable Art
24522.description: A self-propelled art machine that enhances your glorious garments. Bring or, remove your shirt, shorts or whatever and pedal that bad boy till it pops!

24523.name: Tarot Readings
24523.description: New love, new lust, need guidance?! Let our skilled tarot reader peer into the stars and reveal the answers, while you sip on a Playa Cosmo, of course.

24524.name: Sexy Saint contest
24524.description: Don your holy garb and come parade as your favorite saint, voodoo deity, or multi armed god!  We will worship at your feet!

24525.name: T-Shirt painting
24525.description: Celestial Bodies provides easels, stencils and spray paint to spiff up your T’s. Create your 2017 Burn and Celestial Bodies Souvenirs.

24526.name: Pants Off Dance Off
24526.description: Shirt Cocking Dance Off at the Black Hole

24527.name: Corn Pops & Corn Whiskey Shots
24527.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7 a.m. – 8 a.m.
24527.description: Snap, crackle, & shuck your way to a great Burn!.  Start your day with a shot of corn whiskey & crushed corn pops!  It's a healthy part of every Burner's diets.

24528.name: Flow State & Peak Performance Dialog
24528.description: Learn about, share about Flow State & related experiences. Open sharing of experiences, thoughts on, ideas for facilitating, and discussions about Flow State & Peak Performance in the arts, athletics, and LIFE. Facilitated by Performance Psychology Consultant Ted Monnich, MS.

24529.name: Gong Meditation with David Zach-Shemesh
24529.description: Enter a deep state of relaxation, contribute to the balance of the glandular and nervous systems, improve quality of sleep, circulation and the ability to cope with stress. This gong meditation is a cleansing process for the subconscious mind, an opportunity to immerse in the rich overtones of this ancient instrument, which work on the mental, emotional and spiritual bodies.

24530.name: Vinyasa Flow with Eli Scheier
24530.description: Vinyasa Yoga, translated as “arranging something in a special way,” brings a lightness, ease and relaxation to your daily playa rituals. This class is meant to re-connect you with your body, mind and soul so there’s more room for dance, play and community. Tap into the source of being.

24531.name: Cacao Ceremony + Shamanic Sound with Jena & Sacha
24531.description: Experience deep relaxation, inner joy, and self-healing through the love medicine of the Cacao. We will combine the medicine with a sound journey with a shamanic touch, which together offer a beautiful, safe ceremony for re-union with Self-Love. During this 2-hour sound bath and shamanic trance, including guided meditation and dance, you become more spacious, grounded, and heart-centered.

24532.name: Chanting and Sound Circle with Casey Karr
24532.description: Join a powerful vocal immersion in concert with a variety of overtone-emitting instruments and explore the different layers of your voice. Share and receive energy with and from the group, and reach heightened states of awareness and blissful states of resonance with this energizing ritual.

24533.name: Soundbath Concert with Aya & Tyler
24533.description: In live performance, Aya and Tyler record live loops, layering vocals, instruments, and percussion into an alluring multi-layered soundscape that guides the listener to experience his or her true essential nature and connect with our beautiful planet earth. Fusing sacred mantras with English lyrics, elements of jazz and electronica with soul and R&B, and shamanic rhythms with indigenous instruments, Aya and Tyler create an accessible experience of meditation through the power of music. Intention + Vibration = Transformation

24534.name: Kundalini Yoga with Liam Pfeiffer
24534.description: A tantra-based, physical and meditation practice that aims at releasing the prana, or life energy, that resides at the base of the spine. Via the repetition of kriyas, a special set of exercises, Kundalini Yoga is meant to help practitioners overcome blocks and resistances, raise vibrations to higher frequencies, and open awareness to new realities. Its goal is to form a connection to the divine self, and a union between physical and non-physical experiences.

24535.name: Vocal Meditation with Elian Zach-Shemesh
24535.description: Cultivate a delightful state of resonance within, as well as a deep and harmonious connection to others. Blindfolded, you will be encouraged to use your own voice as a powerful instrument, and discover its ability to become a great source of self-empowerment. Find the delicate balance between contributing your own unique sound to the collective, and being fully immersed and supported by the shared vibration. The experience includes a restorative meditation segment using overtone-emitting instruments and aromatherapy.

24537.name: Live DJ Sunset Flow Yoga with Lauren Taus & CRSTO
24537.description: A vinyasa flow designed to inspire love and adventure. This movement practice is about deepening your connection with your heart center so that you can be more present with others in this wild ride of human experience. Expect to move, feel, and fly, then relax back into the truth of who you really are. Class will close with a short, yoga nidra meditation.

24540.name: Super Power & the Rituals that Tune us to our Flow
24540.description: A discussion on the concept of superpowers. The panel will discuss our passion to inspire people, to harness their best attributes and will give an opportunity to learn up close how leaders of their industries use their power to be a catalyst in the world. We focus not on what our speakers do, but on how they do what they do. It is our aim to ring out and honor the superpowers in each and every person who joins us and touches our tribe.

24541.name: DMT Release with RahQuel Star Achiaviatta
24541.description: We will experience life upgrading gamma breaths that activate our pineal glands, natural DMT release, and major consciousness upgrades, followed by a gamma-fueled dance party to epic shamanic electronic and organic beats brought to you by DJ Quetzal Star. This is a community heart opening and exponentially elevating (and grounding) journey into DMT- Divine Moments of Truth.

24543.name: Live DJ + Yoga with Lauren Taus and CRSTO
24543.description: A vinyasa flow designed to inspire love and adventure. This movement practice is about deepening your connection with your heart center so that you can be more present with others in this wild ride of human experience. Expect to move, feel, and fly, then relax back into the truth of who you really are. Class will close with a short, yoga nidra meditation.

24544.name: Vinyasa Flow Yoga with Katherine O'Connor
24544.description: Vinyasa Yoga, translated as “arranging something in a special way,” brings a lightness, ease and relaxation to your daily playa rituals. This class is meant to re-connect you with your body, mind and soul so there’s more room for dance, play and community. Tap into the source of being.

24545.name: Rebirthing Journey with Alhia Chacoff-Berger
24545.description: A powerful inward and outward journey, using breath as a vehicle for purification, self-exploration, attunement and empowerment, aligning to a frequency of Love. Breathe, Explore, Transcend.

24546.name: Sound Experience with David & Elian Zach-Shemesh
24546.description:
Our immersive sonic journey inward includes 5 chapters:
Talk. About the therapeutic properties of sound and how to use it as a meditative tool.
Vocal Meditation. Using our own voices, we will explore the delicate balance between contributing to and receiving from the collective.
Breathwork. Inspired by Stanislav Grof’s Holotropic technique, we will practice a powerful form breath that enables to disconnect from the “monkey mind” and reach heightened states of awareness and a deeper state of meditation.
Sound. We will play an intuitive sequence of overtone-emitting instruments, including a gong, Himalayan singing bowls, tuning forks, drums and chimes.
Connecting. An opportunity to share musings, thoughts, feelings and poetics about our individual experiences.

24548.name: Sonic Journey & Sound Meditation with Josh & Eliza
24548.description:
Join us for a two -hour sonic journey and meditation combining breathing techniques, vocal toning, guided visualizations, and a collection of instruments such as gongs, Himalayan singing bowls, tuning forks and other various harmonic-overtone-emitting instruments.
There will be a brief introduction reminding us of the role of the receiver and how to use sound as a tool for meditation. 
We will explore the different acoustic and electro-acoustic layers and textures of sound and its property in space--how we perceive and locate vibrations that build and shape our reality and understanding of presence. Familiar traditional sound meditation instruments mentioned above will be used alone and at times in concert with a with a 10-channel spatial sound system with careful attention to a consistency in ethos

24549.name: YOGA MEDITATION
24549.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 6:30 p.m. – 7:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 6:30 p.m. – 7:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 6:30 p.m. – 7:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 6:30 p.m. – 7:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 6:30 p.m. – 7:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 6:30 p.m. – 7:45 p.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 6:30 p.m. – 7:45 p.m.
24549.description:
Meet Tarini, for meditative yoga classes at the foot of the BODHI PROJECT. Learn about breathing technics and experience a true meditative state.
Strengthen and stretch with asanas. Experience complete relaxation.  Discover the divine within yourself. OM OM OM

24550.name: Honeybees; the straight scoop
24550.description: Question and answer session with a long time professional beekeeper. We will discuss the planets most celebrated invasive species; their current status, behavior & economics along with factoids about bees and we will address your questions. The discussion will follow the interests of the participants will be useful for professionals, beginners, wanna-bees and honey lovers. At Hibernaculum on 6:30@E.

24551.name: Free Photography Zone
24551.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
24551.description:
This will be the beginning of my third decade photgraphing the participants of BM.
At the Free Photography Zone each person is given a print as their tangible reminder of the experience.  No promise to find it on some site.  You get a print then.  
You will be photographed in a professional studio setting using medium format black and white film.  
While good portraits must be a collaboration between two people remember that I can only photograph what you bring to the session.  I have no interest in contributing to the thousands of forgetable "selfies" that will be done that week.  I will try to photograph you as best as I can and make an interesting portrait of you.  If all you can do is stand there and re do your high school graduation photo then that is what you will get.
HOWEVER, if you approach the photograph with an open mind and a willingness to try to help me make something interesting you will be rewarded with something unique.
Please come by, relax in our shade structure, look over prints from previous years, possibly get inspired and most importantly get your portrait done.

24552.name: To what would you pledge your allegiance?
24552.description:
If you are from the USA can you say what it means to be an American? What do you say to the folks from Mexico and Venezuela who say, “You know, we’re Americans too? Is it easier to say what it means to be a Burner than an American?
He will talk about his personal journey as he explored the question of national and individual identity. Not only did he discover something did not expect, he will share with you a new pledge of allegiance that he’s written for himself that you might want to adopt for yourself as well.

24553.name: Flow State & Peak Performance Dialog
24553.description: Learn about, share about Flow State & related experiences. Open sharing of experiences, thoughts on, ideas for facilitating, and discussions about Flow State & Peak Performance in the arts, athletics, and LIFE. Facilitated by Performance Psychology Consultant Ted Monnich, MS.

24554.name: What Would YOU do for a Klondike Bar?
24554.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 4 p.m.
24554.description: Come to Sharkey's Bar Monday - Friday and show us what you'd do for a Klondike Bar!

24555.name: Mindful Cooking
24555.description: Experience the sensuality and meditative quality of cooking in silence. Brunch menu.

24556.name: Kazoo Sound Healing
24556.description: The Kazoo has long been used in sacred ceremonies across the world. It's buzzing is said to have transformative powers and people report experiencing powerful visions while under the influence of the Kazoo. Join us for an afternoon of Kazoo work and leave feeling ready to buzz your way around the Playa.

24557.name: Bubble and Pancakes Party
24557.description: Start off your day right with a dose of colorful pancakes and mimosas while wading through a bubble dream with bouncy beats. Come in your best PJs or elaborate bathrobes.

24558.name: Morning Yodel Dance
24558.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:15 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:15 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:15 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:15 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:15 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:15 a.m.
24558.description: Come greet the day with Camp Random Pants when we play the Original Morning Yodel! They say five minutes of dancing to this Yodel = 90 of yoga!

24559.name: Planet Earth Tribute
24559.description:
It pained many of us to hear that Planet Earth was taking the year off. 

We may not be able to duplicate  all the hard work they put into making our burn so awesome, but we are going to try for a few hours to create a place to dance to our favorite Planet Earth songs:) 

Walk by and if we are even close you should feel the pull followed by the need to dance for a bit.

If it is a success we will keep going into the night. Heck might even pull out some shine;)

24560.name: DickChicken: the only death is that of a coward.
24560.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 3 p.m. – 11 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 11 p.m.
24560.description:
Hello fellow Olympianese. I am aware of the constant rumblings that taint our strange wayStation. The questions posed all too commonly to Old Scratch at the crossroads. The ponderings which confound the Jungians as much as they validate the Freudians... 

 What in the good name of St Anthony, patron Saint of all heavenly miracles, is a DickChicken?

 The only surviving prehistoric sport, a ProtoDickChicken is believed to have been enjoyed during the ice age. A mix of fencing, old west pistol dueling, bull fighting and capoeira, DickChicken was proliferated amongst all the known ancient civilizations.  The Nordic called it dïkkChükken and translations from Olmec hieroglyphs tell of a DuxmalChixenitza game enjoyed throughout the americas. The Greek played a dramatized version called deuxus ex maChichina.  

In order to reach the highest heights, we must mash pelvises with giants. To soar with the eagles we must first dick the chickens.

24561.name: The Connection Project
24561.description: The biggest Mediation that the Playa has ever seen. Starts Wednesday at 3pm for 15 minutes or less, JUST STOP. Sit stand it doesn't matter, close your eyes open them, whatever. Just take a moment and give praise and thanks. Let this vibration flow across our planet. Like in Washington DC 1993, 4000 mediators came together and the crime rate significantly dropped. But we are going to go big, "GLOBAL. Let do this!

24562.name: Blanket Game
24562.description: This game is about cooperation and competition.  Teams stand on blankets. Challenge is to work together to flip over the blanket without anyone stepping off the blanket.  First team to do this wins a fabulous prize!

24563.name: Jesse & April Light's 15th Wedding Anniversary
24563.description: Please join us for our 15th wedding anniversary renewal wedding at The Temple at sunrise. We want to kick off our anniversary right with YOU!  We will be adventuring out to see some art and be with friends.  I hope you can get your dusty bunny butt out of bed or just don't go to sleep, which is our method for being up at sunrise!  ;)

24564.name: Story time
24564.description: A dramatic reading of D. Seuss' "Oh, the Places You’ll Go!"

24565.name: Traditional Chinese Tea Ceremony at the Earth Zone
24565.description: Join Lani Violet for a Traditional Chinese Tea Ceremony in Pele's Fire Earth Tower Tea Room.  You will learn basics of traditional chinese tea etiquette such as peace and relaxtation, tea selection, brewing technique, various chinese words and phrases, finger tapping, posture, meditation and manners.  Bring your tea cups! Extra tea pots if you got it!  This is a calming ceremony to ground yourself for a full week ahead.

24566.name: Sentella, The International Theme Camp!
24566.description:
We are Burners from Sentella, South Africa, and we're on a journey of exploration, discovery, love, and friendships. Our next stop is the mythical Black Rock City, where we cannot wait to dive into this magical Radical Ritual, Burning Man 2017!
 
See you soon!

24567.name: Sexy Walking 101 & 102 with Billy Jack Spark
24567.description:
Come learn to strut your stuff in a sexy new way.  Whether you are sexy, not sexy, new to walking, have been walking for years, are unable to walk, constantly feel you are doing the walk of shame, try to approach people and they walk away, or have nothing better to do....THIS CLASS IS FOR YOU!!  
We will cover the basics of sexy strolls, saunters, strides and nonverbal communication.  All you need to bring is yourself!!!

24568.name: Coco Poco Loco Pink Party
24568.description:
Come on down to Coco Poco Loco on Monday afternoon from 3pm-12am dressed in Pink, for the infamous Pink Opening Party!

There will be DJ’s spinning sexy tunes throughout the afternoon/evening (with a possible surprise guest!) as well as some dazzling performances to start your burn in style!

So bring your cup to sample our Pink Opening Cocktail or West Coast beer on tap, a donation for the bar & get your Pink on!

24569.name: Chakra Balancing Experience
24569.description: Come join us at Camp Camp Camp for a special Chakra Balancing Experience.  Clear energy blocks and prepare yourself for an amazing week on the Playa!

24570.name: How Dominant Cultural POV Influences Our Success
24570.description: Communication is an ever-expanding field. We are inundated with influence from family, friends, marketers, politicians, clergy, and entertainers on a global level. My aim is to change how we think about cultural influences on our personal fulfillment, our ability to empathize, and our continued curiosity and growth.

24571.name: Breaking your personal frame; redefining YOU
24571.description: At age 42 I retired, sold my home and business and everything else, bought a sailboat and spent the next 17 years circumnavigating the planet.  I will talk about what it takes to break your personal frame, get off the merrygoround, expose yourself to danger and unknown outcomes and develop a frameless view of both yourself and the larger world.

24572.name: Breaking the Frame on What Living Long Looks Like
24572.description: Dr. Zloof brings you a new minimal approach to living long with quality, passion and purpose!Presented in a hilarious and anecdotal manner, it will leave you with new insights and a simple routine to easily incorporate into your daily life.

24573.name: UNICORN RAMPAGE 2017
24573.description: Wednesday on playa is UNICORN DAY! Bust out your horns and your sparkle! Meet us on the open playa and dance until sunrise with the Charlie the Unicorn Art Car! Stampede with the Unicorns by day and Rampage with the Unicorns by night. This is a little something we like to call Unicorning So Hard. DJs, dancing and magic at the Electric Dandelions all night, then heading out to trash fence and 12 o'clock for sunrise.

24574.name: Self-Love = Other Love
24574.description: What cultivates euphoria as the mirror image of other love? Reflect on and extol your radiant self with us as we explore its potential to heal our world.

24575.name: Morning tea time
24575.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 7:30 a.m. – 8:30 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 7:30 a.m. – 8:30 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 7:30 a.m. – 8:30 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 7:30 a.m. – 8:30 a.m.

We will be using candles, incense, oils, massage, energy breathing, flowing energy through chakras, and tantric bi-aural music to achieve orgasmic edging, become multi-orgasmic, and bring your partner to the heights of ecstasy. 24585.name: B.E.D. "Clarity & Consent Playshop" @ RhythmWave
24585.description:
The mission of the Bureau of Erotic Discourse (B.E.D.) is to help people safely and happily navigate the sexual shoals of Black Rock City, to get what they want and avoid what they don’t want. This workshop is called “Clarity and Consent” because it is about clearly communicating desires and boundaries for consensual sexual activity.

The subtitle of this playshop is “Negotiating Sex on the Playa,” so some of the material is about how to get to a positive, consensual agreement. But a negotiation is also successful if it helps to avoid an unwanted outcome, so we also discuss how to convince someone to go away. B.E.D. values the right of individual choice, which includes the right to choose NOT to have sex.

We don’t care what gender you appear to be, or what gender you claim to be, or what kinds of partners you prefer. What matters is communication and consent. All are welcome to attend this "Clarity and Consent Playshop" presented by the Bureau of Erotic Discourse - at RhythmWave!

24595.name: Mean Gods Suck: Connecting to the Universe
24595.description: Anxiety was built into us on a neurological-level for survival. It served its purpose and now is outdated and running amok, destroying us and our ability to salvage this planet. If we are to survive we must transcend our predisposition to anxiety on an individual spiritual level. Come learn about what William James called “primal religion”, an instinctive understanding that we as individuals are part of a much larger transcendent whole, and how we can build those tools for ourselves.

24599.description:
Do you Love ART? Would you like to BE a PART of Some ART?? Do you like rainbows, Trails of color, Custom tailored psychedelic photographic gifts meant to express who you are? Well then come on down to Camp HELLO, We Love you! We Will be creating super high resolution Long-Exposure Light Paintings using only REAL LIGHTS and ZERO Editing or graphics Magic! Come on down, Bring your friends, Partners in crime, Kids, Family, Parents, Grandparents, and ALL of your ENTHUSIASM to create a colorful slice of compressed time you can take home and keep forever! 
How does it work?  First you pick your favorite pose, Something that truly represents your personality, Your relationship with your group, How you feel at that moment, what type of magic you hope to create in this world Or Your LOVE For the burn! Then you answer a series of questions meant to get in touch with who you and what you love. On 3....2....1 You Freeze as still as a stature while Gadget (our resident light painter) Creates a Scene of textures, colors, energy, smoke, electricity, magic, rainbows or fire, And get a FULL resolution 50MP copy of your light painting through the magic of E-Mail (delivered after the burn!), When you get back to the default world feel free to print your image up to 80" wide! :-)
Why? Because HELLOOOOOO, We Love you! :-)

24600.name: A Heathen Perspective On Ritual Slaughter
24600.description: As a practicing Heathen Gothi and leader of a kindred, Alf Herigstad is going to share a unique perspective about a ritual practice that has been misunderstood and vilified in the modern age.  That is the practice of ritual slaughter, also known as animal sacrifice.  He will dispel some common myths, and explore the history of this practice.  He'll talk about the legalities of it, and discuss why it is still done today and is in fact making a resurgence.  He will share personal accounts of how it is practiced by his kindred but more importantly...WHY it is practiced, what the purpose of it is.

24601.name: Anonymity & Positive Framing in the 10 principles

24602.name: Velociraptor Conservation and Captive Management

Once the pendant is filled in, it must cure for 2 hours, then be ground flat, and taken home on a cord/leather/metal chain. (Sign up required - 10 people per each hour session)

24607.name: 5Rhythms Dance w/Marcia Dancingheart @ RhythmWave
24607.description: The body is our living, breathing temple. We can seek refuge in our body parts, inviting them to move, dance, and reconnect our whole being. We dive deep into embodied listening, co-creating our tribal heart-beat. The 5Rhythms with Marcia Dancingheart will open your body temple, shake out your soul, and call in Spirit to nourish your Being. It’s a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirements are a body that is still breathing, a mind that is still curious, and a heart that is still beating. Feet. Breath. Beat. Dance. All are invited to join Marcia on the bamboo at RhythmWave!

24632.name: Burning Man: A Tibetan Book of the Dead Parable
24632.description: Buddhists “Take Refuge” in the Buddha, His Teachings, and Community; Burners take refuge in The Man, The Ten Principles, and the Burner Community. The Bardo Thodol/“Tibetan Book of the Dead” is a Buddhist guidebook through the death-and-rebirth process. It details what is envisioned and experienced by one making that transition, which continues well after Western medicine declares the physical body “dead.” The Man Burn is a parable of the process described in that guide. We’ll unfold the parable, discuss its relevance, and conclude with a suggested walking meditation for the eve of The Man Burn.

24633.name: User's Guide to Human Incarnation: Yoga of Primal
24633.description: This is a journey into the truth of who you really are. Human incarnation is divine revelation. Celebrate your five bodies! Take an inventory of the amazing siddhis (i.e., supernatural powers) you already possess. Through the portals of breath, sound, asana and meditation, you will encounter your own primal reality. Hatha means Sun ("Ha") and Moon ("Tha"), i.e., Yin and Yang, and we will dive into the undivided truth of this swirling mystery, including the Yin in the Yang and the Yang in the Yin. Consider it satsang with yourself!

24634.name: Opening to Love with Edgie
24634.description: This workshop allows you to experience emotional openness and heart-felt connections to find more possibilities for what love can be in your life. You’ll discover some of the ingredients for happy, healthy, loving and intimate Relationships. A Human Awareness Institute presenter leads you through gentle exercises designed to open your heart and allow you to feel more connected with others. You will have the opportunity to peer more deeply into yourself and see ways you may be holding yourself back from fully giving and receiving love, care, support and being seen.

You can feel the life they breath into their words, the energy they move through their instruments and the connection they make with their audience.
