25017.name: Psychedelics - Past, Present and Future
25017.description: Join Rick Doblin (Visionary Founder and Executive Director of the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies), Mitchell Gomez (the Executive Director of DanceSafe), Casey William Hardison (A tireless Cognitive Liberty advocate and combat veteran of the 'war on drugs') and The Teafaerie (Psychedelic Superhero and author of the blog Teatime on Erowid) for a conversation and Q&A. It's everything you've always wanted to know about psychedelics but didn't know who to ask!

25018.name: Harm Reduction 101 W/ Mitchell from DanceSafe!
25018.description: 'Harm Reduction 101' Harm reduction is a set of strategies and ideas aimed at reducing negative consequences associated with admittedly risky behavior, including illicit drug use. Harm Reduction is also a movement for social justice built on a belief in the fundamental civil rights of people who use drugs. Mitchell Gomez will host this 'introduction to harm reduction' talk, with an open Q&A at the end. Today, electronic music is the fastest growing youth culture, and the community DanceSafe serves stretches far and wide. Current programs and initiatives aim to provide safe spaces to engage in conversations about health, drug use, and personal safety; provide free water, electrolytes, safe sex tools, and ear plugs at EDM events; provide honest, fact-based, unbiased information on drug effects and potential harms; offer nonjudgmental first-point of contact to risky or challenging situations; offer drug checking services to prevent overdoses and death; and work with promoters and local stakeholders to advocate for safety first approaches. Come hear Mitchell from DanceSafe talk about harm reduction in general, and it's application to Burn Culture (as well as unique challenges of the Playa).

25019.name: Safe, Sane and Sapient Psychedelic Use
25019.description: Join Mitchell Gomez from DanceSafe and Dr. Richard Idell for a discussion of the current state of psychedelic research, both official and otherwise.

25020.name: Mandala Workshop
25020.description: A Mandala is a spiritual and ritual symbol in Hinduism and Buddhism, representing the Universe. In various spiritual traditions, mandalas may be employed for establishing a sacred space, and as an aid to meditation and trance induction. Mandalas are also created to focus attention and create positive vibrations around it to achieve a goal, release positive energy, or for attracting good luck.

25021.name: Kerameikos (Ancient Greek pottery)
25021.description: Ever wondered how those ancient vases were produced and decorated? Find out at our pottery school at Gymnasium, and you’ll be able to make some ceramics (kerameikos) of your own! It’s a three step process: first, we'll make the vases of different shapes using coil building techniques; then, we will let the clay dry to apply the slip and carve designs. (You can use the break for lunch or try some of our big toys, such as aerial rig or gymnastics wheel). At the last stage, the pots have to be fired after Burning Man, but we could ship your masterpiece to you, if you’d like! Otherwise, we’ll use it to decorate our camp and use the most appealing ones to award the winners of our athletic events next year.

25022.name: Patsy's Hangout Morning After Chill
25022.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 1 p.m.
25022.description: Whether you're just waking up or on your way home after a long night out, Patsy invites you to stop by and relax in our lounge to chill tunes. A great place to meditate, contemplate and plan your schedule before heading out for the day.

25023.name: Patsy's Hangout Bar
25023.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 6 p.m.
25023.description: A great place to connect with old friends and make new ones while enjoying a fabulous Playa Bolli cocktail.  Enjoy high-energy tunes, good company and a comfortable space.  Sashay up to the bar, move to the music or just hang out.  Participate in our featured daily rituals and be sure to show off your fabulous playa couture.

25024.name: Patsy's Hangout Lounge
25024.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11:45 p.m.
25024.description: Patsy's lounge is always open and welcoming to all, even when the bar is not serving. Stop by and relax while touring the city.

25025.name: Radio Noir Night
25025.description: Take a break from the chaos of Black Rock City and join us for a calm, quiet evening of listening to actual radio detective shows from the 1930s. You'll bask in the ambience of our Noir Detective Office and we will provide the whiskey. At this point we have a cult following and a brand new line up of radio shows for you- come check it out around 9 pm on Wednesday night.

25026.name: All Chads Party
25026.description: Calling all Chads! Your presence is requested at the first annual Chads party. Here you can mingle and chat with other Chads about Chad things. Be your best Chad self and show us why we all endeavor to be as glorious as a Chad. Even if you are not a chad, you will be today...

25027.name: Sade Happy Hour
25027.description:
Are you a Smooth Operator? 
Do you lead a Diamond Life? 

Come to our Sade Happy Hour at The Organization located at 8:45 and F. 
Be a Jezebel and show that Nothing Can Come Between Us....

This is No Ordinary Love.

Hang on to Your Love over smooth tunes you can get Punch Drunk to with our Sweetest Taboo cocktail and have Frankie's First Affair in our photo booth... Is It a Crime?

See you after the Long Hard Road in Paradise

xo
- Sally & Maureen

25028.name: 5 Levels to Domination: Surrender to the Goddess
25028.description: We will undertake a sensual journey into the realm of Femdom, exploring D/s dynamics via the ritual of foot massage and worship. In this workshop, we will be encouraging men to be more vunerable in the presence of women. Using a gently escalating 'levels' format, we will create a safe space for disciples to worship, and ultimately submit to, their divine Goddess.

25029.name: Lap dance for lovers/ NARCAN demo
25029.description: This will be a short class with basics of seductive movement, set to music! Bring a friend or partner or come by yourself! All you need to have are a chair and a good attitude! There will also be a short demo on the medication narcan, which reverses opiate overdoses

25030.name: Vinyasa Yoga with Kate O'Connor
25030.description: Breathe, move, flow, and let go! This 60 minute vinyasa style flow class features pranayama and intelligently sequenced movement to center the mind and the body. Followed by a 30-minute dive deep into relaxation with a yoga nidra guided meditation. Let the magic of the environment and the practice restore your sense of wellbeing and inner peace.

25031.name: Cacao Get Down: Chocolate and Ecstatic Dance Party
25031.description: Cacao Get Down: Drinking Chocolate and Ecstatic Dance Party

25033.name: Sunrise Après Yoga with Boozey Snakes
25033.description: Come get bendy and boozey at Camp Fuck Yeah. Mimosas provided, please bring you own mat. Join us for a little apres, while you Namaste 🙏

25034.name: Laughter Yoga Workshop
25034.description: Come laugh with us! You'll leave feeling happier, more relaxed, and ready to take on all your playa adventures with a perma-smile! It's contagious!

25035.name: How to Invade Earth: The Geopolitics of Space
25035.description: "How to Invade Earth" will be a workshop on the geopolitics of space, with the audience playing the role of a human populated Martian nation-state seeking to conquer Earth. Physical realities of spaceflight and the tyranny of the rocket equation will help us apply geopolitical theory onto solar system relations and conflict. As Martians, we will explore strategies to project power throughout interplanetary space and within Earth's gravity well.

25036.name: Face/Body Painting Interactive Session
25036.description: Come find a face to paint, paint your own, or come find your face being found for brush food! Color Up!!

25038.name: Radical Civic Responsibility
25038.description: Inspired by burning man? Want to bring the magic back home? Do you have interactive public art in your downtown yet? Come learn from the Mayor of Truckee about how we can run for office as burners and win! Other elected officials on playa highly encouraged to attend!

25039.name: Don't Dance and Want To?
25039.description: A Dance Workshop for People Who Don't Dance! Ever feel like everyone else is kicking it on the dance floor and you're just....bopping? Don't Dance is a workshop to help you find your inner dance style and get you more comfortable in your body and out on the dance floor (or playa).

25040.name: Get Dizzy With It
25040.description: Always wanted to learn Contra Dancing and never had the chance? This is your moment. All levels welcome!

25041.name: Internet Privacy Charades
25041.description: Learn how to protect yourself from Trump's spooks by running around with tinfoil hats.

25042.name: Night Photography at Burning Man!
25042.description: For cameras with a manual setting and assuming there is NO FLASH (it doesn't work in the dust), I'll show you some real basics to get decent looking pictures of all the amazing people, places and things at night time on the playa.

25043.name: Yin Jin Jing Qigong Postures for Relaxation
25043.description: You will learn Yin Jin Jing postures along with detailed descriptions of the mental focus required to move the energy appropriately. We will go through the individual postures and then do the series all together.

25044.name: Mindfulness Meditation
25044.description: Learn techniques of mindfulness meditation and how to begin to incorporate this practice into your life.

25045.name: Permaculture 101: Basics of Theory and Design
25045.description: Permaculture 101: Basics of theory and design.

25046.name: Ride a Giant, Humansized, Claw Machine Game!
25046.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 3 p.m.
25046.description:
Come play on our giant, humansized, rideable claw machine game. Win prizes, drink beer to make tokens. You can't lose!

It takes a team of 3 people to play. You'll need to drink beers and crush the cans to make tokens. 1 Token per player. One of you will ride in the claw and collect prizes while the other two of you use ropes to pull your friends around!

25047.name: Unicorn Cycling Workout
25047.time:
Sunday, August 27th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Saturday, September 2nd, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
Sunday, September 3rd, 2017 10 a.m. – 11 a.m.
25047.description:
Have you ever ridden a unicorn? Have you ever done it in the Deep Playa? We know you haven't and we are going to fix that!
Unicorn Cycling Workout is the unique experience of riding a flock of unicorns in the Deep Playa with an unquestionable benefit to your health. During Burning Man, we are going to organise guided workouts with music and fun twice a day, and all the other time you can use the unicorns for yourself to get in even better shape!

25048.name: Poon at Noon
25048.description:
Giddy the fuck up. The Poon @ Noon is back and ready for playa action. With all your patent pending favorites; old west photo booth, body buffing station, best damn tasty libations, limited edition 2017 BM bandanas and of course above average conversation. So get on down, where some western gear and yeehaw your pretty little buns on over..

Who: You
Where: 4:00 & Dance
Why: Fuck yeah
When: Wednesday August 30th 12-6pm

DJs
-Poon Resident DJs
-Surprise International Guest DJ - to be announced

25049.name: Pink Tantra Puja: Celebrate the Divine Within
25049.description: Come join us for an interactive Tantric celebration of ecstatic games and rituals to deepen your connection to others, increase your energy, and improve your love life. You will be amazed at how quickly and intimately you can connect with strangers. We all have the the power of creation within us; let's express it with each other through energy, connection and open hearts.

25050.name: Slow Jam
25050.description: Slow Jam is a gentle and heart-felt practice of connecting with the self and with others through slow, improvised couples' dance. Slow Jam is a strongly held container creating a safe space for exploration of intimacy and connection. There is no expectation of touch or contact, and each participant is given tools for finding and holding their own personal boundaries. This is an opportunity to let go of the busyness in our lives and in our heads, and really sink deeply into our body wisdom and experience our authentic selves.

25051.name: Intimacy through Japanese rope bondage
25051.description: An exciting, hands-on introductory workshop on the historical and artistic world of Shibari. Explore reasons for wanting to tie or be tied up, the safety factors involved, how to choose the right ropes and lengths. We teach foundational ties, and some intriguing variations, as well as explore a dynamic use of bondage from the sensual to the artistic. No previous rope experience is necessary.

25052.name: SolDance
25052.description: Dance is the next yoga. It is a path of embodiment, an invitation to come fully home to the reality and magic of your very human life. It's accessible, affordable, safe and effective. We all dance, ever time we take a breath. It's something men, women, children and elders can all do. IT FEELS GOOD. It feels like FREEDOM. It's waiting for you - right around the corner at your neighborhood dance or yoga studio - to inhabit your beautiful body and choose your amazing human life.

25053.name: Tribal Tantra - Heart Opening Puja
25053.description: This is a "station" puja, with an inner and outer circle. One circle rotates and with each rotation you have a new partner to dive into presence with. Each partnering is truly an opportunity to fall in love with ourselves through the eyes of another. The stations are subtle, elegantly simple and this is their potency. Open to the possibility of adoration, forgiveness, healing, deep unconditional love and experiencing your higher self in the span of a couple short hours.

25054.name: Heart Opening Concert with FIA
25054.description: Come and receive the gift of original heart opening and empowering music. A unique, crystal clear voice sharing divine wisdom in a powerful way that hits you straight in the core of your being. Songs guiding us back to ourselves and each other.

25055.name: Pink Floyd Ecstatic Dance
25055.description: Start your day with a spiritual journey through music and dance. Awaken the body and spirit and express your innermost self in a fully accepting community of love. Have some time to pause and reflect on this amazing adventure called life.

25056.name: Drum Talk: Rhythm Workshop & Ceremony
25056.description: If you can say it you can play it! DRUM TALK is a school for students who want to discover and develop their voice on the West African djembe. Learn the Language of the Drum with Dan Bailey who teaches traditional West African polyrhythms, chants and djembe techniques specializing in Baba Olatunji's world renowned drum language. Using this method of vocalizing rhythms, drumming becomes accessible to everyone. By seeing, hearing, saying and playing the rhythms this approach appeals to all learning styles. Get clear tones while protecting your hands and taking care of your drum.

25057.name: Mermaid Spa Day
25057.description: Welcome to the first ever Playa Mermaid Meetup! For experienced merfolk or anyone who's ever dreamed of becoming a mermaid or merman, join Mermaid Soluna at the Steam Bath for a full mermaid makeover! Bring your camera for a photo op in your new tail. Bring bubbles, spa goodies and sparkly thing-a-ma-bobs to share! Learn tips and tricks from a pro mermaid, discuss how we can de-moop our oceans, and just relish in the amazing wetness of the steam bath! After we've gathered all the mers, we jump on the nearest art-boat for a cruise around the playa.

25058.name: Axis Syllabus Influenced Dance
25058.description: Practice harnessing the forces of the world around us while simultaneously diving into the discovery of our unique shape and expression. This fun dance class will be strongly influenced by Axis Syllabus - a deep inquiry into the experience of movement that draws from biomechanics, anatomy, physics, western medical sciences, physiology, anthropology and an expansive collection of empirical knowledge. The syllabus is supported by a matrix of masterful movers that continuously bring fresh research and exchange ideas internationally.

25059.name: Experiments in Group Connection
25059.description: Playing with welcoming everything, including each other, the present moment, and our own bodies.

25060.name: Have fun with Acroyoga
25060.description:
"An innovative blend of partner yoga, acrobatics and thai massage, acroyoga is a great way to practice trust, communication and connection, while discovering all sorts of fun ways two bodies can interact. Get ready to have fun, play with others, and get a great workout too!
"

25061.name: Intimate Thai Massage
25061.description:
"Tired of being all by yourself on a lone yoga mat? Then come to this challenging and playful galactivated partner yoga session! Experienced acroyogi Zach Beach will blend together their experience in partner flow, acrobatics, thai massage, dance and fitness to bring you one supercharged partner yoga session. Get ready to have fun, meet a new friend, deepen your yoga practice and send your yogi heart into the stars! 
"

25062.name: Ecstatic Sound Oasis
25062.description:
Ecstatic Sound Oasis is a co-creative sonic art movement where the participants immerse themselves in a non-ordinary state of mind, synchronizing their heartbeats into one harmonious pulse of deep connection with mother earth. 

This subtle meditation weaves heart activating cacao elixirs with sacred ritual practices of self-loving embodiment.

Shamanic breathwork is utilized in order to merge with the orgasmic chant of each individual, aiding in the journey, and creating dialogues between ancient beats and the singing bowls.

The vibrations will guide the life-force energies to embrace and expand love and compassion towards the heart of the BRC.

25063.name: Goddess Breast Massage
25063.description: Breast massage is an ancient technique that works on the female body in an extremely effective, holistic way. Boost your energy levels, circulate lymph, and get some emotional healing with these simple techniques. Women only.

25064.name: Body Art Flow
25064.description:
BAF is a wave of movement that merges blind folded contact dance with body painting. As we create gentle movements into one another, the naked bodies (optional) become the paint brush and the canvas. The intention is to imagine the body as water drops melting into the desert while honoring our inner child.
Ecstatic music guides us to create a radiant color mandala on a canvas placed on the ground. Closing in savasana to integrate the energies soaked in and recognize the vulnerability and love of the collective held together to become a brand new artwork of light.

25065.name: Heart Field Alchemy 101
25065.description: The intention of this workshop is to offer insights and techniques for healing, empowerment and manifestation, all drawing from a combination of topics that range from neuroscience, meridian based self healing modalities, intuitive frequency focal points, and prayer technology. Attendees will leave with an augmented and upgraded capacity for emotional and energetic self regulation, as well as a keen awareness of how their newly harmonized moment-to-moment vibrational state is creating the reality that they step through.

25066.name: Compersive Platantra: alchemical playshop
25066.description: Through the inner alchemy of sensation and feeling, we can find the wisdom of oneness and connection as well as the experience of exquisite and holy individuation. We will be playing games to connect with one another and ourselves, as well as going deeper into the waves of sensation that we experience as disconnection or pain. All is welcome in this space. This is where we come to experiment with humanness and the mysteries of love.

25067.name: DJ Set
25067.description: a dj set of electronica music

25068.name: Therapeutic lap dancing
25068.description: The lap is the most powerful bodywork anywhere that we have with us everywhere... 💜

25069.name: Pipe Ceremony
25069.description: Come make a Good Prayer for yourself.  The sacred pipe is an instrument of prayer gifted from White Buffalo Calf Woman for all people.  Come gather in a Circle, as Rainbow Tribe.  Give your prayers.  Send them up in smoke.

25070.name: Therapeutic Biting
25070.description: Biting heals body, mind, and deep social wounds on many levels. In this workshop, you'll learn where, when, and how hard to bite to deliver this transformative (and enjoyable) experience.

25071.name: Learn Ancient Secrets of Tantra
25071.description: Discover how Tantra can increase your energy and stamina, heal one physically mentally and emotionally, connect more deeply with others, combine your spirituality and sexuality, and dramatically improve your love life in ways that you may not even realize are possible.

25072.name: Discover How You can be Multi-Orgasmic
25072.description: Join this lively discussion on Orgasms. Did you know that both men and women can be orgasmic? Did you know that orgasms can last not just seconds or minutes, but can actually last continuously for hours? Discover ancient secrets of breath, sound, and movement to take your orgasm into whole new worlds.

25073.name: Make Your Own Tutu
25073.description: It's Tutu Tuesday, but you didn't bring a tutu? No stress! Come along and make your own no-sew tutu. We provide the materials and your colourful tutu is yours to keep.

25074.name: Taste the Rainbow, Lick the Whore 3: Forever Queer
25074.description:
Maybe you attended the inaugural ball in 2015? Maybe you danced on the speakers in 2016?
Well now it's 2017 and it's time to rise up and proclaim we are FOREVER QUEER! Let's stand together, celebrate, and dance!
This is a party for everyone and everybody. Bring your friends and a great attitude. Park across the Esplanade by the Pegacorn and bike racks!

25075.name: Playa Virgin Sacrifices
25075.description: Bring us your playa virgins to sacrifice to the volcano god, Tectonic!  Virgins with IDs get consentually disoriented and tequila'd.

25076.name: Hip Hop Happy Hour
25076.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
25076.description: How ya livin Biggie Smalls? The playa's first hip hop happy hour is BACK with facepainting, grown-folks vodka lemonade & photos on Sesame Street!
25076.hostedByCamp: Street Life Camp Hip Hop Jams

25077.name: Black Rock City Airport Social Party
25077.description:
Black Rock City Airport is a happening place!   
The Black Rock Travel Agency Social Party & Meet n' Greet is the place to be!
Hosted at the Star Port Lounge, the very tall and amazing shade structure with crow's nest look-out on top, in the center of the Airport Village.
Live music, refreshing chilled beverages, and possibly yummy sustenance to help keep your body powered-up to party-on!
Bring your live act.... music, dance, poetry, magic, special drinks & culinary wonders.....or what ever you have and share it with others!
Be there after you've been in the air!  
Black Rock City Airport.... 
Where we "Fly the Playa"
Lovingly brought to you by Black Rock Travel Agency, with hugs & kisses!!

25078.name: PROTEST NO-THING!
25078.description:
Do you have nothing you feel strongly about? No convictions that keep you awake at night? Are you outraged by the lack of affairs at this time in this place? If so, join us in fighting against NO-THING we stand for! Stand up for the NO-THING we do stand for! Together, We will Unite for Collective action as we PROTEST NO-THING!

What you will need:

Outrage! We must stand united to rally against NO-THING.
 
Thick Skin! Literally. It gets f-ing hot in the desert and playa dust can hurt your eyes and throat. Dress accordingly. Stay hydrated. 
 
The Ability to Rhyme! To have a lasting impact on passersby and to CLEARLY COMMUNICATE our message, so our fellow civilly disobedient can JOIN US in fighting for our cause, we will need you to yell a rhyming chant (because they're easier to remember). 
 
The Willingness to Not Get Arrested! Who are we kidding, Black Rock rangers are cool.
 
Strong Sign Holding Skills! This is where we need YOU to shine. Grab a sign. Declare (or don’t) your opposition to NO-THING!

Also, punch and pie.

#protestnothing

* We will meet at the Last Resort Country Club (10 & Kundalini) at Sunrise Saturday, 0630-0700, and will proceed to march out into the open playa to make our voices heard! Together! United! In solidarity against NO-THING!

25079.name: Black Rock City Airport Pancake Breakfast
25079.description:
Hot Pancakes with airplanes on the side....  
That's the Black Rock City Airport - Black Rock Travel Agency Thursday morning Pancake Breakfast!
We've got cakes on the griddle and flying machines in the air!  
All to be gifted to your little dusty self.... see how much we love you!
You better come early, cause the Cakes Run Out and the pilots stop gifting rides.....all in time!
Hosted at the Star Port Lounge, the amazing shade structure with the crow's nest look-out on top, in the center of the Airport Village.
Be there... or be pancake-less on the ground!

25080.name: Black Rock Travel Agency, Airport Cocktail Party
25080.description:
Black Rock Travel Agency, Airport Cocktail Party is the place to be Saturday afternoon!   Refreshingly cool beverages, Classic Sargent Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club tunes & Yummy things to snack on....like Pilots!
There's no better place to settle-down, drink-up & chill-out .....  so you'll be ready to Fire-up and Power-on..... to the Man Burn and into the night!
Oh, and did I say....  there's Pilots!
Lovingly brought to you by Black Rock Travel Agency..... with kisses!

25081.name: The Burner Dating Game
25081.description: Looking for love? Come on dowwwwn! Each round three lucky contestants will vie for a playa date with a hidden bachelor(ette) by answering awkward, bizarre, and intimate questions in front of a living studious audience.  Hilarity! Prizes!  Stick around afterward for our 80's Homecoming Dance!

25082.name: Radical Communion at the Temple
25082.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 11 a.m. – 11:45 a.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 11 a.m. – 11:45 a.m.
25082.description: Experience a Eucharist (communion) at the Temple - just like the early church did in the deserts of the Middle East.   No religious affiliation required - just an interest in this ceremony commemorating the Last Supper that has been shared by Christians for over 2000 years.  Will be celebrated by the Reverends Brian Baker and Amelie Wilmer, two Episcopal priest. Blessings will be offered after the service.

25083.name: Art Yoga with Sharon DeMattia
25083.description:
What if you could feel totally uninhibited and completely free being yourself in the world? What would that look like?

Visualize yourself on canvas where you are the Magician, the Artist and the Art.  Your soul finds a safe space from which to speak as you create an anonymous inner-self portrait.  You unify your external life with your internal, build a bridge from head to heart, and create the alignment necessary to do your work in the world. You portrait becomes your compass with which to navigate through chaos.

Afterwards, you can offer your portrait at the temple during your own radical ritual

25085.name: WORDLESS: The Art of Sound, Deep Playa Art Piece
25085.description: Join us for a sacred sound gathering at the WORD structure. Bring your singing bowls as we collectively tune into the playa vibration with our positive intentions. We will begin gathering by the structure THURSDAY around 5 pm until after sunset.  Location will be at 11:11 half way between the Man and the Fence.

25087.name: Shabbat Dinner for the Playa
25087.description: Merkabah invited all burners to join our Shabbat ritual and feast.

25088.name: Pee-Cone Pie
25088.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 3 p.m. – 5 p.m.
25088.description:
Pee-Cone Pie Stand distributing individually wrapped pink flexible lady Pee-Cones complete with a slice of Homemade Pecan Pie. This little doodad is a survival tool that'll give gals a bottle full of relief in deep playa. 

Hurry while supplies last! First come, first served, one per vagina or similar!

Come for the Pecan Pie, stay for the David Bowie Dance Party: Deep Cuts, B-Sides, and Rarities. BYOB

**Located near the BLACKSTAR Vinyl Sanctuary behind the Palenque Norte Lecture Tent & Full Circle Tea House

25089.name: B.R.C. BLACKSTAR Bowie Sanctuary Inculcation Rite
25089.time:
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 9 p.m. – 11:30 p.m.
25089.description: Discover the Mysteries of David Bowie's Final Work, BLACKSTAR in Analogue Sound & Grasp the Key to Ever-Lasting Life ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Auspices to commence upon confirmed visual of first of star light  ~  9pm  ~  Nightly Rite Services:  *Order of the B(owl)ie Brotherhood Inductions     *Administration of the B’eucharist     *Revelation of the Key to the Mysteries      *Listening Meditation on THE VINYL RECORD +3     *Nightly Awarding of BLACKSTAR Iron-on Patches  *Nightly Bike Journey 'Beyond The Man' in search of LAZARUS (Optional)   *****    Wednesday Night: Join Later-Day Dudeist, Abbot of the ILDic Order, and Scribe of the B(owl)ie Brotherhood, Playa-Name-Pending in ‘his-&-hers’ 2nd Consecration of the Hallowed BlackStar Vinyl Sanctuary, following the Pee-Cone Pie Stand Bowie Dance Party (3-5pm) and Bowie Live Series (5-9pm), BYO Bike, Light, Buzz & Back-Support

25090.name: Come be a Postal Worker for an hour or a day!
25090.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
Thursday, August 31st, 2017 10 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
25090.description: The 3:00 Post Office loves volunteers to serve our many customers and also deliver mail around the Playa.  However, we have very high customer service standards and invite you to participate in training on how to best elicit creative performances from our customers in return for postcards and stamps and tips on leveraging food/drinks/favors in return for delivering mail on the Playa.

25091.name: Puppy Party!
25091.description: Kick off your Wednesday evening fun at Psychedelic Puppy! Free drinks, live DJs, and transfixing LED visuals! What more could you ask for!?

25092.name: Untraditional Love Tarot
25092.time:
Monday, August 28th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, August 30th, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
Friday, September 1st, 2017 1 p.m. – 2 p.m.
25092.description: You're privileged and you've chosen the desert. If love deals you a bad hand, find a new deck. Enjoy an untraditional love tarot reading from a cardist inspired by his heartbreak sustained at Arcosanti. The value of our interaction is based on your investment. Your vulnerability will be met with security.

25093.name: Stage Combat Workshop
25093.description:
Have you ever wanted to get in a fight, but not actually hurt anyone? Here's your chance!

This workshop will teach you some of the hidden techniques in stage fight choreography. In this hour class, we'll focus on the proper stance, sound effects, reactions, and basic physical maneuvers - slaps, jabs, and kicks. By the end of the workshop, you'll have a short routine memorized - and if you bring your phone, we'll help you record a short video clip!

Bringing a partner is encouraged but not required.

25110.name: Canjo making workshop
25110.description:
Can you canjo? (Hint: you can!)

WE'RE GOING TO MAKE CANJOS. IT WILL BE AWESOME.

I'll bring the hardware, you bring the cans, and we'll turn all that into fully functioning stringed and fretted instruments! Hoedown optional.

25114.name: Burning Aerial with Cyn
25114.description: How high are you?  Want to go higher!?  Come join us for our aerial silks BASIC skills class and get your feet off the playa and all tied up in silk.

25116.name: 2nd Annual High Noon New Mexico Grito Competition
25116.description: A distinctive yell speaks to the soul.  As we hit the halfway point through our burn, join us to see who can greet the day the loudest and proudest!  People can yell con o sin liquor!

25120.name: Cacao & Dance Ceremony with Wild Sirenda
25120.description: Join Guinevere and Lizz, in front of the Kazbah pyramid, in a potent journey to activate and awaken the heart through the union of cacao and dance. Experience the magic of this ancient Mayan medicine as we come together in sacred ceremony to drink an elixir of heart opening cacao, make our intentions and dance wildly into the night. Wild Sirenda will be hosting the ceremony and taking us on a journey with music and live vocals as we go deep into the sunset.

25125.name: Chakra Play for Intimate Partners
25125.description:
Sensual Chakra Play by Blaze ( Ramone)
            For intimate partners
Come explore the seven levels of intimacy with your partner through contact yoga, sensual massage, and compassionate communication.  Take your relationship through trust building and passion ignition. Be prepared to give and receive in this clothing optional, no camera zone of intimate exploration.
Bring towels and mats.

25128.name: B.E.D. Clarity & Consent Playshop
25128.description: Join Tectonic and the folks at B.E.D.: Bureau of Erotic Discourse for a playshop on the essentials of consent. Learn about the 11th Principle with real stories and practice scenarios. Leave empowered with the knowledge to create better erotic experiences for you and your community.

25142.name: Ayurvedic Rituals on Playa
25142.description: How to stay balanced, naturally energize the body, & stay cool. Explore who you are, uplift energy levels with special pranayama (breathing technique).

25152.name: BAD EROTICA READING HOUR, By Kim
25152.description: BAD EROTICA READING HOUR, By Kim.  Come listen to our very own Uli, Kim, while she reads, bad erotica.
